links_reviews_text: The shorts were a little longer than expected and the waist was loose but a belt helped!

LOVED this piece. I have pretty thick thighs which can make jeans/jean shorts an issue. I also have a long torso which can make rompers challenging. But this fit perfectly! Waist was a little big, but wouldn't have been able to go down a size bc of legs/butt. Overall LOVED it! My boyfriend said I looked like I had walked right out of an 80's sitcom lol.
Fits well. The shorts were a little baggy but they were still super cute. I'm busty so i paired it with a crop and a belt to make it look fashionable!

I love the coverage and versatility of this piece. You could wear a fitted short sleeve shirt under it, a tank top and keep front button open a bit, wear Birkenstock's or tennis shoes or boots even! It fits a little looser than what I had hoped for, but it does resemble the pic! I'd have sizes down to the XS in hindsight.
I loved this a lot more then I thought I would. It fit well and it's an easy, cute look for summer.
Super cute denim romper, looks cute with sandals or sneakers. Fit was good, maybe a little on the big side.
Was very unsure about this but absolutely loved it. Wore for errands, brunches, vacation and would definitely rent again! Fits true to size.
This is the first RTR that I've worn from my first order and it didn't disappoint me, i love the fit and felt confident wearing it! Definitely happy!

I never wear rompers because I have a short torso and a big butt- but this romper is PERFECT. So comfy, so versatile, lots of compliments wherever I wear it. Truly considering buying it because it is a perfect piece of clothing. RENT THIS!!!!! You will not regret it.
Got lots of compliments but a bit tight and short for my comfort... Will try the small next time

Never thought I would be in a jean one-piece. However, I tried this on during visiting the flagship store in NYC and fell in love with the fit. I got an X SMALL but usually where a small / medium depending on stretch. This outfit was great, a small would have been perfect but I was heading to a wedding in Nashville and needed to have a denim outfit for the night before the wedding outing. Simple outfit to dress up. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Tricky to style without looking too NASCAR
links_reviews_text: It's a denim romper... definitely a little tricky to style this one. Wore these with some clean white sandal slides and simple accessories. The material is heavier denim than I'd anticipated so not the best for a very hot summer day.

links_reviews_title: Casual & cute - fit perfectly TTS but for some reason just didn't love
links_reviews_text: This was a cute jumpsuit, and super comfortable. It fit TTS everywhere. Idk why I just didn't love it, i really wanted to!!! I took this on vacation and it was a hit.
I would definitely recommend. Not as heavy as I expected which was a plus. Fit well.

This piece was amazing - fabric was great quality, not too think to wear in FL heat. Fit was perfect, it's normally hard to find rompers that fit my long torso but I had no problems with this piece. I will rent again!
I found the thighs to be too roomy and the overall fit a bit odd. It looked too much like I was going to chop wood. Pass.

links_reviews_title: Relax and have fun...Great option for causal wear!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an outdoor music and wine festival. This was a cute and easy option for a full day spent outside. I wore the large because the XL was way too baggy. I couldn't have gone any smaller due to it being tight at the midriff.

links_reviews_title: Everyone thought it was super cute and asked where I found it.
links_reviews_text: Really cute and flattering, might have wanted to try an XS but it fit really well anyway!

Better suited for longer torsos. Mine looks like a 2 piece almost, but it's still fun. I'm a 4 top, 6/8 bottom and the 6 is great. I've got bigger thighs and they don't feel crushed. Would rent again.
The fit on me was just okay. I'm 5'9, between a 4/6. Worth a rent :)
It was cute, but didn't get to wear it because it runs small. Definitely not forgiving in the tummy.
This romper fit great! It was 100% comfortable and easy to style in different ways. I'll have to remember to take a photo next time I rent this one. ;)
I mean I like it, I looked a little frumpy in it, but if you're smaller can be a good look (5'5 160lbs) wore a medium
Runs really big, size down!

links_reviews_title: Fun, different way to wear denim!
links_reviews_text: Instead of your usual summer jean shorts or skirt, this was the perfect change in denim! Looked so cute and wore a lacy tank under it to add some color. Loved this!
Loved this, such a comfy, relaxed look and feel. Would rent again

Super cute for everyday. The denim was thick, not as soft as I would prefer. It also made it a bit hot for most of the summer. The shorts were a tad short also. Overall, I enjoyed it and wore it several times. I may consider renting again.

I loved this romper! I want to live in it. I got so many compliments wearing it and it was so comfortable. The only problem was how hot I got wearing it in the dead of summer but honestly it was worth it.
Fits true to size or maybe slightly big. Comfortable - I wore it on a hot day and wasn't too hot like you would imagine a Jean romper might make you. Easy to take off to go to the bathroom.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for a country party here in Texas!
links_reviews_text: I am an hour glass figure and I filled it out just right with some wiggle room. I had a lot of fun in this cute thing!
Perfect!
I received many compliments wearing this and it was great for everyday wear

This was unbelievably cute! Not too short, stretchy, and super easy to wear. I have a long torso so sometimes these don't work for me, but these were perfect. The arm holes were smaller too so you couldn't see my underwear...bonus. :-)

This romper was cute and fun, classic denim like you'd expect from Levis - sturdy & comfy. I'm somewhat short-torsoed so there was a bit of extra fabric that folded at the waist, still flattering. My only complaint was the arm openings were slightly over-large for me and my bra peeked out a bit

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear this piece, due to sizing issues.
links_reviews_text: Looked amazing from the waist up, but the bottom half was simply way too large, almost as if it was mis-sized.
So fun and casual for running errands.
This romper is great for summer. Very well mAde and easy to pair with lots of accessories. True to side, However- if your behind is curvy get one size up. You are welcome :)
I'm 5'4" and this was huge on me! If you have a long torso this might fit okay but it was very long on me.
Didn't end up wearing, size small was way too large and looked like I was wearing a box

highly recommend this for any causal wknd trips. really cute and easy to take off/put on. i'm typically a small and this fit w room all around, but i used a belt bag so it didn't look as loose. highly recommend!
Very heavy and warm. Wouldn't rent again.
This one is kindof itchy- I like the tunic length (I'm only 5'3"). Overall I liked it for work (paired with sanctuary pants from RTR) but wouldn't run out and buy this one
Thick and cozy. Warm for cold days. Not the most flattering sweater, but that's ok.

One of my favorite rentals ever. For a cozy day - perf for winter running errands or brunch. So comfy and still really pretty. Great shape. I'm between M and L, M was perfect. Wish it was less expensive, would love to buy.
Warm and comfy. Can feel it's high quality. Perfect cut!
chunky knit, perfect navy, not so flattering on my apple shape, but still wore it as perfect for cold outdoor day.
Super warm and cozy but not particularly spectacular
Very heavy sweater, great for very cold climate. The front center braid makes for a lumpy backside that was not flattering.
Soft and comfy, not itchy at all. Braid detail elevates what is otherwise a classic, simple sweater. I enjoyed wearing it. Size down if you don't want oversized look.

links_reviews_title: Not as structured as I'd hoped but I used it and it went with my outfit

links_reviews_text: This bag is mostly structured without being overly formal. It fits a ton of things and was easy to carry over arm my arm or shoulder with the longer strap.

links_reviews_title: fun long vest, would be ideal for holiday szn
links_reviews_text: So I didn't have the right event to wear these vest, but paired with Jeans and a black long sleeve & booties. Was cute and fun. Couldn't reallllly tell it was blue unless in very direct / bright light.
I loved this piece. It adds drama to an otherwise boring work ensemble. The pockets come in handy too.

links_reviews_title: This is the best piece I've rented from RTR!
links_reviews_text: It is very high quality and really elevated the look of my outfit.

links_reviews_title: One of my fave RTR rents so far!!
links_reviews_text: This vest was magical. So luxe - felt like a star in it and got tons of compliments!
LOVED this. The blue color is BEAUTIFUL. I am 5'3" so with heels it hit the perfect length. Paired this with faux leather leggings and a black top for a holiday gathering. Also has pockets!

links_reviews_title: A great fashion forward vest in crushed velvet.
links_reviews_text: The picture does not do it justice. The crushed velvet is a deep, rich purple/blue. My only complaint was that the lapels flaps open so I had to do a quick stitching to hold them in place. For reference, I am 5'4" tall, 32C bust, 129 pounds.
I loved this so much and wore it a couple times.. hard to give back! It's a little more subdued than I expected, but it picks up light really well. A good style piece to layer over basics.

When I rented it, I felt it was a little out of my comfort zone...but it was amazing. I wore it with black skinnies and a long sleeve black top. I felt fierce in it and got so many compliments. I highly recommend. My only aside is that multiple people stroked the fabric because it's very touchable and luxurious. So be warned...

links_reviews_title: Cute but blue color was hard to spot unless you look closely!
links_reviews_text: Love me a good suede menswear vest! Soft, subtly dressy vibe but still edgy enough that it caught people's attention. Wore this to a work networking event and it was such a perfect outfit for it. Professional, fancy and you can dress it down or up and wear day or night! Perfect with boots and black and chunky accessories

This is a great piece and I actually thought about purchasing it. I likely could have gone w a size 40 just as well although I didn't feel the 42 was really big or anything. It's a great piece to dress up something you already have and a good party piece. Looks good w boots as well as flats and heels. It's also wrinkle proof so perfect for travel!
I wore this to the theater over the holidays with leggings and a tunic top but also plan to wear it again with pants and a blouse on a work trip this week. It feels amazing and the color is so rich.
I didn't want to send this one back, subtle but luxurious, I had this over the holidays and wore to a couple different events. Fit great, not to heavy, something different and fun!
Wore this with black leggings and a black long-sleeve shirt. It was absolutely gorgeous.

I got the medium because the small wasn't available. It was too big for me and a bit too long for me. But, I loved the color and wish it would have worked. I noticed that it was hard to keep the collars down though when I tried it on.
Wore it to work.. great pop of color for a comfy day!
Cute for work, the shoulders were big, and I have big shoulders, may want to size down. But fun for work!
a little too tight in the chest. did not wear
Wore this with belted (my own) over a dress shirt and black jeans. Really comfy, and functional pockets were nice.
Beautiful, but very heavy weight.
Very unique shirt, fun for casual work day or the weekend. Fit really well, would rent again!

Wore this for a casual day out at breweries in town. Loved it paired with a bomber for when it got a little chillier. It's nice and soft, less baggy than I assumed it would be. If you're between sizes, I'd say size up (normally a S, but was 14w pregnant, only slightly showing, when I wore it and I definitely could have used a M).
Definitely see through so will need a cami under it.

links_reviews_title: Was a great comfortable vacation appropriate sweater
links_reviews_text: Fit is a little loose, maybe could size down, but that might affect how the shoulders fit. Was cute and comfortable for a day out and about in the city!
I'm pretty sure I had this top as a toddler in the early 80s, and that is fine with me . Adorable . It was a little shorter than I would have liked, but otherwise fit great.

Runs slightly large so depending on how you like things to fit your normal size could work for you or you may want to size down. I wore this a few times while on vacation in Oregon this summer and loved it!
This was fun to wear, with unexpected colors. It is a bit translucent.
Super cute, hit right at the hips. Got lots of compliments!
It fits well and I like the fabric. However, it is definitely sheer and requires a nude colored bra.
It's a cute top, but nothing special. You could wear it for many different occasions depending on the rest of your outfit choices.

links_reviews_title: fit super weird! not a fan
links_reviews_text: fit super weird! not a fan
I went with a smaller size to give it more of a mod look. Very light sweater material. Was a bit see-through but nothing crazy (I wore it to work).
Great for that spring weather between hot and cold. Will be great to wear for the day when the weather starts off cool and warms up mid day. Nice color and fabric.
Looks better on the model. Ran a little big. Size down. Would have been cuter if it were smaller.
Great sweater - does not fit as loose as shown on the model but super cute and very comfortable!
Light weight. Fits true to size. Short/cropped.
I'm a fabric person so I only gave it 4 stars for being a bit too lightweight and not soft. And the ties are sewn in unevenly, odd. But it's cute on.

links_reviews_title: Light weight, edgy and very comfy!
links_reviews_text: I was able to use this to layer and also alone. The front was s little low cut to wear it as a normal sweater over a normal T-shirt but had a loose fit and good length in the arms, slightly boxy but exactly what I was looking for

This sweatshirt was adorable! It's great for everyday wear and fun to wear during the weekends! It does run a little bit small but does have some stretch. It looks great with a pair of jeans and boots or cute sneakers! The tie-up in the front really makes the sweatshirt that much better.

I thought this top would be a little roomier and the sleeves a bit longer. It was snug in the arms and the sleeves weren't anything like the picture of the model. I was disappointed that it didn't have a high-end look or feel even though it was casual. So back it went.
Super cute shirt. Really comfortable. Loved the lace up feature of this shirt.

Fits great, a little short, maybe 3 inches below belly button. I wore it with some dark red jeans. Since there's nowhere much to go during quarantine, I wore it to the mailbox. My neighbor said I looked cute and nautical.

links_reviews_title: The neckline was fun and interesting.
links_reviews_text: Arms were very tight.
Great spring/summer sweatshirt for chilly days, works well with jeans, shorts, leggings

links_reviews_title: tight sleeves and shorter than I thought
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were tight length was short. I'm typically a M and for the loose/ casual style I was going for I would likely need an XL
Cute but would never buy it for this price. Too casual for work. Can't dress it up for evening. But for day time everyday wear--it is comfortable and unique.
Fine rental for a weekend; wore running errands. Very thick material. I found this is be insanely low cut and adjusting the laces did nothing.
A little short so I wore a tank underneath. It was a cute shirt for errands
Tight in arms and chest
Cute weekend shirt. Sleeves were tight
Sadly ended above belly button on me. I'm 5' 7".
Sleeves barely went to my wrists and the shirt length barely went to my waistband.
I'm an apple shape and this top just made me look fat.
Ran very small!

links_reviews_title: fun times with friends. Casual and sexy apres ski! perfect under fun jacket and with leggings/jeans
links_reviews_text: relaxed and fun! lots of compliments!
All good but arms were tight\ which made it uncomfortable.
Nice and easy
I really limed this shirt. The shoelace front makes it so cute

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and decent for weekend errands.
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size and is flattering. I wore it with jeans and felt put together enough for weekend errands. The string was twisted and needed to be ironed, but I didn’t bother since I wore a coat outside anyway.

links_reviews_title: Not great for tall and curvy
links_reviews_text: The fabric is thicker than it looks in the photos, so it actually looked chunkier than I expected. Also, at 5'9", the length was a bit short, not covering the 'baby bump' area very well. I wore it, but wouldn't want to buy it.
A bit boring and thin

links_reviews_title: Super cute but was too small and couldn't wear!
links_reviews_text: Arms were too small
Was a bit tight in the arms, but not as short as I thought it was going to be in the torso.
I assumed given the picture that this would run a little large, but it's true to size. I'd size up to get the aesthetic in the picture. Sent back without wearing, but it's very cute!
I did not wear this because the sleeves were tight and it was cropped on me. I was hoping to wear it on our Canadian cottage vacation.
Great with jeans and sneaks.

Loved this sweatshirt, I can see myself wearing it all year long. only reason it got 4/5 stars is it seems my strings shrunk so it doesn't lace up all the way. other than that I really love this shirt!
easy fit casual top
it was too tight on the arms and chest to give off the cute "chill chic" look I hoped for

links_reviews_title: It's good for hanging around the house and doing chores
links_reviews_text: Even though I'm short waisted the top was very short. It came to the top of my jeans and the arms were too short.
I wore the bejeezus out of this top over Christmas break. It's a little baggy but the tie detail is playful and reveals just enough skin. Perfect for a sporting event, hanging out or traveling.

links_reviews_title: Perfect still warm pullover for when you never want to see black again.
links_reviews_text: When it arrived it seems to have been shrunk. (I did not wash it myself - did not want to risk further shrinking.) The sleeves are more like 3/4 and the length is almost a crop. Still, I layered it over a long tank and enjoyed wearing it.
Eyecatching details.. perfect pair for a classic white converse and jeans

While I know I have a long torso, for a large the length was meant for a more petite sizing. It was like a crop top on me. The sleeve length appeared longer than the length of the body just taking it out of the bag. Very disappointed

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable everyday sweater. Wore it twice while I had it as a rental!
links_reviews_text: I am very tall and this runs a bit short like a crop so I paired it with a shirt underneath.
I love this jacket! I like my jackets baggier so I got a 6 (normally a size 2) and it was perfect! Only thing I didn't like is that it didn't have front pockets.

It is so adorable! It's heavier than it looks because it has a light padded lining, so be prepared for that. This jacket definitely runs small so size up. Next time, I'm going to get an 8 because I like my jean jackets on the big size but I'll def be renting this again.

Fit was perfect. The print is fun tie dye but understated. Would wear this everyday. Fit well in the shoulders (I have athletic arms and would size to your larger size for this). Usually wear a 4 or 6 and was happy with the 6.
Fits true to size, unusual, but not for everyone.

links_reviews_title: Statement piece for this year's tie-dye trend
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. The jacket actually has a lining so it is warmer than an average thin denim jacket. The pattern is so pretty and on point for the tie dye trend. Pretty versatile & can be paired with lots of stuff.
This was a little stiffer than I'd like, but was a really cute jacket for St.Pattys day and I got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Cute cut - but beware the green
links_reviews_text: I actually really like this jacket, and plan to wear it again. But the picture makes it look tie dyed blue, and it's actually blue and GREEN. And to be honest, the green splotches look a little vomit-y. I decided not to care and just roll with it, but it was a little surprising.

I absolutely loved this jacket. I rented for music shows during SXSW, and in a sea of denim jackets this beauty turned heads. Compliments right and left. The sleeves were a little long, but a single roll of the cuff was all that was needed. The colors are vibrant during the day, somewhat less so after dark but still very unique and fun.
Got tons of compliments, wore for 90s party
Loved, loved, loved. Definitely a fitted jacket. If you like your demin jackets over sized, go up at least 1-2 sizes.
Fits perfect, goes good with everything.
I really love this jacket. It runs a little large so size down. Looks great with a white top. If it were a little more reasonable I would buy it in a smaller size.
Loved this denim jacket! Me and my daughter wore it so many times. Fit so well. I was sad to send it back.
I usually don't like denim jackets because they tend to be stiff, but this was really comfortable. Definitely a little greener than I expected, but I liked it. I'd rent again.
Fun!
Such a fun jacket. Wore it to work and I got so many compliments. Very sturdy denim, and it has a thin lining so it's perfect for the colder months.
All pros in this navy subtle butterfly print light weight dress. It was so comfortable.

I could've worn this dress every night of my birthday weekend. It was absolutely beautiful, and SO unique. Even with long sleeves, a high neck, and calf length hem, I've never felt sexier! Classy and elegant, you'll definitely steal the show in this dress. 10/10 recommend.
fitted and shows the curves perfectly.

This was perfect for a birthday party and was warm enough for NYC weather in January. However, if you are going to be walking long distances the dress will start to ride up to your thighs. If you are in an area where you will be driving and not walking for more than 5 mins it's great! The dress is comfortable and it does show every detail on your body so a slip could be necessary. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I loved that I paired it with a red lip and leather booties.
links_reviews_text: I looked stunning according to my husband. He took one look and his jaw dropped. He definitely loved how the dress hugged my curves. Such a great fit on this mesh dress. I wore spanx under and it looked perfect. I got so many compliments.
Wore this for a party I hosted and loved it. Would wear again on a date with heels or to work with a sweater and flat boots.

I came into the New Year covered in Butterflies and feeling like one, too. Evolved, free and eager to explore and live through whatever is next. The dress fit like a glove but was very comfortable and stretchy. I wore this to a party which was much more dressed down than I'd expected, but still felt great. Sexy + Comfortable = A+ in my book! Such a beautiful dress!
Very flattering for an hourglass or pear shape. Felt sexy while being super comfortable! Can be dresses up or down. Pretty pattern and soft fabric. Loved!
Comfortable Chic dress!!! Worn for holiday party. Many compliments.

This was a beautiful body con dress. It was comfy as well. I felt covered up but sexy too. It was a long dress on me but for reference I am 5'2" and 104 lbs. I wore spanx tights. Maybe a little hard to walk a lot but it was perfect for a dinner and birthday party. I loved it.

I was surprised, by how many compliments i got from man & woman on this seems like simple dress. May be its pattern & sheer sleeves, i could went with M, as its stretch, it will show imperfections- so shape wear needed
Comfortable and chic, I loved everything about this dress! It's s midi and I wore a medium but could have worn a small as well. Super flattering ...ok be renting it again. Love Fuzzi!

links_reviews_title: Blue butterfly hues, light and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Wore for a pre-wedding celebration. Can easily move around, breathable, doesn't ride up, and not itchy. Definitely renting again.

I wore this out for my birthday on a cool evening. It isn't very warm because the material is thin, but it was beautiful! I have some mama softness around my waist, so I wore spanx to smooth some of that out. The dress is not thick enough to do that. I don't love the turtleneck. It is flattering on the model, but not on me-- at least not every angle. Overall it was a beautiful and unique dress, and I'm glad I tried it out.

love this dress, overrunned with compliments. Two layers of fabric and the under one does slide up if your steps are to long, the mesh is in the more covering side so it’s kind of fine. Insanely flattering bc of pattern/fabrics

Love this designer and it came new with tags, always a bonus. So incredibly comfortable, easy to move in, almost felt like I wasn't wearing anything at all. Form fitting but not too tight. I loved the blue butterfly pattern, so many compliments, you can't go wrong with this gem! Ladies you will transform into a beautiful butterfly.
such a cute dress. i love how pretty it is.

links_reviews_title: Much Compliments and it was comfy.
links_reviews_text: Dress was flattering to my body and it's a challenge when you are body conscious. The see-through fabrics was solid and I absolutely the design.
- coverage with flattering fit
Loved wearing this on a night out! It's sexy yet covered from head to toe, a thinner mesh material but I had no issues wearing it during the winter when paired with a warm coat.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and the print is very pretty.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super easy to get into and I loved the fact that the sleeves and bottom most part of the skirt was sheer. The dress is revealing and conservative all at once making it appropriate for multiple occasions. Could be worn with heels or a more casual pair of booties to dress down.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my baby shower 8 months pregnant. It felt and looked amazing.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit if you are pregnant and petite! My big 8 months preggo belly fit in the dress comfortably and yet the rest of the dress did not look big at all. It was perfect I got so many compliments! I am usually a size small, I rented a medium just to be sure I would fit, but don't be afraid to even rent your size as the fabric is made to adjust to your body! This dress is absolutely gorgeous!!
Wore this for a bday dinner and a brunch. Both occasions this was the perfect dress to be festive but not over dressed and SO comfortable. This dress is so so flattering. Lots of compliments
This dress was awesome! I'm 5 months pregnant and it had enough stretch to show off my tiny bump yet also make me feel slim and beautiful.
Upon receiving this dress and trying it on, it felt like it was made for me. It’s very comfortable and the material is breathable. I even wore it a second time to a wedding. I loved this dress!!!

Really love the length, almost floor length but the fit was great so it didn't feel like a shapeless maxi. Wore it to party and got so many compliments. Dress covered me up but I felt super sexy in it. Definitely recommend it!
Looks great on. Material was thinner than I expected. Dress smelled unclean. Like someone else's body odor.

links_reviews_title: Unique look perfect for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress - I am 5'4" and it was way too long so I didn't end up wearing it. The fit was perfect and hugged me in all the right places, however it was too long so the extra fabric was bunchy due to the extra length
Rented this before but we decided not to go out
Difficult fit, even though the shoulders and waist fit; hard to get on.
Super cute, an ode to the 2000's with the mesh material and print. The fit was perfect i would have gone down a size smaller for a snug fit, but i still made the room gag.
Fits like a glove but so do all the dresses by this designer. Received many compliments about the butterflies and how nice the dress fit over all.
Great fit!
This dress was amazing. Truly a masterpiece. A must rent!
Love the long arms and tall neck and a beautiful pattern. Fabric very soft
This dress is awesome, was sad to send it back. Incredibly comfortable, and fits like a glove. I am between an 8-10 and the LE fit perfect.

This jacket fits true to size but the style is meant to look a bit oversized. This style is more of a statement piece than it is an everyday jacket, as I found it challenging to pair with most of my wardrobe.
Went with a M/L for an oversized fit. It's a great acid wash trendy Jean jacket that stands out. Have rented a few times now.
Oversized and fashionable. The oversized look is spot on for those 90s vibes

Was obsessed with this jacket while I rented it and wore it multiple times. It had a good fit and was easy to pair with a variety of things but I liked it most with a pair of jeans and a white shirt underneath. It's a great casual jacket but you could dress it up too. I got a lot of compliments while wearing it.
This denim jacket is the perfect spring layering piece. It is oversized.

links_reviews_title: So cute! Would wear all the time.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Super cute jacket for everyday wear.
Super trendy - perfect for in-between weather! Love love love

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket so much. Got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit right in with my wardrobe. Perfect oversized fit.
This was huge and unwearable. I got an XS/S and it looked ridiculous.
Very oversized - also, the jacket was SO stiff. Didn't feel nice at all.
Runs really large and is quite rigid
I am a true Medium in all garments and I got the ML. It was larger than I had wanted so wish I would have sized down. It's super rad though. Very edgy 80s vibe.

Great jean jacket. I think I'll keep it for a while! I am usually a medium, but as per usual, Allsaints runs large, so the XS/S fits me well. It's a bit large/boxy in the arms, but I rolled and pushed up the sleeves, and it looks just fine.
It is meant to look oversized but I stuck with the XS/S and typically wear a M/L and I was happy with my choice.

links_reviews_title: Great jacket but Way too big!
links_reviews_text: The jacket was amazing but it was so large. I got the Xs/S and I was swimming in it. Way too big to wear
Jacket was pretty and a nice durable material but super oversized! I usually wear xs/0 and am 5'3 (with a short torso) and the jacket was extremely wide and baggy
Jacket was very large
Many compliments
Flattering and adorable. So many compliments!!
Solid long pufffer coat. Kept me warm in 20-30 degree weather. Nothing special about the cut or design, but it's cute enough to do the job.

links_reviews_title: Warm but lightweight for winter trip to Europe
links_reviews_text: Rented this coat for a 10-day trip to Europe in January and it did not disappoint...great length (hit right below my knee and doubled as a blanket on the train) and kept out the wind and some light rain too. Didn't need a ton of other layers - in fact was actually hot the day I wore a thick sweater. Roomy but did not weigh me down and compressed easily when necessary.
I rented this coat to take to Quebec City before Christmas! It was freezing there and this jacket did not disappoint! It is full length but light weight. I loved having it for my trip!
Shielded me head to toe in cold nyc rain. Its pretty warm but not bulky wish I owned this!
Kept me warm in my canada trip during winter. Size is just right, sleeves was a perfect length. Very light to pack and hood is just the right size too - doesn't fall off.

I was underwhelmed by the thickness of this coat. You'd think if you need something this long you'd also need it to be warmer. But! It was about 40 today and very windy so it was nice to have such full coverage without sweating. Great for breaking the wind and covering legs. Hit me at mid calf and I'm 5'6"

links_reviews_title: Puffer coat too long for a 5'4" person
links_reviews_text: Pros: The coat is warm and lightweight; This coat would look stunning on someone tall and thin. Cons: Not flattering on a petite person. I ordered a medium which fit fine through the body, but came to my ankles which made zipping it up awkward, so I wore it once, but open. Honestly, I felt looked ridiculous in it. I think if I had ordered a small it would have been too tight.
Excellent jacket for traveling in the rain/snow! It's nice and sleek too. Almost bought it.
The coat was comfortable warm great for everyday

links_reviews_title: It's super thin, but it worked perfectly...
links_reviews_text: For a quick vacation to NYC in December. It is also known as a sleeping bag coat apparently, runs on the longer side.

I have been looking for a flattering long everyday coat. This coat exceeded my expectation. The coat is midweight, which helps make it flattering and not look like a butterball. Has two zippers, so you can unzip the bottom, if you want more freedom to walk and move your legs.

This fit true to size for J. Crew - I ordered my usual 0. That said, I just didn't find this especially flattering on my petite frame. I wore this to work from home, and it was comfortable, but I just wasn't impressed by it and wouldn't have worn it out. The length overwhelmed me, since I'm short, but the knit itself is very pretty.
I liked the sweater. It was warm and comfortable but I wouldn't say it wowed me on any level.

Rented it for a trip to NYC and it was perfect. I ended up keeping it and rewearing it a couple more times once I got home. Cozy, not itchy and had a nice fit. It's not tight fitting, but hugged in the right places and had a little give in the waist. Highly recommend! #winter #sweater #knits

links_reviews_title: True to size and great fit!
links_reviews_text: Paired it with Sanctuary plaid leggings. A little bit itchy
This is a comfy and not itchy sweater. It is on the longer side which I loved and is perfect to wear with leggings. It's very warm. I plan to rent it again.

I wore it probably 4-5 times throughout the month!! Almost bought it! Will definitely rent again! I wore with jeans for casual & wore with black leather pants & statement necklace to dress it up. Very great sweater! Received a ton of compliments!
I rented this in white and pink and while I'm not a big pink wearer, I found I like the pink better the White was just kind of blah. Still a very comfy and cozy sweater
This sweater is very classy and very warm. It was perfect for a winter day. It's a little baggy so it's not the most flattering fit
I went on vacay to Seattle and needed something warm but cute! This was such an awesome sweater and I felt so good in it! Super warm paired with this Kate Spade jacket!
Super cozy, not itchy, classic

links_reviews_title: We had our family photos taken and they turned out great.
links_reviews_text: It was a really flattering fit for being 8 months pregnant. Very comfortable!

I get that this is maternity, so a bit longer. But it fit very strangely over a 20 week bump. Like it was tighter around my thighs? Almost like it was cut to accommodate bump but then go narrow again. Didn't love it.
I think this sweater is more meant for wintertime than spring time. I found it to be too heavy, and a bit itchy. It was pretty though and I could wear it over leggings easily.
Roomy enough but not too big that it looks messy. Long enough to wear with leggings!

I wore this on the weekend with leggings and to work with nicer slim pants. It's cute and comfy and I love the longer length. It was a bit itchy when I wore only a tank underneath, so the other times I wore it with a thin long sleeve "tissue tee" underneath, and that was perfect.

This is a great piece to rent for a casual day at work or for out and about. The sweater was a little itchy when I first put it on but I got used to it by the time I got to work. I have rented this sweater in pink and didn't have the issue so that's the reasoning for four stars. This is a heavy sweater but not doesn't feel heavy when wearing. I would rent again!
Fit well with leggings for a cold day.
Very flattering on an hourglass figure and such great quality
Great for a cold winter day. It's on the heavier side so I would only wear it in the winter
while the large fit great it did look a little frumpy. however it was so comfy I didn't care
Not too scratchy and thick warm weave

This sweater is the perfect length and weight. It was long enough I could wear it with leggings but it also looked great with jeans. I was concerned about it being too warm when I rented it, but it worked out just fine. Rent it!!
Runs very large - I usually wear 0-2 and xs was too big. Other than that, great dress. Very soft - not scratchy at all.

I was really looking forward to wearing this, but couldn't even wear it for an entire day. The sweater fabric was itchy (even with a shirt underneath!) which is an automatic dealbreaker for me. I got this because I thought it would be an oversized fit, but unfortunately it was oversized in all the weirdest places on me - underarms, back and chest - but got tighter as it came farther down on my body. It's such a shame, because the pattern and color of the sweater is gorgeous.
Nice sweater but runs a bit big. I got several compliments on the weave of the knit.
Sweater is big and comfy. A little itchy due to the wool but was a great piece to throw over some black leggings and bar with OTK boots

Comfortable! I'm a medium petite but ordered a small and this was the perfect amount of oversized. The sleeves were slightly long on me but looked great as is over my palm just a bit or even folded when I preferred out of the way.

links_reviews_title: Itchy, not comfortable and too long
links_reviews_text: N/A

This sweater had an oversized fit which was exactly what I was looking for. The neck wasn't constricting and it was easy to wear over leggings or skinny jeans for a semi-pulled together look when I didn't feel like making an effort!
I wore this a lot. ITCHY, but I adjusted. At 5'6" and 20 weeks pregnant I still was fine in an XS, so I think it runs big. The arms were exactly right but lots of room in the body.
I wish I'd rented this before our weather turned to spring. This sweater was so great, the kind of sweater I've been searching for all winter.
This was very easy to wear and comfortable - not at all scratchy. Next time I would order a medium.
Cute everyday sweater not super soft but doesn't make me look Pregnant. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: It's cute and casual, nice fit and nice quality
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater! Fitted my arms nice and snug but not too tight, and the body fit a little bit loosely. Looks cute with leggings or tight jeans. Very warm!
It was a little bulkier than I expected.
This was great for the cold snaps. It went from paired with leggings cuddled up on the couch to paired with boots and jeans for a trip to the local bar. It's the perfect warm basic.

links_reviews_title: I love this sweater so much I bought it from J. Crew
links_reviews_text: I'm short so this is more of a tunic for me. Wore it over leggings, jeans, etc. It is pretty heavy, so more for when it's actually cold out then when it's just your office air conditioner!
Loose
Cute, comfortable sweater
I really loved the fit of this sweater. I am tall and it was the perfect length to go with leggings. Only negative was the material was a little scratchy but overall a great pick. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Winter dress with a little sparkle
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a winter day with a little sparkle to brighten it up. I love knit dresses and RTR has so many great ones including this one.
Felt like a million dollars in this dress. It is body hugging and in the right light a tad see through. I had to wear Spanxx, and even then shows the fanny pack area. Beautiful colors and well made.
This was a perfect fit for me. The glitter stripes are subtle. The ruffle hem is lovely. Wore it twice. I will be renting it again.
I like this dress but it's a little too short for my height and the dress runs small. The ruffle detail on the neck & sleeves are beautiful and the metallic strips are fun.

I absolutely adored this dress. It's a thick knit that doesn't wrinkle so it was nice for travel. It retained its shape very well and the sparkly thread was not itchy at all. I wore it out to dinner with flats one night and then to work with tights and boots another. I loved the ruffle detail around the neck and sleeves and it was a nice length. The length was good for work, but it was pretty fitted around the butt. I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Love the feminine design and beautiful colors
links_reviews_text: This dress fits great, very feminine and shows off the curves. Beautiful colors and some sparkling weaved in the colors. Love the dress. Wore to work, makes me look thinner.
Such a fun dress. A little fun and glitter.

links_reviews_title: Loves this fun and festive dress
links_reviews_text: If you like glitter and ruffles in an understated way, this is a great dress for your holiday event. I wore it to play music on Thanksgiving and again at a reception.

links_reviews_title: Runs small order one size up.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a large in this brand and this dress was tight and shorter than I expected.

links_reviews_title: Nice sparkle on a winter day
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress and colors. Super cute once on. It is however very tight, though stretchy. If you dont like body con dresses this is definitely not for you. Size up for most, it's hard to get on. Beware even though this is a turtleneck dress the material is not that warm.
The dress was very short

links_reviews_title: Such a great dress! Loved the fit and I'm 5"3 and it wasn't too long which was perfect!
Super cute dress but a little bit sheer so wouldn't recommend for work

links_reviews_text: I wore this at 22 weeks pregnant. The fabric is stretchy and smooth so it is very forgiving. The stripes aren't too sparkly in person, just the right amount of festive. The ruffle starts right under your butt so it is a little on the shorter side. I am 5 2 so I thought it was perfect. Hit just below my knees. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it was just a little loose in the arm area.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, comfy and classy!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting
Very nice for work, good for a tall gal. Super cute bottom ruffle and sparkle. Definitely size up.

This dress has just the right amount of sparkle to stand out, but is classy and professional enough for work. I paired with black suede boots and felt amazing all day. Not itchy and very figure flattering even with my curvy shape. I received compliments ALL Day. Would buy!!!
Nice but I was not expecting the stripes to be metallic. It was cute enough but too dressy for day and not a knockout for night. Great fit and length.
This has a subtle festive look. The stripes are a lurex thread which does not show up in the photo. When you first put it on it's quite snug, however it loosens up to fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Cute & festive, but rough / scratchy material
links_reviews_text: I was surprised this looked so cute on, I was apprehensive, but the cut with ruffle at bottom was flattering and made it not feel too short. The glittery stripes make it perfect for a holiday event / party. It is tight and you do have to pull over your head, so I suggest not putting lotion, makeup, or deo on until after dress is on. Do your hair after putting it on, too. Drawbacks:it is a little see through on bottom (I suggest tights or black nylons to help with this). It's also a bit rough on the skin.

Rented with my unlimited and very happy with this dress. It has a little sparkle but not too much. Great fit. I thought it would be more sweatery but it's actually more of a thin stretch fabric. So good if you are going to be in a warm party or place. Knee length on my petite frame.

I rented this for a holiday party at 8.5 months pregnant and it did not disappoint. Just the right amount of sparkle and formality for a daytime event. It was very comfortable and only a tiny bit short due to my belly. Very pretty in person.

links_reviews_title: Not at all like the pic
links_reviews_text: Idk if I didn't notice in the pic but the stripes on the dress are very metallic. It's not at all a sweater dress which I thought it looked like. I wear a 6/8 and the medium was tiny. Too short, too tight, not flattering or work appropriate.
I rented this for everyday wear and it was perfect. The colors are gorgeous and there is a little sparkle in the fabric. Its not the softest top but it was still comfortable.
Loved this sparkly sweater
Simple top with added sparkle! The colors are great and the sparkle gives an otherwise simple top some added fun. The only thing is I felt this was a little itchy

This does run small, I'm always a medium and rented a large based on other reviews and it was for sure the right call. This sweater was totally my vibe, basic (in a good way) and understated, but with enough sparkle to stand out. It's warm and not itchy, perfect for San Diego "winter"
The sweater was a bit thin and scratchy but otherwise cute and comfortable after the first few minutes.
I love this crew neck cut reminds me of the good ol 90's! So cute and fancy enough to wear with a skirt!
Really itchy and uncomfortable I didn't wear this
Not very soft at all. It also runs small. I rented for work but just wore on the weekend to run errands.
So many compliments! Cute and comfy, easy to dress up or down. Went with so many bottoms

links_reviews_title: I never want to return it.
links_reviews_text: This top is thin, which makes it great to wear under a warm jacket. The sparkle is perfect- not over the top so it can be work to work, but enough of a statement to transition the piece into evening activities. It looks great with denim or dress pants. Cannot say enough good things about it.

Rented with my unlimited for work and the weekend. I went up a size based on other reviews and that was probably unnecessary but still fit great. The colors with the slight sparkle are perfect for both work and going out. As another reviewer said, the sparkle woven into the fabric seems like it will be itchy when you first put it on, but it's not at all. I love renting these funky scotch and soda tops from RTR and this was another winner.
Easily layered for mid-western weather, and transition from day to night.

Loved this lightweight sweater with subtle sparkle to it. I thought it was going to be slightly see through but i was able to wear without a tank top no problem. Wore this about 3 times and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: the sparkles were so pretty. and I loved how long the sleeves were.
links_reviews_text: not very soft, and a little see through. But nothing an undershirt couldn't handle. I loved this shirt. I wore it out for date night to the casino, with ripped jeans, and glitter sneakers. I loved this sweater.
Cute and sparkly sweater. Runs a bit small. Typically I wear a size small top and I ordered a medium in this and it was snug. Fit more like a small but still doable.
Cute, a little too sparkly for my taste but will rent again closer to the holidays. I'm usually a medium and the large fit perfectly.

Nice lightweight sweater. The colors are great and I really liked the little bit of shimmer in the fabric that dressed it up just a little bit. Easy to dress up or down. Comfortable and fits true to size.
LOVED this blazer and got compliments all day long. Flattering cut, fun pattern, and good material.
Loved the look and the fit. Nice fabric.
Perfect for work
This blazer is really cool. It's a versatile piece. I wore it several times for business related events and also more casually. Would love to own it and would rent again!

If your feel you have a similar body type to me, RENT THIS BLAZER. I have truly never experienced a better and more comfortable fit. My coworkers asked if it was tailored! Got so many compliments and will definitely rent again
Fit perfectly! Wore with an all white outfit. Looked so chic!
Jacket was absolute perfection! I wore for a conservative work event where I wanted to both fit in and stand out. Lots of compliments.

Lots of compliments super great blazer fitted but meant to be worn unbuttoned. Super tempted to buy this but I have too many other temptations in a holding pattern. Good for all seasons not to heavy and light enough to wear a light sweater underneath will transition well through seasons and has killer potential with jeans . Will rent again for sure.

links_reviews_title: Great Pattern, Flattering Cut, Size Up
links_reviews_text: Oddly, this fit in the arms and shoulders, but was too snug around the boobs and mid section -- usually I have the opposite problem with blazers. Very flattering fitted cut for curves girls, a little give in the blazer, but not too much. Just should have gone up a size. I wore it once open and it was cute.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but didn't fit
links_reviews_text: I loved the quality and pattern of this blazer but it was too tight across the shoulders. I sent it back without wearing because I didn't think I could type at my desk comfortably In it. Womp womp.
I love Tanya Taylor blazers - they fit so nicely. I loved pairing this with a white tank underneath .
Many people commented on how great this blazer looked. Very comfortable Fit was perfect
So much so that it didn't flatter and the boxy cut and wide-set buttons didn't help. Cute print and a really nice piece otherwise! I might size down and try it again some day.
Runs a bit big in the shoulders and arm length but overall a killer fall blazer. Got so many compliments!

I really liked wearing this and was sad to send it back. I wore it to work in a business casual environment with dark jeans. It's flexible in that it can be dressed up or down. Would rent again for sure! I'm between a 6 and an 8 and went with the 8. It was a little snug in the shoulders, but fine with a light weight shirt underneath.

links_reviews_title: Not bad, but I wouldn't rent again
links_reviews_text: I liked this blazer enough to wear it, but I wouldn't rent it again. This blazer is slightly fitted at the waist, so not a boxy/rectangular shaped blazer. Because it's more fitted, it doesn't look great if you wear it unbuttoned. The bottom portion of the blazer awkwardly flaps out. I think on most people, this blazer would look better buttoned up but I didn't love how that looked on me personally. I ended up wearing it unbuttoned and just let the bottom portion hang weirdly.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this one!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Wore it just as pictured and received lots of compliments. Great classic look for work. A little warm for the Florida weather but luckily I was inside most of the day. Would love to rent again when its cooler.
Ordered a size up for a roomier fit ti wear with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Looks great with jeans or black pants.
links_reviews_text: Runs just a smidge small--I'm going to return for a 12.
Very flattering, fit well, got lots of compliments. Fits TTS
A great twist on the jacket, a conservative cut but cool fabric. Plaid is everywhere this fall, and this is a fun, updated look. I wore it with electric blue pants -- lots of compliments.
Fit well in shoulders and over hips on my pear shape, but too large in waist. If a bit slimmer in waist would've been great.
Awesome blazer. Fit is perfect. Looks best worn with a white shirt underneath and buttoned. Can be paired with black pants or jeans.
Nice tailored looking fit.
Perfect for work

links_reviews_title: Really like it! Fabric feels great.
links_reviews_text: Here I have it styled with a black pencil skirt, tights and booties. I threw on a blue sweater because it was cold today. I wish the body was a tad bit longer and the sleeves slightly shorter. lol!

links_reviews_title: Cute work blouse. It is a bit loose and low cute but it's fine when wearing a cami underneath.
links_reviews_text: Transitions easy from work to evening.

Lovely animal print blouse. The sleeves are plenty long for my glamazon arms. The tie and peek a boo collar are a showstopper. I will wear a cami underneath to work because it shows all my cleavage. Note this is normal for me because I am short between my neck and chest. Plenty of room and could probably size down. The blousy look is fun. I will be keeping this for a while.

links_reviews_title: I think leopard is always sexy
links_reviews_text: I like the shirt but you cannot wear it and, it Hass to be worn out because of the drape. But it's such a soft employees shirt. The bow hides the boobs but is still gives a hint of it.

I really like these tops made by Nicholas. It has lots of really luxurious details like heavy metal buttons, strong snaps and great shaping. The negative is that it's a bit short but that makes it perfect when paired with high waist jeans!

links_reviews_title: Short and not for the busty
links_reviews_text: Sadly the shirt is not for large chests. The wrap around leaves a gap and super short and just not flattering.
Wore this top to work, casual drinks with dealers (see in pic) and dressed it up for a nice dinner. Cute top for anything, got lots of compliments

Love the pattern and is perfect with a dark denim. The sleeves are big, and the faux wrap doesn't lay completely flat (which somewhat creates the illusion of a bigger tummy). This shirt is lightweight, hits right at the top of my pants with maybe .5 inch of material left to tuck, and had cute buttons on the sleeve and top of the neck.
Very soft and beautiful fabric but the size 18 felt more like a size 14 or 16 to me. There was no way to wear this blouse.
I had to wear a cami because the front was cut low on me.
This blouse hits perfectly at the waist, but is very low cut if leaving it unbuttoned at the neck. The fabric is flowy, but slightly see through.
This top is really cute but it's so short that it was uncomfortable!

Pretty. Great style, but definitely gapped all day in bust. I'm not busty. I pinned the gap and then had no problems. I liked that it was shorter without being a crop top. No need for loose tucking in.
I loved this - it was great. Dress it up with black pants and heels or down with jeans and sneakers. Very versatile and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a few parties and during the day- great for work to evening!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this top! I wore it 4 times in 2 weeks! The only flaw was the v is a little low for a small chested person, but the ties covered it up so it wasn't an issue.

links_reviews_title: Golden Girls meets Real Housewives of NJ
links_reviews_text: This would be great on someone, just not on me. I rented the 6 and am usually a 2-4 in tops and it fit well. It is on the shorter side, but would be great with a high rise pant.
Too short and button would not stay closed at bust... hence why you should never wear this to work
Very flattering. True to size. Will definitely wear again!
Such a flattering fit. I safety pinned the keyhole for work just to be safe but an undershirt would do the trick too. Will rent again.
Beautiful fabric and drape
Sizing ran super small and with the very deep open neck, looked like bad lingerie. Not cut for a large bust.
This was okay - nothing special
Loved this top for work. It can definitely be dressed up or dressed down depending on your day. The material is super luxurious and flattering. Wish I could buy but definitely will rent again!

It's a little sheer and a little low cut. Would recommend wearing a tank underneath it. Otherwise got lots of compliments. When I received it, the shirt had tags on it so I assumed it was brand new. However when I went to take it off, the front button fell off.

links_reviews_title: Great way to add some flare!
links_reviews_text: This blouse was the perfect way to add a little to a black blazer and jeans. It is a little short, but worked with a high waste.

links_reviews_title: More of a tunic than dress
links_reviews_text: Sized up for my postpartum figure. Certainly was flattering, but was a tunic on me. Paired with leggings made a perfect casual holiday party outfit.

First off, I did not have an issue with he dress being too sheer. I had fully prepared myself with leggings, but didn't end up needing them. This was easy to dress up or down, and I loved how the sheer overlay on the top kept it from being just a run-of-the-mill plain black dress!

This dress is so cute but was too short for me! I'm 5'7 and ordered the XS. I'm going to try the Small hoping that it will be a little linger because it was such a versatile, cute dress! Would be perfect with boots, flats or heels and can be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a warm day at work. Even in black and with long sleeves it's light and airy.
links_reviews_text: A touch too long for my 5'4" frame, sort of swallowed me up.
This dress is completely see through. Hard to wear to work or even out unless it's a very dark venue.
Cute dress, a bit looser than I'd hoped. Maybe a 2 would have been better. The bottom part of the dress was really thin and kind of see through in the sunlight, so I ended up not wearing it.

This dress is more of a shirt & it's very sheer. Even with a slip I was not able to wear it to work. I am typically a size 0 and sized up to a 2 -- still too small. Beautiful dress and/or shirt though. I would suggest styling this by sizing down and wearing with leather leggings instead of drying to force it as a dress.
I'm three months postnatal and just looking for a piece that would elevate my look without reveling much. I felt stylish in this classic cut piece and would rent it or buy it.

Perhaps I should have read the reviews, but I had no idea this was so sheer. The bust section has a bit more fabric but I still would never feel comfortable wearing it as a dress without leggings. It fit just fine but wrinkled very easily.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately a bit short and see through for work.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful but very thin and see through material. Wanted to wear for work but would have been stressed all day about it being skimpy.
Absolutely perfect fit - such a gorgeous dress and got so many complements. I paired with snake skin boots for a party, then flats for work. 10/10 recommend
Fantastic fit - relaxed but tailored, perfect for work or weekend. Easy put together casual style.. LOVE this one!!
Cute cropped sleeves. If you are in between sizes, size down. Great stretch. Runs a bit large.

links_reviews_title: Really cute but arrived VERY wrinkled.
links_reviews_text: Fit is great
This blazer was the perfect addition to elevate jeans and a tee for a networking event. Super flattering fit - I wish I bought this!

links_reviews_title: It would be a blazer I want to own.
links_reviews_text: Not a boring black blazer.
Great fitting jacket! I have broader shoulders/bust and this jacket was extremely comfortable. The material is stretchy, so I was able to move freely!

Nice heavy material and a well made blazer. I'm more into cuts that geek tailor made and fitted. But I still liked it and it went well as outwear for my sleeveless jumpsuit. The evening was warm. I recommend if you are ok with a loose fit.

I really liked this. But pay attention that the sleeves are short. Kinda weird short too. Longer than 3/4 -shorter than full length. Would be a good summer/spring blazer so you can push the sleeves. I'll rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect early fall jacket/season transition jacket
links_reviews_text: Loved this so much, I could have sized down but the 1 was the only size available in the store and it was fine - just a little long. I would say this ran true to size. Easy to throw on with jeans and super versatile!
Fitted jacket with stretch. Wore it to BC & got lots of compliments. 3/4 sleeves & gold buttons sets it apart
This was the perfect match up for my casual Friday attire. The sleeves on the blazer were a bit short but the blazer was super comfy and cute.

links_reviews_title: Great Jacket- Awesome piece that dresses up a white T shirt or a stylish way to stay warm at dinner.
links_reviews_text: Has some stretch which is nice, and the pockets are deep to hold your phone and keys so you can go purse free if you want. Love this jacket. I want to buy it, but might wait til i get my hands on the 4 to see if it runs longer in the torso.
Perfect for a smart work look. I wore with a hot pink camisole and felt great. Sleeves are not full length and not quite 3/4.
Wish it wasn't so expensive, otherwise I would have bought this piece! So classic! Fits great
Wore a lot. More fun than a black blazer. Casual
Great casual blazer for layering. Didn't wrinkle as much as some reviews mentioned. For me being 5'3' it hit at an awkward length on my hips, but still wearable.
cute long blazer works great with jeans and a white tee

Wore this jacket to work a couple of times. It fit well. The sleeves are 3/4 length which I'm not used to. It wrinkled fairly easy. Not something I would buy or rent again but was good for a different jacket to wear to work.
Fits so well

links_reviews_title: It has a casual cool look
links_reviews_text: the bottom of the sleeve makes it so you can't just push them up--and I think it will wrinkle if worn all day.

A nice casual blazer for summer. The skinny lapels and unstructured fit meant that it worked best loose and open. I tried it out buttoned, but it was sloppy looking that way and not proportioned right for a woman's body. Open, though, it was great.

links_reviews_title: It was a great design and fit for me.
links_reviews_text: Pros, great fit and design. Fabric is stretchy so it kind of falls out of shape at the hem. I was the first to wear it so it wasn't a worn issue.

links_reviews_title: love the fit, very comfortable. Its basic. It looked best with white t and jeans
links_reviews_text: love the length, love the stretch
Beautiful jacket. Fits like it was handmade for my body. Very tailored and upscale look. Material is soft and moves with your body. Wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: Nice for work in the summer
links_reviews_text: Cropped sleeves and a fitted look. I have broad shoulders so went with the 10 (I'm and 8-10). It fit well. Stretchy khaki material. Cute detail buttons. Not a formal blazer exactly, but really works well in the summer. Quality seems really good.
Fit nicely- Wore it with flats, fitted high waist jeans and a white T-shirt. Casual summer work look! If you are in between sizes probably size down.

Although this jacket was well-constructed and of quality fabric, the description and sizing is way off the mark! First of all, I ordered a size 2 (US 6-8) and it fit like a US 2 ... tight and short. Sleeves described as long were actually 3/4 length. Shoulder to hem length described as 28" was actually 25". Fabric described as crepe felt more like a nice casual khaki twill. Fit described as slouchy was, as you might guess by now, was anything but that. The jacket arrived with tags still on, so this is not the result of dryer shrinkage. I will re-order in a size 4 with hope that it will fit like a US 6-8.

links_reviews_title: Cute Jacket Love the Pockets But Long
links_reviews_text: I was the first to wear this, tags and all. I liked the material and color of the jacket. I also loved the pockets, they are pockets that you can fit your entire large iphone in, and keys without anything popping out. The sleeves are meant to be quarter length but since I am petite they fit me like a normal suit jacket. The only downside for me is that I am only 5'1 and have a short torso so the jacket made me look really short and small and hit me at an awkward spot on my body.

links_reviews_title: The warmest coat youll ever wear
links_reviews_text: This was actually the best coat ever. Its so cute and has the perfect fit. I swear its warmer than a canada goose. I wore it in a swedish winter and wasnt cold at all!
Fit great, perfect for skiing in 30 degree weather with very thin base layer and vest under.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a ski trip that got cancelled - still lived in it! :)
links_reviews_text: Fits TTS - it is a more snug style jacket, but I was able to layer a turtle neck sweater under it no problem. Would have been perfect for skiing, but works well for a casual weekend jacket too!

Obviously I got engaged in this jacket! It was perfect! Flattering, fit well! Ordered the large for skiing and fit perfect for layers underneath. Great pockets. And I GOT ENGAGED IN IT!!! LOVE THIS JACKET!!!
Really nice not to buy a ski jacket. This was very warm, even for winter in Vermont. Everyone could see me because it was so shiny. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Awesome cruelty-free jacket - unfortunately runs small
links_reviews_text: I am in love with this jacket despite it running quite small (wore it once anyway). I usually wear size XL jackets but this ran small, mostly in the bust and torso. Chesty ladies should def size up. On the plus side: it fit perfectly around the shoulders and I loved the long arms. And the positive surprise: it does not contain any feathers and is cruelty-free (see picture of the inside of the jacket) which I just love! I'd buy it in a heartbeat if it existed in a larger size.
Super cute & warm! I got it just to wear everyday and ended up wearing it a lot (even running!)

links_reviews_title: I love this coat and really enjoyed wearing it this winter season. I got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: No cons. This is a great coat!
Love love this jacket. Wore it for Aprés ski and stayed so warm but stylish! There are a good amount of pockets for this to serve as a ski jacket is well! Highly recommend!
This coat is very cute and warm but runs a bit small. I rented it for skiing but I didn't feel comfortable enough in it so unfortunately didn't get to wear.
Super cute - my daughter grabbed this from me when it came in and looks so good on her she wears it instead of me. She's about 5"4 and thin. It's adorable!

I loved this so much that I bought it! It's extremely comfortable and goes well with any outfit! You can dress it up or down, and there's a perfect amount of room. So comfortable too, highly recommended!
This is a cute sweater that while boxy was very flattering due to the puffy sleeves. Really comfy and had a cool high low hem line
I wish this sweater was half an inch longer but I loved the sleeves and the material.
Really cute and beautiful crisp white color - I wore this several times while renting and I noticed the neck becomes more stretched with each wear

Everyone needs a crisp white turtleneck sweater, right? Well maybe not - but it's a pretty quintessential Nantucket look and this sweater helped me nail it. I will definitely rent again and probably buy. The xxs fit great and was the slightest cropped so hung really well with high waisted jeans.
I really liked this (and it was great for zoom calls). I would have bought it if it wasn't cropped. The length in the back would have been perfect all the way around.

Very cute! It is short but looks great untucked with high waisted pants. I wanted to keep but the fabric was stiff and rigid, not soft, not even scratchy. It kind of felt like it was made out of rope. It wasn't uncomfortable but I probably wouldn't wear it again even though I liked it a lot!
I loved this sweater. It is cropped, but is very comfortable and has a cute shape.

Great sweater and super comfortable! Seemed a bit more "off-white" in color. I debated between the XXS and XS and the XS was the right choice. It's definitely cropped, I think I would have like it more if I wore it with high waisted pants.

Perfect for casual events. Fits a little large and baggy, which is very cute. Loved it and wore it A LOT! My only issue was that it got dirty very easily around the hems (near wrist and waist) because of how white it was--shows EVERYTHING.
Little dingy.
Cute sweater

links_reviews_title: When you just want a nice, comfy sweater
links_reviews_text: This is a super solid basic for when you just want to wear something uncomplicated and reliable. Loved it for work. Nice cut, a little on the shorter side, but a bit oversized and definitely flattering.

links_reviews_title: The fit was boxy, but if you like that look for sweaters, this is for you!
links_reviews_text: It was soft but I felt like it had no shape. The front is shorter than the back, so I could do the "french tuck" to give it shape because it kept coming untucked on me. I did really like the neckline and patterns on the sweater to take a different vibe to your traditional white
I loved this loose, relaxed, breathable sweater! A thick sweater that was still cool enough that I didn't feel like I was suffocating it in. I loved it so I bought it on sale from J Crew!
Looks cute with high waisted jeans
I have a short torso and this was not too cropped. Simple and chic. Not too warm.
I didn't wear it because the weather at the vacation spot was too warm.
Love this sweater! it's super cute and cozy. Great for everyday autumn weather
This comfy white sweater looked great with leggings, and worked well for travel. I also got a lot of compliments on it!
A perfect white sweater. Flattering silhouette. Not itchy at all! Surprisingly not boxy either! Good for weekend wear or work.
I loved wearing this! Very beautiful! I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Did not want to let go.
links_reviews_text: Sorry not sorry for keeping this as long as I did. Perfect for fall! Comfortable, chic...so many compliments!
This jacket made my outfit more fun! It was a little big, but I didn't mind. It was comfortable and good heavy material, but the slits on the sides made it less warm.
Wow I loved this piece! It's very oversized so not too overwhelming for tall girls and allows for easy layering. Will be renting again!
It is oversized. Had good pockets. Cozy winter feel. Wore it to a broadway show and dinner. Would rent again.
I should buy this jacket I loved it so much.

I LOVE this! It's the perfect layer for the holiday season. Easy to dress up or down! The one size runs oversized, but I loved the look and thought it fit great for a 2/4/6. Will be hanging on to this one for a while!

links_reviews_title: Cozy, feels like wearing a blanket
links_reviews_text: This sweater coat is huge, warm, and fully lined so very comfortable to wear. I love the oversized look but be aware that it does fit huge.
This was a nice fun and different style of coat to wear but only for a short period of time. Was ready to return it.
I am in LOVE with this jacket. I kept it for a week. It is an extremely oversized comfort jacket that isn't meant to be a coat but definitely kept me warm. I plan on renting it again.
Oversized sweater/coat. Love the color and feel or wearing a big, cute blanket

links_reviews_title: Great fell and wearable with everything
links_reviews_text: It is definitely a large swingy coat, but I loved it and got compliments on it wherever I wore it. Warm enough for a winter day in the 30s
Super cute to throw over anything. Pretty thick material so you could wear it without jacket. Love the length (as it is oversized/one size) and got lots of compliments! Go for it!

Yes it runs big as it's one size fits all so this is more suited for taller girls like me, but I loved the look! Wore it as a coat to a recent wine tasting day and it kept me perfectly warm in 40 degree weather. Received compliments all day! Love the color and the tweed it was soft and stylish.

links_reviews_title: This one is for the tall girls!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9" and this sweater coat swallowed me. However, I still wore it and got compliments. The fabric is warm and cozy, but not heavy enough to drape well (it felt tent-like). This piece is lined, has pockets, and high side slits that give it swing. It was a bit scratchy on my neck. If you do it, go skinny (and monochromatic) underneath.

This was comically large on me. I thought maybe I could just wear it as oversized but I would have just looked silly. The arms were super long and the bodice just enormous. Not meant for petites but taller/curvier women might fit this better. I loved the print and could totally see this paired with leather pants and moto boots. Bummed I couldn't pull this look off myself!

This is such a cute piece for fall! It's very oversized, but has slits up the sides that make it less sloppy. Warm and cozy, with a ton of ways to wear it. I'll be wearing this nonstop for a few weeks.
I wish I was working in downtown SF last week as this jacket would have been incredible.

This is a warm, cozy, well-made cape/sweater. I have long arms and found this to hit right at the wrists, and even long enough on the torso. My issue was with the slits at the side, which I hadn't noticed in the posted photos. Because of the cut, it can't go underneath a jacket, yet because of the side slits, it lets chilly air in. Overall it is great inside for hygge lifestyle, or outside in autumn without wind. But as a layering piece, it doesn't work.
Definitely over sized as described, but it's not bulky at all. Very comfortable and looks adorable.

links_reviews_title: Loved loved loved this sweater. It kept me warm and fashionable at the same time!
links_reviews_text: Very nice outfit. I loved the feel of it and the fit as well.

I rented this for the holidays on the West Coast to wear at night. But it is more like a sweater coat than a jacket- unstructured and casual. So a bit too sloppy to wear with a nice dress out but prefect for jeans and sushi.

links_reviews_title: This was too big for me. I usually wear a 10/12 but this was HUGE!
links_reviews_text: Very heavy- more like a coat. Runs large so order a size smaller
Large, heavy, way too big for someone my size.

I love this. Oversized but not too huge on me (i'm usually a Medium). Has side slits that are almost the whole side seam, just FYI. I loved it, but something to think about. It's very much like a swing jacket. Warm but lined in like a satin so not overly warm.
Th is fabric was way too thick to be cut this way- it just did not hang right at all... very unflattering, especially if you have any bust up top or hips. This was a dud.

I love tartan but I am always worried about channeling school girl or hairy man in the highlands. This was an awesome coat which DOES NOT channel either of my worries with tartan. Surprisingly warm for a grey autumn day.

links_reviews_title: Lovely, oversized cardigan jacket which looks tough and edgy, but sophisticated enough for work.
links_reviews_text: Good quality, loose fit with comfy inner lining.

The idea of its shape is nice, but once on I felt a bit like a tent. I really liked the pattern and went back and forth in it, but in the end I decided it wasn't for me. The open panel areas near the arms don't really show in the pictures the way they look in real life.
Great in theory, but way too big! Like comically large.
it was so cute for work i want it in my closet!

links_reviews_title: Not going to wear, too big
links_reviews_text: Im 5'3" 118 lbs and I drowned in this coat. Probably best on a tall slender woman.
I received many compliments. Looked great with jeans and boots. Warm.
This jacket was cute and cozy but the one size fits all made it feel too big and clunky for me (I usually wear a size small or 6).

links_reviews_title: It was okay... For real cold you need something that is not so floppy... it's cute though.
links_reviews_text: a little bulky and awkward

While it does run large as a one size fits all it was soo cozy and comfortable. It was like wearing a very fabulous blanket and perfect for snowy weather. I received tons of compliments and enjoyed wearing something outside my usual comfort zone. It might swallow someone more petite, but I felt it worked well for me.
The smallest size in this sweater is made for a size 8... so crazy big and bulky. Won't work for petites.
The fit was somewhat odd. I'm on the heavier side and this was big in my shoulders - I can't imagine how it fit on a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: LOVE! Would love to keep it, but too pricey for a holiday coat.
links_reviews_text: I LOVE THIS JACKET. I got so many compliments, and I kept it through the whole month of December. This one had been overcleaned a bit, but it's a slouchy look anyway, so not a big deal. I'm a larger gal and the oversized look was still cute...if not the most flattering.

links_reviews_title: It is great for the holidays
links_reviews_text: It was a little large with no buttons but looks great

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable dress- many compliments
links_reviews_text: I would say this runs large. I'm typically a 4-6 but fit nicely in a 2.

Yassss - its a deep cut V BUT its a very cute dress! I sized up cause I was planning to wear to work too so in that case I could wear a cute sports bra underneath. Also wore for a dinner night with no bra :)
Definitely low-cut in the front -- had to wear a lacy tank underneath, but otherwise was fun to wear. Thick and nice fabric.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but very low cut
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress but it was so low cut. I ended up wearing it out to dinner and it was fine, but slightly scandalous. I have a small chest so it wasn't as inappropriate as it could have been. Loved the material and print though!
Nice material and flowy sleeves. The top is pretty baggy if you don't have a full chest so I wore a black one-piece underneath.
Ran small, I didn't get to wear it

links_reviews_title: Runs small, doesn't work well with big bust

links_reviews_text: Is WAY lower cut than the photo suggests. Couldn't wear to work.

links_reviews_title: Tried to wear this without a camisole but no way!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size but the vee in the front is too revealing for this 36D. Wore with a navy camisole and it worked but made it more casual. Great fabric and comfortable with a camisole.

links_reviews_title: Great Casual Dress, but Has No Stretch
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this dress because it had no stretch around the waist. Note that it is not a real wrap dress. It has buttons. So if you may want to size up if you are unsure about the waistline. Other than that, it's great dress.
Very low in the front. Don't expect to wear a bra with it. It runs tight around the chest.

I rented for my brother-in-law's military promotion at the White House. It was flattering, fun and easy to wear! I pinned the top to shop less cleavage and used fashion tape to keep it in place. I LOVE this dress!

links_reviews_title: bust is way too open... no clips to hold it shut...
