links_reviews_text: unless you would like to wear a camisole underneath, would not recommend.
Fits well in the waist--very flattering. Wore this to work and then to dinner with friends. Love it.
Fit really well and true to size and draped excellently. Received a ton of compliments.

This was a little tight in the waist for me. I didn't read the reviews and selected this dress for work based on the photos provided. Like other reviews this was way too low cut for work and it didn't fit anyway so I sent it back. The quality seemed nice, but beware that the fit does not look like the pictures.

links_reviews_title: Cute work dress - paired with chunky sandals to make it casual.
links_reviews_text: Loved it! A little revealing in the front if you're more well-endowed like me.

links_reviews_title: Very matronly and tight in the waist
links_reviews_text: Not flattering

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but runs small in the bust/chest area
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress and very low cut on me but if I went up a size and wore a cami underneath it would be perfect for work.
Beautiful dress but made for taller girls with longer torsos
Bad fit, really low cut, tight around the waist, and way too low in chest area.
Very cute but wore a camisole under as very low for work

Yes, the chest opening is more deep plunge than wrap dress. It's fabulous though. I wore it without a bra and with a sports bra, no problems either way. Use good posture! Lightish, good movement. Hope to buy soon!

Just as the other reviewers mentioned. This dress is lovely but it is so low cut that you would have to wear a cami to be able to wear it comfortably. So....I wore it backwards! It actually fit that way and made for a very sexy back!

This dress is very low cut, so if you are renting it for a party, dinner, vacation, etc, and you are okay with low cut, you'll love it! It definitely cannot be worn to work due to the cut. A body suit or bandeau bra may work, but a cami probably wouldn't look right with it.

links_reviews_title: Runs small in the chest, extremely low cut.
links_reviews_text: I'm so bummed because this dress is gorgeous but I couldn't get the wrap element to work on me and it was a lot more low cut than I'm comfortable wearing.
Couldn't wear it! I normally wear L/XL in Equipment with no issues but I couldn't get the waist buttons buttoned on this dress. Seems pretty, but also very low cut as other reviewers have mentioned.

Wore this 2x with a full slip from another dress. Per other reviewers, definitely too low cut to wear alone, but with the slip (superior to a cami, I think, cause it stays put, and adds some nice movement to the skirt), it was a very easy wear, and flattering for my pear shape. Almost bought it.

links_reviews_title: Not well depicted - deep deep V neck
links_reviews_text: As previous commentators have said, this dress goes down below your breasts. It's pretty but wasn't remotely work appropriate (my goal). RTR should put different photos up.
I wish I would have sized up for this one. It is very pretty but snug in the chest, and I am small chested. Not sure how this will work for bustier ladies??

I was shocked by how small this dress runs. I usually wear a size 6, but sized up for what I assumed would be a more relaxed fit. When I tried it on, I couldn't button it closed, and as other reviewers said, it is very low cut. It is not nearly as conservative as it looks in the photo.l, and a camisole underneath would look silly. The result would be all cami, some sleeves, and skirt.
Beautiful dress that hit in all the right places. Cuts a bit low

Beautiful quasi wrap dress. I am pretty hourglass (small waist and broad chest/hips), and it was too low cut on me for work. I had to wear a bodysuit underneath to wear to work. Lovely, and I would definitely size up if you are wider through the ribcage/hips (button-up skirt that could gap if your hips are curvier). Great dress, but I wish I had ordered up so it weren't so low.
Maybe I couldn't figure out how to wear this right, but it was SUPER low. The wrap doesn't really cross over, just goes straight down, so you're basically exposed down until your waist.
This dress was so promising, but there is no way you could wear this in public without a tank underneath. Doing that added so much bulk it wasn't even worth wearing.
Loved this look and material. The only downside is it is tight in the shoulders / arms. Making it a challenge to move or unzip. My zipper was also really difficult to move!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful winter work dress. Great color
links_reviews_text: I felt so beautiful and warm in this dress. Good fit.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. One of my favorites. Conservative and classy.
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. I'm so upset that I couldn't do it justice in the pictures. It looks so much better in person. It can be dressed up with some nice pumps or down with boots or booties. The fit was perfect, although I could see a bit of an issue if you're bigger breasted. I'm on the smaller side. The waist fit beautifully and was super slimming. The fabric is thick and high quality. I'll def rent again and possibly buy.
As mentioned by others a bit tight across ribs, great dress with pockets, easy to dress up or down
The length and fit of this dress are great. I love a dress with sleeves! The fabric is on the thick side, with a little stretch. Will definitely rent again.
Fit was spot on and very comfortable. Zipper was a little finicky and would get stuck at times
Great fit. Lots of compliments. Very warm on a chilly day!

This dress is so great. It fit like it was made for me. The shoulder details and length make it stylish but it's also simple. It has some stretch so it's comfortable... and it has pockets! Loved it so much I kept it another month.
I liked the style of this dress but overall the fit was too large

I sized up one and it was still too snug in waist, but slightly large/okay elsewhere, sleeves too long. Would look good for work/conservative event if it had fit correctly. But didn't like darts on chest, as some others mentioned. Good thick fabric, like a thick jersey. Good for tall.
Love the thick material, great conservative length, long sleeves, and pockets!

links_reviews_title: Really nice work dress. Had issuees uploading pictures
links_reviews_text: I really like this dress for work. To be honest I would've worn it anywhere else. Really nicely tailored and I love that it has pockets, color is as pictured. I usually order sizes 12 or 14 the only size available was 12, it worked, but the only con was...I'm very busty and it was tight around the chest area. If you're bigger up top, I would suggest going a size up. Lots of compliments I would recommend.

I rented this for a job interview in a conservative workplace. The reviews made me a bit nervous, but the dress actually worked on me. It is tea length on me. Thick fabric, not much stretch, good for cold weather. pockets a plus. I plan to wear as planned. The shoulder pads are a bit of a mystery and somewhat unnecessary, but do not necessarily detract from how it looks on me.
It might be tight around the rib cage but I loved it, and wore it twice

I wore this to Thanksgiving dinner and felt fairly fabulous. The fabric feels luxurious. The skirt is relatively long and voluminous, so it might work best for the tall. I often need a 12 in anything that's fitted through the hips - the 10 fit great here because the skirt is so flared. I did NOT notice the unfortunate effect of the bust darts until taking the photo after the event - I'm just going to imagine that they were more noticeable in photographs than in real life. :/

The mock turtleneck, long sleeve and midi length of this dress all speak to me. However, this dress was quite uncomfortable to wear with the shoulder pads and awkwardly large button right at the bend of the neck. It felt overly stiff in my shoulders and neck. It looked ALRIGHT and it did "fit" but didn't look great enough to make it worth my discomfort wearing it through a whole work day. Pity. Sent it back without wearing and removed from my hearts.
Top was too tight, I couldn't zip it up. Runs small.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments on this!!!
links_reviews_text: It was a bit of an odd fit feeling really tight in the arms (hard to lift my arms up) and then the arms were too long, had to fold them under. Neither of which are problems I've ever had with a dress before. But I got tons of compliments on it all day, so it worked well for the day, but definitely wouldn't buy.
I rented this for work - I needed help getting zipped into it, but once it was on, it was comfortable all day. Nips in nicely at the waist and creates the illusion of hips for us narrow gals.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress. Too small around my chest.
links_reviews_text: Material was nice, and it hung gracefully.

I received so many compliments in this beautiful dress. The form fitting top and looser bottom were very flattering. There is something weird about the cut of the arms that I have noticed with other Black Halo dresses. The fit was a little off, but luckily when I had the dress fully on it wasn't too noticeable!
size up

links_reviews_title: So flattering! Love the color and fit
links_reviews_text: The cut of this dress makes it super flattering. I kept it much longer than anticipated since i loved the fit. Only sending it back to get dry cleaned!

links_reviews_title: Unfotunately, I couldn't get it to zip up.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" and 124 lbs. This was v. long and too small in the ribcage- couldn't zip. It seemed cute, though.

I sized up and found It fit perfectly on my broad shoulders, but a little bit loose at the waist and hips. Loved the shoulder detail (though it did catch on my purse), and the length. Very easy to wear to work.

links_reviews_title: Pass if you have a larger bust.
links_reviews_text: Very nice color. The dress is cut extremely tight across bust. The dart detailing is at an odd angle as well. Really disappointed. I was so excited about this dress.
It was too long and too much material for my frame. I was swimming in fabric.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing due to the fit.
links_reviews_text: Was quite tight around the bust, but roomy in the shoulders, back, and waist. Fabric is a nice material - heavy but doesn't weigh too much.
Too tight in the arms for me. Beautiful color
This dress fit me like a glove but I can see how it might feel tight on anyone with a slightly larger but or larger arms. I would definitely rent again, i feel like a green Fleur Delacour!

links_reviews_title: Super Cute if You Don't Mind A Little Discomfort
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable. but it is cut VERY narrow in the shoulders (as so many others have noted) which makes it a tad less comfy than many other dresses. But I wore it all the name of fashion. It has a fitted, militaristic quality that is right up my alley and the pockets are an added bonus. I am glad I got this and happy I wore it because I like how it looks but I am also not sad about sending it back.

Loved the color and fabric weight. Perfect for Fall or Winter in California. Accented this dress with some bright pink pumps which styled it up a bit. I was snug in the bust but for my size it worked just fine.

links_reviews_title: Everybody loved my dress, got compliments
links_reviews_text: The dress was exactly as at the picture and fit me very well. Loved the color.
Added a belt.
Great fit. Very flattering and elegant. Warm dress (great for chilly day, wouldn't wear it mid summer).
True to size. Pockets are a cute touch. Flattering length. Was told I was dressed like Kate Middleton haha. Comfortable too.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated, slightly different work dress; another hit from Black Halo
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit, quality fabric, though definitely heavy. Runs a touch small in shoulders and waist, but true to size for other Black Halo dresses. Paired with a long necklace and black suede heels, felt like a boss all day, got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Zipper is hard to do on your own
links_reviews_text: It's cute. It just gets stuck at the seam. If there was someone to zip it up for me. I would have worn it. But it was just okay and not worth the effort.

It's a shirt for sure but it is long enough that on a tropical vacation with a swimsuit it could be a dress. Maybe, if your torso isn't long. Very cute and comfortable, paired well with shorts (you couldn't see them unless I raised my arms). I wore it a LOT before returning!

Loved wearing this. There's no gaping at the busy and plenty of room in the shoulders. There's lots of fabric creating a dramatic babydoll shape, but that's the allure of the top. Can't wait to rent again!
Loved these. Not too pinchy on the ear lobes either.

links_reviews_title: A little short and stiff but still a cute option for a comfy weekend
links_reviews_text: This was a little stiff (maybe from all the dry cleaning?) and short (and I have a short torso) but was still a nice weight for early fall.

This loose-fitting sweatshirt is warm and comfortable (my preferred fit). Size down if you prefer a closer fit. Hit at a good length on my petite frame. It would be great for a site-seeing vacation or travel day. I prefer special details which is why this everyday basic is only 4/5 stars.

links_reviews_title: Great for a more casual look!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this too although it was a tad more cropped than I expected. As long as I wore it with high waisted jeans it still worked.
One of my favorite rentals!! Was very tempted to buy it. So comfortable, cute colors, cute sleeves and stripes, and perfect weight for a fall day. Cute with jeans or leggings
This sweatshirt really surprised me! Was not too sloppy looking and perfect for jeans to look put together but still comfy!
One of my favorite sweatshirts! The length is a little cropped, so if you're on the taller side I'd suggest sizing up.
Such a roomy and sporty looking sweatshirt. Would rent again

Good sweatshirt for casual days, it's not super thick so be aware of that. I am usually between a S / XS but went with the S for a bit of an oversized look and it ended up fitting exactly how I wanted. I think an XS would've been too small
Just okay, true to size.
I'm literally always an XS and this was way too small

I loved this sweatshirt, so much so I almost considered buying it. For now, I'll have to settle with renting it again. I was able to wear it to work without it looking like I was wearing a frumpy sweatshirt. I love the cropped silhouette as I'm pretty short as well.
Oversized sweatshirt but cropped length - I wore over a white fitted cami & it worked for my tall frame.
Love this top! Perfect for everyday. Very comfortable. Definitely would recommend wearing with high-waisted jeans/leggings. I would rent again.
Nice loose fit, great layering piece. Wore as a warm up for dance class, easy off and on. Shorter fit but I have a short torso so it worked for me.
Liked this, a little boxy fit but overall great.

I wore this sweatshirt more than almost any other previous runway rental. The back is grey and the front is navy, but the ribboned details were a perfect compliment to tie it together. The crop was at my waist, and not too short or long. The length on the sleeves was perfect and I could shrug them up to my elbows comfortably, where they would stay. Definitely rent this for casual running around!!
arms are plenty long, but very short waisted. Looks cute with high waisted pants, but not a good match with other pants.
Good for a causal weekend top

links_reviews_title: Loved the boxy fit and soft fabric
links_reviews_text: I have long arms and even these were a tad too long on me.
a little short, and I'm pretty short.
Lightweight sweatshirt great for everyday wear. Slightly cropped and sleeves are a little large.
I wanted to move this but it was stiff and just not great.
Sweatshirt material
Loved this sweatshirt! Its a bit short, but it is super cute with jeans, sweats, really anything. So comfortable too...

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a day tennis tournament.
links_reviews_text: True to size; a little too short at the waist.
Almost bought it but trying to save $! Will rent again. I rented for a plane outfit.
Love this casual and cropped sweater. Looks awesome with high waisted jeans and is that perfect amount of cozy for the weekend.
Good sweatshirt

So cute and comfortable ! Perfect for a casual day at work to be comfortable! I got it a size up because I like my sweaters to be bigger! If you like things true to size I would recommend getting your size!
It was super comfy but the sweater was too short

This is very cropped and the photo on the model does't accurately represent how this fits. Didn't wear it because it was so cropped. I own lots of Joie pieces and am always a small. This runs TTS but description didn't describe this as cropped.
This is really comfortable, but its no more special than any other sweatshirt.
This was so short, I didn't even try it on. I have a long torso, but even still, this was very short.

links_reviews_title: It's way shorter than reviews say
links_reviews_text: too short, very boxy
So cozy! Slightly cropped length but worked well on my short torso. Roomy but not too much that you look bulky. Nice classic sweatshirt material. Not itchy at all and not too warm.
Super cozy and cute. I am long waisted so it was a tad short on me. But I'm still considering buying.
Loose fit, slightly cropped. Sleeves are quite baggy. Fun sweatshirt to wear with jeans and sneaks for a casual weekend look.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for everyday - comfy and fun, lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fabric was soft and warm. Fit was roomy and a bit cropped. Looked casual but polished.
Stylish and casual
Comfy
Great fit. Beautifully made and super flattering. Considering buying!
Comfortable and professional but I'll size down next time I rent.

Easy to wear for work. Light, mild stretch fabric that only slightly wrinkled after sitting for several hours. True to size, size down if in-between. I'm 5'1 but wear ankle length all the time, these were a touch long and the calf area is less fitted than most ankle pants which wasnt a super look for someone shorter.
Really liked the color. Legs a little baggy.

Love these pants for work! The olive color is great and the crepe fabric is very comfortable. I'm usually a 6/8 in pants and have a larger butt/thighs and the 8 fit perfectly. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Can never go wrong with Theory

links_reviews_text: I like these pants and would buy them if they were not so expensive

I usually wear black pants for work, with the occasional venture out into dark navy territory. I took a chance with these and am so glad I did. They fit well, we're very comfortable-- even for a day that included travel -- and looked stylish. I rented them twice, in fact, and will rent again.
Defined waist but roomy thighs. Loved the length.
fabric is a nice crepe that drapes beautifully.
Love these pants. Great fit, super flattering and comfortable.
Ok for work. Runs a little big.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing it - runs large
links_reviews_text: The length of the pants are great for petite women. I'm 4'11 and it hit be right above the ankle. The fabric is much thinner than I expected, it's not necessarily a thick, structured pant. It's more so a looser, relaxed fabric. Also, would recommend sizing down as it was quite large (and I'm usually an 8 in Theory dresses).
Great trousers for work.

links_reviews_title: Very classy pants in a fantastic color for work.
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants. They were a little big in the waist, but I was able to make it work. These pants are super chic for a day at work. I LOVED the color. I have short legs, so they fit me a little lower on leg. They fit me a bit higher than the model pic which I was glad about.
Great fit. Very nice quality and cut. True to size and color as pictured
Wore these to work. Really like the color but long in the stride and big in the waist.

links_reviews_title: Runs large for Theory, but amazing
links_reviews_text: Comfy and cute!! Perfect fall color. I wish I could buy these!!

Color and fit is exactly as pictured. I'm 5'5 and typically wear size 2 in all Theory products (pants, suit jackets, blouses). This ran just a tad larger than other Theory pants I've worn; these are meant to have a more relaxed look/fit so you can probably size down for a more tailored fit if that's what you're after. It was perfect for a business casual setting with a cream colored blouse tucked in, a black belt, and pointed black flats.
A bit large in the waist.

links_reviews_title: I enjoyed how it worked with the matching top
links_reviews_text: Stylish and understated.

I absolutely loved this long cardigan that could be worn over pants or could even be worn as a long dress! I got 1000 compliments when I wore it out and about during the day, but I think you could probably even dress it up a bit to wear out to a fun dinner or happy hour! The buttons were a good quality and stayed shut while I wore it which is always an issue for me with cardigans!
Wore as a cardigan it is slightly itchy but worth it for the unique bright colors. Perfect for taco night at church as well as out to lunch for more tacos!!!
Tons of compliments from morning to night. Many thought this was a dress! Super comfortable too.

links_reviews_title: Great piece! Colorful, fun and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this sweater! So cute, comfortable and versatile. Seriously considering buying!

links_reviews_title: Standout colors got me lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I'm 5 8 size 8 and ordered the small and medium. When I tried on both I did like how the medium fit better but the small also fit. I went with the medium cause I'm not a small in anything. As the night went out I realized I would have liked a snugger first. You can see in the picture out the material gathered. It still was beautiful and super comfortable. I paired it with stockings but would love to wear this during the warmer months with a strappy shoe.
Fit super nicely-- the colours were a lot of fun!
Wore as a duster. Very bright with some sparkle in some color blocks. A little scratchy but still fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Very unique - a statement cardigan if you will ;)
links_reviews_text: Wear as a cardigan or as a dress - but get ready to be noticed as this pops out in the crowd.

The colors are vibrant, the fit is on point, and it was a head turner. Don't be afraid of color. This is a special little number. My only complaint was there was a tiny dark stain on mine when I received it.
I thought this was sooo adorable, but it did run a bit small. It was a bit snug in the arms and definitely wouldn't fall right on my chest, but it still looked cute, so whatevs!
High quality fabric and perfect length (I'm 5'6"). Everyone at my office LOVED it. Perfect for fall/spring.
The fit is true to size. Great sweater to pair with many things or wear as a dress!
Loved wearing this, was nice and colourful. Was pretty comfy except where the gold part is, that was a little itchy.
You’ll get a lot of compliments
Lots of compliments. Light weight. Fun pop of color. Would rent again.
Got so many compliments! Pairs great over just simple T-shirt and jeans. Light and perfect for spring or fall. Slightly scratchy but not bad.

links_reviews_title: Better as a cardigan than dress.
links_reviews_text: Cute for pictures but with sitting all day it gaps open at the buttons. Recommend wearing lamenting under if using it as a dress.

links_reviews_title: Worn as a dress ! Why not ?!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful rib knit dress with full button front and a very flattering neckline
I received more compliments on this sweater than almost anything I own. It is high quality fabric, amazing color and soooooo figure flattering! Love love love!!! DVF never disappoints!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this colorful dress
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this colorful dress. I also wore it as a cardigan so it's essentially two pieces in one.

This cardi is what RTR is all about. Would I spend $500+ on a super-distinctive rainbow-striped sweater in real life? No. But how amazing is it to wear and send back?!? Beautiful quality. Can be styled several ways. Fun piece.
Loved this sweater! When the price drops, I will buy it! The colors go very well with anything.

The colors, the fit, the feel. Everything was perfect about this cardigan/dress. DVF knows a woman's body. It is flattering and the combination of colors are perfect for all skin tones. I got stopped every few feet with compliments. I wore it casually to a festival but will be trying it out for a dinner or something a little more formal soon. This is by far my favorite piece from RTR!!!
Great cardigan.

links_reviews_title: Unbelievable amount of compliments wearing this!
links_reviews_text: Everyone including strangers stopped me about this duster. If fit like a dream and looks beautiful. I absolutely loved this rental.

links_reviews_title: Impactful, cheerful stripes with great fit
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size but I wore a slip so it was more forgiving on my cellulite! Also low cut on me. Buttons may gape a little, so slip is extra benefit

Tons and tons of compliments on this stand out sweater dress. I wore with leggings so it was mostly open at the bottom. Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor dream coat is what my husband called it. Gorgeous even though my straight no curve body looked even more boxy in it.

links_reviews_title: I loved this cardi so much that I ended up buying it. Wore it for my instagram @lauralldaylong
links_reviews_text: The material is such high quality and the colors are gorgeous. It's really long though so anyone who's short just take note of that.

I'm a large and the medium fit. I kept it closed because they way it laid on my legs was appealing. I wore with ankle boots and jeans and it looked funky and eclectic. I forgot to take a photo in it but the colors are rich and the green and yellows have sparkle to them.
Fits amazing. Can wear as a dress or a cardigan over jeans ! Really nice material
Nice knit, bright, stretchy, great a long or with matching turtleneck by DVF, bright yellow & green usually not my colors - but in this mix it worked
Received a lot of compliments. Holds really well.
Not blown away
I wore this as a dress with a black bodysuit underneath. So many compliments and so much fun to wear!

This cardigan is so awesome! I wore it like 5X before returning it. Lots of compliments. People kept asking me where I bought it! I was worried it'd be too long on my 5'2" self but the S was the perfect size and length!

links_reviews_title: Super Fun and Colorful! Very Christmas-y!
links_reviews_text: Wore it as a sweater all through December - some of the material was shiny/sparkly which made it perfect for Christmas and New Years season.
This sweater is gorgeous and bright. I wore it a few times in different ways - as a cardigan, as a dress. Very slinky.

links_reviews_title: It was a fun sweater. I think if I had an event to go to, it might have been more fun.
links_reviews_text: The fit is fine, but I would never have been able to button it. Hadn't intended to. Also, the metallic fabrics are a little itchy.
This is my fav RTR rental to date. It goes with everything and is super colorful. I got compliments from people I never get compliments from! I felt so pretty every time I wore it
Nice casual top for work. Relaxed fit with fun sleeves as an added pop. Fits true to size. Received many compliments!
Good black blouse with fun sleeves. Good twist on a basic black blouse.

worried about the sleeves, ended up loving them and the fit. Buying it directly from the brand at the end of the day, because it's a nice looking/comfortable work shirt that I'll get lots of wear out of.

links_reviews_title: Great blouse for work and every day.
links_reviews_text: Perfect length and relaxed fit. Unique sleeves make it stand out. Loved wearing it to work and will definitely rent again.
Easily goes with dress pants or jeans.

great for a Friday night dinner with black jeans and booties. loved this top and the print was so cute. the sleeve detail really made it extra special. I ordered a size up (usually a L and got XL) and it fit great, little roomy but not too oversized. would recommend this top to friends
Very flattering top, sleeves and back peephole very cute. Got lots of compliments.
I liked this blouse better than I expected. The ruffles are subtle but make it less boring that a normal work shirt. Paired with jeans for work. Really lightweight and flattering.
Stylish and classy.
Fits really well and sleeves are unique.

Great arm detail that makes the shirt stand out from the rest. Was comfy and stylish. Ordered this because I couldn't find anything else I liked. I ended up wearing it to work and as a date night shirt. Was unexpectedly happy with the rental!
I ordered this for the Thanksgiving holiday as an option for my family's Christmas card picture! It was adorable and I wish I could buy it!! I can't wait to wear it!
Comfortable, flattering. Nothing super special about this shirt, but it was a very solid regular workday shirt with a great fit.
I really like the fabric. It was comfortable not tight.
Wore a few times tucked into high rise jeans. I loved the look!! Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: It was a perfect fit for me.
links_reviews_text: pro - lightweight, not too long or or too short. No cons.
The shirt is perfect for black pants or jeans. It fits true to size and the sleeve detail makes it great for work or a night out.

links_reviews_title: This is a great top! Suble sleeve styling, luxw fabric and quality!
links_reviews_text: True to Size, if not a litttle large, comforatable , button in back was a little hard to undo,

So flattering, stylish and comfortable! Rented it fir a conference but ended up wearing it for dinner out with friends and to work the following week, too! Would totally buy it if it wasn't so expensive!
Got so many compliments from coworkers and my family! Loved this dress.

As others have said, this runs large. The chest was big on my and my bra straps showed when I moved. Also, the middle section as baggy in both the front and back. Also, the slit in the back was a little high. That being said, I still liked this dress. I wore it to court on a Friday and I got a lot of compliments. The sleeves were not too tight which is a frequent problem for me. It zips in the back and is an appropriate length for work.
I have found a new favorite designer on RTR! This Trina Turk dress fit my hourglass figure like a dream. This is a great wintry dress for work. Plus I got to style it with red shoes!

Fit is great, pattern is good for winter. Very flattering for hourglass shapes. It's a little low cut but not as bad as I thought it would be. Slit in the back is pretty darn high though...almost too high for work. I put on tights underneath and it wasn't so noticeable.

Love the neckline on this dress, but a bit too revealing for my very conservative workplace. Draped a shawl over my chest, which kinda defeated the purpose of the neckline. Other that that, great fit.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but not a show stopper
links_reviews_text: Great for winter, plaid is red and black which is unique, pretty good rental but not my fave
This dress ran large on my small upper body and was generous in the waist. I'd love to rent again down a size, as it is well made, lined, and lovely for the fall and winter seasons.
It runs a tad bit large but very comfortable

I wore this dress for a photo shoot in Charleston. It fit the Notebook vibes perfectly! I am a pear shape so the 10 bottom fit perfect, but top a little loose but I made it work. Also if you are short like me it's a little long but nothing you can't work with. Great for curvy girls!

Perfect length for a business environment. Fits snug to the body so if between sizes, size up. Neckline is flattering and not too low. Quality is excellent and fabric cut design adds tremendous interest and elegance. Looks expensive and well made. A pure hit!

Something about this dress made it incredibly itchy! I had a rash along my chest after wearing it. I'm allergic to wool but this fabric has none, so I cannot pinpointed what caused the discomfort. Otherwise the pattern was nice and the neckline unusual, but interesting.

Proportions not good for my body but probably good for "straight & narrow"? Fit perfectly in the bust but way too big in the middle. Still wore it to work because I loved the plaid. Might recommend to size down unless you're busty?

links_reviews_title: Form fitting and good for fall
links_reviews_text: Nice print and perfect for fall. Great length for work. The only issue I had was that it was a bit looser than expected. Will size down next time.
Too large

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress, black tights, black shoes.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6", Chest: 40C, 150 pounds. I have broad shoulders, large chest, top fit perfectly, rest of dress was quite large, unfortunately.

This dress is so pretty and the material feels nice: soft but sturdy. The neckline was just way too wide for me and showed bra straps. Cleavage reveal OK for workplace; just too much upper chest showing for my taste.
Cute dress. A little on the big side.

On me this dress ran way too big. I have been pretty consistently a size 8 and this was very large in the hips on me and I have a more hour glass figure. If you are pear shaped this might be a good option. I did not find it to be too low cut.
beautiful but too large

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and festive for the holiday season.
links_reviews_text: It was true to size, and a comfortable fabric.

links_reviews_title: Great dress to wow at work
links_reviews_text: Form fitting in a flattering way. Sleeves so comfortable even though it’s not a loose fit. Really looked great. Someone stopped me in the hallway to tell me how great he thought I looked.

links_reviews_title: Liked the quality and fit of this dress except that it's a little low cut for work.
links_reviews_text: Low cut for work but great for a party. For someone with wide hips, can make you look hippy, otherwise flattering. I wore with a back jacket to work and looked good. Had to cover the bust area w/ a small v shaped tack on to my bra.
Runs large. If between sizes order one size down.
Perfect for the office! Nice length & the neckline isn't low at all. True to size. Love Trina Turk for office wear. Have a great day.

links_reviews_title: For the first time, my boss complimented my outfit...
links_reviews_text: This one is just prefect for the holiday season or just as a winter frock. I wore it to the office but my boyfriend and I agreed that had I added a a black blazer, I could have worn this to Court. Lots of compliments, including from my boss who never mentions my wardrobe (except to remind me that I missed a casual day again.) Fits true to size and not as low-cut as I thought.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Slit in back is waaayyy too high.
links_reviews_text: Dress is absolutely beautiful. However, the kick pleat in the back is too extreme. Could not wear at all which broke my heart.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Felt like a beauty
links_reviews_text: Sorry I didn't get a pic. I'm an 8-10 in pants but got this in a 12 & it fit very nicely. I rented for work but found it a little too much of a statement piece and a little too low cut for work. Don't get me wrong...I wore it to work anyway & got a lot of compliments. It's one of those dresses that will make you feel good. The fabric and cut kind of smooth you out. The colors in the plaid make it easy to pair with different shoes. I paired with a wide heel, nude suede pump. I'll be renting again

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a work conference and work back in the office. Great fit and super flattering.
links_reviews_text: Definitely need some bust to wear this (I'm 34C) but it is super flattering in that area and fits size 4 perfectly. I'm 5'4" and thought the length was great for work/after work events.
Feminine and unique twist. I absolutely loved it and will rent again.
Very nice dress, wound up wearing pants to the meeting I had rented this for. #roomforboobs
Loved this black & red plaid dress. I am 5'3, 119 lbs and the 2 fit like a glove. Liked the sweetheart neckline for something different. Would rent again.
Sleeves are tight. Wore this with white ski pants for a cool 80s vibe. Fun look for a ski weekend!

I was excited about this jacket especially since I just bought a pair of red ski pants. I thought I'd have the perfect ski outfit. This coat was just too short and too tight. I looked ridiculous. Sent it back!

I love love love this coat. It adds pop to every outfit, and every time I wore it I received compliments. The coat is very warm, but note, it is very fitted - so hard to wear with bulkier sweaters. If you want to do that, I'd consider sizing up. The medium (my standard coat size) fit perfectly otherwise.

This is an example of why I wanted to try RTR Unlimited - got to rent a totally new style that I would hesitate buying. Wore this to work and was comfortable all day. The leg is meant to be a little cropped which I didn't mind. Fabric is stretchy and this can be pulled right on.

This jumpsuit was very comfortable. It's made with a stretchy fabric so it's very easy to get off and on. I wore it to a women's league meeting and got a lot of compliments on it. Looked really cute with a turtleneck and boots
Really easy to wear but just kinda eh for me. Wasn't inspired to wear more than once. Stretchy material- could've sized down as the crotch was low and I had extra material around my waist and butt.
Liked how it was stretchy and I could just pull it on

links_reviews_title: What jumpsuit dreams are made of
links_reviews_text: Love this jumpsuit! I wore it in fall and put a shite shirt underneath it but I can see it being adorable at any season.

I'm 5'5" and the length is just a tiny bit short so I feel this might be a hit for shorter gals. Nevertheless I loved it! Got so many compliments and felt super comfy. I wore it with shapewear and I do agree with that it would be best suited with a bodysuit underneath or a top like mine picture that is very fitted and sleek so the lines only show minimally. The fabric is stretchy and hugs curves.
Stretchy material made this super comfortable to move in all night long. Added a belt to create a more cinched waist look and got tons of compliments!

This looks best with a bald head of white turtleneck underneath. I had planned to wear a mid weight turtleneck, but it's so thin that the line of the shirt showed. You have to wear a thin turtleneck underneath. It also came wrinkled - I should have steamed it but didn't bother.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a casual office day
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit was super comfortable. The fabric is stretchy so you just pull up (no zipper or adjustable buttons) to wear over a shirt or for a more dressed up look by itself. I styled it with a skinny black belt.
Such great stretchy material. There isn't a zipper so it's super easy to pull on and off. Didn't lose shape all day. My only complaint would be the length. I'm 5'4 and it was oddly short on me.
I ended up wearing this with a sweater over so they just looked like pants. It bunches around my lower stomach and I felt self conscious in it because of the fit.
Really liked this piece!! Probably will order again sizing down though and it would be more flattering

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and felt very fashion forward.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is very stretchy almost like a spandex material. I got a lot of compliments throughout the day on the outfit. The medium was a bit long in the crotch for me, but i think a small would have been too tight. I wore with long sleeve black crew-neck shirt and booties. Wore to work and was very comfortable

links_reviews_title: I'm super short, so this length was perfect for me. Love it!
links_reviews_text: Small wasn't available, so I got the XS. It was just a little bit snug, perhaps Small would have been better, but I got tons of compliments regardless!

This jumpsuit provides a trendy, fashion-forward look. I wore it over a black turtleneck bodysuit to keep everything in place. It's form fitting but stretchy, and the shorter length made it work even though I'm on the shorter side. I received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Cute, worn to a Broadway show and baby shower
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and had a little stretch to it so it was comfortable

I wore this twice to two different parties. Once with a white turtleneck and once with a black turtleneck. I liked it with both undershirts. I have an average torso length (I guess) and thought it was just a little long in the torso region. I wore it with a thin belt around the waist one time and that seemed to help. Overall I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it, but just couldn't..
links_reviews_text: Beautiful jumpsuit made from excellent material: unfortunately too short in the torso that I was not able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Wore for work with a long sleeve tshirt underneath
links_reviews_text: Was cute enough for work and then drinks after

links_reviews_title: Very trendy but not perfectly flattering
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and easy to take on and off. As a short person, the length of the legs was fine for me and I like the slightly cropped/flared look. However, the torso was a bit too long and sagged throughout the day. I really liked the style, just wish it were slightly more flattering.

links_reviews_title: Wore for Thanksgiving & liked it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Was cute and flattering. Super comfortable with the perfect amount of stretch. Wouldn't have minded the length being either two inches longer but great for fall/winter - for work or to go out!

This looked super cute in the picture, but when I got it on, it was a little tight, and showed my pooch a little too much. It is more form fitting than I thought. Maybe a bigger size would fit better.
Really fun winter jumper! Works best with a body suit since the fabric is not overly forgiving.
Feels like pjs, not the most flattering but ended up loving because balance of comfort and style worked
Cheap poly knit with no zipper. Just not the quality I'm looking for.

Absolutely loved this jumpsuit. Brand spanken new with tags. I paired it with a black long sleeve underneath. It fit like a glove. I got so many complements and felt great in it. Will definitely rent again.
The fabric had a nice stretch. No worries with visits to ladies room as it was easy in and off.

links_reviews_title: Better open than closed but SO cute
links_reviews_text: I'm between M & L and I went with M. It fit perfect. I didn't love what it looked like closed but open, it was so nice. Material is great, color is great. May but this.

Loved this cardigan. Rented it for everyday. The balloon sleeves detail made me feel on trend. Fabric is good quality, soft, kept me warm, and fit as described. Paired this with demi cut jeans and ankle boots.

It looked weird buttoned up with my hourglass frame, so I left it open and paired it with a white and then a black turtleneck. It's a really warm and non-itch material. Loved that the sleeves flair, giving your traditional cardigan a twist.
The perfect cozy sweater to wear everyday. It's slightly oversized so maybe size down a bit!
I loved this cardigan for a nice fall day in DC! I wore it to work and also on the weekend! Would be great to keep except the price tag was very high. Great for a rental!

It was a fashionable cardigan and didn't have wool (yay, for those of us allergic!). No problems at all. I wasn't as wild about the color as I thought I would be, but that's just my personal opinion. Great fall sweater.

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater! It's simple yet the sleeves give it added flair.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, even my long arms. The color is really fun. It's warm and thick and holds it shape well. I got lots of compliments on it even thought its just a cardigan. I think the sleeves and color really made it stand out. Will either rent again or buy.
I love this cardigan! I wore it everyday for about a week. I'm 3 months postpartum at 5'6 146 pounds and it fit perfectly. Super soft and silky fabric. I was surprised at how much I liked the color.

links_reviews_title: I loved this sweater so much and got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit great.

I'm a sucker for warm cardigans and this one fit the bill. My favorites are cotton, merino wool, and cashmere. I'm leery of blends, because I'm not sure about the itch factor. I took a chance and am so glad. This sweater fit true to size. I'm 110, 32C/34B in chest, xs-s for tops. I rented an xs and it fit like the model. Next time I'll rent a small as I like my cardigan a bit oversize.

I have worn it more then any other piece I've rented. Wore to work with black silk shirt and trouser. Over a black and white stripped tee with black slim pants and leopard shoes. So cute and the cut is perfect. I really want to buy this sweater. Rent it, you won't be let down.
Good all around sweater pop of color

links_reviews_title: Soft, pretty silhouette, great fall color
links_reviews_text: Wish I would've sized up. If buttoned it's a little snug on the belly.
Love! Didn't wear it buttoned as shown on model, but couldn't get over how comfortable this sweater was. Wore it several times before regrettably sending it back. Definitely considered keeping.

links_reviews_title: Very soft but too bulky for me
links_reviews_text: This is a very soft sweater . I think it is intentionally oversized. It is a bit too bulky for me, and I found that uncomfortable. I wore this over a white t shirt with jeans over the weekend. Nothing spectacular , nothing I feel like I need to wear again.
Loved the pattern and the fit. The straps were a little too long but I was able to pin them. Such a cute summer dress.

links_reviews_title: Casual and yet very put together
links_reviews_text: A great dress to be a little more dressed up on vacation and still stay comfortable and casual. Material felt good quality
This nautical themed sundress is adorable, comfy and gains compliments for days. Another of my rentals that stayed in my closet for weeks bc I didn't want to let it go.
I have this issue with most dresses. The straps were loose even on the tightest loop and the chest area was too tight. I couldn't wear it bra less bc the fabric was too tight.

This dress was so cute and different! Very versatile and can be dressed up or down (perfect for a trip). A little tight in the chest area - I am a 32a and wore sticky boobs because my regular strapless bra made it too tight.

This was so cute but reallt oversized! I enjoyed wearing it a ton but the straps fell alot. They have buttons for adjustment but I am small framed and was pulling up my straps a good bit. I wore it with a bralette and felt comfy and cute. Size down!

Love the fun print. Flowly and easy summer dress in a high quality lightweight wool. It's tighter in the chest so it gave some shape. The straps are adjustable and can cross in the back. It has pockets!
OBSESSED WITH THIS EPIC DRESS! All the compliments. Print is darling. It's so soft and comfy. The chest is a bit tight. Loved wearing this!

links_reviews_title: So if my review is not your opinion you delete...I'm entitled to my opinion
links_reviews_text: WARNING topless mermaids I counted 8 on the dress sent to me. No thanks not interested in objectifying women. Online pics are super vague don't show.
Overall l liked this dress. The print is cute. It was a little tight across my boobs, but I made it work. The dress is also a tad sheer, so you need to ensure you have on the proper undergarments.
Was totally obsessed with this dress. Fits really well. Prob better on taller people. Beware there is wool in it. Which I am sensitive to. So it was v itchy.
I loved this online but in person it was big baggy unflattering and felt very cheap. Was so bummed!

This dress is definitely tight in the chest. I wound up wearing it without a bra and just petals (and then it was comfortable). It definitely is also thin material and the petals would've been visible through the dress had I not also had a jean jacket on. But, the style and print of this dress was adorable. And the fact that it has naked mermaids, stylistically, was the icing on the cake for me! So cheeky and fun!
I sized up for this dress as I read other reviews it ran tight. This was the perfect size and was not too loose or too tight. Got so many compliments on this dress.
Such a fun dress. Casual or can dress it up. rented for vacation but also wore to work with a cardigan.

I wore the 6R, it was a bit tight in the chest, I'm only a 32B, so would recommend sizing up if you have larger chest. The material is really nice, a tad see through. I loved the print, very whimsical
I want to buy this dress, it fits so well, is so flows and soft yet structured and is so well designed. Pattern is epic and can dress up or down.
Super narrow and tight in the chest
Very cute print. Might try again in larger size

links_reviews_title: Really nice pant and great fabric!

links_reviews_text: Too long
If you are looking for a comfortable and beautiful social trousers, this is one of the best in RTR.

links_reviews_title: Loved this for a business meeting
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, structured jacket. Fit perfectly. Impressive quality. Felt confident.
I think that the pant is long. I have long legs and it seemed a bit too long for me. Pretty material.
I loved everything about these pants- the fit is perfect and they're SO comfortable. Too bad they're $500 or else I'd purchase immediately

I accidentally ordered a size up and they were huge! So, no need to size up; if anything, these run roomy. Didn't get the chance to wear them since they were falling down, but the fabric was very nice and they appeared to have a great drape. I'm going to try to rent them in the correct size and then I'll update this review.

links_reviews_title: Size down, too long for petite ladies
links_reviews_text: Too long to wear without heels
These pants were brand new and true to size but they have a noticeable seam running down the front. I am slim but not perfect and these were Not flattering.

I loved the fit and tailoring of these pants. They were perfect for work at a business casual/professional office. However the inside of the pants are unlined and the wool can be itchy on your legs throughout the day.

I love this. I wore it to work and then two days in a row over the weekend. It hit at exactly the right place on my waist and was really soft. I did wear the little belt part on the tightest hole, so I guess you might want to size down if your waist is small. I can't tell you any other ways to wear it because I think I wore it the perfect way, hehe

I sized up in this sweater because it looked a little cropped and I wanted to wear it to work. I didn't need to, I think my normal medium would've fit perfectly. It sits right at the top of high waist jeans. Thick and soft material. Love the belt detail. Might rent again.
I rented the medium because that's all that was available, but unfortunately it was too big so I didn't wear it. Seemed cute though!

links_reviews_title: Super cute...love everything about it! Got so many compliments! So unique.
links_reviews_text: Fits great. Wear with high waisted pants since it is cropped. I wore a bodysuit underneath.

Loved this cardigan! It felt like a cool update to the normal cardigan, and I was so pleasantly surprised by HOW soft it was!! I wore a small but probably could've worn an XS too. I styled it similarly to how it's shown onsite, and got so many compliments. Can't wait to rent again!

I wasn't able to get these in an extra small so I ordered the small. The length was a bit awkward so I tucked it into boots (which didn't really work). The print was really fun though, had they fit better I would've work them with stilettos!

When these pants first came in the mail, I thought they had forgotten to include the belt with my order and almost sent them back (it was in a separate bag of course). Glad I found it! Wore these pants to Thanksgiving, to class, for presentations and photo shoots. They ran a teeny bit big for me.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated pants that feel like pajamas!
links_reviews_text: As previously stated, it runs large but the pants are oh-so-comfy! The material is smooth and the included belt helps keep it all up. There are some weird ruffles in front but most people loved the touch. I got so many compliments. I wish I could keep these!

LOVE!!!!!! Absolutely love. I wore these to a work event and couldn't love them more. The pants run slightly big but I wouldn't have sized down, they're meant to be high waisted. Wore with a body suit top and mules, tons of compliments!

The fit was perfect, just enough to hug the body but leave some room for movement. The legs of the pants are billowy but with a nice balance of weight. Received a ton of compliments, women and men alike. Would definitely recommend and am pondering buying it for my permanent wardrobe collection right now.
Loved these, would rent again. Just be aware you can see nude underwear and tattoos through them... quite thin material that could have used a liner
Great parachute pants! A very nice dress material high waisted cropped pant. I'm normally a sz 10 and the large fit great. No complaints.
Yes these are huge- that's the point. The pre-gathered waist helps the tie look extra paper-bag-like. Such cool pants. Back view is not flattering though!

Felt like I owned the bank wearing these pants. Luxurious and heavy fabric. Print is eye catching lots of compliments. Runs a bit large in waist and roomy in pant leg, even with my big bum probably better to choose a size down.

links_reviews_title: I would wear these pants forever
links_reviews_text: They are so comfortable and flattering. Lined well and I received so many compliments. Comes with a belt so easy to adjust the fit on the waist.
Fits big but loved them overall! So comfortable.
I am obsessed with these pants, although I would have sized down. It was big around my waist...but there was a belt to keep them up.
Got a ton of compliments on these. I usually wear medium on pants but def size down for these.

links_reviews_title: Compliments, yes, but too fussy to wear again
links_reviews_text: These were cool and different. But the zipper is in the back and the tie goes over it, so kind of a pain to use the restroom. Not the end of the world. Unfortunately these are sheer enough that you have to be very very cautious of what to wear with. For example, I had a cream thing bodysuit which looked awesome except everyone could see my thong so I had to wear spanx over the bodysuit - making the entire getup all together too fussy

First - these pants are very comfortable. They have a sleek look, even for high waisted. This isn't my usual style, but I loved them with a tight tucked in black shirt. I got tons of compliments and would definitely get them again. I wore them with black wedges and that worked well.
big, but cute
OOVED everything about these pants. Not too see through per previous comments. Will rent again.

This is why I love RTR! These are a little too impractical to own (dry-clean only), but I felt like a super star wearing them. I was worried they'd be see through, but nope. And looked way more expensive than they actually are.
Amazing pants. Multiple compliments each time I wore them. Love!

I always think that palazzo pants make me look large/hippy, and I worried too much about this when i looked in the mirror. Luckily i wore these anyway & got nonstop compliments all day at the office! They move beautifully, have pockets, & the pattern is great. Definitely don't miss the belt included in a little bag
I loved these pants. They were so comfortable and such a fun statement piece.

The only issue I had with this pant is that the belt comes separated and you need to get it through two long and extremely narrow belt loops, which also unnecessarily folds the belt. Otherwise wonderful, traveled well, and fun to wear. Very comfortable.
need to pick a good tight fit top for these pants.
Definitely size down 1-2 sizes. The waist and hips were very large and that made the pants fit too low to look good. I may try going to XS.
Was like sitting fish in a barrel getting compliments on these pants.

I really wish I could have kept these pants! I wore them to a work event and received compliments galore. They are so SO comfortable and really make a statement. They do run a bit large but the belt helps to make sure they stay in place. Rent these pants!
I love the comfort and ease of these pants. The only issue is they are a bit sheer that the label on the inside was visible. I would rent again.

These pants will never be tight fitted pants and that's ok. These are so chic I couldn't get over it (the belt comes in a mini bag separate from the pants, the belt is a must to making the pants fit properly). I wore them to work and an event after and no matter what they didn't wrinkle. For that they earn 5 stars

links_reviews_title: They are sliming , light and flowy truly a runway fee!
links_reviews_text: Amazing
Weird length on me, didn't realize there was an additional tie until I sent back as it was hidden on the back without instruction
these are beautifully made...perfect fabric for summer..loved the wide leg...runs a little large

Every single person complimented my pants and told me to buy! They are extremely well made and comfortable fabric! The fit is high waisted, and runs a little large but there is belt to adjust the size. I wouldn't size down.

I wanted to like these pants so much, but they just didn't work. The length is too long even though I'm 5'1". And the material is very see-through. My husband said he could see my backside and I tried with a black tank top but you could clearly see the top right through the pants. They do run loose even though I have wide hips.

These run huge! I usually wear a 6 in pants and the medium was listed as a 4/6, but the waist is so big. I think I probably could have sized two down with how much space I had! That said they are a very cute idea! The fabric has a nice weight that drapes nicely and I love the pattern. Hoping to get these in a smaller size another time!

This coat is quality and full of high fill down, making it super warm. I wore it over light and heavy layers all over Europe in below 30F and was totally fine and untouched by the wind. 3 cons: 1) The hood is huge but doesnt stay on, 2) the pockets are too far back on the sides, 3) the coat closes w very difficult snaps. Another note, I dont think this coat is water resistant or proof, so if it gets wet, it will ruin the down... likely needs to be weather-proofed to last very long.
Very oversized and comfortable. Liked for casual weekend wear. Only con is that the snaps are insanely hard to close. I just wore it open but would be annoying on a really cold day.

First of all I just want to say I adore this jacket. It is super warm and lightweight. I am tall and love how long it is on me, the length was super flattering. My husband told me I looked like I was wearing a sleeping bag but I don't even care this jacket is my happy place.
It's super warm, cute and you'll love it. A must rent!

Fun pattern, and given the wool blend it was warm. However because of the wool blend it pills quite quickly. The structure of the sweater has very bulky shoulders/arms so it's awkward when trying to wear a coat over it.

links_reviews_title: Cozy sweater but not that flattering
links_reviews_text: This is super soft and fuzzy and is incredibly warm. Better for winter than fall. The proportions of this didn't really work on me and made my shoulders look very broad. I got this new with tags from the store.
Too boxy for me and a little itchy. Sent back without wearing unfortunately.
I did not wear this sweater. The bottom is snug and puffs the top out. Since I am busty, this did nothing for my figure. I felt huge in it and sent back. Very disappointed
Size up. Cute sweater

this is an extremely thick wool sweater. it honestly felt like it had been washed and dried by accident. the fit was super strange, too. lots and lots of room in the top half of the sweater. couldn't wear a jacket over it because the sleeves are so oversized at the top of the arm. i would have sent it back immediately if it weren't for fees.
Wore this in Breckenridge - it's warm and the colors are beautiful!
Was incredibly soft and warm. Wish I could have kept it, very high quality and attractive pattern. Great pullover! A bit pilly but nothing out of the ordinary

The arms on this sweater made me look like a linebacker (I am petite, 5'3"). Although the sweater was very soft and the colors were really pretty, I couldn't wear it because it looked ridiculous on. Might be better on a much taller, larger person.
This sweater is so soft, despite being almost all wool. It's somewhat puffy top and tapered waist was very flattering. It is a warm, thick sweater, so had to save for a colder day.

links_reviews_title: Perfect cozy sweater for the Thanksgiving holiday.
links_reviews_text: Fits as expected. Soft and comfy.
Not my favorite, however it is really warm. I always layer with a heavy sweater so no problem with any itchiness.

links_reviews_title: This sweater is so cute and cozy. Perfect for the cold weather!

links_reviews_text: This is one of my favorite sweaters of all time. It is so comfortable and warm and very stylish. It was so hard to send it back!

The quality of the wool is excellent and the pattern is gorgeous. The cut is roomy through the body and tapered at the waist, and the sleeves are very long. The wool is not scratchy at all! Sweater looks great with skinny jeans in a dark blue wash and booties with a heel. XS is a little too big for my 5-foot body, but I'm wearing it because it's so pretty and a snowstorm is on its way. Can see wearing this at brunch in the city, après-ski, and anytime I want to look casual and chic. Love.
Sleeves are a bit bulky but then it's fitted through the mid-section.
Wore half tucked. Liked the collar and shape, but those combined with the color can give finer vibes/ catholic school uniform vibes. Definitely an oversized fit
Has pleats and was a little longer in the back. Front opens pretty wide was able to breast feed. Really pretty mod blue color. Fabric was thicker and not see through.

links_reviews_title: Great casual top in pretty blue.
links_reviews_text: PROS: Very room and comfortable. The color is a very pretty periwinkle. Perfect for a casual work day. CONS: It is polyester and does not breathe very well. I wouldn't recommend for hot weather.
Fits well, except fell a little weird on my bum so I had to improvise on the tuck. But still love it! Got a lot of compliments. It's professional, but casual.
Loved this style. Comfortable and easy to wear. Would rent again.
Good balance of interesting lines with overall comfort and flattering silhouette

I liked it at first try but as the day went by I completely fell in love! The fabric was heavy and fell so nicely, it was breathable (even went to a dance class and felt great!). With blue jeans looked looked casual but also a bit expensive, I used it again to grab dinner and black jeans and large earrings made me feel classy in that not-trying-too-hard style. Loved it!
Fits slightly baggy but very cute and a work appropriate. Fabric is kind of heavy.
I would recommend this for a work shirt.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt but never tempted to wear
links_reviews_text: I thought this was a cute shirt. The bottom button looked like it was pulling on me because I have curvier hips. I was going to try to do the half tuck like everyone on here but whenever I tried, I always just ended up putting the shirt back and wearing something else. The chest was also VERY large.

links_reviews_title: It was a nice ordinary blouse.
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs big. Nice and comfy for summer office wear. Would size down for a more polished look.

links_reviews_title: Ended up wearing for more than just work
links_reviews_text: Liked this top a lot. Beautiful color and a standers button up with flowing fabric that was comfortable. Fit well and looked great with a French tuck.
not worn
Fit a bit large, but super comfy and didn't mind the oversized look. Kept me cool on a hot day, and it looked cute with dark skinny jeans.

links_reviews_title: Crisp and clean, a little large around the bust
links_reviews_text: Perfect for work. I wish this was silk it would drape so much better. Perfect for work. Beware there are folds/pleats in the back that look weird if you wear it untucked like I did and have larger bottom and smaller waist it bunches up at the end.

links_reviews_title: Also fits really big and not flattering on big chested
links_reviews_text: Felt is was going to school or bowling. Couldn't pair with any pants would make me feel like my body was bigger than it is. Pleats don't work well with bigger chest. Im 32DD and my waist is 24 and I felt so wide in this. I just tried on and returned.

links_reviews_title: Exactly what it looks like -perfect work blouse
links_reviews_text: This is perfect blouse for work or casual. Is exactly like the photo - perfect by itself or under a blazer.
Great paired with narrow pants for work. Easy and stylish spring look--material feels substantial and expensive, but it's still lightweight.
Perfect, drape-y shirt
A great work shirt. Got lots of compliments and the color is perfect!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable shirt, looked better as a french tuck
links_reviews_text: Could be a little boxy but overall very comfortable shirt and I would rent it again.
oversized and the buttons were larger than i thought, but the color and fabric were nice.
Going to be hard to give this back. The Small was still a little loose on my size 6 curvy frame, but in a very flattering way. Fabric is thick and drapes well. Will rent again!

I feel conflicted about this shirt. It's the high-quality I know and love from Equipment but it is heavier and drapier than I am used to. It also doesn't look great tucked in but also looks a bit like a bowling or mechanic's shirt left untucked. I would size down if I wore it again, but I'm not sure if I will.

links_reviews_title: Modern and feminine take on a vintage bowling shirt
links_reviews_text: Beautiful robin egg blue color, light weight fabric and loose fit makes this a perfect spring shirt. Preppy and put together with a nod to vintage. Received tons of complements. Would rent again!

I love the look and feel of this shirt. It does run a little large but I liked the oversized feel of it. It's not see- through at all and the pleats in the front are very flattering. It was perfect tucked into a midi skirt.

This is a PERFECT shirt. It is perfectly designed and the fabric is lovely. I wore this to work with some fancy joggers and it was the perfect mix of casual but chic. Its lightweight enough to be perfect for spring and summer. I can't wait to rent this again!

These pants are such a lovely lavender color. They don't wrinkle and they hang beautifully. The waist is elastic which makes them very comfortable. They do run big but because of the style and the elastic waistband it wasn't an issue. I highly recommend
These pants are super comfy and fit great. Especially if you have a big butt. They wrinkle a lot though so be aware of that.
These were unexpectedly wonderful. The color is beautiful, and the fit looked great on my tall, hourglass frame. I wound up wearing them twice - once to a friend's birthday party, and again to work.
Super comfortable and well fitting. I've rented these twice for travel since they're easy to shake out and don't wrinkle!
These are so cute and COMFY for work thanks to the elastic in the back. Such a good color too I got so many compliments. Highly recommend!
I rented the pants to kick off a conference and it was super comfortable. It does fit a little larger than I anticipated, but I still loved it.

These loose fitting pants are gorgeous and effortless! They do run large so size down at least one size(I'm gifted in the hips and booty and probably could've gone down one more size). I got endless compliments at work and the outfit was comfortable all day. I really think these pants can be dressed up or down too! Perfect for a hot, humid, southern summer!

links_reviews_title: Fun, flowy, and cool for the summer
links_reviews_text: I'm such a fan of these pants. I got a ton of compliments and loved how they fit. Super easy to dress up or down and a nice light color for the summer. I'm a fan!!

links_reviews_title: Trendy and nice color, but rans large
links_reviews_text: It's very chic, trendy and modern, but rans really large. I am a consistent 6, rented the 4 and was still slightly large.

I went way out of my comfort zone for these pants, but they were great! Material is nice for hot weather and the overall wear felt flowy but not baggy. They can be a bit unforgiving if you have cellulite, but nothing Spanx can't fix! I highly recommend them for business casual attire.

links_reviews_title: Such a great color and SO comfortable.
links_reviews_text: These pants are my first RTR item of clothing worn, and I'm already impressed. The color is gorgeous and the pants are so flowy when you walk—you can't not like these! I do think they were a teeny bit large because of the elastic at the back, so I might size down next time if I rent these again. Overall, very pleased with these.
These are positively perfect. So comfortable and perfect for work or any event!

I'm usually a 2 or a 4 and I wish I would've ordered a 0 in this pant. The color is pretty spectacular - perfect for spring. You can see that they do wrinkle a bit after sitting. They were great for work and also a night with friends paired with a cami.
Definitely size down... I'm normally a 2 or 0 and the 00 fit perfectly. I worse these pants 2-3 times and they didn't stretch out and looked super cute with flats or sandals.
Perfect spring pants for work! They are a lightweight material so perfect for warm spring days

links_reviews_title: Light, comfortable, great color - got SO many compliments
links_reviews_text: I don't have anything bad to say. This is my favorite color, so naturally, I felt so cute in these pants! They're light, flowy and the elastic on the back makes for a GREAT fit. Wore with heels and a plain top to work/happy hour and let the pants be my focal point. Can dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pairing with navy and white sweater.
links_reviews_text: These pants were amazing. I paired them with a navy and white sweater for a baby shower. I received so many compliments! The elastic band in the back made them SUPER comfortable.
This was almost 2 sizes too large. They were falling off my hips.
Such a cute pair of pants! They do run a bit large but that's the style. The color is gorgeous and I was able to dress it up / down whenever!

links_reviews_title: Sleek, modern & great fit---and an elastic waistband!
links_reviews_text: Loved these---so comfortable & chic
Size two sizes down! Perfect length for someone 5'2 or 5'3
Loved these pants, got lots of compliments on how slimming they are. Note they are more of a lilac than a periwinkle/light blue. Will definitely rent again!
Comfortable and no complaints here. Hit at the right length for me and had a nice flowy fit but still fit nicely to my body. I considered buying them!
Loved these pants!! They were a big hit at the office!
These pants are so comfortable and so flattering! I ended up buying them in black! They do run a little large in the waist, which was perfect for early second trimester of pregnancy.
Cute pants , but were falling off of me. I have a wide waist and normally a 6 is perfect, but these were huge on me
These pants are pretty and nice-looking. They run a little big, but that's also kind of the look. Not mind-blowing, but a nice choice for work, etc. Recommend.
I normally wear a 6/8. I am swimming in the 6!
Beautiful color and texture. They're flowy and airy and I was complemented while wearing them which felt nice. I love the way they felt while I had them on.

I thought because of the pockets and cut they might add some pooch to the stomach area. They don't. They are perfect. Comfy. And have a little elastic in the back. If you have a hard time finishing pants because of your thigh or bum area, these are the pants for you. Tons of room and tons of comfort.
very comfortable , highly recommend
These pants are okay, flattering enough to wear but not very exciting.

links_reviews_title: I expected these to be loose, but these pants run large even for J. Crew.
links_reviews_text: The color is lovely.

links_reviews_title: LOVE! Want to buy them for myself!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love these pants. I'm normally a 4/6 but wore a 2, they definitely run big. Super fun, can be casual or dressy. I wore Jack Rogers but could easily have worn work heels with them! 100% recommend!
Color is bright and fun for summer! First time trying the wide leg trend and it surprising fit well!
Tons of compliments, but the sizing is a little large and these were very long on me- about an inch from my feet.
I can't explain how much I love these pants. I can dress them down with a tank and some keds or throw on some heels and a blouse and wear them to the office.

links_reviews_title: The lilac color is everything spring
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color! Fit was great with heels. Super light material and did I mention the gorgeous color? So springy! Will be renting again soon.
I rented these in a size smaller than I normally wear, and they fit perfectly! Very comfortable and stylish for a work event, and I got lots of compliments!
I loved these pants, they did run a little large. I should have sized down.
I love these sunglasses. I kept them for weeks! If I could afford them I'd buy then and make them mine. But I can't so I gave them back. See for yourself! You'll get instant "cool girl" points
Absolutely love these! Classic yet edgy. I got a lot of compliments.

For something more fitted like this I would usually take a small but so happy I went with medium, the small would have been a true bodycon dress, whereas in the medium the skirt is still a little flippy. Definitely runs small (like most reformation) and material is thin, will show any bra indents or anything so be aware, but you could also layer a cardigan over to help with that/to make it a more daytime appropriate look!
It's a wee bit short which balances out the high neck for a slightly provocative yet intellectual French girl look
I usually wear a 00 and this was tight on me, but I do have a large bust. Liked it a lot though!
Really soft and comfy but a tad short
Cute! Got a lot of compliments. The ribbed knit is the same fabric as a lot of reformation stuff. Not very forgiving but spanx did the trick.
I liked it but not enough to wear it.

After reading the reviews, I decided to size up and order a medium. The medium fits well, but is a bit snug in certain places. The dress is very short, but if paired with a pair of tights I think it would look perfectly fine!
Runs way too small I sized up x 2 and it still clung in weird places
It's cute! Wasn't too short on me, but not a lot of width and I can usually wear M in dresses and this L is a bit small around the hips
The best dress! It can be dressed up or down depending on accessories. I bought it immediately because I just knew its a dress I'll wear a million times!

Absolutely love this dress; perfect shape and light enough to wear in early fall when it's still a bit warm out but will also do well in the colder months. It's a bit short in the skirt, so watch out if you're tall -- I wore it with blackout tights so it didn't matter much but just to note.

links_reviews_title: Busting out of this top in an A cup...
links_reviews_text: This top is very cute and works well for a night out but the single snap in the front does not work. I have a small chest and would literally bust out of this top anytime I moved. Wouldn't rent again because of this. If you're cool with a cami underneath or your bra hanging out - this works!
Can dress up and down. Fun color!
Awesome red top for summer

links_reviews_title: Good for all occasions! Not as cropped as people say
links_reviews_text: I was happy it wasn't as cropped as some people said, I felt comfortable in it but my shorts were mid-rise. Loved the color and the way it ties together at the bottom. The sleeves make it a bit dressier that it could pass for work, but I wore it for a summer bbq.

I loved this top! The color is great and the pattern is subtle but beautiful. I thought it was really comfortable to wear and felt you could really dress it up or down. I will advise wearing a tanktop underneath as a precaution because I did notice that the front could open with certain movements.

links_reviews_title: Comfy for work and sight seeing
links_reviews_text: Wore this several times to work and on vacation! Tie front. Slightly short on my long torso, but I wore high waisted pants. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: My friend and I accidentally both rented this shirt and wore it on the same day ....
links_reviews_text: Short like a crop top. Cute.

I love love loved this top! It's such a fun pattern and color. I wore it with high waisted pants since it is a slightly cropped cut. It's not the most flexible fabric, but the cut was loose enough that it didn't bother me. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Tight in shoulders but super cute
links_reviews_text: Really cute and flattering. Perfect for a summer party or for a casual work environment if you wear high waisted pants and watch for the clasp coming undone.

Overall fit was true to size. I have a pretty long torso but when I wore with high waisted jeans the shortest part of the shirt sat at the perfect spot on top of my front button of my jeans. It was a bit tight in the shoulders but didn't bother me much. The puffed sleeves are so cute without being too exaggerated.
The quality of this top is great. A bit tight in the shoulders.
Gorgeous top, I got the large (am a true medium) based on other reviews as I have broad shoulders and it fit perfectly. I am buying this.
Beautiful color and great cut but the small was too small for me. Would say it fits more like a size 2.
Top was too wide and too cropped, not particularly flattering
This top is a great color and good cut. Would be perfect for a summer a day

This top showed my belly button and I'm 5'8 and wore the small. I'm not into that look. Otherwise cute. Maybe a little tight across the back. Really liked the snap closure to keep it from gaping. Would work for someone shorter.
Shows belly couldn't wear to work way too short

links_reviews_title: Great print, runs small thru shoulders
links_reviews_text: Fantastic print! I received compliments all day long! The fabric doesn't have any stretch and the shoulders are a bit narrow, so if that's a broader area for you, I recommend sizing up!
