Wore this top out to dinner and it did the job. I wanted to love it, but if I lifted my arms it would rise up exposing my stomach which was annoying. Luckily there was a clasp to keep the top closed- total plus! But the elastic on the bottom did more harm than good. Wore it once.
Print is really beautiful but it ran very large on me and the draped waist was not attractive. I didn't realize that there was an elastic waistband either.

I'm normally a size 6 girl - smalls to mediums. And the medium was no where near fitting over my chest. The second I moved a single muscle the button popped open. Not made for girls with chests (145 lbs & 36DD.)

links_reviews_title: Love the color! Really cute top
links_reviews_text: I had to pin the chest area as the V was a little deeper than expected but overall, loved it!

links_reviews_title: Cute top that's good for work or weekend
links_reviews_text: I rented this top for everyday wear. It was very cute and versatile but it does run quite small in the shoulders. I'm almost always a xs or s and the small was snug
Casual or dressy, easy to match
I am obsessed with this shirt ... it's so cute, flattering, and fun for summer/vacation/everyday wear! Considering buying it because it's so great!
Normally wear a small in tops, but ordered a M here. It was incredibly uncomfortable--super restricting arms, and didn't know if it wanted to be a crop top.
Super tight fit in arms and overall even though I sized up. Front lays awkward around waist line

links_reviews_title: cute top, good color, couple issues
links_reviews_text: Was flattering, but didn't wear. Overall fit was ok, but tight in shoulders when moving arms much (and I am narrow); also if I pull my arms back the little snap at the chest pops open, revealing to whole enchilada!
It showed my midriff, which wasn't something I was looking for.
It is a little small, although I'm broader shouldered. I used a safety pin to make sure it didn't open which worked out fine

This shirt has an elastic bottom which is great but I could not even pull the shirt over my shoulders because the top was cut so narrow for the shoulders and chest. If athletic build, order one size up.
Size up when ordering. Short top.
Weird billowing gape in the middle. Yes, there is a pin at the top, but very high up and leaves a weird gap in the middle

Probably should have gotten a large, but it was high cut and showed some stomach at the twist in front and it was obvious that there was a snap to pin it at the chest and that looked tacky. Just wasn't the look I was going for.

links_reviews_title: Much smaller and shorter than expected
links_reviews_text: I am consistently a medium top. Not only was this generally too small all over, even if it had fit it would have been a crop top. Had to return. Order a size up!
I'm a 4 - 6 and it was extremely small on me. Designed to be more cropped. Size up.

links_reviews_title: Beware of flashing your entire office
links_reviews_text: Either this designer is a man or it's a woman who does not make any movements in clothing and designed this to be worn solely by a mannequin because one small breeze or turn of the torso and you flash your entire office your stomach and chest. For whatever reason the front of this shirt is not secure anywhere, and it's flowy so that one small movement and your entire stomach is showing. And your chest. It doesn't help that the only thing holding the shirt closed is one of those teeny tiny buttons that, let's be honest, never stays buttoned and that would be particularly unfortunate on a shirt that is not capable of holding itself up and together to begin with. Luckily I noticed this mishap in the comfort of my own home and safety pinned the hell out of it so I could go out in public. But if the fine folks at RTR want to do everyone a solid and sew the inside lining together or remove this shirt from circulation so no one suffers a career limiting sudden movement or utter mortification, that'd be much appreciated. designers should design for people and not mannequins!

Great print that dresses up work pants or jeans - can be for day or night. Puffy sleeves which might not be your thing. Has a slightly cropped look in front so good with high waisted pants or regular waisted - as long as you don't mind showing some skin. Felt really good in this!
Got so many compliments already, and it's the perfect size!

links_reviews_title: I'm tall and small fit great.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for LA evenings. Elegant. Cool. Classic.
Coat is a perfect mid weight for fall weather. A great neutral color to go with so many things! So many compliments!
A little too big for my liking! Felt like Harry Potter in a cape.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Coat, but it is big
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3 and wore it with heels. It was still a large coat and although I liked that about it- I could have sized down. I wouldn't rent it again but it was a fun coat!
boxy and wide as seen in the photos. shoulders run true to size

links_reviews_title: Definitely big, but I'm into it.
links_reviews_text: As another review mentioned, it's definitely big, but I kind of liked that about it. It's great for the transitional fall weather because it's not too heavy and easy to wear over a sweater.
It felt so perfect around the chest and arms but the rest of it was ginormous. For reference - I tried it on with a thick sweater under and it was still huge.

links_reviews_title: Perfect with a skirt but tight
links_reviews_text: I am large chested so it was squishing me a bit and my arms are small but it was way tight on them. I wish I would have ordered the large for comfort reasons even though I'm usually a medium. It goes really well with a skirt though!

First, I didn't realize there were black stripes in it. Der. Plus the sleeves were super long and NOW I'm looking at the photo and realized i had it on backwards!!! It fit pretty well but the arms were tight. High quality but I couldn't rock it well but maybe you'll be more creative with it!
I felt like I was in a straight jacket and the sleeves are just ridiculously long.
I loved this turtleneck but couldn't actually wear it because the sleeves were so long. Like 6 inches longer than they should be.

links_reviews_title: What a waist of a rental item!
links_reviews_text: So disappointing. Runs super small. So small that I couldn't even get my arm in the sleeve. There is zero give in this fabric. Shirt runs at least 2 sizes small
Sleeves were super long and strange. Over all WAY TOO SMALL.
The sleeves are extremely skinny and tight. I have thin arms and couldn't even get this in, yet the body fit fine.
Love it. A little right but looks great.

This was very tight all over, maybe because the material doesn't have a lot of give to it. I may try it one size up. I had no complaints about the extra long sleeves, thought. Thought that was a fun design element.
This fitted top make a beautiful silhouette and an easy style enhancement to a basic black wardrobe
I sized up based on reviews. It didn't matter. This shirt run at least two sizes too small. A pity.

links_reviews_title: Impossibly small and skinny arms (my arms are not small). Nice fabric and pattern but impossible.
links_reviews_text: Impossibly small and skinny arms (my arms are not small). Nice fabric and pattern but impossible to get this on to try it. Good subtle colors in the fabric. Seems as if it would be durable. But you would have ot be shaped like a cartoon character to wear this.
Quality fabric. Fit well overall. Sleeves were tight around the wrist. Was a nice alternative option, but no wow factor.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear this item.
links_reviews_text: This is an XS which is what I usually wear unless I want something baggy. The sleeves are super long which is the style they are meant to be bunched at the wrist but I was unable to get the top on completely due to the narrowness of the sleeves. It is really small with little stretch in width, only in length. The body seemed fine, fitted as it should but I just couldn't get the shoulders in place and it was very uncomfortable. I probably could have gotten it eventually but the "getting it off" was not something I wanted to try either.
Nice fit, thick material and great for cooler weather or even cold weather. Accentuates curves and is edgy but modest.
Beautiful fabric, sleeves are extra long, meant to be bunched up. But body was too tight to get into. Impossible to wear. Good luck!

The sleeves are incredibly long to the extent that I felt little girl playing dress-up. My husband could not stop laughing. The top of the turtle neck can up to my nose. Was super bummed because it looked so cute!
Runs very small. I typically wear a M, ordered a L and could not fit into this size. Had to return the item without wearing it
This top is so unflattering and itchy. I should have listened to the other reviewers. Sleeves are too tight and too long!

links_reviews_title: zipper back made this harder to put on. Loved the color and concept, but the sleeves were long!v
links_reviews_text: Loved the chevron pattern and color.
This shirt/sweater is way too small and the sleeves are really really long. Not wearable

links_reviews_title: Did not get to wear or take with me because it was delivered to a wrong address.
links_reviews_text: Really tight...I might have gotten the wrong size???? Sent??? Not sure but it was really small. I usually wear small or medium...just not the right material...thick and not very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Rented this just to wear for a weekend fall outdoor event!
links_reviews_text: The sleeves on this sweater top are absurdly long! I have... pretty long arms, but this was unwearable.
Runs very small. I would rent again in a larger size.

Beautiful fabric. It was so small i could not pull it over my head or get my arms in the sleeves. 5'10 and 145LBS. Great for VERY thin women or size up. Way up. Beautiful color and patter, lux fabric. Overall a beautiful sweater. Just not for me.
This shirt was so tight I couldn't get it over my biceps. I had to return it. If you don't have big arms then you'll be fine.

links_reviews_title: Very strange fit and long sleeves
links_reviews_text: Extremely tight and sleeves were about a foot too long. Nice material.

links_reviews_title: Wrinkles easily. Very cute and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Photo does no justice. This is a great skirt. Very comfortable. Guess it runs super small. If this is a 12 I doubt I could have fit my pinky into an 8

Amazing skirt! I want to keep this forever! Was great for work, and lots of other events...wore to outdoor brewery with a cashmere turtleneck, to work with the Silk Tory Burch top, with an open shoulder mock turtleneck bodysuit for an evening out. Got so many compliments including mountain chic when I work it with my Frye boots and a beautiful silk blouse for work. A definite rent!

links_reviews_title: Great skirt that can be dressed up or down but runs large. Struggled to keep it up all day
Cute skirt just too "winter" . I will rent this again next fall.
links_reviews_text: Cute skirt just seemed too heavy for the warmer weather so I did not wear.
I normally wear a size 2 or 4, but found this size 6 very small! It still fit (and is gorgeous), just a little snug.

I found this too fit a little too big in the waist, so it ended up being even longer than I thought it would be - came down to almost my ankles. The fabric is nice and high quality, and the detailing is very cute. The slit does make sitting down a little risque, but otherwise nice fit and comfortable.

Very cute - true to size AND looks similar to the picture. The slit doesn't come up super high, but some might be more comfortable with opaque tights. The fabric is a bit thinner, so it would be tough to wear with a chunkier top tucked in. Would rent again - a great classic but not a showstopper.

links_reviews_title: High maintenance, very fragile beautiful skirt.
links_reviews_text: This skirt flows beautifully when you walk and feel very designer. It's true to French sizing. The 10R fits like a true 6. The cons: it's wrinkles extremely easily, and if you get any water on it, it will "stain" it. Upon very close inspection, I noticed it had stains on it everywhere. This isn't noticeable, but after I spilled some water on it, the darkness from the water spot never really went away as it dried. This skirt is absolutely beautiful, but very high maintenance and fragile.

links_reviews_title: It is pretty and well made, runs big and the belt doesn’t go all the way around.
links_reviews_text: The fit was a bit big, although I have a small waist and narrow hips.

Rented this as an alternative to work dresses… Glad I sized up. I think I have a pretty small waist and I'm normally a 4 in dresses but the 8 fit perfectly with no room to spare. Will pair this with a fitted turtleneck and boots- easy work outfit!

links_reviews_title: I liked wearing it but didn't get one compliment on it-so that says something!
links_reviews_text: fit pretty well buttoned up according to the way it was made, but then had this belt that was too small to go around my waist, so it just hung down. wasn't sure what that was about...

I normally never wear jeans cut like this because I just don't find them flattering but this pair totally proved we wrong I loved them. They fit well but I would be curious to try the 26 because they were bigger in the waist

I really liked these jeans. At first I wasn't sure but they quickly grew on me. The fit was great. The color is a perfect washed out grey. Love the seams and details. I so loved that the jeans have a little flare silhouette!

links_reviews_title: Easy to pair with any top/style. Perfect for a day walking around nyc! Cute with booties or sneakers
links_reviews_text: For very true to size, slight stretch
Cool detailing - material is more grey than black, as I'd thought. Fun to rent.
Can be dressed up or down, great for an everyday look-
Runs veryyy small. Cute jeans but didn't end up wearing.
Really wanted to like this jeans but the waist fell far below my belly button and was expecting them to be higher!
These are super cute. They fit perfectly. Super cute with ankle boots that are a bit higher like in the photo. I like where these landed on my waist.
Cool look, great fit. Almost bought them.

links_reviews_title: New style for me it was fun.
links_reviews_text: Love these jeans. Fit was true to size but waist was a bit tight on me.
These pants were pretty boot cut on me, which really wasn't flattering. They have little to no give, so I'd say size up if you're unsure!
These pants were super cool and comfortable! The only problem was that they hit me at an awkward length and the hem was too wide. So, they looked/fit a little weird on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Black jeans with an edge so perfect for a night out.
links_reviews_text: Fit was loose but not baggy. Super cute with heels.
I did really like the look of these jeans and they were comfortable. I didn't wear them out though.

I do not know where to begin. I normally wear a 28, but RTR recommended a 29. The cut of this item is very strange with a higher rise in the front than in back. The legs are straight and the jeans are not fitted at all. However, the design includes a multiple of seams that do not make any sense and do not enhance the fit or the look overall.

These are incredible. They're the perfect vintage looking black jeans I've been searching for! I ordered a 30, knowing that some women said to size up, and I'm glad I did. They are slightly tight through the thighs, but are still comfortable. They fit around my waist perfectly with no gaping - a win in my book!

links_reviews_title: Honestly these jeans are amazing. So comfy and easy to move around in. High-waisted. Soft. Love.
links_reviews_text: I’m 7 weeks postpartum and needed a pair of everyday jeans I could throw on and be super comfy in. You can dress them up or down. I’ve been wearing them with converse and nursing tops. When I’m out women always ask where they’re from. Highly recommend.
These are grey jeans. Fit well, good for everyday. They have a little spandex in them so had some give. A basic jean.

links_reviews_title: I would size down in these

links_reviews_text: The bottoms looked baggy and weird on me
These are not great for hourglass figures. The crotch fits weird too!

links_reviews_title: Nice style, just a tad too long
links_reviews_text: This actually had a great, slightly edgy look and fit really well through the higher waist and thigh. I have short legs, however, so the kick didn't happen until too late and they didn't flatter. Just looked like tree trunk legs. If I owned them I would hem them and then they'd be awesome. Log legged ladies only!

Absolutely LOVED this jacket. Perfect for spring. It was a little thicker than I had imagined, but I didn't get overly hot in it. The pattern is so cute and the style of the jacket gives it a cool hip vibe
Love this - the pattern is great, the fit was fab, and it's warmer than expected. Perfect for a walk / wine walk during shelter in place times. Have worn several times since I rented it.

Torrrrryyyyyyy. What a lewk. I loved this jacket, was such a nice material and was a great alternative to the basic denim jacket (I still love a denim jacket, but a change is nice, ya know!?) Strongly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Fun and colorful. Fits a little roomy
links_reviews_text: Warm so great for fall/spring transition weather in NYC. Interestingly, I never got any real compliments on the jacket except from the banker who said he didn't recognize me at first because at the previous visit I wasn't so... colorful. Haha. Off handed compliment? Yes it's very colorful, not for the shy and fun to wear
Great jacket for Spring. It is also thick enough for cool Spring nights. Enjoyed wearing this piece.
bright and fun poppy pattern - exceeded expectations when i received it. weirdly long piece of fabric hanging from zipper but not a huge deal
Adorable mid weight bomber coat that was warmer than I expected but print was perfect for spring. Zipper pull was bizarrely long but my friend had the great idea to tie it in a knot.
Absolutely love this bomber jacket So comfy and made my basic T-shirt and jeans so much cuter
Colorful fun jacket that is a great alternative to black when out taking a walk in the sunshine. Medium weight, would be perfect for spring day around 50-60 degrees.

links_reviews_title: Love this coat, was warmer than expecting. Loved the colors, xs fit perfect!
links_reviews_text: Sporty and fabulous
Beautiful and comfy. Size down if between sizes or up for a looser fit.
The only thing I didn’t enjoy about this jacket was the logo string attached to the zipper. It was always in the way.

So cute so versatile so many compliments. I have wanted a floral bomber for a while and while this isn't the pattern I would buy, the effect was spot on and it was a great look with high-waist jeans, Keds and a black tee
Great floral print. Looking a bit murky after lots of rentals. Loved everything except The zipper pull and Tory Burch's need to have her name boldly on everything.
The fit is typical of a bomber jacket and it's the perfect pop of color to enhance a neutral outfit. I will be renting throughout the cool season. LOVE!

links_reviews_title: Cute and fit perfectly, got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Loved it.
Fit great
LOVE this jacket I just didn't get a chance to wear. It's loose fitting but super comfy. I will probably order again.
Cute jacket - better lined than you would think. Fun with jeans and white sneakers.

links_reviews_title: every day wear, to the office. all the compliments made it great
links_reviews_text: it is lined and very warm, almost like a thin down jacket. this makes the jacket nice and cozy but it also makes it not a "slim" type fit, in case you were looking for that. material is quality, print is beautiful, style is great. con would be that i do not like the long zipper pull that says "tory sport". i would cut it off.

links_reviews_title: This bomber jacket got a lot of compliments! Fun for work or play.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are nice and long! It's surprisingly thick and warm.
Loved this piece. I dressed it up with black and down with white jeans, T-shirt and tennis. Tons of compliments.

I rented this for vacation and wore it twice. Once with black crops (although the cuffs and collar are actually deep navy) during the day and also to the airport with leggings. At 22 weeks pregnant, I was still able to zipper the jacket fully. Boxy fit, but worked for me.
Great casual transition piece. Wore with leggings and sneakers while running errands
This is the perfect jacket to add something to a jeans and t-shirt sort of day. Not as light as I'd thought, but good for cooler spring weather.

links_reviews_title: So cute and comfortable, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fits TTS.

This is really cute and I got a lot of compliments on it! I love the print. I could've sized down bc it's a bit bulkier than I thought it would be, and I like my jackets a little smaller. But still works well and looks cute for spring.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant Colors, Warm, Great Transition Piece
links_reviews_text: It's a pretty thick bomber jacket. Super cute with a navy T-shirt underneath.
I wish our weather would have allowed me to really enjoy it
Brightened up the full winter. Colors are great.

This didn't do it for me. The pattern looks weird in person and doesn't seem particularly hip or trendy. I'm not sure what this look is trying to be. I don't understand why there's such a long zipper, & the jacket was too cropped for my liking.
Boxy and not as warm as I would have liked. I only wore it once.
Short sleeves, but runs a little big. Good for running around town errands.
Fit perfectly. Casual but could be dressed up. Fun for every day.

links_reviews_title: What's with the really long zipper pull?
links_reviews_text: Received it brand new with tags. Cute and very warm but the zipper pull on it is extremely long!

Sweatshirt-like material, but a little thinner/stiffer than a sweatshirt. It's actually split on the sides which I didn't realize. A great design, the slit sides allow you to tie it without adding a bunch of bulk around your middle! The ties are actually part of the fabric of the shirt back. And once it is tied you cannot see the side slits. A little shorter than I'd like, and I am short-waisted. And I had to fiddle with the tie periodically. But still a fun shirt!
Material is a little heavier almost like a light sweatshirt.
The front tie elevates it from being too casual
This is a great summer-to-fall transition piece. It's a nice sweatshirt material and it's an interesting cut while still being very comfortable.
This is such a comfy and versatile top. Dress it up with a sequin skirt or down with jeans. Bust runs big and the back hem is shorter than the front. It doesn't cover your behind.

Great for a Friday at work. Fits great! Disappointed in the state I received it - wrinkled and strings coming off the hem. This is my first rental in the unlimited memberships. Hope this is just a fluke.

When I first tried this on I thought it was boxy and boring. Then I tried it again with the tie a little tighter and I liked it better. The arm holes are big but it worked out for me just fine. It is kinda thick like a sweatshirt.
This top is fine. It's like a light sweatshirt material. It's a little short so I would size up if in between. I'll return after wearing once to work cuz it's nothing special
Absolutely loved this! Looked prefect with a pencil skirt. Sturdy material.
Loved this top. Looked great and was super comfortable
Such a great shirt. However, if you plan on moving around a lot it's annoying. The shirt rides up and I found myself constantly adjusting myself. Otherwise unique with comfortable fabric on your skin

I wore this shirt a few times but the front tie is really bad. I even ironed it but it is not a thick tie like on the model; it bunches up and gets very ropey and thin and looks kind of cheap. No matter how hard I tried to flatten it and tie it cute it would not stay.

links_reviews_title: Adorable! Great shirt to pair with jeans or skirt!
links_reviews_text: Fit well, nice material. Runs a tad bit big
I thought this was cute in the photo but it was too much heavy, thick fabric. Also the fabric was kind of stiff. I think this is better for tall, slender wearers with longer torso.
A little boxy. Came very wrinkled and had to iron to wear. Slightly shorter in back. Just ok.
Not a good piece for me

The material is similar to a light hoodie, cute for work if your office environment is laid back about attire! Fit was just right. Almost bought it, but the fabric of the front ties was curled in when it arrived. I steamed the ties to flatten them out, but within an hour of putting it on, the fabric was curled again. Not a huge deal, but it just didn't look as nice as the flat ties in the pictures.

links_reviews_title: Really cute and fun. Flattering and comfortable
links_reviews_text: A little short and thicker so could get hot in summer, but perfect for spring and fall.

links_reviews_title: I wish I liked it more!
links_reviews_text: It was true to size and cute, but it just looked better on the hanger
The fit was awful!
The fit is true to size and the way the tie cinches your waist is very flattering. I loved this shirt.
Didnt wear
I didn't wear this. It looked a bit frumpy on me and not nearly as cute as the picture.

It fit strangely. It was big in some areas (arms and shoulders) but short in others (where the sides came together and length). If I tightened the string to make it more fitted it flipped up and was short in the back but if you left lose it make me look baggy.

links_reviews_title: Odd fit, even for someone petite.
links_reviews_text: . Very short, and I'm short waisted.
Boxy and icky. Maybe if you are super slim and have no breasts. Was just a bad fit, even with a tiny waist
Really flattering silhouette for curvy peeps. Comfy yet sophisticated. I wore it out with slim black trousers.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for everyday and received tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit was slightly larger than I expected, but it was still functional and cute!
I liked the shirt, but I thought it was too short. I think the shirt would be good for someone who has a short torso.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this as it is a little shorter for long torsos.
links_reviews_text: A really cute top but I ordered a medium and should have ordered a Large so I didn't end up wearing this out. Super comfortable though.
I have a longer torso, so this top was a little too short for me but was cute and a great quality.
Great for work
Cute but it does need ironing.
The fit of this is WEIRD. I wish I had read more reviews prior to renting. Not worth one of your unlimited slots. It runs really big and isn't flattering at any point. The material is super cozy.
Nothing wrong with fit or fabric just wasn't overwhelmed by this piece. Very comfortable and easy to transition from work to hh, but overall the piece seemed forgettable
Fun too, the ties were wrinkled but otherwise fun to wear. Only wore it once as the fit didn't work super well for me.

Pros: fit true to size, material is soft Cons: The material is very heavy, the sash once tied is very heavy, causing the top to pull forward. The side view is not shown in the picture but the arm cut out are very large and there are slits up the side that go up past your natural waist, the blouse doesn't always stand in place so it may open on you if your doing something active.
Unflattering fit. The shape was awful on me but would be cute on someone taller maybe ? It was bunched and heavy looking.

It was just "okay". I ordered a small which is pretty spot on to my size. Like other reviews, I didn't love how large the armholes were. I wore a cute bandeau underneath just in case. I have a longer torso and this hit me RIGHT at my high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is so cute I received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This is my favorite piece I've rented so far. This jacket fits nice and a bit oversized. I wore it on a trip to Europe and it was perfect for colder days. Love this!
The sleeves were so long and bulky, and the jacket was just too large to be flattering. I ordered it for a glamping trip, but didn't end up wearing it
Pretty true to size but I think the fit is "oversized". Bigger sleeves and puffs out but cute. Fun trendy pattern. Warm for mild winters.

I absolutely LOVED this jacket. It was perfect for winter in Nashville. I wore it almost every day with athleisure and going out. I wanted to buy it but I think I needed a size down so maybe next time. The only reason I sent it back was bc I needed dresses for Miami. Now I am back to wearing my boring Patagonia jackets. Loved!
Very cute pattern, loved the idea. The fit however was very body, and was way too big. I was definitely sent way too big a size but I think the boxy fit runs a bit big in general
I definitely could have sized down, but it is a fun jacket, great print, style and warmth. Chunky sweaters fit nicely. It's a keeper for the winter, or until something else catches my fancy.
Cute but big and also heavier than I needed for Los Angeles in the fall. Someone thought I was wearing a blanket!
Too large. Boxy fit.

links_reviews_title: This is hands down the BEST fall jacket I have ever worn. Flattering, comfortable, gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I am a true small and ordered this jacket in a Small. Comfortable and enough room to layer with a sweater or sweatshirt.
This is a gorgeous coat but very oversized, so definitely size down!
Boxy fit
Cute dress. Very long wore with heels to show a bit of ankle. Had to wear with cami due to being a bit low cut.
Good for every day. Nice fit. No complaints!

links_reviews_title: Cute, had to be pinned up top
links_reviews_text: Very cute and comfy, received lots of compliments. Had to pin the chest though; it would have been too revealing otherwise.
Perfect for a wedding.

Received many compliments on the dress during our family holiday photo session. I ended up wearing the 2 even though with Madewell i am usually a 4. It does gap on the top but sizing down seemed to help. I am sure if you use double stick tape it would be fine but I didn't really care. Overall, great dress! Would love to actually buy!
Wonderful, flowy dress that looked beautiful in fall foliage! Dress is cut low, but was totally fine with secured with double sided tape. Sleeves are cute. Loved wearing it :)

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the length was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The color and pattern were beautiful the material was light and flowy and the length fit, even though I'm super short
Loved the easy silhouette of this dress. The length was perfect with flat sandals, and I'm 5'2 wearing size 2. The only issue is the torso was too long, causing the neckline to be quite low.

Wore this to baptism. So comfy, lovely muted red color. I'm 5'-11" and A cup. Length was great, bust was a little roomy. Great transition dress from late summer to early fall. Light weight fabric, wore on 80 degree day and felt cool and breezy. Thanks again rent the runway!! XOXO

links_reviews_title: Rented as part of unlimited plan and wore to work.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4, but went one size down based on reviews and it worked fine. It was fitted in the chest and waist, but I liked it that way. Pretty and flattering dress for work. Could also be dressed down.
This dress is extremely low cut - more like a halter. If you aren't comfortable with that, particularly for daytime wear, this isn't the dress for you.

links_reviews_title: A bit small and didn't like the fit
Amazing wanted to buy but resisted
links_reviews_text: This dress is awesome I got so many compliments from both men and women. I was really really tempted to buy it and was encouraged by plenty of girlfriends to do it. Will def rent again so cute fits perfect and goes great with heels!!

links_reviews_title: Really flattering and fun print maxi dress.
links_reviews_text: I expected this to be long, but it was actually ankle length and perfect.

links_reviews_title: This was a fun dress to wear on a warm fall day with booties.
links_reviews_text: Cute maxi dress that is a bit low cut (I had to safety pin it). Most of dress is forgiving but band around rib cage was a big snug on me.

I wish I had an occasion to wear this too because it fit well--even though it was a bit low cut and revealing for every day. The deep V and material made it a bit fancier than I expected and I didn't find an occasion to wear this to during my month rental, though with a jacket, flats, (and a scarf for modesty) I could probably have worn it out and about for everyday wear.

links_reviews_title: fun dress to wear to a concert
links_reviews_text: This dress was cute but ran big in the chest and shoulders. sort of an awkwardly placed slit as well. I wore with brown tights and brown booties as a transitional summer-to-fall piece. loved the pattern and slits in the sleeves, but wasn't wild about the fabric.
Loved the length. Sleeves fluttered and flattering neckline

Fit true to size I am 5'6 and it came to my ankles Was very low so Needs a camisole Good fall colors very boho Slit in front but can be hidden and tucked away Also slits on sleeves Lightweight breezy nicely lined
Great fit on the bottom but way too big on top. Tried to pin it but it just didn't look right. Wish it had worked out.

My event ended up canceled due to weather so I wore this out to lunch instead, hence not getting a great full-length photo to post here. The front is super low cut and requires double-sided tape to not flap open, or simply wearing a cami underneath like I did, for modesty. The length was perfect and I'm not very tall so taller gals keep this in mind and find appropriate shoes. I ended up wearing ankle booties with 3" heels and it was still a good length. It's true to size and the empire waist area is where you need to keep the true-to-size in mind. If you have a bigger ribcage, you might need to size up for that area. Otherwise, it's free-flowing by size. It does have a slit on one leg, beware on windy days like we had :D

I ordered up on this dress because I wasn't sure how the bust area would fit. I think the size 8 would have been just fine, but the 10 worked out great. I did have to safety pin the cleavage area; it was pretty low cut. The dress flowed well and the material was great. It was a perfect piece to transition into fall. I received a lot of compliments when I wore this.
Runs large like most madewell items but sizing down fit me well. I'm usually a 4 and a 2 in madewell and wore the 2. The top section of the dress shifts a bit but overall I was happy with it.
Loved this cardigan! Super cute grandpa vibes in the front. Xs was a little small on the shoulders, will size up next time.
This definitely fits a bit oversized as I’m a size 16 and comfortable wearing a large. That said, it is SO soft and so cute. I want this jacket so bad. Definitely not ready to return.

links_reviews_title: Grandpa in the front. Utility in the back.
links_reviews_text: Unique piece, hybrid cardigan jacket! I loved the mixed materials, it's lined in nylon so it's actually a warm layer. The wrists were tight, I was annoyed I couldn't push the sleeves higher up my arm to give it some more attitude. The neck also rides up really high, felt a little odd but not bad. I sized down to a M, would normally order a L but wanted a leaner fit.
I received so many compliments. I love the back - it's like a cape and gives the whole boyfriend sweater look at little flare. Will rent again.
The perfect weekend item. A-Line shape, so it's meant to be a loose fit. Looks great with jeans. One I would consider outright purchasing!
I felt super cool in this one, but I wouldn't call it a statement piece. I probably could have tried to style it differently. Great for fall/early winter!

Size Small was still too large on my 5'4" 117 lb frame, but I loved this anyway. It is lined in Army olive, matching the color of the "cape" on the back. It is SO well made--absolutely no itchy fabric due to a wonderful construction. But it is a few steps beyond the "boyfriend" look on me! Please forgive the awkward pose--I was trying to illustrate the fit. I very much recommend this but suggest sizing down a bit, or just enjoy the roominess! :)
When I rented this I didn't realize the back was different from the front. Def not something I would buy but loved wearing it. A bit oversized but I liked it that way.
A little potato-sacky for my body type but cute.
Wore this to work but I think its meant to be outerwear not a cardigan.
Fits boxy and big. Great with boyfriend jeans or skinny jeans. I wore with a black turtleneck, tennis shoes and dark jeans. Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Cute, but note back vent open
links_reviews_text: Trendy plaid, note back is open up to back yoke part, can't see on model photo.
This oversized cardigan is the best piece I've got this season. I cannot wait to rent again. I received so many compliments. It's so well made. If it wasn't so expensive I would buy it in an instant!

This would be an ok jacket. The description mentioned partially lined, the back view photo lols sort of like a jacket. But was looking to rent a cardigan. This had a much more boxy fit since only the front half is knit. But probably a comfortable and warm fall jacket.

links_reviews_title: Don't want to give them back
links_reviews_text: Soo comfy and flattering for a ski weekend in Park City! I wore these on the plane and for Aprés! A new friend commented on how good my ass looked in them too so if you also like to show off your booty, these are a solid choice 💁‍♀️
High quality denim, perfect fit, trendy cut. Fit perfectly to my normal size. Bought them.

links_reviews_title: Bummed Bc I got the 28r last week And they were too big. The 27r fits perfectly but there's a stain
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit. But there is a stain right on the crotch. Not sure how it got sent out to me like this.
Really comfortable jeans in a great style and wash. I've worn them 3 times so far. The only annoying thing is the button fly but it is not as stiff as some others I have come across

links_reviews_title: Solid high waist button fly relaxed fit jean
links_reviews_text: Soft, worn-in, heavy denim with some stretch. Sits just above belly button on me (I'm 5'4".) Got baggy in the waist and butt after two wears, had some funny pulling in the fabric on one leg, but overall good denim in a current style.

These jeans are fantastic. I sized up as I hadn't tried this brand before and while they work, they are a bit big. Nonetheless, ended up wearing them multiple times because they are really good and have been continually unavailable in a smaller size. Wore without the cuff in my picture and length is still cute even on someone shorter. I typically wear a 27 or 28 in denim. These seem to run comparable in sizing to Madewell. I'm looking forward to trying a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Too tight and unflattering for 5'4 frame.
links_reviews_text: These pants did not fit me well. The denim does not have any stretch.
These jeans were a bit tight at first, but broke in quickly once I had them on. I love the fit so much, I may end up buying.

I was nervous renting jeans given how variable fit can be but these were spot on with just enough weight to feel substantial but still stretchy. I'm usually a 6R in pants with a straight figure and 28R was perfect. I've been wearing to work and on the weekend. After wearing 5 times, they're starting to get loose in the knees but I would definitely rent these again.

Easy, cool jeans! These run true to size with room for movement. Love the high waisted look as well. They have some stretch (enough for comfort). Casual for an easy breezy outfit! I'm typically a size 0/2 and the size 25 fit perfectly.
These got worse as I wore them...wanna look 15 pounds heavier these are the denim for you! Just so bad.
Fits strangely. Small in waist and hips but loose in legs. I'm usually a 25 or 26 and these were not comfortable. Going bigger I think would be too loose in the legs.

Looove these jeans! Extremely comfy and a nice wash. I am a size 4 / 27, and got these in a 27. Next time I will rent them in 26 as they do have some give and stretched out after a couple of days of using them.
I loved the fit and look of these jeans the only reason I returned them is because the weather cooled and I stopped wearing sandals.
I rented these for update and kept them two months. Easy to dress up or down. Plus they made my butt look great. The denim was so soft and lived in yet the construction was spot on.
Didn't want to let them go but couldn't afford to keep!
Loved these - the jeans were so flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fit and looked great, exactly like the picture
links_reviews_text: Love these

One reason I love RTR is to be able to try items and possibly purchase for my closet. I rarely order pants from RTR and tried to love these. The fit was great at first. Came to my natural waist and hit mid to lower calf. So comfy... until they started to get loose from wearing. I'm a solid 8 and the 30 fit good. I'm 5'5 140#.
I loved these jeans! Super comfy with a little stretch. The button fly is a nice detail. Felt relaxed, but still on trend and put together. Wish I could keep them.
Cute but typical. I wore to a church event. Nothing special.
Nice comfy fit. Extremely true to size. Not the look I was going for but it is just like the image
I loved these jeans! This brand normally runs small, but these ran true to size. Very flattering on my curvy frame. Gave that 90s look without flattening out my butt. Will definitely rent again!
Ran small for me, as a I regularly wear a 28/29. Definitely size up 1-2 sizes if you have a bit more curve to your hips!

links_reviews_title: Very confortable and doesn't lose shape after multiple wears
links_reviews_text: Loved this jeans! Great length ! Very confortable weekend jeans or to travel! Fits very nicely around booty area. Easy to fold to make it shorter.
These fit great and are a true denim. Only compliant is that they were a bit too long on my 5' 4" frame. They hit at my ankle and would have liked them to be about 2 inches shorter.
These jeans have a lot of stretch to them so they end up larger than I thought. If in between sizes go down. High waist is really flattering. Overall cute casual but nothing super special

I've tried on re/done denim before and found it to run small, particularly in the thighs, so I got a size up. However, these jeans have a fair amount of stretch so I would have been fine with my normal size - in a size up they're a bit big around my waist. They're very soft and comfortable, and versatile for daily wear.
Nice materiel and colors. Had to cuff sleeves because they were short.

links_reviews_title: Comfy sweater, slightly shorter than I would like but very cozy!
links_reviews_text: Great cozy sweater for work or everyday wear. I wore this to work and got compliments on it. It is slightly shorter than you would think but roomy otherwise. I usually wear a large but tried an XL just because these types of sweaters I like to be extra roomy, and it paid off!
Fit was true to size, I ordered a Small instead of XS to have a cozy and comfy look.

Nice sweater - arms on the short side as other reviewers note but not a problem if you usually shove sleeves up as I do - bit of a balloon shape at middle so not a sleek look, but cozy. A good option for a casual retreat day at work. But nothing to get excited about.
Enjoyed, but not blown away. Middle of the road in weight for a sweater. I liked the color blocking and was cute and the sides were different.
The sweater was fine but I would never pay the retail price for it. I'm typically a small but the xs fit just fine.
I get several compliments on this. The design is flattering and fresh and the sweater is warm on a fall day.
Enjoyed wearing this sweater. It was cut and comfortable. Received a few compliments too!
Perfect interesting sweater!!
Great sweater, runs a bit large.

Usually a S-M in tops, but I often get L sweaters for a more oversized fit. Fit well but definitely not oversized/sleeves were pretty short - but it is a cute sweater and I enjoyed wearing it on a casual Sunday!
Loved this sweater! I wore it numerous times and may honestly wind up buying it. It is a bit on the short side, I'd personally add 2-3 more inches, but love it all the same.

Fits just as expected- a boxier cut and side vents at bottom help it lay well. Sleeves are definitely 3/4 length if you have longer arms like me. Got compliments from both a 25 year-old guy I work with and a colleague in her 50's. Just a tad itchy...the only reason for 4 stars instead of 5. If it were cozier, I'd buy it!
Loose fit, stylish in design and color scheme, great for work to date night to party
Great fit and perfectly warm for a chill spring day.
Average sweater for everyday wear
Loved this sweater, I got a ton of compliments. It was a little wide and not very long but super comfortable.
i should have gotten a small but it was still great

links_reviews_title: I loved this top. It was great for beach spirng.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit.
Simple/ easy fit but cute details with the color blocking. Warm enough for the office but needed a jacket outside
Loved this - felt stylish but casual, like I wasn't trying too hard. I'm 5'10/Size 8 and this felt short in arms but otherwise fit fine. Wasn't form fitting but not too oversized.

links_reviews_title: This was a fun, everyday sweater! Wore it to work and got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: You could wear this with anything!

links_reviews_title: Great everyday sweater for fall or spring! Colorblock makes it stand out.
links_reviews_text: Super comfy sweater - not tight fitting, but not overly loose.

links_reviews_title: didn't wear it as didn't like the fit
links_reviews_text: arms were really short and not in a way that it was meant to be
Shorter in the front than I prefer and sleeves felts short as well. In general not very flattering.
Cute everyday sweater, rented a size up so that it would be a bit boxier.
Amazingly warm and soft material, cute colors and overall style. Will rent again.
The fit is great and the color block works so well with jeans and sneakers
Cute sweater but was a little big because I got a medium when I'm normally a small. I would rent again.
Solid sweater. Felt it rode a little short but might be preference. Colors were nice but also felt it attracted fuzzy and hair to stick to the fabric.

I ordered this a size larger so it would be a loose and oversized look. I loved it- it was made well and warm. The color block looked clean and neat but fun. Wore over 3 times with skinny jeans and boots.

links_reviews_title: I loved the three color palette on here.
links_reviews_text: The fit was just right. Not too snug or loose.
Lovely sweater with a good medium weight. I dressed it up with black pants and heels for work and down with jeans for the weekend.
Great fit and comfortable. I wore it many times
Loved this sweater! It was super comfy and not itchy at all. It looked great with everything and the fit was really flattering. I didn't wanna give it back!

I loved this sweater. I definitely considered buying it. It fit perfect. The material was comfortable. I wore it out for brunch with jeans and then to work with a pair of black pants. Looked great with both.

links_reviews_title: Soft and cozy without looking sloppy
links_reviews_text: I got an xl because I wanted it to be extra baggy but a large would have been perfectly fine. Was able to dress up and down for work and a casual day out and about. Would rent again.
Nice pattern, cozy fit

It had a comfortable, loose fit that wasn't too baggy which is exactly what you want in a sweater. It's super versatile- I paired it with slacks for work, black skinny jeans for date night, and ripped jeans for a weekend day out. I got a TON of compliments on the color block pattern.

links_reviews_title: Neutral sweater that's cozy and fun
links_reviews_text: Great quality and fits true to size. Flattering color blocking and cut.
Fit great without a bra! Definitely needed to iron the tie to make it as big as pictured but was such a great gameday top
This is very cropped!! I wore to a country concert, so it was acceptable but be aware! Very cute and comfortable.
Absolutely loved, so many compliments. Very short but perfect with high waisted skirt or pants!

Love this top and wore it a bunch on a vacation-- great with high wasted jeans or shorts. I'm normally a small and rented the medium which was quite loose. Luckily, the lie in the back allows for a lot of adjustments. Definitely recommend wearing with a bralette for more coverage.

This was the perfect summer crop top, the yellow more of a marigold. I got so many compliments on it and I could wear a plunge bra with no problem because the back ties hid the bra band. It's definitely on the shorter side for a crop top.

The fit can be adjusted according to how tightly you tie the knot in the back. I loved this top so much, it was adorable and paired perfectly with high waisted bottoms on a hot day. Can be worn without a bra

links_reviews_title: Liked it, but didn't love it unfortunately
links_reviews_text: I had been trying to make this top work for WEEKS while foregoing a spot in my rotation and finally just threw it together with jeans (3x1 also RTR!) for a weekend at my parents. The eyelet detail is beautiful and the color pops against the skin but overall i felt pretty "meh" about this top. I think it'd be better suited on someone with a smaller chest. Photo of the back (a beautiful bow) on @thanksitsrtr

Loved the color of this top for summer. It's so bright and happy. I thought the fit was a little small when it comes to the chest area. I am a C cup and I had a bit of underboob but other than that it was great. Love the back too, it's subtle sexy.

links_reviews_title: LOVE THIS SHIRT & SO MANY COMPLIMENTS
links_reviews_text: I could have gotten a medium but I prefer a little bit more lose fit. Looked great with high waisted jeans! I am short so my torso is smaller so it didn't show that much stomach but my roommate tried it on (she is 5'8") and thought it was too much stomach. But own it! Its the cutest shirt and I got so many compliments.
Great fit, ties at back
Perfect fit for a hot summer day. Wore this to an outdoor music festival. So many compliments from the boyfriend! The ruffles and back bow made a crop top into a statement.
My favorite part about this too was that I could wear a regular bra with straps! It ties in the back making it work for anyone. Very cropped but goes well with high waisted skirts.
Shows a lot of skin and was a bit loose but LOVED it and got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: SO CUTE! Got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I want to buy this for myself! It looks extra cropped on me but I'm super tall.
What a perfect crop top for the sun. I'm extremely busty and was able to wear a bra without issue/it didn't show.
Great going out top! Wore to an outside bar and loved the bright yellow piece.
I was a little concerned with the size of the top when I pulled it out do the box but it was actually very adjustable and flattering! It was great for summer and I got a ton of compliments!
This top is beautiful and i did not want to send it back.
Receive so many compliments on this top. Perfect for summer with high waited white jeans!
I got so many compliments on this top! It's so simple but flattering. Loved it! Best without a bra so easier for smaller chested girls.
Fit perfectly. Ties in the back so it is adjustable.

links_reviews_title: Ordered a size up for comfort
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments. I ordered a size up so it fit a little looser.
Amazing shirt! Definitely super cropped but looked fine with high waisted shorts.
Perfect for a festival themed bachelorette. I love this top and would have bought it if I would have thought I'd wear it often! So flattering and love the color.
Wore this with a white denim skirt and it was adorable. The material is thick enough that I didn't need to wear a bra and the bow on the back completely makes the shirt!
the top is very cute but better for small chested women

links_reviews_title: Loved but not for Busty Girls
links_reviews_text: Wish this could work for me!!!! I thought I would give it a try but it just did not work with my DD's.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, fun top for the weekend
links_reviews_text: Really fun top. With a larger bust, I went up a size to accommodate and the shirt overall worked. Wearing with a pair of high waisted jeans to make it a little less cropped and revealing.
I exclusively wear crop tops & am used to showing off my midsection and this was stupid short. Couldn't make it work with even the most high waisted of bottoms.

links_reviews_title: Super cute detail and tie in the back!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. V-neck, but too much and adjustable because of the tie back

links_reviews_title: Very high quality structured blouse with great details
links_reviews_text: This shirt is SO cute. The side slit comes up very high; I wouldn't wear it to work without something underneath. And it is definitely oversized. The fabric is very structured, though, so it holds a flattering shape and doesn't immediately wrinkle -- I wouldn't rent it for summer though, as the fabric is heavier for a blouse. Great for spring/fall transition.

The details are beautiful. Know that it's cropped in the front and the sides go up higher but I loved how it looked with high waisted pants and contrasted how full the sleeves were to see tighter bottoms. Would buy if less expensive.

Great top for work or out. The sides are a little high so I wore something high waisted for work. The sleeves were a bit long so I might size down next time. Also this wrinkles easily, took off my coat and there were wrinkles around my shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful twist on a classic white blouse
links_reviews_text: As a designer myself, it kills me that someone could describe this blouse as nothing special. Beautiful thoughtful details, loved the neckline. Yes slots on the side were high but I didn't mind with high waisted pants. Played with it both Tucked in and out
great versatile top with high quality cotton and detailing. wore to work and casual dinner with friends. would be an amazing wardrobe staple. contemplating buying one....

Interestingly enough, I'd already left the house wearing this blouse before noticing the high slits up both sides. I changed out of it the minute I got home. Good thing I hadn't worn it to work. Also, I found the shirt to be fairly basic, blah, boring. I thought the detailing I'd seen in the pictures here would make this something beyond the ordinary crisp white blouse. On me, nothing.
Fits great, though the sleeves were too long for my taste so I pushed them up. Great summer blouse for work! Super light and airy but still sophisticated.

I'm sorry this picture isn't the best representation of the shirt but I seriously loved it. The material of the shirt is super airy and light but also sturdy. I ordered it in a large because small and medium weren't available it honestly was fine! The only big part were the sleeves that were too long.

links_reviews_title: Love, love, love this piece. Beautifully constructed with just enough daring to make it memorable
links_reviews_text: A little boxy but still flattering. Perfect with denim. Will absolutely rent again
Very nice quality! Made me look great but also like I wasn't trying too hard!
Sides of blouse came up higher than expected so I had to wear a cami underneath for work.

Pros: This shirt has a unique cut. Good for a casual day at the office. Would look cute with jeans or shorts. Cons: The side slits are pretty high so recommend high waisted pants. Also for me the sleeves were way too long but looked weird rolled or bunched up. Even with high waisted pants it showed a little skin so since I was wearing it to work I had to wear a tank top underneath. Definitely cuter without a tank top.
#trendy #highquality

links_reviews_title: Perfect to throw over a jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: I rented a bright colored, sleeveless jumpsuit. I threw this over that, so I could wear it to work. This is a large, boxy cut. Also, it was low cut in the chest and cut high on the sides. Putting it over a jumpsuit worked, because all of the cuts made the jumpsuit visible and the boxy shape made it work appropriate.
Slit on side is quite high

links_reviews_title: Runs really big and sleeves were very long.
links_reviews_text: I could not wear as it was way to large for me.
The blouse fit fine but I wasn't aware that the sides are cut very high, making this a midriff too on the sides. I did not wear it.
Ordered a large but probably a small would have worked. The blouse is a lot of fabric with an odd proportion. Didn't wear because it was just too tricky and I kept futzing with it!
This shirt makes you look like a cocktail waitress and I wouldn't recommend!
Received with tags on brand new which is nice. Crisp and white but nothing special. Runs huge

links_reviews_title: Started a Zoom fashion war with this one
links_reviews_text: I paired this skirt with a navy blue top by Trina Turk... this combo has started a fashion war in my Zoom meetings. This skirt is even prettier in person than in photos. The A-line cut will flatter any figure and the skirt moves with the body, skimming and laying flat. The tropical weight wool is light enough that you can wear this skirt in any season but high-summer. I was perfectly comfortable outside at 70-degrees with a light breeze. Awesome pockets. I will be renting this skirt again.

Loved this a-line skirt! The color is beautiful, yes it wrinkles but that's what nice natural fabrics do. Fun zipper pull in the back with a leather tab. Great length and loved having pockets. Versatile to wear with basic tees and chunky sweaters.
Wrinkles pretty easily but very lightweight wool. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous quality skirt and beautiful fit.
links_reviews_text: Wow! Marni does it again. Lovely lines, fully lined in black acetate, and fun extra long belt. (Belt comes in a separate bag, similar to RTR purses.) Wrinkles a bit easily- only downside. Hits me (5'5") about 1 inch below the knee cap. Could probably have worn the 40R, but decided to size up for a bit more comfort. This is a great piece!

Wore this for a bridal shower. Got a lot of compliments on this skirt. The fit was a little strange, but not enough to notice all day. Snug in the hips and loose on the waist, but that just may be because of my shape. I would still rent again.
Very comfortable skirt. On the longer side. I'm 5'6 and it hits below my knee. I love the look! It also hugs curves well while not being tight. It has an elastic waist for comfort.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and flattering but not lined
links_reviews_text: As others have mentioned, this skirt appears much smaller than it is, fabric stretches nicely, it is summer weight fabric and you definitely a dark slip under it. Liked it enough to keep for a second wearing... easy to dress up or down.
Loved this slip skirt. Fit well with elastic waist band. Paired back to oversized top to contrast slim waist.
Love the weight, pattern and length. Great with a tabk on the weekend and a T-shirt for my (casual) office. Paired with flats for work. Surprisingly nice length - I am 5'4".

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable skirt for day to night
links_reviews_text: Looks small when you hold it up but it stretches and hugs in the right places. Super comfortable and light.

links_reviews_title: Easy to pack skirt. For work trip or weekend
links_reviews_text: Fit was as expected. Higher rise. Nice and light.

My first look at the skirt, I thought I could not fit my legs into it. But the dress fits to your figure. The fabric is very stretchy. It was very comfortable and I could do all my everyday activities in it.
This was very flattering and comfortable. It hit right at my belly button and fell just above the ankle.
Such an adorable skirt that goes with anything. Very comfortable for casual wear but easy to dress up as well. It is thin so better for spring or summer wear.
Rented this skirt twice already. I wore it in London with an oversized sweater and at home while hosting Friendsgiving. Looove this and have been super tempted to buy this.

This was tight but stretchy, which actually made this very flattering and not that clingy. It paired really well with a tee-shirt and clogs and I was glad that I was able to wear it multiple times during my rental.
Great skirt. Fits well and forgiving. Pairs well with sweaters for the fall! Works for petites.

This was a cute everyday skirt for work. The drape and silhouette is a bit more flared at the bottom than it appears in the photos. I was also surprised there was no zipper - the waist is elastic and the fabric doesn't give much when you pull it on. It also runs a bit small so renter beware; I'm pretty consistently a medium/27 but a large fit me perfectly in this brand/style.

This skirt fit so weird, sized up per rtr recommended size but was left with a bubble of fabric above my butt from the elastic waistband Beyond fit problems this skirt felt so cheap and looked poorly constructed, like an 8th grade home ec project.
I love this skirt!! I wore it multiple times and felt great in it. I am highly considering buying this. Is easy to dress up or down as I wore to work and then out for happy hours.

It was very long & form fitting. I wanted to wear it as an everyday casual skirt. But it was a bit more dressy. Still loved it though. Order up because it runs small & does not stretch. It's a very sexy skirt I wore with a white t-shirt & flip flops to make more casual. Then I wore it a second time with a tank top & strappy sandals.
Perfect to rent to be on trend with this style skirt without needing to purchase. Comfortable with some stretch
Perfect skirt for everyday. Can be dressed up or down. Will rent again!

Very cute but didn't end up wearing. Too form fitted for my taste and kind of see through. I'm usually a medium or large and the large fit well. The material wasn't super stretchy but did have some give and the back has an elastic waist.

I wore this skirt for everything all week! I wore it to work, day drinking, fancy dinner and out. So easy to dress up or down with a crop top or a shirt tucked in. It's true to size and not stretchy but doesn't stick to your body so it's really flattering, just skimming your figure.

links_reviews_title: I have worn this so much. I am debating keeping it. Love it
links_reviews_text: Love it - rent

Very work appropriate. I was between a medium and a small and got the small so it would fit snuggly on my waist. Definitely not a lot of give in the fabric. Glad I got true to size. I wore with a black T-shirt tucked in and a thin belt over the skirt

links_reviews_title: Epitome of an everyday midi skirt
links_reviews_text: One of those wear everywhere to everything pieces

links_reviews_title: Fun, easy fit, can wear with so many outfits
links_reviews_text: Bunched a little but that was actually flattering look

Very flattering but slim through the hips and butt so size up if you have wider hips like myself. There is also absolutely NO give in the fabric. The skirt sat at my waist and hit mid-shin/calf. Paired it with a super slouchy sweater and booties. Comfortable. Would rent again for a warmer spring day in a size larger.
It feels amazing, the color is perfect, super easy to style. Absolutely beautiful! Definitely renting it again.

This skirt was perfect for my Roman holiday. It's sophisticated, has a great pop of color, it's comfortable and well made. I wore it a couple of different ways including with white tennis shoes and a leather jacket. Also this is faux leather but it was so soft and buttery I would have believed it was real.
Fits well! I'm a 12, I sized down and it was perfect.
hard to believe this is faux leather. fun color, great for spring. high-quality monotone belt adds extra flare.
What a lovely skirt. Great quality and the belt is a must to tie it together and cinch the waist. Fit TTS, if anything slightly big. Got tons of compliments!
Makes you look and feel a million bucks! The leather is so buttery that it moves with you and is so flattering.
Loved the color and material. It's cropped which I liked but I definitely would have preferred the fit of a large instead of the medium I got.

links_reviews_title: Love the warmth and bright color.
links_reviews_text: Feels super comfortable on the skin since it's cotton. Bright color makes me eyes smile.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I kept it
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color. Thick heavy duty material. Not too hot. Perfect statement sweater
Fit great, stylish. Received many compliments on this sweater!
The sweater wasn't as soft as I thought it would be, but it was certainly warm! The sleeves were long and it was semi cropped. The color was Forsure a show stopper!

I LOVED this sweater! I'm not normally one for bright colors but it was so fun and comfortable. I did size up based on other reviews so the crop wouldn't be too extreme and it was perfect. I wore it to work tucked into a skirt, and also wore with jeans on the weekend. I wore this 4 times, and will 100% be renting again. It's a nice heavy ribbed material, warm but not too warm.
Pretty color. Fun pierce to spring to summer transition

links_reviews_title: Super fun neon pink cropped sweater
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater, wore it twice in the same week! The color is super bright - highlighter pink/neon. I sized up based on reviews and was happy I did - typically wear a small and ordered the medium to ensure it wasn't too cropped. Fit perfect - wore to work and a causal house party. Not oversized and still met my pants without showing any of my stomach. Bump friendly as I'm 5 months pregnant.

links_reviews_title: Hot pink! Who can go wrong with that?!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this sweater! I live in the pacific nw so this was the perfect spring transition color and cozy! It's a neon that makes it fun and was very flattering with high waste jeans. The picture on the website doesn't give it justice, so much brighter than I initially thought. The sleeves are long, but I have long arms so it was nice to not have it fall short of my wrists.
Great sweater that could work for office or everyday. I found this TTS and would rent again!
Loved the hot pink. Sleeves were long.
The color is a neon highlighter pink. Fun pop of color for winter. Nice and warm. It is a crop. I'm pretty short so I really liked where it cropped, but may be too short for taller girls.

Usually wear an 8, rented a medium and large. I tried on the large first and liked the way it fit so stuck with the large. It is cropped but the large worked out well for someone who doesn't like to wear short tops. It is a heavy sweater, again in a way I liked bc the sweater stayed in place. Wore it twice while I had it, once with jeans and once with leggings. I would love to wear this everyday.
This sweater is way brighter than shown in the RTR photo. Was great for casual valentine's day
Soft and comfy, cute but this is bright neon! Loved wearing it once but wouldn't keep. Got lots of compliments.
This sweater is way brighter than I expected. It's super soft and full of positive energy. It's a little shorter than I expected, more like a cropped sweater.

links_reviews_title: This color is really bright and fun!
links_reviews_text: Nice sweater to wear during the summer on cool nights or winter! The bright pink color is very lively and fun! Its a nice change up for me!

links_reviews_title: Bright ad fun sweater, so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Very warm, definitely not for early fall. Very comfy and cute.

links_reviews_title: This just didn't work for me.
links_reviews_text: Something about this particular color pink just made me feel like a 10 year old. The sweater is nicely made and comfy cozy - but I wasn't a fan of the slightly puffy sleeves and the highlighter pink color
Fit is ok but the color is more like a neon hot pink --- it's super bright
I wanted to buy this sweater and keep it forever, Amazing color, perfect cut, wore it multiple times.
Super fun color and the fit was perfect. I got so many compliments!

I loved this sweater. The highlighter pink color was SO much fun, but the offset with white in the rib kept it from being too intense. I got a ton of compliments every time I wore it, and it was a nice chunky weight without being unbearably hot.
This sweater is cropped and so warm, like A neon pink. Have rented multiple times and love it for the winter !
Love the color, texture and look of this sweater. Got lots of compliments, too.
I love this sweater. It is a bright, neon pink with a cropped fit. Flattering, comfortable and got so many compliments.

This sweater is amazing, so soft and the color is so vibrant but not in a tacky highlighter way. The knit is thick and heavy and really keeps its shape. I'm 5'9" and the this sweater hit me at the top of high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments wore this to work as we have a casual dress code
links_reviews_text: Love this sweater! Soft and Bright. Perfect for high waisted jeans. Will rent again and again!

links_reviews_title: Neon pink sweater is a fun pop of color and great everyday piece
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, bright fun color. Loved it!
The sweater is super bright and fun but VERY short. I am 5'10" so it was really more of a crop top on me. Be careful if you are tall as you may need extra length.
Loved this sweater! Great fit. True to size. Perfect amount of crop. Super comfortable and looked great with distressed jeans and Nike high tops. Will miss this piece!

This was a cute casual sweater. It does run a little small and feels like it's meant to be more of a cropped sweater. It is WAY more neon in person, which I loved but just a heads up. You get great compliments on how fun it is

The photo doesn't do the color justice because this sweater is NEON!! It's super soft and comfy. Thick material and looks great with jeans for an everyday/weekend look but it's a tad cropped. I ordered a size up to have it be a bit looser and I'm glad I did because I think the medium would have been too cropped.
I usually wear a small but ordered a medium and maybe would have done a large if I knew the fit. It's oversized in the arms but cropped. Great color.
I love patterns and loved this one! However the fabric felt too stretchy a bit see through and overall not the level of quality that I expected it. Used it only once.

I want to own this but I'm too poor!!! It's a great piece to layer under a blazer or casually like I did. True to size. Is very thin so be warned for those sizing down it might pull across your frame in an unflattering way. I highly recommend!
Pretty print, breathes well, very comfortable.

A well made Super soft cotton turtleneck. I wore it 3x and would keep if it wasn't so pricey (for everyday wear). Depending on what you are looking for, it felt a little bigger than TTS, but I wasn't looking for a fitted Tee, so order your size according to your desired fit. I am sure an XS would have fit and looked great and maybe less casual. Pairs well better with well wore jeans... which I did as well.
Feels really soft on. Great on my skin tone. Interesting colors to boot!

links_reviews_title: I got many compliments...nice lightweight top...matches many colors!
links_reviews_text: fits true to size, nice light material...I got many compliments.

Fun turtleneck, but be careful if you are large chested. The pattern accentuated my curves, and I felt is drew too much attention for work, so I wore a cardigan over it. Sizing up may have solved the issue, but it fit well everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: Simple + soft turtleneck for a winter day!
links_reviews_text: This turtleneck was fine - not the most exciting rental but very soft, and nice colors. I wore tucked into blue jeans. Really great for a winter day when you don't want to wear a sweater.
I thought this was a simple turtleneck, but I got SO many compliments on it was work. Fit well, was comfortable and chic.

I loved wearing this beautiful turtleneck tee. I think the color and pattern is interesting and flattering and the fabric is very smooth and comfortable. Hope to rent again in the future. Was tempted to purchase.

links_reviews_title: Casual top for casual weekend events
links_reviews_text: Nice fit. Sleeves were long enough for me. The fabric is very thin though, so it's good for cooler days; not freezing ones.
Wore this to a nice dinner and a casual brunch. Great for all events. Can be dressed up or down. Logo is very tasteful / provides a little pop of color. Photographs well.
Beautiful pattern. This sweater is quite thick, so it was great for winter and I wore it around the holidays. Nice quality and feel to it.

Rented for a simple at work Halloween costume. Kept to wear longer! Loved the vintage looking print. It's warm and cozy so it's perfect for snowy Chicago. The only thing is that it's slightly cropped which isn't the most flattering look for me.
Really cozy sweater. Great color and fit.
This sweater is soft (not scratch), comfy and has a nice easy fit. Size down if you want to wear it more form-fitting.
The sleeves were long on me and it was just ok so I didn't wear it
Heavy duty without being heavy. Was soft not scratchy. Fit was perfect for my body.
No shrinking violet in this sweater- it is so cute and even though it's $500, I keep thinking about it and wish I could own it. Would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great color and patterns! Feels a little bulky on a short torso.
links_reviews_text: Great quality and color combos but not immediately flattering for a short torso
Had so man compliments when I wore it to work!

links_reviews_title: So warm, great color for the holidays
links_reviews_text: I was really worried about this sweater being itchy, but it is so soft! It is very, very thick and warm, so you almost don't need a coat with it in lower temperatures. The color is great for the holidays because it's not red/green overload and can be easily dressed up or down. My only (very minor) gripe (not even enough to dock a star) is that the torso length is semi-cropped. On me, it came down to just below my belly button. I generally size up for thicker tops, including sweaters, and I'm very glad I did because I think, while a small would have been perfectly fine in other aspects, it probably would have been too short for my preference. tl;dr: very warm, very soft, will rent again

links_reviews_title: I like the pattern on this sweater. Wore it to work and got several compliments.
links_reviews_text: Very warm. I didn't wear anything under it. It's soft and not itchy.
Love love love this. It's true to size, maybe a touch bigger. It's cropped but not so much that your belly will be exposed if you're wearing high waisted pants. Super warm and cozy too!

links_reviews_title: Felt like I was the enigmatic loner in a David Lynch film. Or the Stranger Things opening. Cozy,warm
links_reviews_text: Good

This sweater is really cute -- loved the pattern! I'm 5'1" and the XL was still pretty short on me. And I don't have a long torso, so that's saying something. I wore it with black leggings and Vans, and was very comfortable. However, I spent a lot of time tugging the sweater down. Not sure if I'd rent it again.
Loved the details on this sweater; it was the perfect length for me (I prefer slightly cropped) and the neckline is just a little edgier than a crewneck.

This top is too fun! It is so comfy and effortless. I love that it fits big and has length in the back. It felt edgy and youthful. The fabric is soft and wonderful. I wore a tank underneath since the armholes are massive. I wanted to just live in it. I wore it to work and then again to thanksgiving with my family.

Shirt is ok. A little shorter in the front than I thought from the model picture. Also note that the armholes are very big and long so you definitely need to wear a camisole or tank underneath this otherwise everyone will be able to see your bra (or lack thereof! ) fine for wearing around.

links_reviews_title: Soft and easy to nurse under.
links_reviews_text: Wore it on a rainy day and wasn't too warm under my raincoat. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: This was so flattering. Loved it.
links_reviews_text: Fit well and looked great, even for an, "ahem", older lady.
fit true to size

The knit is what makes this piece a win. It's thin (but of high quality) so it drapes beautifully. It was a surprise because it is essentially a rectangle of knit. I wore it with slim jeans to a family event. I felt very 'New York City' elegant even though it was a casual look. Loved it so much I borrowed it again. I wore a plain thin long sleeve top under this but it could work with a tank underneath as well.

This was a fun sweater. Lightweight, so good for fall in Florida, but with a little more flair than a typical black basic sweater. I found several opportunities to wear this. Fit was loose and I had to wear a tank top underneath because the armholes are big, but overall a great everyday rental.
Would def rent this again. This sweater was super soft and comfortable. Great for a casual day in the office

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but you need a tank/shirt underneath (otherwise the arm area offers a free show haha).
links_reviews_text: I wish the front was slightly longer. I got it for work and every time I reached up for something, it rose up tremendously. I had to wear a tank underneath to keep from exposing my midriff or bra (through side views in the armholes). It was pretty linty, but cute overall.
So so soft and comfy, the material is wonderfully cozy. Would buy it if it was a bit cheaper!

I love this dress. I read other reviews and sized up and I’m really glad I did because this dress is so comfortable and cute. It’s also light weight and the buttons up the front are actually snap buttons which really come in handy when your trying to get into your SUV or just do anything in general. I will definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Cute design- wish it fit better!
links_reviews_text: This dress was probably one size too big on me- had a weird gap in my chest to upper waist. Otherwise was a super cute black dress for work!
Fit is pretty TTS but not much stretch and maybe a bit tight around the chest and shoulders. I received so many compliments and will definitely rent again!
I've rented this before in a different color, and it looked great both times

links_reviews_title: Size up for the perfect work dress
links_reviews_text: I want to buy this dress next time I rent. It is a little short but you can still make it professional. It does run small. Size up.
A little tight, but great fit overall and very versatile.
