Fit me well!! Only compliant I have is that I can't lift my arms up or the entire dress will shift up uncomfortably. Also, I'm a 32A and there was definitely some weird room leftover in the chest area. Perf for work!!

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of leg to go from day to night!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs a bit small in the chest and shoulders. I took advice from other reviews and went with a 6 because I'm a 34DD and didn't want to feel confined in the bust area. This made it less snug in the waist but I liked the look. The dress doesn't have any stretch, so seriously consider going up a size. Wore it to the office, on the road for several hours to show homes and then off for drinks in the evening. Loved the versatility and comfort.

I am so in love with this dress that I am going to buy it! I almost always wear a size 2 but read the reviews and got a size 4 in this and it fits me perfectly. I got this for a funeral but can wear it to work to a wedding to date night or just about anything. Truly the perfect little black dress and the fit is so flattering!
Wore the dress for work. Tight in the chest (34D) loose on the hips (36").
I like this dress, but I ordered a size too big. It's good for short people like me

links_reviews_title: Kind of weird with the sizing, but cute
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 2 in another color and it was big. The 0 was pretty tight. I think the sizing might be just a little off, but I would still go with the smaller one if you're in between. Kind of basic, but worked for a work dress.
A little short and a little right in the chest but it's a great basic black dress and the snaps add a little fun detailing to the piece.
A fun twist on a black dress. The front is memorable but not overdone. Hikes up a bit when you sit down, but a great length when standing.

This dress is really cute! The top was a little odd in fit. It ran tight in the chest but loose around the top of the shoulders and collar. It's cold now so I was able to hide that with a sweater to keep my arms warm at the same time. Super versatile dress and will probably wear it a couple more times before I have to return it.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, but better with tights for work as I found it just a bit too short for a work environmen
Runs small on top & large on bottom. Weird.
links_reviews_text: Like the reviews said, it's tight on top so if you have bigger than a C cup this isn't your dress. I decided to try anyways and sized up. I'm normally a 4 so the 6 fit in the top but the bottom half was awkwardly large and made me look a lot bigger than I am.
Super cute light weight material - runs small
Tight across the chest

Cute dress with great material but it was loose around my waste making me look a size or two bigger then i am without a belt. They have this dress in other colors and people have said they fit different. May try one of those- regardless good dress for work

I wore this when I had to travel from Boston- NYC and work all day through evening. It looked amazing throughout the day despite my travels! I wore this with flats as it is a bit on the shorter side but still looked professional. Could be dressed up or dressed down for any occasion. The cut is also extremely flattering as it slims the waist without making you feel restricted and highlights your legs in a perfect way.

links_reviews_title: Very classy. Size down if you're worried about for.
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing but would rent again in a week instead of a 6

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but ran small in the hips and shoulders.
Most flattering dress ... but runs small if you have large boobs
links_reviews_text: I wear a 12 and the 12 basically fit perfectly except i have a D cup so I had to go up a size. Other than that ... this dress is perfection!
I wore this a few times for various work trips. It's so cute, flattering and comfortable!
I'm always in for the little black dress, but the sleeves were tight and the way the dress fit was not Made for this Latina with hips.
Loved the style and fit of this dress! It's a classic LBD with a twist: the buttons and uneven hem add a little extra to it. I'm hoping to find the same dress in other colors.
It's beautiful and fits well as long as you size up! I rented this as a backup dress and didn't need it but it's beautiful
This dress is so amazing! I felt so amazing at work while wearing it. It was extremely flattering.

links_reviews_title: cute button detail that makes it different from other LBDs.
links_reviews_text: Tight in the top and when I sat at work I had to keep my legs a certain way not to flash everyone. Overall a flattering dress but uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a client meeting
links_reviews_text: The material was very restricting. It was tight on my arms and hard for me to lean forward without the back pulling. It was also on the shorter side so a tad revealing for a business professional attire. Wore it with a long sweater.

links_reviews_title: Fit not flattering if you have a tummy
links_reviews_text: I got the 8 because of the reviews that I saw that it ran small. And it fit through the stomach but was tight through the upper back and weird fitting on the boobs and shoulders. It inched up my body if I raised my arms.
I couldn't get my arms past my head, super tight around the shoulders like the other reviews said. I wouldn't rent again, too bad because it's a great conservative design for work.
Runs very small in the chest

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but didn't work out
links_reviews_text: Dress is cute. Thought it would be okay for work since I am short but I was not 100% comfortable with the length. Dress fit in the waist but was too tight at the top. My arms felt restricted. Not sure if an 8 would fit better bc the 6 was loose in the hips. I could have worn it but didn't want to feel uncomfortable all day.
I had such high hopes for this dress. It's so cute on BUT the cut and fabric make it so you can't raise your arms and restricts 80% of shoulder/arm movement.
Perfect little black dress for work. True to size
Fits just like every other standard brand - very true to size and great length! The sleeves on shoulders are flattering too.
Didn't wear. Couldn't zip up. Even if I could - too short for work.

So many people complimented this outfit! It was perfectly professional but still fun. Wore it with heels and black nylons to dress it up. Fit a little tighter around the hips, but otherwise perfect fit.
Warm classy and perfect
This was an excellent staple piece for my winter gala. I got so many compliments on it! It fits really well and it has pockets! Highly recommend for a nice wedding or charity event.

I adored wearing this coat. I felt like a queen. It was a beautiful texture that kept me warm all night. It was a little heavy on, but wasn't too much to handle. I felt that the coat was a little long on my little frame, but the cut of the coat didn't make me look frumpy.
This coat makes any everyday outfit look chic and is great for a night out! Runs true to size, I'm 5'6" - 32D - 140lbs and wore a small
Loved this jacket for winter formal events. It was a tad bit long on me (I'm 5'2) but I didn't care given the look and feel.
I absolutely love this coat. Very beautiful and elegant.

links_reviews_title: This coat was the talk of the party!
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat. I rented it for a Christmas party cruise around the bay and it kept me warm and stylish. Everyone was trying to convince me to buy it because it was such a hit! I might get convinced to splurge in the future. Cozy - warm - fashion forward
Rented this on a trip to Boston and it is so warm and luxurious!! And soft. Loved
This coat was very soft and comfortable. The sleeves were a little tight so you can't wear bulky things underneath. Was perfect for dinner and a show.
I rented this for a wedding and it is so soft and gorgeous and true to size. I ended up not wearing it but I may look into purchasing it! It's a definite showstopper

I definitely enjoyed wearing this! It didn't photograph as well as I would have liked, and it fit average (not terrible, but not amazingly flattering either). That being said, you do feel pretty great in it - not to mention warm and glam! The one I received had something spilled and then dried into the fur which made one part of the coat not feel soft and luxe light the rest. Fortunately you couldn't see it, but you could feel it.

I think of coats as being large enough to be able to wear with a sweater underneath. This was not like that. It is beautiful though and if you intend to wear with just a dress underneath than it is true to size. If you plan to layer, I would size up.

This is so versatile and gorgeous. I got compliments every time I wore it. Wore it to a special event with a dress and the next day with skinny jeans and a basic long sleeve white tee. The only reason I'm sending back is because I want to try a another color! I Love this brand and I'm never disappointed!

links_reviews_title: Such a hit! Everyone thought it was real fur!
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat. Felt at home in it. Super chic over a tshirt with jeans or with a gown for a black tie event. Everyone thought it was mink!
I LOVE this coat! I wanted to buy it.
Pretty formal coast but it runs small thru the hips. I have a straight and narrow shape and I could barely get the small buttoned. Note that it's heavy, great for cold areas.
Size up a couple notches and prepare for compliments.
I'm 5-7", 140 lb, widest part of me is my hips and thighs. These pants are very lightweight with a stretchy waist so they were very comfortable.

These are nice cropped pants with fun button details on the ankles. I got a lot of compliments on these pants. I tend to likely slightly more classic stuff so probably wouldn't rent again but I had fun wearing them. I typically wear either a 0 or a 2 and ordered a two in these pants and the fit was perfect.
Cute buttons down the leg. Flattering fit.
I rented the 6 and probably could have worn the sz 4. I have rented these pants two different times. They are so flattering.
Flattering, comfortable, and special looking.... the perfect black pant??? I really wanted to keep these and probably will rent again. I didn't know I could get so excited over a basic black pant.

links_reviews_title: Cute buttons on the bottom flare
links_reviews_text: Light weight, fits great. Loved the button details on the bottom of the pants.

links_reviews_title: Highly recommend for business casual. Fits perfect and they are cute to wear for Happy Hour as well.
links_reviews_text: The buttons at the ankle were super cute.

Beautiful pants, the material feels lovely. I usually wear a 6 but got the 8 bc it was available and it fit perfectly. These were the right length and I wore them over some pointy toe boots and with a crop top (very high waisted but that's perfect for my body type) for my birthday party and the outfit worked so well!

links_reviews_title: Best fit ever! Like they were tailor made!
links_reviews_text: Very fancy pants. I loved them ! The only bad thing is that they zip in the back and it can be hard to do up yourself. Especially to close the little clasp.

Much too large in the waist for me... cute pants though. Nicely made. Beautiful workmanship and detailing. I would size down if I decide to give them another shot. Thighs fit perfect but waist was gapping.
cute...great fit!

links_reviews_title: Wait, why did I choose these?
links_reviews_text: Super weird fit which is easy to see in the photos. These were crazy tight around the calves just above the flare. Totally weird length for me. Bad pick on my part. Maybe good on others?

For comparison, I wear a size 25 in high waisted denim and the OR fit me well. When I first tried them on, I loved the fit and the lightweight feel of the fabric and immediately wanted to buy them. After just a few wears, though, the waistband started to pull apart from the fabric and there was some threads dangling at the hems. They also started to stretch out a big and didn't look nearly as sharp and flattering. Great for a one-time wear if you need a pair of black pants rotated through your wardrobe!
Got these pants to wear to work. The fit was fine but the material was SO uncomfortable. If you run warm at all I highly suggest against these. They do not breathe at ALL.
It is wide in the hips
Comfortable, high waisted, great with heels
The skirt part is fitted and it was too narrow for my hips so the dress was riding up. Didn't end up wearing

Love the way it looked and fit. I usually am a size 8-10, the large was a bit big up top and the mid was a bit more fitted at the bottom. Doe get wrinkly after a while and alight see through. Overall good dress

links_reviews_title: Linen pockets create an unflattering hip situation
links_reviews_text: The idea is beautiful and I actually love the wrap, but the pockets made my hips look so big and it created a bubble over my lower stomach. Maybe if you rent a size up it sits looser and doesn't do that, but it makes me look so much wider on the bottom than I really am

The fit isn't the most flattering and the linen wrinkles like crazy, but this is a really cool dress. Strongly channeling Molly Ringwald in The Breakfast Club. I'm wider across the hips with a narrow waist-- tying the dress in the back ended up bunching the fabric at my hips and caused the pockets to gape, so I tied it in the front. Girl cred all night. Will require shoes with some height if you're on the shorter side.

Linen has no stretch. Wraps always fit. This dress is a match made in heaven. The wrap elements hang from the bust and perfectly pull in the dress a few inches above the belly button. There are -POCKETS- but don't get too excited... they occupy the "pooch" area, so putting anything in them makes you look lumpy... only other concern might be the slit in the back- IT IS HIGH, I wore it to work anyway!

Comfortable, a little oversized, but adjustable with the wrap tie. Has pockets, great length (I'm 5'8 and hit below the knee) for work. Linen wrinkles during the day and can be a bit on the sheer side. Very comfortable and stylish. Loved this dress!

Absolutely love the color. This fit is ok - defines the waist well, but the top is baggy, even if you have a larger chest. Wrinkles a lot because it's linen, but honestly that makes it more comfortable in the heat than the shape would suggest.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but wrinkles way too much
links_reviews_text: Love the design and cut of the dress, if it was made in another material it would be a real winner. Unfortunately the material wrinkles instantly and gets worse throughout the day.
Such a pretty dress! Too bad it's not in season anymore or I'd probably still have it!

This dress was really easy to wear and it's flattering because it cinches at the waist however you like. I didn't tie it into a bow but rather a single knot in the front. I wore it three times, and had to iron it each time, but it was worth the effort! It was great for Fall because the material is thick.

links_reviews_title: Nice summer dress but nothing special
links_reviews_text: This dress was a nice change of pace for my work outfits in the summer. It did come very wrinkled. At first when I saw the dress it looked awkward but after putting it on and tying around the waist it looks much better. I had to tie the belt around the waist pretty tight to make it look right so it wasn't overly comfortable for work.
Liked the waist - flattering, made me look taller and like I have a smaller waist
This dress is such a great color and the material is good for the summertime. It's just a little confusing to work the waist tie. It does stretch out over the day.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Will rent again.
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for summertime. I wore this to work and received compliments on the wrap-around belt. My only complaint is that the knot in the belt, which I tied around my back, was that it was uncomfortable sitting against my seat. Other than that, I would rent this again.
Loved this dress. Easy and comfortable for work. Will rent again.

Loved this dress. True to size. The twisted waist is super flattering on curves and makes fit easy to adjust. The linen is light enough to wear during NY summers, and the color was a beautiful olive. Great work dress. I could see this being lovely for early fall too. Would rent again!
Fit and style was perfect for a summer workday
These fit like a glove

links_reviews_title: Bought these - the most comfortable jeans ever
links_reviews_text: Love these jeans. They were incredibly comfortable, nice light washing, made my butt look great.

links_reviews_title: I could live in these jeans.
links_reviews_text: A great simple stretch jean. Loved them.

links_reviews_title: Perfect jeans. Soft and fit well.
links_reviews_text: These jeans were great. I wore them at least six times and although they did stretch out a bit, the fit was still spot on. I will definitely put these in my rotation.
Great basic jean. Nothing fancy, but fit well. One star off because they are a much lighter blue that pictured.
I like the color and feeling of these jeans. They were comfortable but you definitely need a belt. The waist gets loose and starts to fall down easily.

links_reviews_title: Great butt jeans! Super soft and stretchy fabric. Nice blue color (not too faded)
links_reviews_text: Great butt jeans. True to size. High enough waste for the "over 50". Fabric is super soft and stretchy. I'm 5'6"+ and they hit 1 inch above ankle. Love these jeans!
Want to buy these too
Comfy jeans but nothing special - I already have pairs like this.

links_reviews_title: I should of sized down to a 27 as I was pulling them up the whole day.
links_reviews_text: Nice jeans but i think they looked a bit worn out.
Great fit and super cute on.
Fit is okay. Nothing interesting about these.

These jeans are so comfortable! They feel like wearing leggings, no muffin top, and they don't dig in to your stomach when you sit down. Unfortunately they rode down on me and I had to hike them back up all day, besides that they looked and felt great!
I loved these a lot! They fit well, were figure flattering and still comfortable?! How does that happen? Would definitely rent again perhaps purchase
LOVE the fit

links_reviews_title: Perfect for 5'2 length and have some give on top so you can tuck the shirt in

links_reviews_text: Comfy fit, a tidge on the small side, but a great thickness and the ankles are the perfect width.
Perfect denim weight and color!!!
Pretty comfy! I'm normally a 27R but I've worn other joes and know they tend to be a bit snug in the waist and sized up.

These jeans felt great when I first put them on. I usually have a problem with the waistband giving me a muffin to (apple shape problems...) but these were perfectly stretchy. After an hour of wear though, they expanded and got baggy. And n though they were new with tags, smelled like moth balls and sweat.
This could probably be worn as a dress, but I loved it as a top/blouse. I love the loose fit and the high quality of the fabric. The color is divine and peaceful and it looks expensive overall!
Very oversized, beautiful color but weird feeling fabric. It was OK for a day but I think you can find better!
Size down! Too loose for me in the upper body

This dress is even cuter when you put it on!! So so perfect for my "a little more casual than business casual" office vibe & I got a ton of compliments. Not too low-cut and long enough for my 5'11" body

For a short-waisted person with 32As, this was a giant sack on me. The belt helps some, but the chest, shoulders, and sleeves are 2-3 sizes too big. Wore the 0 and it fit like a 4-6 on me. If you had a larger chest or longer arms I could see this being beautiful. The color is a very light mint and the fabric is weighted but not too heavy.

I like the shape of the dress but I certainly was swimming in it. I also pressed it with an iron and can't seem to get the wrinkles out, I'm not sure what kind of fabric it is but it's very thick and heavy, and was a terrible choice for summer. The color is pretty but it felt oversized on me.

links_reviews_title: Cozy work fit! Be careful when you bend down though!
links_reviews_text: Work
no cons pros are is flattering if you are busty and it cinches your waist line

links_reviews_title: Cute! But runs large on top.
links_reviews_text: I picked this dress for the nice light color and I knew it ran large so I picked a size 8. I am normally a size 10 on top and the shoulders were still a little bit big but I kinda liked how that looked. With the belt folded and tied( it comes unfolded and looks so weird when it's just hanging), this dress was super flattering and I loved the full skirt and pockets. The sleeves were a little long and tight so I unbuttoned them and folded them up. Highly recommend this especially if it's warm out because the fabric is pretty thick. I would definitely rent again.

The fit is oversized and was right on the edge of working for my petite frame. The shape is flattering for pear or hourglass and would work well for large busts. The crossover top is stitched so there is none of the gaping open that can happen. Belt is nice and wide and attached along the back. From waist up there was just too much fabric for this to be a real winner for me. But would def recommend for bustier and slightly taller to tall women.
Pockets!

I rented this for work, but I sent it back without wearing it. I'm usually a 2 or 4. After reading the other reviews, I decided to get the 2. The body was still on the looser side (which is part of the look) but the shoulders and arms were just to massive to wear. I felt like it added a lot of bulk. Pretty color though....

links_reviews_title: Cute, needs a little prep work
links_reviews_text: This dress does run 1-2 sizes large. With a little playing around with the belt, the dress actually looks cute. The key is to not tie the belt right away (makes it look like weird dangling shirt sleeves). I folded the belt UP and then tied it, which made it cinch in my waist. Love the pockets and the color.

Loved the feel and color of this dress, it was super comfy and one of my coworkers said this should be the only color I wear from now on. BUT this dress was huge. It's already supposed to be oversized, and on my more petite frame it was just a bit much. I had to fold ip the sleeves and there was a ton of extra fabric in the back. Wish I had sized down on this one

Despite the bad reviews I was intrigued to try this dress. I'm between a 2-4 and sized down to a 2. I'm shocked at how many compliments I got at work for the fit and style of this dress. Fun dress to try.
Love this dress for a spring work look! Easy, flattering, unique. It's not fitted so a 4 would have probably worked too but I ordered a 6. Love!
Wore for a news segment and for work, Compliments all day long. Amazing fabric for winter to spring transition

links_reviews_title: loved it but there was a lot of fabric so i would recommend sizing 2 sizes down
links_reviews_text: Flattering in the waist area with the tie, sleeves and shoulders were large
I loved this dress! It is a little heavy...perfect for the fall, but absolutely beautiful. I can't wait to wear it again.
I got so many compliments on this dress and I felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: Great quality, didn't do anything for me.
links_reviews_text: Think you need to be quite tall to pull off all the material without it looking bulky.
Very cute dress, but it was so big I couldn't even wear it. Maybe a size 8 would've been better.
Rented this for work. I was SWIMMING in it, so ended up not wearing. Might try again in the next size down.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but baggy fit, go a size smaller
links_reviews_text: Good for day, night, work, etc. can definitely be dressed up or down1
Loved everything about this dress but it was too hot for the summer
It was very large, requires tank top underneath or something. Deep neck line.
Love this dress but was unable to wear because it runs very large
So cute. Got so many compliments I decided to keep it another week. But definitely size down or it won't look cute. (I am normally a 4)
The dress is super cute, but way too big. I may try it again in the future, but may be a size smaller.

Nice heavy weight fabric for cool spring days. Gorgeous color. Unfortunately, the sleeves were too long, even with the cuffs tucked in. I ordered my usual size 6 and this fit more like a size 10. The drop shoulders were like a slouchy bathrobe. Will try to re-order in a a size 2 or 4.

Like other reviewers said the dress does run large. I'm usually between a 4/6 and the 4 was roomy. It's still a super flattering dress, even on a petite frame. Usually wrap dresses have so much fabric that they swallow me. This one was still super cute and perfect for work.
This dress runs true to size, and is a perfect dress for work to dinner out.
this does run large, so i'd size down. the fabric is so comfortable and the dress is flattering. the color is beautiful.
Too hot. Too baggy. Too much.
I ordered the 12, too big. I ordered the 10, too big. I love the dress. The fabric is thick and the dress is well made. I will try the 8.
The dress was very large. You can adjust the fit with the tie, however, the armholes were too large and made the entire dress look baggy.
Was falling off my body. Definitely size down. Also, very thick material.
The color is beautiful but this dress fits a little strangely and isn't incredibly flattering. The tie has a weird part in the back that is difficult to maneuver.
This dress was absolutely awesome. It did run a little big. I usually wear an 8 but could've worn a 6. The fabric and color were gorgeous. I got compliments all day!
Beautiful color and fit. Runs large and is made of a heavy luxe material. LOVED IT!
Wore over a black tank for a date. Covered up enough to be appropriate for the weather but still a little sexy. Loved it
I live in Florida so I didn't rent it for the warmth. It's definitely a statement piece that I got a lot of compliments on. It fit true to size and made a normal black on black outfit more fun.
Got this for the Jimmy Kimmel Show! Love it. Casual & Classy at the same time! Sleeves are baggy so be prepared for that. The photos don't show that well. Also it is NOT for warmth.

This jacket was fine. I got the large, and found that I had to wear it open because it was fairly snug when zipped (I'm usually a M/8-10). It was pretty comfortable and made for a nice alternative to a cardigan, but it wasn't anything particularly special. I only ended up wearing it once.

links_reviews_title: Unique touch to a basic outfit
links_reviews_text: While it was a little itchy putting it on, I hardly noticed and got several compliments throwing this over a white tank and jeans for a birthday party.

This bomber was so cool and fun. It was great for a night out and really added a level of coolness to my outfit. It does run pretty small - I usually wear a large and went with the extra large. The sleeves were a bit long, but I think one size down wouldn't have fit! Definitely recommend.
This was a fashion outside my comfort zone, but I'm glad I tried it! It definitely fits loose around my arms, but I just rolled up the cuff to tighten it a bit

I absolutely loved this bomber. It's totally sheer and doesn't really provide much in the way of warmth, but it more than makes up for it with cuteness. I thought the fit was perfect - it was completely comfortable everywhere, but wasn't boxy on me and was totally flattering.
Sheer jacket, meant to wear over. I wore this once over a black sleeveless jumpsuit for a party, and another time over a black shell. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Cute piece to wear to work
links_reviews_text: It's nothing special but if you are looking for another outfit to wear to work the jacket is cute and unique. Fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Loved this, I could dress it up or down, a little sexy and sporty. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Loved this, I could dress it up or down, a little sexy and sporty. Lots of compliments.

I really really love this and its another rental that I would like to own. Great, lightweight sheer bomber jacket, that I wore a few times, with a dress, with jeans and with workout wear.. was just the right weight for our moderate desert temps in AZ in late fall. Lots of compliments, understated statement piece!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, cool jacket that dresses up jeans.
links_reviews_text: Overally, fit was a little big/baggie but I probably should have ordered down. I prefer bomber jackets to be more fitted.
I loved this as a unique alternative to a blazer at work (I work at a creative agency). It's also a fun layer for almost-fall, when you're ready for jackets but it's still pretty sweaty out there.

links_reviews_title: This jacket was forgettable. It was fine and could be worn with anything. But boring.
links_reviews_text: Looks cool in all of the pictures, but in person it was just flat and boring. Not the standout piece I was hoping for.

Worked great as a layer to throw on over a tiny top. Doesn't add a lot of warmth but gives the effect of a bomber. Edgy alternative to a boring cardigan but still playful with the polka dots. Fabrics is mesh. Cuffs are a poly or nylon mesh rib. Sleeves are a little too blouson at the bottoms so I rolled the cuffs back once to help control that.

links_reviews_title: Super cute for day or night!
links_reviews_text: Looks great on, just a little warmer than expected.

links_reviews_title: More of a blouse than a jacket!
links_reviews_text: Loved this for an added layer to an outfit. It is actually more of a blouse than a jacket because it is so thin. I wore it over a spaghetti strap bodysuit with skinny jeans and loved it.
I cannot love this jacket enough. It's fun and classy all in one.
The large was way too large for me and looked pretty sloppy. I didn't end up wearing it. Unfortunately it's not as cute as you would think it would be. The dots fade into the blackness.
I loved this. Wore it multiple times. Cute with jeans heels and a crop tank for a night out!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this jacket. It's comfortable and can be dressed up or down. will be renting again!
links_reviews_text: I got a size larger than I typically would. Looks great with a baggier fit
fits well. nice details on the sleeves
Nice jacket for spring/summer. Light material

links_reviews_title: Shear boomer is cute and stylish!
links_reviews_text: I could have probably done a medium but the large was just fine since it was a jacket

links_reviews_title: Easy way to dress up a look
links_reviews_text: Great day to night transition piece and perfect for spring weather. Lightweight and great for travel. Wore this over a black tank several times - with jeans for casual and black pants for a work dinner.

links_reviews_title: Nice sheer bomber would rent it again
links_reviews_text: Good fit
Love the sheer look of this bomber. It runs really small so order one size up.

links_reviews_title: This was a piece I want to make a staple in my wardrobe
links_reviews_text: This little jacket is so chic and I received so many compliments on it
Great jacket! I wore it a few times- out to brunch, to work, over a dress... lots of possibilities; I didn't want to send this one back!

links_reviews_title: Paired it with a black sexy cami underneath. Jacket was perfect over it since it was only 40 out.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7. With an athletic build. I opted for a silk cami underneath and left the jacket open/unzipped. The large fit perfect as I have 34D chest, long torso and longer arms.
Was short in the sleeves and a bit snug
Interesting, but surprisingly tough to style. The pattern disappears if it's worn over dark clothing. I thought it fit a little snug around the waistband.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this item. Wore with black midi skirt and got SO MANY compliments
links_reviews_text: Fits well . Sleeve cuffs are the same gauze as the jacket which I liked.

This jacket was cute, fun and comfortable, but not show-stopping. The fabric is beautiful and it looked great with a simple black tee under it. The sleeves are kind of puffy at the bottom which I didn't realize. I liked it, but only enough to wear once.
wore this to work and to dinner with a black shirt underneath and black pants. very versatile.
Loved it! This is a great staple piece for your wardrobe! Highly recommend!
Just what I needed to make my outfit for a night out in Vegas. Casual and dressy at the same time. Fit was perfect, I'm usually a 2 in tops.

Thought this would be a fun jacket to wear going out - I got a Large but wish I'd gotten a medium, it was too big for me. It was also very sheer so in the cold didn't work as my sole jacket. Didn't end up wearing it. Liked the idea but not the reality

links_reviews_title: LOVED this jacket. So unique. would have bought it if it wasn't so expensive!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Love the detail as it makes it very unique.
Fit was great. My only challenge was that the material kept clinging to my tights, otherwise it was cute!
Dress looks amazing on and is just enough of a statement with the print and sleeves to be super fun, but not so overbearing it can't be worn to work!
Easy to wear dress. Flatting and true to size

I wore this dress when visiting family in New York, specifically at a pre-wedding outdoor party. I got so many compliments on it and would have loved to buy it- maybe next time! Definitely planning to rent more from this brand.
Rented this for work. Loved it.

I gave this 4 stars because I loved the flow of material, the silk texture and I'm obsessed with the prints. There are some cons. Wish it was petite sized because it engulfed me. I was wearing 2 inches heels, making me 5'4. And the waist has no give.
Love the dress. Fit is great. Print is playful. Length is great for a tall lady.
Loved the print, style and fit. Got a few compliments heading out of my hotel. If I could change anything, it would be slightly shorter. Classic short gal prob.
Fit wonderfully, was very faltering and comfortable. I loved that is fun and work appropriate! I got tons of compliments from my coworkers and felt great!

I adored this dress! So comfortable and I think you can wear it year round with different shoes. I wore this to work with some white trainers. I am a 27 waist and the size 0 was perfect. I think this might me to bug for smaller or more petite ladies. All around a very cute dress.

I loved this dress. It was super flattering even though it has a lot of coverage. I wore it to work and to a Broadway show and received a ton of compliments! Material wasn't too hot for the summer and I loved the print.

I got this for work and it was so nice. Even during the hot New York summer it felt breezy and light. I got a ton of compliments. I did cinch the waste with a belt because like the other reviews said I was a little large around the waste, but not too much at all. Will definitely be renting again.

links_reviews_title: Stylish dress for wedding rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: This wasn't the best pick for a spring event (given fall colors), but was a stylish dress nonetheless. True to size and very flowy/comfortable. The sleeves were very flattering. I paired with my Gucci loafers and a low slick pony.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for everyday wear for work.
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty and unique but I think would be better-suited for women with fewer curves than me. The overall fit was big - especially in the waist are which made the dress a bit shapeless. I would suggest going down a size. It fit everywhere else just fine but I did feel like it emphasized my hips. I like this dress but I don't think I would rent again for that reason.

links_reviews_title: Stunning color, print and cut that's perfect for day-to-night. Fabric is nice, light, and flow-y.
links_reviews_text: I wore a 6. Which was a tad big in the waist, but worked. A 4 probably would have been perfect
A little loose at the waist. Large puffy sleeves and midi type length. A bit frumpy but overall cool print and comfortable.
Really suits for the occasion... specially if you like something conservative and elegant with a bit of color.
Huge arms and size down 2 sizes. Super cute print

I loved this dress - beautiful material, cool print, and an interesting cut. The sleeves and shoulders are a little flouncy - maybe even clownish? - but I liked it. Made me feel very 80s power woman. I paired with a navy blazer to tone it down for work.

Piles of compliments and felt wonderful and comfortable for two big work events. The fabric can get a but static but overall really nice. It doesn't wrinkle and falls really nicely . I would rent it again!
Loved this dress, so easy to wear. I am usually between a 4 and 6 and even this size I wore had room in the waist. Got compliments all day.

I'm fully obsessed with this dress. Rent it, rent it now. The material is so lovely, feels like a sturdy silk blend. The sleeves are SO fun. The cuff is a little tight but that could just be cause my arms are so long the cuff hits higher than it was designed to. Felt so fun and fashion-forward at work in this! Wore it was tall black boots.

This was the perfect dress for the party I went to--not too fancy but just the right amount of festive. I'm not normally an orange person but this was the perfect shade and I got so many compliments on it. I'd rent again.
While this is a lot of dress, it is super fun to wear and can be dressed up or down. Heels, booties or flats, and throw on a belt for a different look.
So flattering, so comfy!

links_reviews_title: Fit not great on smaller frame, looking clownish
links_reviews_text: I really loved the print and idea of this dress but on my short frame the fit was off. The sleeves are very poofy and the back of the dress has an odd poofiness that I wasn't expecting. The waist also fell kind of low on my body and just wasn't flattering. Ended up wearing it once with a leather jacket which hid most of the parts i didn't like.

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress, great transitional season piece.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to sz, it's blousy so better with heels!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Palm Springs Weekend
links_reviews_text: If only I had more than one place to wear this fabulous dress! Tons of compliments when I wore it out on a weekend in Palm Springs. It did run slightly large - could definitely have worn a 4 - but was comfortable and so chic.
Easy to wear 1940's feeling dress with fun print mix. Got lots of compliments.

This dress was a fun way to end my work week. It fit really well, and I received a lot of compliments from my colleagues. Material is light, but the long sleeves and longer inseam made it totally appropriate for winter. I'd totally wear this again.
Runs slightly large in waist. I wish I sized down but I have an hourglass figure. Go by the size of your waist to choose right size.
This was the perfect dress for a work event.

links_reviews_title: I was told I look like Carrie Bradshaw !
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable dress. Great statement piece for work. Runs true to size. I'd recommend pairing with a black belt at the waist to give yourself more of a "put together" look.
Great look for work and true to size.

Decent fit- runs a bit small in the waist but nothing too crazy. I appreciated how modest it was, so I feel like I could wear it to any sort of occasion! Definitely keeping it for a couple more weeks in the hopes of getting to wear it again!
Really cute at some angles - straight out grannies closet at others
Super comfy dress! Very loose fitting and a great eye catching pattern. I added a black belt to cinch waist a little. Great for everyday or a less formal occasion!
Im normally an 8/10 and I wore an 8 in this one. It was too big at the waist for me so it created a weird bubble in the back. I got lots of compliments though and it was very comfortable.

I loved wearing this on a date night recently. This dress has a fitted waist but is true to size and still worked with a larger chest! I styled with black tights and booties and leather moto! I loved this dress so much I also wore to work a few days later!
Great bell sleeves and pattern on this made it just funky enough for work and going out for drinks. Fits snug at the waist. Beautiful silk material.

links_reviews_title: Good color but not quite the right fit
links_reviews_text: I ordered this as a season transition coat. I liked the color and the heft of the fabric. However, after one afternoon of wearing it, I reallyyyy didn't like this coat. The top part was too tight for my shoulders and kept cutting into my underarms. I also have long arms, and the coat sleeves were too short. Only the bottom two sets of buttons on the double-breasted closure have buttonholes, which means the coat can't close up all the way. And then the pockets. They are set high up on the coat and with a narrow opening at the top of the pocket, making it uncomfortable for putting my hands in them. They also look pretty lumpy with anything in them, like keys, gloves, or even a tube of chapstick.
Perfect cut ( runs small), perfect length, warm and the color is gorgeous
Long trench, beautiful unique maroon color, great for the cold (worn in Park City, New York, Chicago). Keep in mind it is long in length (I'm 5'4) and it comes down to my mid-calf
I wore on my trip to NYC! I needed a warm coat and it definitely did the trick! Fits nicely with a sweater under and pockets were big enough to hold phone and hand warmers.
Nice, well-made coat. A little heavy, but warm. Runs a bit large. I'm 5'8" and 125 lbs.

links_reviews_title: @thanksitsrtr - I like these coats :) and this is a fun color
links_reviews_text: A classic. Warm and cozy. Great color. - @thanksitsrtr
Great color, runs a bit large but overall fantastic for layers and extremely warm

Very warm, a little tight in the shoulders so I wouldn't have been able to wear a thick sweater, but it fit everywhere else and buttoned easily. Loved the color and the way that it sat once buttoned. Would definitely rent again. Only returned because it got a lot colder this week so I wanted to rent a puffy jacket.
Such a good coat, ladies! The color is amazing, the fit is super flattering, and it's warm to boot. I'm debating purchasing this one.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, small in the shoulders
links_reviews_text: If you have thin shoulders and arms this coat could be a dream. I only wore this once since had to wear a thin layer underneath. Definitely wouldn't have been able to wear it with a sweater. It was too snug up top otherwise it would have gotten 4 stars.

Seems all Club Monaco coats are cut the same--the Daylina was also very tight in the shoulders, I could only fit a thin blouse underneath. I'm a 2-4 and wore a small. Don't bother with your regular size unless you're underweight, or maybe much smaller in the shoulders. Great color though

links_reviews_title: Works great for a professional look with pants or a special event over a dress.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Long but not too long. Polished and sophisticated.
I love this coat and wore it for winter season! It's wonderful! Very well made!

Although I did not end up bringing this with me on my work trip, it was a beautiful high-quality incredibly classy coat. The color is rich and the detailing is incredibly chic. It ended up being a little dressier than what I was going for, but if you are looking for something high end and warm, this is a great bet for you.
Fits well and is a great length!

links_reviews_title: Have had this for over a month, and not returning any time soon- LOVE.
links_reviews_text: Have had this for over a month, and not returning any time soon- LOVE. TTS, heavy, warm, well structured, expensive looking, beautiful color- stands out in a sea of black & camel.

I rented this coat for a weekend in New York (I'm from LA) in November. The coat was very warm and comfortable. The color was beautiful and made it more exciting than a coat in black or grey. The pockets were big enough to hold my gloves and scarf, which I ended up not needing. The neckline is lower so keep that in mind when layering underneath. Overall, this coat was perfect and I'll rent it again the next time I have to go someplace with colder weather.

Loved this shoulder bag! Minimalistic in style, it's perfect for everyday and every outfit! The hit of color on the strap and sides of the bag make this a perfect transitional piece from Winter to Spring. The shoulder strap is adjustable so you can wear it long or short, and there is plenty of room for my wallet, car keys, lip gloss and other mini items. Lastly, the twist lock detail adds a unique touch!
This sweatshirt was definitely comfortable but the inside was not a cozy sweatshirt material. It is a great top for in between seasons weather,
SO COMFY!! Got so many compliments, wore it so much in the month I had it
It is a great twist on a basic sweatshirt. Makes you look like you our more effort in than you did.
Cute and comfy sweatshirt. Great for everyday casual activity!

This is a nice, casual top! I liked wearing it, but it definitely runs big. I did a half tuck to make it more flattering. It's very comfy, and thin enough to wear under a coat and not overheat, but cozy enough to keep you warm.
Love this sweatshirt. Loose fit, yet still very flattering. Great for everyday.
This sweatshirt is really nice. The print is very fun and the fit is relaxed. It's perfect for a fall day and I got many compliments!
Soft and slouchy. Perfect for a rainy weekend.

This is totally my style, a simple raglan sweatshirt with a fun pattern. The only issue I had with this is that it tended to feel like it stretched out as I wore it that I might even suggest going a size down. It was super comfy and fun to wear though so totally recommend.

This was a really cute and fun sweater, however it was a bit dingy and smelled a little of smoke. I also noticed two faint stains on one of the sleeves. It was a good sweater to lounge around the apartment in but I probably wouldn't rent it again.

I LOVE this sweatshirt!!!! It runs large so size down. I'm usually a small and the XS was perfect. I don't want to give it back it's so so good for travel or hanging out. Tons of compliments and I jazzed it up by tucking into jeans.

links_reviews_title: "I'm not like a regular mom, I'm a cool mom!"
links_reviews_text: A casual piece to be sure, but with enough style and slouch to not feel like a gym sweatshirt. Great for hanging out with my kids while dressed like an adult.
I liked this top - it's a light sweatshirt with a cute star print. I wish I didn't size up - it was very boxy and made me look wide, but nothing a French tuck couldn't fix.

I am super in love with this lightweight sweatshirt! It has an oversized/slouchy fit. I have broad shoulders for my 5'3" frame. If I sized up to a L, I could probably wear it off-shoulder very comfortably! Love this one. May have to purchase!
I'm a size 10 and I ordered a large but was practically swimming in it. I loved the print so I'll try a medium next time, if I want a baggy look or a small if I want it to fit more tightly.
Sweater fit true to size and was the perfect length for wearing with some leggings. Great lounge-around item that looks better than a regular t-shirt!
I am typically a Size 2, so I ordered the XS. It was way too big on me and looked more like a M on me
I love sweatshirts. This one is a little on the large size. I wore it over the holidays and it was fine. I wouldn't wear it in public though.
Was hoping for something cuter, falls like a pajama shirt. Overall loose.

links_reviews_title: I loved it so much, I had to go buy it.
links_reviews_text: Over sized and great to walk around in.
The arms were short but very full in the body. It is very thin and the collar is wide.
So comfy. So cute. Will rent again.

I like a looser sweater/sweatshirt fit so I thought by ordering a small I would be content. I was still able to wear, but in hindsight an XS would have been just fine! The sleeves are long too, I rolled them up one. Overall a cute rental for everyday and I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but huge. I ordered an XS and the sleeves are huge.
links_reviews_text: Not what I was expecting at all. This sweater was so large and baggy in the sleeves.

I really wanted to rent this for a trip I had planned, the XL was recommended and despite all the reviews saying to size down, the L was unavailable, so I picked the XL in the hopes everyone was wrong! They are not, the XL was so big on me that I had to send it back without wearing it. I would have been better taking a punt on the medium fitting instead.
Super cute sweatshirt, took my casual outfits up a notch and got a lot of compliments on this.
I'm an XL in Monrow skinny sweats right now, but I went with a M based on reviews and it was still boxy/oversized. It's super cute and cozy!
Lightweight, loose and slouchy. Very weekend.
I really enjoyed this sweater. It was a nice casual addition but added some fun flair with the Stars.
Runs really big.
I loved this sweatshirt for an elevated athleisure look. It was great to travel in as well as to throw on with jeans. The colors are super cute and would go with tons.

I absolutely love love love this sweatshirt. I was not going to return it because I know I would wear it alot, but it's currently 90 degrees and it's too warm for this. But i will 100% rent this again in the fall/winter/spring!! Soft, and beautiful colors. I wore the Large because it was the only size available, but I would rent in a Medium. But the oversize look was still good!

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments on this sweatshirt! It is super comfy and light weight.
links_reviews_text: I should have ordered the M instead of the L, the sleeves were too long and it was a bit too baggy.
This sweatshirt was so cute; the stars are everything. It was really a great everyday piece to run errands and hang out with friends.
a bit boxy but very cute and comfortable for casual wear
Can you ever go wrong with a Monrow stars lounger? Nope. Loved this and wore it an embarrassing amount.
This was an xs, and was huge. Nothing special.
The fit was large and the fabric was a little rough for a sweatshirt.
Runs oversized but great for hanging out

links_reviews_title: So big I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: It's cute, but runs really big.

A toast and homage to the whimsy of Kate Spade. Plaid weave peplum jacket and basic black Vince trousers. I left the lucrative (but very unpredictable world of advertising) for a job in Government, and after decades of jeans and casual wear, my new boss wears a suit everyday. RTR is the perfect antidote to literally having nothing to wear! I love having a closet full of everything and then some. At age 63, I am honored to be an Ambassador! #thanksitsrtr #@renttherunway #rtrambassador
Fun jacket and a great pop of color over a basic black outfit for work. Got a ton of compliments. Sized down based on other reviews and it fit perfectly!
Cute for the day! Buttons were a little more scuffed than I'd like.

links_reviews_title: Trendy jacket for a casual work day
links_reviews_text: This jacket was fun to wear on a jeans "work" day. I felt pulled together but comfortable. The jacket was a bit short which is fine for me (I'm short and short waisted). The fabric wasn't too heavy so I could keep it on all day for a meeting inside and outside.
It was perfect for work and I got so many compliments. Will definitely rent again!

Wore it to a school event, was comfortable and not restricting although probably would have liked better if actual size I wear as it is boxy, ordered size 8 as that was the only size available. Colors were perfect for spring. It was wet outside so pairing with boots/jeans worked out great. Overall, liked it a lot!

I rented this for a formal event, and I thought Kate Spade can never go wrong. The problem is the blazer is bit worn out, and the color of the buttons faded away. I really mind about the condition of my rental, and the one I received is bit old. I didn't want to wear for my event. Overall, it is a stylish piece and size runs little big.

I got so many compliments on this tweed jacket. I was even told by someone that I looked like Coco Chanel! I originally got the jacket because it thought it was red and cream. It's definitely black and pink! I would size down, but I'm definitely renting this one again!

Really pretty pink tweed. Great for work as a blazer alternative. Warmer/thicker than expected. Only critique is that I wish it was more fitted in the waist before the peplum. As it is now it's pretty boxy and loose in the waist and then even more fabric is added due to the peplum.

Pretty blazer, a little loose fit but appropriate for a professional work environment. Definitely wear a shirt underneath as it's not super long and the peplum bottom is airy otherwise. Overall very comfortable, warm, and love the large black buttons.
This jacket is a little boxy but cute for work and warm if you have a cold office. Size down or wear a sweater underneath.

links_reviews_title: Cute blazer. Material of the garment made it seemed a bit old. But fit the bill for a work outfit.
links_reviews_text: Fine. Nothing to go crazy about. Something about the material just made it seem a little old.
Cute jacket. Didn't love it as much as Kate Spade's other items, but it was cute and I got several compliments.

The light pink and fuschia colors in this jacket don’t translate well in the photo, but it’s a nice pop of color that will go well with any LBD or jeans. A nice tweed jacket always reminds me of Chanel and this one doesn’t disappoint!
Lines are pink and not red as they appear in the model picture. Peplum bottom and 7/8 length sleeves make it a little more flattering than a boxy blazer.
I wore this top with jeans and felt professional and comfortable at the same time. Jacket had room in it for a flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: OK fit... not worth renting again
links_reviews_text: I didn't love the fit. I felt it was too short to wear with pants, I paired it with a longish black skirt to try to counteract the boxy shape. However it was VERY comfortable, the material is soft inside and out and the weight was perfect for a chilly summer office environment. So if you just need to be warm and look professional but not as concerned with a flattering look, this will be great for you!

The jacket is cute and comfortable. The style is very short, so be sure to wear with a high waisted pant and/or a complimentary top beneath it. The fabric seems to hold strong scent of dry cleaning chemicals, so be sure to remove it from the plastic bag to air it out well in advance of your event.

links_reviews_title: Felt spring-y, happy, and professional in this! Waist is loose so it looked a little empire waist.
links_reviews_text: #happy #spring #professional
Great for meetings - fashionable yet ready to be listened to!
perfect spring jacket a little boxy so maybe size down lined and super comfortable

Cute jacket to mix up the work wardrobe. Has a Chanel-esque vibe which was fun. The fabric is actually a mix of hot pink, candy pink, black, and white, with a hint of shimmer. Pretty girly so I dressed it down with jeans and black lace ups. I rented a size down as others suggested which worked great, it wasn't tight at all across the shoulders. This style has the potentially to look boxy, ladies with a large chest might not like the look.

links_reviews_title: Size Down for a Perfect Fit
links_reviews_text: I read the reviews and decided to go with a size 2 (usually a 4). Perfection! I got loads of compliments on this jacket. It looks pink from a distance-- not red. Paired with a RTR skirt, and it was stunning. Very warm for a cold day, too.
The arms fit well but the body was a little wide. Also, I thought this was red, bit it is very pink. Still cute for a cool spring day.
The fit was bigger than I thought and rather than a fun, cropped jacket, it's kind of baggy and unflattering. If I had gone down a size or two, it might have worked better.
Beautiful details but Sizing ran large
Wore this to work! Loved the stitching and buttons!
I wanted to love this, but it was boxy. It also was hot, even with a tank underneath. Wore it once, but wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: It was too boxy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Reviews were correct. It is really, really boxy.
The perfect Elle woods style blazer. Looks great paired with jeans! True to size and cute peplum.

links_reviews_title: Its cute, but would be better if it were a little longer in length

links_reviews_text: Cute, fit good, work appropriate. Kind of smelled "used" but I am sure that is from multiple wearers and trips through the dry cleaners. Buttons a little worn looking.

links_reviews_title: Runs large and fit is boxy
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 6 in Kate Spade and this was huge - it may be the boxy style on top. Very unflattering. I would have to size down to try again.

links_reviews_title: Great way to dress up your black work clothes with this fun jacket
links_reviews_text: Received lots of compliments, wore with black top & cropped pants with booties.
This looked little prim, and perhaps a little matronly. Nothing cute about this one on on me.
Wore to work with a black long-sleeve top and black pants. Fit was perfect and it is incredibly comfortable. The bright pink brightened my day! Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket. It looks cute for work or just casual.
links_reviews_text: Have worn it several times and always get compliments.
Enjoyed this jacket. Put it with a pair of pink pants and wore to work.
I just didn't love the giant buttons, and it didn't look very good on me when I buttoned up the entire thing.
Fits perfectly and I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: LOVE the soft fabric and the delicate style.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for work so flattering and cozy - perfect weight. Warm but not bulky. Might not give it up! It hits me just below the knee - I'm 5'4". The detail of the white trim on the sleeve and pockets really stands out.
I really liked this sweater. I wore it running errands. I'm 5'9" and the length was nice. The material is very soft and very comfortable!
This sweater is like a big blanket. I loved it. Definitely long sister length. Great for weekend or casual work wear!
Size down if you're debating, as it's meant to be loose fitting. Soooo soft and cute!
Loved this! Wore it to work and every day.
Light, yet warm and comfy. Wore this to a bar and grill with white crop top and faded blue high wasted jeans.
Perfect length and stylish fit. Loved it!!
I wore this coat multiple times. It is heavy, warm, and looks great with anything. I wish it was mine!
Soft and heavy. Not too tailored.
Fits the bill. A great coat.
Wore this in 29°F weather and was warm. Stylish and oversized look but tailored in the shoulders. Love it!
Rented for a work trip to Omaha. It was a bit "pilled" in places but overall good shape and kept me warm!!!!

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have kept it! Great coat for a winter wedding or event!
links_reviews_text: It's very long and warm. Definitely recommend. I'm renting it again for another event!
Warm and oversized
Super warm, high quality coat! Loved wearing it but it was a tad boxy/bulky. Would rent again!

Rented as outerwear for Chicago cold weather formal event and it's beautiful! I'm probably between a 12 and 14 at the moment and think I could have gotten away with a large instead of an XL, but it's a nice structured cut so even with a little extra room it looks very elegant and not "kid wearing an adult jacket." Warm enough for 30 degree weather and gorgeous soft material all over.

links_reviews_title: Fit weird, the shoulders and arms were very tight but the rest looked really big on me

links_reviews_text: Draw string allows for flexible fit. Flattering cut and length. Print is blue/grey snakeskin. Very thin silky fabric - I had to layer for my cold climate. I wore this with a blazer for work but it would be easy to dress up or down. Would look cute with sneakers or flats for a casual look or with heels and shiny earrings for a night out. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: Fun shirt dress. Easy to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Nice fit overall
I'm in between a small and medium. This is the medium but I probably could have done the small. Cute dress though!
Cute dress wore with tights and booties to work. The material is very thin but other than that loved it!
LOVE Rails dresses! This dress is true to size and perfect for fall weather. I wore with tights and boots for a winter look. For more work week looks follow @renttherunway_teacher on Instagram!

Loved this! The drawstring is nice because it can make the dress more form fitting but also more relaxed. I think it could be made dressier with heels or more casual with boots. The pattern on the dress is also subtle but makes it stand out.

I loved this dress. I was scared it would run small so I sized up way too much, but I still made it work. It was a great length and super flattering - you can bring it in tight at the waist or wear it looser. Loved the silky fabric and subtle animal print.
Pair with ankle booties and a leather jacket, I felt like such a badass. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a cute date outfit - can easily dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: The silky material was dreamy all day.
links_reviews_text: I personally would not wear this dress without something under it. I wore it with black leggings and black oxford wedges. Loved it!

RTR recommended an XL for me and I'm typically a medium. I was hesitant to get the XL, but I saw some reviews saying it ran small so I went with it. It was HUGE. I couldn't make it come close to working, even with a tie at the waist to cinch it. I'd be interested in trying this dress again in a medium because I think it's really cute. Side note, it was super staticky, but I know that's common in winter.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a holiday party, wore with tights and over the knee boots.
links_reviews_text: Only complaint is that it was a bit see through

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress! Perfect for work.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much! It was great for work. The only complaint I had was that it tended to get a bit clingy, but other than that, it was perfect. Easy to wear and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Nothing special but does the job
links_reviews_text: I wanted a dress I could wear to work a few times over the month so needed something nondescript. It did nothing for my shape but it was comfortable and felt professional. It's also nice and soft!

I try to make every rental count even if I don't love the item, but this piece made it impossible. I am a 0/2 and XS was too small! Also, beware how see through this is! Seriously, why do designers make clothes this thin...

Loved the fit and style. Not the most flattering but very comfortable. My only complaint is the sheer fabric. The skirt part of the dress seemed thinner, rendering it see through. It wasn't the worst, but I wish I would've noticed it before I left my house.

Cannot tell you how many compliments I received on this dress! The slots are a smidge sexy for the workplace. Extremely flattering fit and slit height. The sleeves are the perfect touch. Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Pink softens otherwise edgy snakeskin for put together perfection
links_reviews_text: Wanted to keep it. I love this dress.

Great dress!! I could have gone with a small I think though but it still fit fine. I received tons of compliments! Such a romantic dress with a print that is a little edgy and two slits that add a tad of sexy. Highly recommend!
Loooooved this. Beautiful, easy and flattering fit, pretty detail in sleeves and at bottom, festive slit. Can't say enough good things. Was sad to send it back! Will rent again for sure!

Super cute and comfortable dress, no zippers or buttons!! The fabric is light but can still be worn in fall temperatures with boots. It is definitely more navy than black. I saw one of the broadcasters on The Today Show wearing it, and it was fantastic on her, definitely try this dress!!!
Loved the fit of this dress, especially the length, being 4'11 it's hard to find a dress that isn't too long, i was able to wear it with heels and flats. Received so many compliments
This was a fun dress to wear. It's a trendy animal print with a pink twist. I also loved the sleeves.
Loved the new take on snake with Light pink snake print. Fit well and comfortable.
So this dress covers everything but is still very sexy. It's an unexpected dress for date night and a lot of fabric but it worked well. Reminded me of the old jimmy choo perfume campaign.

links_reviews_title: Loved this more than I thought I would
links_reviews_text: This dress is great - so comfortable, and the slits make it a little sexier. It does give the effect of a broad chest/shoulders because of the high neckline and puff sleeves, but I feel like this is offset by wearing a large necklace. I wore somewhat ridiculous shoes with it but think it would look fabulous with a strappy sandal. The pattern is navy, not gray/black.

links_reviews_title: Love the pink and gray snakeskin silky fabric
links_reviews_text: This dress has a lot of interesting details. There is a cute slit up the leg. Also, the sleeves are cute and poofy.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute dress! Classy and so comfy.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Size down as it runs big. I am 5’3 135. I got a small but could have worn an XS.

The dress was cute and fits well. There were 2 slits on their side of the dress, I didn't realize they were there. For a conservative dress, I thought the slits jazzed it up a little. Otherwise it fit true to size. I should have gotten the small, but the medium worked fine. I'm 5'9", 145 lbs, size 6.

I LOVED this dress. I wanted to keep it! It's beautiful, comfortable, perfect for summer. I wore this to work, and it definitely makes a statement. Unique design and the sleeves were awesome! I received so many compliments and had a blast.

This dress is so flattering on any body type I'm a size 12 ang got the xl and it was a teensy but big but not enough to not wear it! It's comfortable and the print is amazing! I got SO many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved this, will rent again and consider buying!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable with the stretchy material but also really cute on and the pattern with color is amazing. Got so many compliments at work!

I loved this dress because it's very unique. So many people stopped to tell me how much they liked it. It was a little much for me /high neck and ruffles and the length. Felt a tiny bit overwhelming on my petite frame. But it looked good and was comfortable. Fit very well

Would never normally buy something so loud but I thought this was fun, and it was! Love the shoulder detail (even though I have wide shoulder, it still looked good). Wore to my brothers engagement party and got lots of compliments. It is comfortable, stretchy around the waist, and a cute length. Would highly recommend.

I wore this for a biz casually elegant indoor event in the tropics. Styled it with black YSL stilettos. It is so lovely, comfortable, on trend, sexy and demure at the same time. Wish I would have ordered a small, but it still looked great. Would love to wear it again some time!
This dress might be flattering for a taller person - for my petite frame it was not flattering. Too bad - I loved the print!
Absolutely love this dress. I almost bought it. Wore to the office and was comfortable all day. It's such a winner.
Just a very nice print and fit. Perfect for a summer date night!
This dress is one of those dresses that flatters everyone. Sadly, it arrived with stinky armpits, so I couldn't wear it. I'd potentially re-rent.
Perfect transition dress . This pale pink and reptile dress is awesome! I wore it to a ladies luncheon, and a summer dinnerJust enough ruffle to be feminine without being fussy. Very comfortable

I couldn't go anywhere in this dress without somebody giving me a compliment. Strangers told me I looked pretty. It's dressy, but it goes anywhere. I wore it with heels to a job interview, and with a pair of sneakers around town. I wanted to keep!

This dress is so comfortable. I wore in Paris during the day with white tennis shoes and through on some nice heels for a casual dinner. The sleeve detail on this dress can really dress the look up. Several compliments...another piece I'd considering buying I loved so much.

links_reviews_title: Stylish and comfortable dress! Perfect for a date night.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and stylish!

Loved the print and the colors. Nice midi length and the slits in the skirt were cute and added a fun flow to the dress. The sleeves on this dress, however, are AWFUL. Total 80's poufy prom dress style. I had to wear a fitted black jacket to cover the sleeves. Also, I usually wear a 10 and got the XLR because L wasn't available. The L definitely would have been a better fit, but the XLR looked fine.

links_reviews_title: So in love with this dress!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this dress!! The fit is perfect, love the cinched waist and flowy material. The material is silky and light. My favorite is the puffy sleeves. I wore this dress multiple times, really wanted to purchase this dress may wait until the discount is higher. Highly recommend renting this dress! It's such a unique and fun dress.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fits fine. Comfortable. Light and airy. Perfect for LA. Wore it to work with gladiator sandals and received so many compliments. The tummy band hides all pouches or flaws. I would probably buy this dress if it goes on sale.
Perfect work to dinner.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything! The pic does it no justice. It's girly flirty and classy all in one.
links_reviews_text: Compliments galore! This yes is one I would rent over and the reason I say that is I don't like to wear anything twice. Which is why I use RTR! Don't underestimate this dress ladies it will give you a little life! Take a chance on this one!

links_reviews_title: Didn't like - looked like you'd wear to a square dance.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Very cute print but not as flattering on as I had hoped it would be.
links_reviews_text: If in between sizes, I would recommend to size up

I wasn't 100% sold on this dress, but the 80's-inspired sleeves finally had me convinced to rent it. And boy am I glad that I did - the fit is absolutely AMAZING and super flattering. The sleeves aren't too poofy - they have just enough volume to make this piece look super modern. Much to my pleasant surprise, there are slits in the front, which make the midi length a little less conservative and a little more fun. All in all, this is a great slimming, comfy and super cute dress for work, a dinner date or out and about for everyday. Highly recommend!
True to size, comfy, super cute and easy to wear.
Great day time short to run around town in. Fits true to size as other blousy tops. Wasn't too cropped. Hit perfectly with highwaisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: I don't usually like cropped shirts and this was CUTE
links_reviews_text: I am tall and have a long torso so usually cropped shirts looks awkward on me but this was really cute! I rented it for a work BBQ so I wore the Med because it went a bit lower on my long torso, but the small fit better all around. Super cute and flattering. Love with high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: Would buy it if I could justify the price
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this shirt. It was true to size and very light and comfortable. Did easily wrinkle, but I blame the humid weather I was in. Was very easy to steam and throw back on. Colors were very cute.

links_reviews_title: East breezy but have someone on cleavage patrol
links_reviews_text: It's such a fun, easy spring top. Just beware of cleavage control! It's more revealing than you think.
Really loved this top- the colors, the fit, and the fabric which has a slight texture. It is breezy for hot days and the loose fit was flattering.
Loose cute top perfect for spring.

I rented this for a pool party in Vegas. Everyone complimented my shirt and it fit great. I'm petite muscular build and the shirt wasn't too big just it was flowy. I would wear it over and over again.
This top was great. Super light and casual. Perfect for vacation or work. Would rent again.
This top was super comfortable and pretty! Love it

links_reviews_title: Cute top to dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Loved renting this top - wore it for a nice lunch out with my family. Really soft and flattering too. Perfect for any vacation!
Comfy and cute. Perfect for a Saturday or casual day with jeans. Cropped a bit and you need to wear a tank underneath bc buttons are a bit spaced out
Great shirt for everyday wear!

links_reviews_title: Cute flowy top, perfect with jeans or jean shorts!
links_reviews_text: Fit a tiny bit loose, and is a bit sheer! Otherwise perfect

links_reviews_title: Such a cute everyday shirt!! LOVED IT! I will rent again!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Comfy!!

links_reviews_title: I would buy this if I had sized down. Love it!
links_reviews_text: So cute and comfortable. Love love love
Great top for a date !
Looks great with shorts and jeans, loved it
Lots of compliments on this shirt! The buttons definitely have a gap which you can't really see on the model so it's a tad more revealing than the photos but loved this shirt.
Comfortable and flattering

I rented this top for weekend wear, and I ended up wearing it to a concert with high-waisted jeans. I did wear a tank under it, because the neckline is kind of low, but it was a fun choice. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: wrinkled in suitcase so bad I couldnt wear it.
links_reviews_text: good quality, boxy fit, wrinkles easily.
Super easy and cute, paired with denim jeans one day and over my swimsuit with denim shorts on another. Super loose blousy fit
absolutely loved this top and will rent again. I got the large and the xl, I have a larger bust since I am currently nursing and I feel like the XL just gave a bit more coverage
Flattering on any figure. Sexy it up and wear just a nude bra, wear a tank for work. #GetItGirl
i will buy this shirt. i am obsessed with it and wore it like 5 times!!!! so perfect for summer 19!!

I absolutely loved this top. I actually decided to keep it for a second month. It's very lightweight and fits loosely. Super cute with high waisted jeans. Would've considered buying if the price wasn't so high.
I didn't wear this because it was so unflattering.
I had to wear a tank underneath it because it was too revealing otherwise in the neckline and buttons. I probably could have worn the medium. It's very lightweight and cute to wear out casually.

I rented this as an easy work-play transition piece. So cute and comfortable, sized up based on RTR suggestion and glad I did-- I typically am a size 12/L, but went for XL to accommodate bust. Fit is loose but in a purposeful way, very flattering all around. So many compliments!

Loved how flowy and comfortable it felt. I was comfortable and fashionable - a win! Only complaint was that if you bend over, you are showing everything off, but that's the way it is with these loose flowy tops.

links_reviews_title: Easy to throw on with white denim and a jacket. Cute and casual
links_reviews_text: fits as expected, loved the tie detail without showing midriff
Breezy and cool. Great pastels
Dressed it down for errands and up for a dinner out with friends. A really cute top, breezy, not see through. Considered buying it
Wore with some mom jeans and looked as dumpy as possible at the zoo

links_reviews_title: Great everyday or dressed up shirt!
links_reviews_text: Wore for a work meeting, a handful of day events and a few nights out. I want to buy !

links_reviews_title: super cute and comfortable but not as flattering as it looks.
links_reviews_text: good fit overall but made me look a little large.
Like it

links_reviews_title: I'd buy this if I could
links_reviews_text: Such a cute top! The colors are beautiful, the fit is cute and flattering, pairs well with high waisted jeans and cute flats for a day of sightseeing! Really loved this one!

It is meant to be oversized and I loved it. It was flowy and went perfectly with a navy pencil skirt for work. There are tiny gaps in between the buttons which is fine for the weekend but I wore a white tank top underneath for work.I want to buy this top!

I needed help with getting the zipper up but this dress was EPIC! So flattering on my waist and didn't stretch out as the day went on because the material is so stiff. There is definitely no give in this dress so size up if you want to have a bit more comfort. It wasn't comfortable but I looked fierce so sacrifices must be made
I wore this dress for a day when I had various work engagements that went into the evening. Add some bling and heels and cocktail party here I come.

Loved everything about this and the fit was perfect. Wish I could have bought it and will likely rent it again! Seriously fit like a glove and looked so stylish and appropriate for work while still offering a hint of sexy.
This dress is so well made. It's very fitted, so it will hug every curve. But the fabric is thick enough that you don't have to worry about it showing imperfections.

links_reviews_title: Wow, felt so sexy in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits tts for Victoria Beckham, it is very fitted but also has a little stretch so moving/sitting was still comfortable. The fabric is thick and feels a little like actual snake skin. I loved everything about it, wish it were mine!

I'm a fan of most Victoria Beckham items and this dress didn't disappoint. The fabric is a beautiful woven fabric with a bit of neon yellow that isn't noticeable but adds dimension. A full zipper down the back and the high neck are nice details too. The fabric doesn't stretch AT ALL however, so if you have curves I'd go up 1-2 sizes.
The dress was hard to dance it but it was so different and fun for a 20th anniversary party.

links_reviews_title: High quality garment but runs small!
links_reviews_text: New with tags! Super sexy but conservative on my hourglass figure. Glad I sized up, as it really runs small in the torso. Needed a heeled brown boot- the hem hit me mid-calf without heels ( I'm 5' 5"). The colors are browns with a touch of hot yellow, not as much grey as in the photo. High quality fabric that has no give. You'll need to unzip the back zipper at the bottom, or you won't be able to walk. It's ultra-tight at the bottom. Elegant and classy!

The jacket is cute but it runs big! I had to roll the sleeves up so it wouldn't swallow up my hands! I'd definitely order it again in an XS as it's a good piece to transition from summer to fall in Arizona.
