links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous luxe jacket with leather details. Feels heavy and warm and I won't hesitate to wear out on the town from Uber to restaurant and Uber to bar in chilly winter Chicago temps. I'm 5'3 and about 125 post Xmas weight and this bad a*** little bomber fits like a dream.

This jacket is absolutely perfect...especially if you're an LSU tiger!!! I wore this to a LSU baseball event. This jacket is so comfy and warm. It was the perfect shade of LSU "gold"! I got compliments the entire day! This might need to become a permanent part of my wardrobe.
Fun retro jacket and fit perfectly

Imagine: it's 1976. You're Parker Posey. It's winter. Austin, Texas. You have nothing to do but waste time in front of convenience stores with your much older boyfriend Matthew McConaughey. You decide to pick up your BFF Joey Lauren Adams. Omg, she has three tickets to the Aerosmith concert. But, what to wear? Thank God for Samantha Sipos! This bomber will make you seriously chill while keeping you seriously warm. I am not chill at all and I don't even really like classic rock, but you better believe I was riding around in a Bronco listening to classic rock mere seconds after putting this on. Everyone adores this coat. They will want to touch, and you - not being neurotic for once - will *let* them! You are going to have so much fun at the Aerosmith concert in this! Thank you, Samantha! Runway Song: Sweet Emotion - Aerosmith :)

This jacket is to die for! I absolutely love this. If it was a couple hundred less I'd buy it. It's so cute and goes with almost anything. It does run slightly small so if you're between sizes definitely size up. Very warm as well! Don't hesitate on this one.

I was hesitant to rent this because I would never in a million years buy a sporty looking jacket like this, especially in such a bold color. But I liked how the other reviewers were styling it, so I decided to go for it. INSTANT LOVE. This jacket and I were meant to be... at least for a little while. I wore it with a striped top and jeans, but I love it with a girly dress too to toughen things up. Rent and wear with anything! You'll be rocking mustard sport-style in no time!!
Super warm and comfy. Four stars only because lining was ripped. Many compliments.

True to size, warm, and surprisingly versatile. I rented this jacket for everyday wear and I never wanted to take it off. My only complaint is that the jacket does seem to have been worn quite a bit and not as new looking as I had hoped.
This jacket is amazing. It's bright but not blinding, warm but not stifling, loose but still somehow flattering. It also photographs very, very well :) my fave rental so far!! definitely recommend

This jacket is so comfy and fun to wear. Perfect length for petite girls. I sized down to an extra small because I knew I wasn't going to wear anything loose or thick underneath it. Love the retro color and accents. Definitely recommend for a trendy addition to your wardrobe!

links_reviews_title: I was walking down the street and someone complimented my jacket and asked if I worked in fashion.
links_reviews_text: Im regularly 2x this is a 4x and fits pretty snug. I expected this though since its high end.
Fit was nice, casual and comfy. Wore to a family function, Loved it!
Comfy cute dress but def stretches out over the course of the day. Would size down!
I wore this on a vacation with an overlay wrap. Great fit and stretch in the dress. Fun slit!
I'm more of a size small and the xs got loose over the course of the day. Fabric is strange but looks nice because of the knit edges.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but high thigh slit
links_reviews_text: This dress feels amazing! Super cute! The slit was a little too high for what I wanted to wear.... but overall, I would order and where it! Easily dressed up or down!
ALC is one of my favorite brands - love the fit and neckline of the dress. Great transitional piece in between seasons!
T he fit on the dress is absolutely stunning. Not only does the ribbed material make the dress flattering the cut up the side is allows for sexy little peak at your thighs.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing it. Wanted to wear it to a weekend event that was cancelled.
links_reviews_text: very cute. will probably rent again next summer
Easy to wear with a thick, stretchy material that creates a great silhouette.
I did not wear this as it was too large and heavy and the smaller size was unavailable.
Way too big. Lots of side boob without a bra. Word a fun strappy sports bra underneath. I'm 5'1" | 150lbs | 34DDD and the medium was very big. Perfect length tho.

Very nice knit dress, but the arm hole comes down so low on the sides and in so far in front that you can't wear without your entire bra hanging out. I tried to layer a racer back tank and it did not look good.
Fit was so flattering, and perfect for a date night. Comfortable material. Wore with long duster coat and knitted slides. Wore cute with heeled sandals and boots.

You can dress this up or down, very flattering silhouette with a lot of stretch. You will need to wear a racer back bra with this. I wore this on an 85 degree day and on a 65 degree day (September in nyc) and it was great both days!
I've rented this several times now and I love it! It droops a bit in the arm holes so it's hard to wear a bra but it's very comfy and subtly sexy.
So big! I'm not sure if a smaller size would've fixed the issues though. Lots of side boob exposure. I didn't wear this
This dress is very nice. It can be dressed up or down. It does run large, though. I would rent again, but would definitely size down.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but way too large on top and my bra was showing
links_reviews_text: cute for the weekend or an outdoor event, I planned on wearing with sneakers but top part of the dress was too large
I loved this dress, casual but a little sexy too! It ran big, as I'm normally a large and would have kept it had I sized down

links_reviews_title: very cute, looks great with off white tennis shoes
links_reviews_text: the fabric is very stretchy and a little loose above the waist. it's the kind that stretches over time from being on a hanger

links_reviews_title: Thick knit dress, runs true to size
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 12 and ordered a size LR and it was a good fit. If you want to go really sexy you could even go down a size and because of the knit stretch fabric it would work. I'm 5'2 and curvy. The dress comes down to about mid-calf at an angle because of the slit. The slit only came up to about my knee. It's a very thick knit, might be too warm for a hot summer night/day.
Fit true to size.
Size 4 fit perfect ! Has a little stretch and you can adjust the rushing on the sleeves so I pulled the sleeves down a bit since I prefer full length sleeves over 3 quarter sleeves
The color is to die for! Fit well too wouldn't have gone any smaller
The color is fabulous as well as the overall fit. It is super stylish and I really wanted to keep this one
Loved the color. Good design. Comfy.
Wow this top is AMAZING! I got sooo many compliments. Gorgeous material in a rich jewel tone. Extremely flattering and soft. Will probably never send this back :)
fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: The color is my favorite - it is striking! Love the arm/shoulder detail.
links_reviews_text: Versatile and buttery comfort
Best fashion blouse for work.

Love Veronica Beard, so I put this bias up front. That being said, this is a gorgeous, luxurious-feeling blouse. The emerald color is stunning. I will definitely re-rent it. Or buy it new if it's still available.
I'm usually a 2 but rented a 4. Nordstrom carried this shirt so while I was there I tried it on to get the right size so I went up to a 4. I received a ton of compliments. I'll rent it again.
Loved the quality and color of this shirt! The detail of the ruched sleeve make it very feminin. Veronica Beard is one of my favorite designers. Easy to dress up or down with a pair of jeans.

Love this top. Would prefer size 4, but it was not available so I went with 6. Because it was slightly too big for me it made me look a bit broad in the shoulders (it runs true to size, it was just this specific cut and my build). Beautiful fabric and stunning color - makes your eyes really pop. Wore it with black pencil pants and high heels as depicted on the model. Will def. rent it again.
Cute and comfy, but super shapeless. A little scratchy in the sleeves if you have nothing on beneath it. I did really like it though:)
I rented this for my bachelorette weekend and it was perfect for lounging around at night and in the mornings. Definitely runs a little large but with a sweatshirt, who cares?!

links_reviews_title: Love the sentiment but just ok
links_reviews_text: This is fine, it wasn't as soft as I thought it would be, still comfortable. It's a nice amount of oversize to still be true to size. I didn't particularly like the muffining-over happening with the bottom of the sweatshirt, not really flattering. Ultimately I decided to send this back because it's too hot to wear it and not comfortable or cute enough to want to wear despite the heat.

links_reviews_title: A sweater to make you happy
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater. The colors are happy. It sizes a bit big. The small felt like a medium. I liked it over sized but if you like fitted clothes get a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Working from home, this should have been awesome.
links_reviews_text: Before I took the plastic off I noticed a small hole, so instead of doing more damage, I sent it back.
This was a great, casual, everyday sweatshirt. I big baggy, but perfect for a comfortable fit with leggings.
Comfortable loved it
This sweatshirt is lightweight and super soft. It runs large, even for a sweatshirt. I just bought it for the text, which isn't very easy to see with the colors, but my husband got a kick out of it.
Thin and tight. Worst combo for a sweatshirt.
Rented for some fun while we had some casual downtime and it is very soft and thinner so not hot to wear in summer
Cute sweatshirt that is perfect for chilly but not cold weather. Lightweight and fun colors.

links_reviews_title: A cute twist to a dress shirt!
links_reviews_text: I have been waiting and waiting for this shirt to become available to rent! The multi colored hearts are such cute details that make a traditional button-up collared shirt so much more fun to wear. I got compliments from my coworkers as soon as I walked in to the office. I was nervous about renting the XS, but Rails shirts run large so the XS actually fits really nicely. Material is lightweight and comfortable - may consider buying I love it so much! Will definitely wear this time and time again in a variety of ways.
Super lightweight and didn't wrinkle
The mini hearts all over make this a fun day to evening shirt. I wore it multiple times and loved it!

links_reviews_title: Great combo of feminine and masculine
links_reviews_text: Pros: This shirt is very soft and comfortable. I love that the small embroidered hearts make it stand out from other striped button downs. It's very breathable, and I got a few compliments on it. Cons: It's pretty thin so I opted to wear a cami under it for work. I started with it untucked, but the bottom got pretty wrinkled in the first 2 hours so I decided to tuck it in which still worked great for me.
Super cute shirt, wore this work but can be cute for almost anything else. Thin material but the heart designs give it an extra flare. Recommend!

The shirt just felt very cheap and rubs small. The sleeves were super short, so had to roll the cuffs. And it's short in the torso as well. I work in a very casual work environment and I wouldn't even wear it to work because it's so thin. Not a winner in my book. Wore to run errands on a sunny day
Ran large so I only wore it under a sweater. Was. Super cute print.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable - and I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The XS fit me perfectly, in that it was just a littttle loose in a very comfortable awesome way. The fabric is very lightweight, which was great for a fall day in LA where the temp was 50 in the morning at 75 in the afternoon - it worked for both.
I rented this top to wear to work. I liked the little hearts that were embroidered all over. The top fit great and I paired it with navy pants and nude mules.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, easy to wear top, cute detail
links_reviews_text: This shirt was great. I wore it twice. I went with a M, even though I typically wear a small. It was loose, but didn't look oversized or ill-fitting. I wore it untucked, paired with jeans and booties. The little hearts are a great detail, but not too cutesy. Really liked this shirt.
Perfect fit, slim but not too tight.
Loved this shirt. Perfect for a fun but classic work shirt. Easy to wear and true to size.
Rent this!!
Nice lightweight fabric
loose, comfy fit
Easy to wear with jeans for every day. Wore it 3 times before I shipped it back.
Was great for work. Clean and professional with a little bit of fun! Did a nice French tuck and was good to go. I got the large because the medium was not available. It worked fine being a bit big.
I ended up getting an XL (normally a M-L) because that's all they had a available but it still looked great! Thin enough that I wore a t shirt under it but still looked great.

I wore this shirt 4 times in 2 weeks while traveling for work. Absolutely loved it. It fits well enough that it didn't gap in the bust on me and it hung nicely. Can't wait to rent again. If it drops in price I would totally buy it later.

links_reviews_title: easy to pair with items already in my closet
links_reviews_text: was a little large but very comfortable.
Easy shirt, super cute, and good fit. Love Rails shirts, and this was particularly nice
The fabric of this shirt is awesome. It's thin and cool like linen, but doesn't look wrinkly at the end of the day. Cute patterns of embroidered hearts set this shirt apart from boring.
Super soft, very cute. Kinda see-through so needed a cami underneath. A really cute practical shirt.
Will rent this again. Lightweight enough for summer. Boyfriend fit.
I sized down one size based on other reviews and they fit perfect. Only odd thing was the pants button from the opposite side of what is typical.
These were really comfortable. The buttons were a nice detail

links_reviews_title: LOVE these fun pants!! So flattering.
links_reviews_text: got so many compliments on these pants! They stretch out quite a bit and run a little big so definitely size down. Otherwise amazing pants!
These were so comfortable and a good statement!

These pants are so fun!! I went up a size- that's all they had- and the fit is pretty good. The waist is large, but was not a problem for me. They are very comfy and fun. They do run a little short and look cropped. My true size would've been perfect.

I'm borderline 28 sometimes bigger so I thought the 28R would be perfect however they were still a little too big. They didn't look big but they felt big so the belt came in very handy! They're very comfortable though & easy to live in all night. Not a thick material which was nice & flexible to move in

I wore these for a concert and they were perfect! I got an 8 because I am usually in between a 6 and an 8 but next time I will get the 6 because these were stretchy around the waste but they worked for the night!
Ran one size too large but super stretchy, comfy and flattering
I love the high wait and flare leg. I'm 5'9 and often have trouble with inseams...these were perfect.
There's lots of cheetah print pants out there, but these are the best I've found! Love the crop length and it was perfect with heeled booties. Needed a belt because it was pretty big at the waist.
Tried to pull it off as part of my Halloween costume... I think a fail! Hehe. Pants are cute though, have a retro feel. Not my style for everyday wear , but comfy enough.

Loved the style and idea of these pants but even thought I sized down (thanks to other reviews) the 24 was still way too big. I couldn't make them work for a night out but they were okay for work so at least I got one wear out of them. Super stretchy throughout and the waist runs big. I liked them I just wish they ran TTS or had a smaller size available!
Love these. So fun and different. A lot of stretch and run a little big. I could've sized down and been fine

Pants are very soft and comfortable. I really like the button detail. Wore them for dinner and to work. Received compliments. They were a little bit big in the waist for me, but still fit well overall
The ankle and the waist are a bit big, but not big enough where the pants don't fit and/or aren't cute. Still loved them and they were very comfortable!
Super cute pant, but they definitely stretch throughout the day. I would rent again, but in a smaller size!

links_reviews_title: A fun substitution for regular print pants
links_reviews_text: These were fun- the fit is large though. I usually wear a 29 and followed the reviews and ordered 2 sizes down and got a 27- honestly could've gotten away with a 26 since I like my pants tight. Overall, just okay!! Sort of a weird crop length on me, not short enough to be cropped but too long to be full length? They were fun for a few wears!
Fun and trendy. Ran too big around the waist - should've sized down. Stretchy and worn in
Definitely size down. Very stretchy. Loveeeed them
Fits well! Did not enhance curves well, but super fun print and good quality !
I am absolutely obsessed with these pants- they're extremely stretchy very comfortable and soooo fun. IN LOVEEEE

These pants were easy to pair clothes with - I wore them three times. Dressed down with a chambray shirt, dressed for work in a black shirt and out to dinner in a black shirt. Went with fun shoes since they're a little cropped; showed them off well. Really perfect leopard pattern. #roomforbooty
These were super fun for a night out, I think if anything they may run a touch small, I got a 28 but I usually wear a 27, the legs fit great but waist was big (not surprised)
Very stretchy and bigger than I expected. Got the only size available thinking it would be just a tad big but had to belt these in order to keep them on. I will definitely get again but size down.
Fun pants for casual or could easily be dressed up for a night out. Really liked them because they felt like a neutral but make a statement. We're big on my waist so had to belt it. Stretchy fabric.

These jeans are amazing, so flattering and cute. They're perfect for RTR because they're fun but I'm not sure I'd spend the money to own them. Fits true to size in my experience. I will probably rent these again!
Super fun pants. Long and need to be worn with heals. High wasted, very cute and stand out
These pants are so fun! Run true to size, too. Will definitely be renting again.
Super stretchy and comfortable. They run a little big so definitely because of stretch so you can size down. I'm usually 27 and 26 was perfect
Yes I found these pants run big but I wore the size 26 with a little extra room in the waist and I received compliments on these pants all day. Loved them and will wear more then once !
Stretchy, high tide true to size. Comfortable.
Rented these for a girls night out. Was expecting pants to be a slim fit and they were far from that. Big throughout. Waist was very large for a 28R. Did not wear.
I thought my size which is usually 27 was going to be too tight but this actually is big on me, so definitely true to size. Love them and want them smaller!

I got these new with tags. Very comfy and have a lot of stretch- will try a size smaller next time because I prefer them a little tighter and the waist was a bit big. Length is pretty long, not really a crop. They are also more like high-waisted stretchy pants than jeans. Easy to dress up or down.
Runs pretty large! Super cute
Color was great, fit was great, they were basically jean material. Fit me perfectly and came up a bit higher rise than standard jeans.
Like other reviews mention these pants run big and are stretchy. I am a solid size 26 with a butt and the 25R fit great. The print was more faded than I expected, and at 5'7 they were cropped on me.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and stretchy, with a fun print
links_reviews_text: I loved these! Very, very comfy. I'm usually a 26 in jeans (Madewell/J.Crew is my go-to), and these fit maybe slightly on the large side of 26, but they still looked good, and I wouldn't size down at this moment. The fit was flattering, while still being roomy and stretchy - pretty ideal for those days you feel a little bloated. The leopard print is fun and unique, and I liked the button fly more than I expected (the fabric wasn't stiff, so this wasn't a hassle). These came down past the ankle on me (5'2"), but were not unflattering. I would definitely rent these again.
These run at least one size too large. They also stretch out a good bit during the day. Flattering style and high waisted.
Soooo cute but they run a little big and they stretch easily. I would size down from your normal pant size
This is a great sweater which is warm and trendy. I liked the colors, the fit was good, not too short or too long. I highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and easy to wear with black jeans.
links_reviews_text: #nightout #40thbirthday #burrythehatchet

I wore this sweater with a black turtleneck underneath. It is very soft and comfortable except for the pink stripes, those are very scratchy. Overall I was happy with the sweater and fit. I wore it to work and received many compliments.
Fell in love with this sweater! Definitely one of my favorite rentals from RTR! It's comfortable and stylish. I would have totally bought it had it been on a higher discount!
Fit well. Nice for casual wear.
Loved the colors and print of this sweater! It was cozy and pretty warm (almost too warm for indoors). It was also a little scratchy around the neckline for me.
Very cute and soft. I should have gotten a small. It was too big on me.
Great sweater that is super soft
love the leopard and glitter trim
Loved this sweater! Wore it to several daytime events for my children before the holidays. Not too thick.

Lots of compliments. Soft, not itchy at all. Good length (so many sweaters look like crop tops lately). Pretty warm! I wore to work on casual Friday and to a birthday party on Saturday without feeling frumpy
So soft and cozy. About hip length on my 5'2 frame.
Great quality, trendy, cute
Loved wearing this sweater in the fall. It's really comfortable, not itchy, and has a little bit of sparkle threading in the top and bottom.

Fun style that I got to wear more than once. My only issue was that it was pretty long so on my 5'4" frame it didn't really lay right. Definitely not a "slimming" effect but still great for a cute oversized look!
I really liked this sweater but it's warm!

links_reviews_title: Glad I sized down! Longer comfy cozy stylish!
links_reviews_text: I recieved sooo many compliments wearing this and jeans at the mall shopping! Lots of people were definatley eyeing as I walked by too my husband said. It fits longer and a little loose so sizing down to a medium was a great idea. Even think I could have sized down to do I dare say a small...but I think this is suppose to be tastefully a little loose. Wore this several times even around the house snuggled on the couch.

I liked the pattern and the fabric is a bit thicker and textured making it good for winter. I wish it had pockets and fit was a little odd. It was big in the waist but if I had gone I size down I think it would have been too small through the hip. Wore it once to work and it was fine but not in love with it.
Liked this skirt. Ran a littleeee big. Could be dressed up or down! I thought it was a little short to wear without tights.
Comfy, stylish and overall great fit.
Wore to work, a cocktail event, and out with friends, get so many compliments. Considering buying it!

Wore this skirt for a pre-wedding open bar/welcome reception and felt so stylish. It was casual enough to wear it in the airport on the flight to the wedding, but also dressy enough to wear at the party. Super versatile and flattering (not too short). Loved it
It's a little short which makes it too ~sexy~ for work, unless you add tights maybe.

links_reviews_title: I got engaged in Paris! Rented for a Seine River cruise and a Surprise photo shoot! BESTDAYEVER
links_reviews_text: The skirt is so well made, the fabric is very nice and thick. It fit very well and I have had a ton of compliments on the skirt when people see the photos from that day. It runs true to size I am a 12 and wore a 12 it fit a bit snug but did not ride up. Amazing skirt that I wish I could keep!
I'm typically a size four, and this skirt ran big. Could ha easily ordered the 2. It was perfect length, if not slightly short on my 5'2" petite frame.
Cute mini skirt and warm wool material but bit big so size down

links_reviews_title: Fell in love with skirts again!
links_reviews_text: I normally don't wear skirts as I find them uncomfortable around the waist. This skirt was so comfy and it hit exactly where I wanted it to - below the waist. It's thick enough for the winter - I paired it with fleece lined tights and didn't feel an ounce of cold. I'd rent this again!

Loved this skirt so much and didn't want to give it back. Would have been perfect for a cold weather day but unfortunately it was 90 degrees in New Orleans on Dec 1st... don't recommend wearing it when it's that warm.
Cute, well made. I'm between a 4-6 and the 6 fit well. I didn't think it was amazingly flattering but that also could be my body type. I liked it overall.

Really nice thick material with a great structure! Perfect length for over the knee boots for tall people like me! Runs a little bit so I could have gone down to a 6. Got SO many compliments on how nice the skirt was.
I'm obsessed with this! It is the perfect plaid skirt

links_reviews_title: Did not have the leather band
links_reviews_text: Picture is blurry but it's just to show that there was no leather band on the particular skirt I rented. It was a little disappointing but even without the leather band, it was cute. Paired with a black turtleneck and a oversized red Badgley Mischa jacket which I also rented on RTR.

links_reviews_title: Wore to work and then dinner.
links_reviews_text: Super cute

I usually wear a 0, but took the recommendation for the 2. The skirt was too big in the waist and ridiculously short. I can't imagine how much shorter a zero would have been. Anyway, not work appropriate. Too bad cause the print is really cute.
This was a great skirt for Christmas Mass. Comfortable, classic and cute.
Fit a bit snug, so I never wore it.
I normally wear an XS / S rented this and the skirt is cute but runs bigger . Pair with black stockings and booties.
Loved it! warm, cute, cozy, pulled together without trying very hard!
It was a little big in the waist, but long enough to wear to work.
Fit is good and flattering! Wish I could buy it.
Too big but really cute
It fit amazing and was so comfortable! I absolutely loved it

It's not very fitted on the waist, it runs at least a size bigger. The material is thick and fairly well made. I tucked a turtle neck into it and threw on a pair of over the knee black boots to round out the look
Fit perfectly :)
I rented a size two which I usually am however this was a little loose in the waist. Length was perfect.
Order at least 1 size up, maybe 2. Cute!

I ordered up thinking it ran tight, but wished I'd stuck with my normal size or gone down. The skirt sat on my hips instead of my natural waist and looked baggy. But, fair warning if you do size down -- the material is substantial enough to be warm, but not so thick that it wouldn't stretch around your curves (for better or worse) if it's tight.
The skirt is quite short but I could wear to work with tights. It is a little bulky so not particularly flattering but still I liked wearing it and would rent again.
Cute but way too small/short
This skirt is cute. Not overly exciting or special but a good basic plaid skirt.
This skit was perfect with boots and tights.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this skirt. Fit perfect!
links_reviews_text: What a great and versatile skirt. I loved wearing this to work. I felt sexy but sophisticated. Not too short not too long. Easy to style and easy to wear. Also it was warm! Perfect for winter.
Great skirt and short
I'm 5'8" and almost always a size 10. This skirt felt tight and very short compared to photos and other reviews I had seen. Very cute pattern and great quality... just didn't work for me.
I'm in between sizes and sized up based on the photos/reviews of others, and it was a mistake. I still wore this but it was really big at my waist.
This skirt was great for fall with black tights and knee high boots. Fit true to size and was very comfortable.

Wore this to a Brooks and Dunn concert in Vegas. Perfect length (I'm 5'10) worked with boots and could easily be dressed up with heels. I felt comfortable eating, drinking, gambling and dancing. Pretty low cut but I think just the right amount
Such a cute dress, though it's pretty low cut and the bow draws the eye to your cleavage. I wore a scarf all day.
This is a very cute dress. It was a little tight in the waist but not enough to make it uncomfortable to wear.
Great material and fit. Definitely a fall or winter dress because it is lined with a warmer material. I loved this dress!

I liked that this was structured without being too formal/dressy. It was very flattering with the fitted top, but a-line skirt. The fabric was much thicker than I thought, so this is best for a cooler day. The dress was missing the bow in the picture when it arrived, but honestly - I liked it better than way. Easy to make casual or dressier.
So comfortable and well made. Material is high quality. Only gripe was that it was a little low cut for work so I had to add a tank underneath.

links_reviews_title: I'm very bottom-heavy and thought the buttons would gape near my hips, but this dress fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!

Waited a long time to rent this because I wasn't sure about it... but I was more than pleasantly surprised. Fit like a glove, long enough for work, and not too revealing while still being flirty and fun. Considered buying!
Absolutely loved this dress. True to size but definitely recommend an undershirt because it is low cut (for work at least)

I am very tempted to buy this dress, I absolutely love it! The pictures I took don't do it justice, and it didn't look like much on the hanger, I'm not sure I would've looked at it had I seen it in a store, but it's very flattering on. The bow on the chest is super cute, a little sexy but not too revealing (for my casual office anyway), and the mother of pearl buttons are beautiful. The fabric is thicker than I expected, and it's lined in a soft knit that almost feels like flannel -- not really meant for this July day, but great for my office where I'm usually cold. My measurements are 33-26-35, and the XS fits me perfectly. It's stretchy, and not tight on me, so it could probably accommodate slightly larger measurements too (more in the hips, less in the waist, and may become overly revealing with a large chest). It's a great length for my height too, short enough to be cute but long enough to not have any worries sitting down or bending over. Favorite dress so far, highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress - great for work or weekend
links_reviews_text: Pros: this dress looks much prettier on than in pictures. Falls perfectly from the natural waist and is fitted in the bust. The cut of the dress accentuates curves and hides any flaws. Love the sleeves and the sailor type bow below the bust. Perfect dress for work or a weekend brunch! Cons: None. Loved this dress and plan to rent this again.
Was cute but didn't have pockets (weird considering the lining); a bit low cut and didn't come w the bow tie in the pic. But I did like the dress it was flattering and comfy

links_reviews_title: Ok, cute! I wanted to buy this dress. It was definitely not for work.
links_reviews_text: Ok, cute! I wanted to buy this dress. It was definitely not for work but drinks and dinner with hubby it was perfect. I am typically a size 2 and wore the 2. I don't think I would have liked it alone 4 as it was fitted but true to size. I am a 128,5'6,34D. I will rent again.

10/10 for this cute dress. I can't get over it I wore it twice in 4 days lol. Next rent I'll get it a size smaller, the length is perfect for my height but the waist was a bit too loose. Still loved it sooooo much
This worked okay for a cocktail happy hour when I did not have to sit. The combo of scoop neck and short length made it very inappropriate for office wear.

links_reviews_title: Felt like the scale was off
links_reviews_text: This dress was cute in the picture, but when I put it on I just felt like the scale was off, too small. I wore it anyway, but not one of my favorites.

links_reviews_title: SO CLOSE TO BUYING THIS DRESS. RENT IT NOW.
links_reviews_text: I l o v e this dress. The fit is perfect. The color is perfect. It's absolutely gorgeous. I would've bought it, but it was just a bit too expensive for my taste. Wore it to work and felt cute and a bit sexy but still professional. I don't have a large bust, so the cut might effect those with a bigger bust a bit differently. 11/10 would recommend!!!!

links_reviews_title: The Best! Made me look 10lb slimmer
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfect, no spanx needed and I was asked over and over if I had lost weight. It literally gave me a different figure. Loved!!!
Had to wear a tank top for work, but not for the weekend

links_reviews_title: Love this playful and flattering dress!
links_reviews_text: I cannot day enough good things about this dress! The cut is super flattering and length is modest yet playful. The little details like the tie and the bust and buttons down the front make this simple dress stand out. The dress is very well made with a jersey lining that makes it super comfortable (and actually warm- so wouldn't suggest for warmer months). Was worried this might be too low cut for the office (as I busty girl I regularly have this problem) but it just had a hint of cleavage that I felt I could get away with it. I should not that this dress runs a little small and was happy I sized up. Definitely would recommend renting this one!
This dress is so cute and flattering. I wore it twice and received compliments from everyone. The lining is thick which makes it a great winter dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a casual holiday party
links_reviews_text: Loved this Hutch dress. I've rented a couple from them and their dresses are always true to size. This was super cute and you could wear a regular bra with it as well!
Great fit, comfortable for work

Adorable dress, very comfortable, thick material. Appropriate length for family dinner w/out tights (I'm 5'11" w/ long legs) also ample room in the bust (38DD) not super stretchy if that's what you're looking for, but skirt is on the flowy side- so good for Thanksgiving dinner. Would rent again for similar event or for every day @ work in the fall/winter.

I picked up this dress on a whim in my Update order, and it turned out to be my favorite! I'm generally a large/12 in Hutch with room to spare, but XL was the right size in this dress. There's not much stretch to it, and it's more on the fitted side through the top and hips. It's lightly lined with a super soft fabric that will make it perfect for fall/mild winter weather.

I found this dress to be very comfortable. Dark navy and thicker material perfect for cooler weather. I didn't find it to be too tight or stiff. Would say it runs true to size. Well made piece...wish it had pockets! Lol

links_reviews_title: Last minute grab from the RTR store
links_reviews_text: While in Chicago visiting friends, my boyfriend snagged a last minute reservation to Alinea. I didn't have anything cute to wear so I stopped by RTR and tried on half the store. This was the front runner. If I had the entire app's worth of choices, I would have picked something else for this occasion, but I had 3 slots open in my unlimited order and used them to make a cute outfit. With regard to this dress, the hanger had definitely stretched the shoulders out and it fit a little funny as a result. Otherwise, I liked the fit. The sweetheart neck was flattering and did not require fashion tape to cover my bra- which is very rare for me. The dress is fully lined with a very soft almost fleece material that feels very nice. It was a good last minute find for dinner.

links_reviews_title: Runs small if you have curves
links_reviews_text: If you're wider in the hips like me, I'd skip this dress. It was super tight.
Cute, but way too big. Wore to work, but had to pin above the bow to control the cleavage (and I am not large busted).
I really liked this dress, it had a soft lining and fit well. It's good for any day/event.
Cute comfortable dress that fit perfectly. Have a warm lining so perfect for winter. Length was appropriate to wear to work.

links_reviews_title: Fun cut and detail. A little low cut for work
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress. It fit fine though I wasn't a huge fan of the sleeves/cuff - long and not much definition. I have a smaller chest which made the v-neck a little low for work. Overall, though, it was cute for one wear.
Comfortable and super flattering. The perfect dress to bring along on vacation.
I rented this for work. It didn't have the bow, as pictured, and was too short for work (I'm 5'8") so I didn't wear it.

This dress fit my hourglass figure well. The neckline could be slightly low for a professional setting, but perfect for a night out. Length was a little on the short side for work as well, but not crazy short. The buttons didn't pucker like some dresses of that style do, which I loved. I wore it with Keds and it was extremely cute. The fabric is a bit heavier-weight, so could certainly be worn with tights in the fall-winter transition. Will rent again!!!

This dress is beautiful, simple, and a great material. I thought I might be able to wear it to work in addition to a weekend party, but it is too short. The long sleeves are great for a late summer, early fall day because they helped keep me warm.
Wore this for family photos and loved it. Really flattering fit, elegant and gorgeous fabric. The button detail and now made it stand out in a subtle way.
It was a bit tight in the chest and ribs, but overall it was flirty, short and a lot of fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Fits nicely snug to my body Better worn for chilly or cold weather
links_reviews_text: Perfect length and a flattering, modest neckline. Its semi-light and the fabric is warm and soft so its best to wear it during autumn or fall.

links_reviews_title: It was a cute everyday dress - wore to work.
links_reviews_text: It was a little low cut for work but overall happy with it.

links_reviews_title: Fun, special, comfortable - wore it two nights in a row!
links_reviews_text: Wore the skirt with a white T-shirt for exploring during the day and with the matching top at night on vacation in South America. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: Wore it, loved it, bought it
links_reviews_text: Fit was easy, print is cute and not obnoxious, slit was just the right height. I was worried at first that the zipper wouldn't stay bc there's no hook and eye but it was great. Rented without the top. Forgot the top I meant to wear with it and worked perfectly with my bathing suit top. Best little summer skirt
Wore this skirt at the end of summer with a white top. The skirt was very light and breathable. The slit was the perfect length.
I loved wearing this skirt. I got so many compliments. It has a side zipper and fits true to size. The slit makes it comfortable and easy to move in. Can easily be dressed up or down. Loved it!

Rented this for a 2-week trip to Italy and couldn't have been happier with it. This was great for warm weather, didn't wrinkle too easily (huge plus for travel!), and went with everything. The slit was a great bonus. Loved this skirt!

The xlg was definitely a little big but this skirt was cute! Great for summer as it's a super lightweight crepe material, the slit is pretty high so it's quite breezy. The only flaw was i wore it with sneakers and the hem kept catching in my sneakers when i walked down steps! Otherwise very cute and i would consider purchasing in a smaller size!
Loved this pretty red skirt. A beautiful color and the flowers were a mix of purple and white. Super cute for a day in the city. The waist was a little tight so I suggest sizing up!

links_reviews_title: Cute 2 piece outfit, skirt for hourglass
links_reviews_text: Was stalking this whole outfit for over a month (this is the summer of marching sets!). The skirt is beautiful, flowing and showing good leg when you walk. It fits me like a glove, almost a bit tight and shows the belly/hips just a touch but since it fits my stomach perfectly it's overall very flattering. May end up buying!

I'm usually a small but ordered a medium based on other reviews. It was perfect. This is such an easy breezy piece that just screams summer. It's so easy to wear, with just enough leg peaking out from the slit. I actually wore this over my swimsuit for a bbq/pool party. Highly recommend!
Wore this on vaca. As stated in other reviews it runs small I had to order an xl which I am glad i did. This skirt was so cute and super comfortable. I would rent again.
Fun, flowy, perfect for summer! Does wrinkle easily, but the the color/pattern makes it not super noticeable. Will definitely rent again. Would recommend to others!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous skirt - perfect for hot weather on our honeymoon in Croatia!
links_reviews_text: This skirt was effortless, comfortable, and easy to pair with basic tops. I wore it multiple times during our honeymoon in Croatia and the material kept me cool. The slit wasn't too high and the skirt was about ankle-length. It looked great with a crop top and wasn't too tight around the waist. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect when u want to be lazy but still look fabulous!
links_reviews_text: Great lengths for my height! Loved the side opening. Made me feel sexy yet very versatile. Great for hot weather as its very light! ....love the fact that it wasn't too tight on my waist for a small.
So cute and fun, love the high slit. Length was perfect! Waist runs a bit small.
Great flowy, light material. Could be dressed up with heels or kept casual with sandals and a jean jacket. Love.

links_reviews_title: My new favorite item all summer long!!!
links_reviews_text: It is very versatile, white tank top and wedges. Gray t-shirt and slip on shoes, t-shirt and flip flops. Love it! The slit is very sexy, I was nervous it would show too much on a windy day or if I bent down but no, all is good. Not over flows at the bottom being it's a Lg if I got smaller I would not be able to zip. Love that it come up so high. I'm keeping it all summer

links_reviews_title: Cute, order a size up if you have wider hips!
links_reviews_text: I thought the skirt was cute and trendy, I liked the split. I ordered a size larger based on other reviews, which worked out. (my hips are almost a size larger than my top half!) I wore it on a very hot day to an outdoor event and the fabric wrinkled a bit when I was sitting on a picnic blanket. Otherwise, it was fun to wear.
The skirt fit true to size. It was initially snug, but after some wear loosened up. The skirt is versatile and can be dressed up or down. I loved it so much, I'm going to purchase it!

This was pretty and easy to wear. I love the slit. I paired it with a white tee and flat sandals. Typically I'd wear a small in a skirt like this, but based on other reviews I ordered the medium and it fit well

links_reviews_title: The bright color was perfect and the slit was sexy and stylish while also being practical!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly with room to tuck a top into it. Slit was great and length was super nice. I bought it because I know I'd be wearing it all the time, need I say more!?

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty skirt for daytime event
links_reviews_text: I am totally obsessed with this skirt! The color is vibrant and beautiful, and it fit perfectly. It's so much fun because while at first it can look conservative, the high slit adds a bit of surprise. I wore with black booties, white tank, and denim jacket for tailgating party.

Flows beautifully and has a great pattern/color. Definitely size up as others have noted. I probably could have been more comfortable in an XL. Didn't hit the floor on my 5'3 frame. Wore with a black tank and jean jacket. Felt so cute!
Tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Very cute and very flattering skirt. The slit, although high, is off the the side and very flatterin
links_reviews_text: The fit was actually a little snug for an XL but just at the very top of the waistband. I zipped it as high as it would and then tucked the waist band in so no one could tell it wasn't fully zipped. For reference, my natural waist is 32.5 inches. Looked fine when rolled, though! Very cute skirt.

Fits as described and a really fun skirt for a weekend. Trying to put more color in my wardrobe and this was a fun way to do that for the weekend. The slit is super fun so would definitely wear more casually than in an office, and super comfortable. It wrinkles like crazy, so I steamed it before wearing it only to see it wrinkled immediately. The pattern nicely covers it tho!
Wore this on a bachelorette party to a winery and it was perfect. Love the slit. Super lightweight.

links_reviews_title: Love it!! Fabric under the ruffle a bit too short
links_reviews_text: I don't normally love off the shoulder shirts, but this one is fantastic. The fabric under the ruffle to cover you bra is a little short though - my bra kept popping out the bottom!!
Great shade of red and the slit gives this skirt a little va va voom.

There is no stretch at all in the material, and the size small was snug at the smallest part of my waist, which is 28". I'm a small to medium, 4/6 in most things, so next time I'll get the medium :) the slit is perfect!
Good waist, material is light and breezy. The slit is a great little surprise. Wore it out a bunch of times, easy to pair with as white tshirt or get a bit more fancy at night

links_reviews_title: Adorable, but VERY small at waist !
links_reviews_text: Yowch
A little long, but to be expected at 5'3", slit was a perfect way to show some more skin
I am big on wearing quality items. This fabric felt so great and sturdy! I wore it out to brunch then to a party! Would rent again. I even considered purchasing it.
Love this top. Have rented multiple times and am thinking of buying. Super cute and fits nicely.

This runs true to size, I wore a large because it was the only size available but next time I'd go with a medium. Wore this to a brewery tour on a sunny day and felt cute and comfy the entire time. Perfect length and I love that the colors aren't too loud.
Very comfortable and stretchy material. I paired it with a high waisted jean skirt so it didn't look too cropped. It was perfect for my vacation but could see myself wearing it every day
Not tall so loved that I could wear high waisted shorts and not show any stomach. Nice material that you could wear in the fall or summer.
This top is made of thick material and is so soft. Very cropped but it was comfortable to wear with high waisted pants.
Cute shirt - I should've sized up
Cute but too cropped for this momma

I liked the fit, which was cropped but not too short. I was able to wear with high waisted pants without my belly showing, maybe a little if I reached my arms up, but I think that's cute! The color give it a cool vintage 70's look. Would rent again.

Great top for a holiday event, date or girls night out. I wear it with jeans but would be super cute with black leather skirt or pants as well. A little loose around the armpits so you have to be smart with your bra.
I wore this to a wedding, I got so many compliments and felt really elegant.
The shirt was very attractive… But big in the chest and under the arms

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color , soft fabric, very feminine. Sadly I could not wear it. It was simply too thin.
links_reviews_text: This blouse is completely thin and shows every single thing. I tried to wear a strapless bra but even it seems to show everything. This is great for those who don't need a bra or love a bra less look. It was too long on me as well and didn't look so great tucked in..see model.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a gift with my back bow.
links_reviews_text: Top fit true to size, although it was pretty snug in the chest area on me (34 DDD.) Styled it with a pair of velvet pants on NYE with leopard botties. I loved the color and the bow in the back added something special.
I love this shirt!

Wore this out for a casual cocktail attire show and dinner with dark wash denim and pumps. It helped dress up the denim and I LOVED the color. If you're a dark brunette this will teapot pop against your hair

Had my eye on this top for a while, glad I tried it! Took me from work to plane to vaca dinner out all in one day looking super fresh, no wrinkling! The only minor "con"...buttons too spaced-out for where I wanted the neckline to hit. Ended up pinning closed between two buttons. Lots of compliments! Paired with RTR Club Monaco pants in a light blue color which were perfect with this top!
Very nice top, would rent again. TTS

links_reviews_title: Cute, classic, comfortable top for the business casual office
links_reviews_text: Super cute and comfortable shirt, little big in the chest and waist but couldn't have sized down because of the shoulders. The tie helped to cinch in places where slightly big.

I ordered this top to wear for work or to dinner one night. I ended up wearing it to the office (we can wear business casual but with jeans) and it was very cute! It ran a little oversized but that was fine by me and the built in belt helped give it some shape. I don't normally wear orange but I loved this top!

links_reviews_title: Versatile! Good for work or with jeans.
links_reviews_text: Fit is a little baggy - if you're not large-chested, size down. But it does have a drawstring at the waist to cinch the waist in. I needed a safety pin between the top two buttons to keep them from spreading open. Got this with my RTR Update monthly shipment and will keep it all month, wear to work and with jeans or leggings out for the night.
Love the cut! Very flattering. The fabric was cheap feeling and the pattern was more dowdy than fun.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday shirt with shape and color
links_reviews_text: Fun rental for a daytime gathering with friends. The waist ties to give shape. Great color. I got many compliments
I'm self-conscious about things that tie around my waist but I loved this! The sleeves are different and comfortable. I didn't need a cami. I'd rent again.

The shirt has nice vibrant colors, love the versatility of the style: not too short, nice belt detail and ruffle sleeves. But it runs very large. Roomy by three-four inches all over. The bust darts are 2 inches wider than my bust line on each side. It still worked really cinching the belt, but size down!
A little baggy but the tie waist gives it a flattering fit. Perfect for work event
Size down.
A great top for dressing up a pair of light jeans.
I loved this top for everyday wear. I received so many complements but it did run slightly large. I'm usually a medium or large and could've used a small.
I think you can size down for this shirt. It is lightweight and comfortable with nice bright colors.

links_reviews_title: Loves the colors, the fit was easy and roomy.

links_reviews_text: I loved this top. Wore it to a conference in Chicago in summer, Material does not wrinkle so this traveled well and was a really nice red poppy color. Paired well with navy pants and stood out in a sea or boring business casual. Highly recommend this very comfortable and eye catching top.
This is the easiest, cheerful piece to wear. I loved the coverage at work. As a teacher, it was easy to move in. I found this really fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Bright, light yet a little large
links_reviews_text: The color of this shirt is amazing! The fit...not so much. It was long and super loose. I had to use a blazer and do some tucking.
Cute top, versatile, loose fit and bright colors. A little on larger size, should have ordered down.

The patter on this top is fun and beautiful. The cinched waist makes a flowy, comfortable shirt flattering. I'm a size 12/ 36DD and I may have been able to get away with the L but the XL worked well. Will probably buy if it goes on sale.
This top was great! Perfect with white jeans
Such a gorgeous color and fit. Tie waist tops are always amazing. I may need to purchase it

The fabric is light and breaths well, this was a comfortable shirt and the waist tie helps define your figure. I wore this 6 months pregnant and will rent again as I get bigger. I liked the fluttery sleeves. I am normally a medium but sized up for the bump, you get good coverage, the buttons did not gap. This was flowy and easy to wear with jeans, navy trousers or shorts on the weekend. I wore it twice before returning.

links_reviews_title: Sturdy Fabric, Grommets Trim = Sexy Detail
links_reviews_text: The sleeve length was such a nice surprise! I have long arms and I was able to not have to push the sleeves up to compensate for them falling short. I loved the stuffy fabric. My favorite detail was the grommets. I felt conservative and no one looked too closely at the grommet detail to consider it too sexy, but I sure felt the sass!

Great dress with a strong heavy knit that is perfect for colder weather. I went back and forth trying to decide if it was black or blue, but final consensus was a very dark blue. Beautiful dress with nice detail. I am likely to rent again!
Perfect length for work for tall girls!! Super comfy!

links_reviews_title: Great work dress for a cold day.
links_reviews_text: Very thick sweater dress. Not a typical fitted sweater dress. Loose and easy to wear. Great for work I am tall and it was a few inches above the knee.
Love the fit and material!
Received a lot of compliments. Fit well. Liked the gold. Worked well with big gold earrings. Warm.
This piece was actually better than what I expected! Very comfortable and flattering. A great rental piece!
Loved it! Was able to move around easily and look dressed up doing it. Perfect for a crisp Spring morning.

The fabric is a very nice quality. And the detailing near hem is nice. I deducted a couple stars because it doesn't have much shape. I felt kind of blah in it. If you would prefer the fit to be form flattering I'd suggest sizing down.
the weight was perfect. Very good quality

This dress is a really nice thick fabric with good stretch. It's very comfortable. I am usually between a size 8 and 10, and the medium was a bit loose in the mid section for me but arms fit pretty snug, so I would recommend sizing down if you're between sizes. The fit in this was a bit boxy, making it a little more casual (which works well at my work place). The dress is a dark navy, not black as it may appear in pics. Overall a great every day dress!

Loved this dress and wore a couple of times - once for work and another for a family party. Nice, warm material. One note: if you are traveling on an airplane, prepare yourself for a search because of the grommets on the bottom if you are going to be in a rush! Could not figure out what set off the TSA, but that was it! Would still rent again!
Perfect sweater dress. Grommets at bottom add flair, yet still great for a traditional office. Warm and cozy too!

I rented this dress for a night out in NY during the winter. This dress was so comfy and warm. I'm and 8 and the M fit great. It is a very heavy sweater dress. I liked it so much when I got it that i wore it to church and to a family dinner days before our city date. Very versatile. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Sweater dress with a bit of bling
links_reviews_text: Comfortable enough but the dress is very straight so it was not fitted at my waist and was a bit tight on my hips/rear, so not the most flattering on me. Also: this dress is dark navy, not black.
Simple, comfortable and a classy look. Runs a bit large the sleeves were long so I had role them up. However very comfy and warm - good for a winter day.
Cute dress, easy to wear, but nothing special. Material is thick and great quality. Travelled well even internationally and out of the suitcase in great shape.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable for work, and for cocktails.
links_reviews_text: This dress is all about the legs. The waist is not fitted and there is room to move (and slouch if you have to spend the day at a desk and want to just not think about what you're wearing). For a long-waisted (or busty) 5ft 8in person, you want to make sure you've got coverage under the dress on the bottom half. The interesting detail about the dress is the bottom panel, which is a separate panel held onto the dress with sturdy brushed-finish gold grommets and lacing. As you move around, there's a little intriguing peekaboo. So when I lift my arms, the grommets slide up several inches and potential show booty/crotch along that line of grommets. Tights or leggings are a good call, or maybe some black granny panties or boyshorts if you want bare legs. It's conservatively cut except for that racy grommet detailing.

links_reviews_title: Quality is high-end, but dress runs very large
links_reviews_text: This is a an awesome sweater dress. I just wish I had gone with my true size. The XL is big... like size 16 big. (For reference - I'm a 12.) I belted it to make up for that and it worked for the day. The material is a gorgeous weight that would hug curves perfectly. I don't think this would pill up either. It seems very high-end. So advice - Stick to true size or even size down one.

I originally ordered this in a Small (usually a 4), but it was huge so I got an XS. The XS still seemed a bit big up too, but it clung in the hips. My boss (another RTR unlimited subscriber) complimented me on the dress. She particularly liked the detailing on the skirt. And in case you missed the other reviews....this dress is navy, not black.

I thought this dress was going to be black but it's navy. Either way, loved it and wish I came in all colors. Super comfortable, soft, thick sweater dress material. Not super firm fitting and true to size. Rent it for work!
The heavy knit makes this perfect for chilly days. Modest and work- appropriate, but still fashionable with the trim near the bottom. I enjoyed wearing it once.
I loved how I felt in this dress. I wore it to work twice because I loved it so much. Its navy, not black, which makes it just a little more special. The detail at the bottom is lovely.

At first thought this would be too boxy, but I ended up liking it a lot. Nice thick material and wearable even in NYC winter weather. It looks black in the picture online but was more of a navy color in person.

links_reviews_title: A bit big for a petite frame
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'0 and was just a bit big for me so it didn't look as good

links_reviews_title: this was a great piece for work ! I would rent it again .
links_reviews_text: it was a little baggy.
Nothing too fancy but nice for cold weather

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a party or work
links_reviews_text: Easy to dress up or down. Flattering. Comfortable.

I rented this for work in the Houston winter. Fabric is thick and hung well. Overall the dress shape is boxy - big around the waist and the detail sat right at my bum and is narrower just under my bum. Made my bum look massive - not a good look for me! It was a touch too short for me for work. Would have been difficult to sit down in it.

I've rented this twice and loved it both times. The wool is not remotely scratchy, and so warm in my chilly office. Looks great with boots and gold accessories. Has that ease of looking good without a lot of fuss. Skims the mummy tummy but still hangs nicely on my straight & narrow frame. Great work dress!

links_reviews_title: Not super flattering on an athletic build
links_reviews_text: I actually didn't wear this out. It was slightly big on me which caused it to look like I was basically wearing a black sheet on my athletic build.
Comfortable, flattering and pretty!
Nothing too special but classy and elegant. Perfect for fall!
I wore this dress all day. It was very comfortable and fit perfectly. Wore with tights and booties. Fabric is a little heavy and I can't imagine wearing on a warm day.
It wasn't really special but it was good to wear to work when I didn't have anything else lined up

links_reviews_title: Really fit well! True to size
links_reviews_text: Many compliments in work! Great material and was not clingy!

links_reviews_title: a lot of compliments, great fit
links_reviews_text: great work dress
Quality fabric and really well made. So flattering. The XS fit really well even though I'm sometimes between sizes and need to go up. Loved this look!

links_reviews_title: it is good for fall or winter but not for summer!!
links_reviews_text: it is good for fall or winter but not for summer!!

Chunkier than I anticipated so I didn't pair it with the whimsical spring dress I rented. Instead I wore it with a fitted and editorial statement jacket from RTR. Bingo - instant intrigue! Hangs above fullness of bust-line for easy work length.

links_reviews_title: Fun addition to my work wardrobe
links_reviews_text: I love the detailing on this necklace. The way the clasp is made makes it possible to adjust the length. I wore it on the shorter side and on the longer side, depending on my neckline that day.

Nice chunky knit, great oversized fit. It really is pretty big and heavy - the sleeves are superlong (which I like), and the dolman sleeves actually can be a bit of a tight fit in a fitted coat. The v-neck is a nice different element, but it can shift around a little. Green is not my favorite color but I did like the black trim line around the neck, which felt very fresh.
Very 90s vibe. Great with high waisted jeans. Definitely more of a weekend piece than a workweek piece. Nice olive green with a black collar!

I rented this to wear around Christmas so it was prefect for the cold weather. Overall the fit was fantastic but I didn't hate it. The sleeves were a bit bigger on me and the bottom was a little rounded with an overall boxy fit, but again, I didn't mind it. A great everyday piece but not sure I'll rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Should've just borrowed my boyfriend's sweater
links_reviews_text: Not sure what I was thinking getting a size medium, maybe this would be cuter on me if I tried a size extra small. I was going for an oversized look, but this sweater basically swallowed me whole. Would look fine around the house, but it basically looked like a I had just borrowed my boyfriend's sweater and wore it to brunch. I guess it didn't help that I paired it with yoga pants after just giving up entirely on my outfit after putting the sweater on. LOL

I really liked wearing this sweater; felt luxurious yet effortless. The relaxed fit was comfy and the material kept me warm without being itchy. I would recommend this sweater for casual work days turned into long happy hours.
Rich forest green color, soft and warm material. Wore it with a black tank underneath.
I loved how soft wnd cozy this sweater was. It had the tags on when I rented it in december. Looked great eith skinny jeans and over the knee boots.

The sweater runs large. I usually wear a small so I ordered the XS and it was still a little big but okay. It is a very warm sweater. I wore it on a very cold day and didn't have to wear a coat. The sweater is not form fitting but very stylish and high quality. The color green does not compliment my olive colored skin type. But, I think if your skin color is lighter or darker it would be very complimentary.
I basically lived in this sweater for a week. Wore it to work, to hang out at home, and on the weekend. Soft, comfy, and warm.

It's comfortable, cozy, and warm! Love this staple piece for every day during the cold weather. The silhouette is baggy but it does not widen you, which is something I look for in baggy sweaters. I love the olive green with jeans or event black pants. This style can be worn every day, the weekend, work, and anything really!
There's not too much to this sweater - it's a chunky knit, high quality material (no pilling), a comfy cozy everyday piece. I loved the fit and the color. Great for every day.
Roomy, comfortable fit
Thick, warm, really comfortable. I'd rent it again for sure!
Fit was a little big & slouchy, but I liked the style. Size down if you're in between two sizes!

Warm, versatile, comfortable, nice color. That said there is nothing particular special about this either. Great to keep on hand for a week. I wore it with leggings while traveling for the holidays and then around the house, running errands, etc. As warm as a hoodie but way cuter!
nice sweater, high quality

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable. Very heavyweight! This sweater was perfect for Seattle weather.
links_reviews_text: The fit was slightly larger and baggy. It was more of a boyfriend sweater.
Comfortable everyday warm sweater.
Loose casual fit
Great quality. Not cropped but somewhat short.
The fit same too large even for an oversized. I am short so the sleeves were way too long too and didn't look good cuffed.
Get a size down. Even though it was just an everyday shirt, I got compliments!
This is a weekend sweater - it is not particularly stylish but it is very warm.

links_reviews_title: Good staple for fall and winter months.
links_reviews_text: Fit was generous rather than fitted, heavier than expected, but in a good way. I wore it quite a bit during the rental period. I’d rent again.
Super comfy and cute! Not itchy at all. Baggy fit but that's how it's supposed to be. I have worn this multiple times and love it!
Cozy and warm. Not stretchy or itchy.
Fit well. Cute.
This sweater was quite heavy and shapeless. The cut also made it hard to wear with anything else. It didn't look oversized but just too big.
It was super cute but i didn't realize how heavy it was online. it's a very very heavy, dense material. but it was very cute!

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater but heavy and runs big
links_reviews_text: If you are in between sizes I would size down. It's a chunky knit and a little heavy so it made the oversized fit too big. Will rent again at some point in xs
Not as soft as I thought it was going to be. Fits slightly oversized.
This is a good looking knock around sweater. If you're going to wear a big baggy "throw over jeans" sweater, this is a solid pick. I could probably go smaller next time.

Even though I'm fairly short, I have a longer torso and long arms — this sweater was awful. The arms were incredibly too long but the fabric was so thick that you couldn't do anything about it. Sent it back immediately. My husband couldn't stop laughing when I asked his opinion!
I enjoy!
Very heavy fabric, but great quality.
I like the cut and weight of this sweater a lot, but I was kind of swimming in the large. I would consider renting again in a smaller size. Got several compliments even with the oversized look.
This sweater is perfect for a cold day. You can tell it's great quality.
Wore it for a casual fall family day and it was just great. Loved the color, texture and weight of it
It's a very boxy sweater! I could have worn but in order for it to look good I would have had to ensure the sleeves were pushed up. It's a very warm sweater, so perfect for a cold day.
The thick ribbed sweater was great and the subtle detail of black trim around the v-neck was a pleasant surprise.
It's like a shirt jacket and coat in 1! I wore it to Chicago in February and with a light coat it kept me warm. I also got compliments every time (3+) I wore it. So simply but really is a good piece!
Loved the pattern of this jacket! I wore to to the airport. It was comfy and warm! Runs oversized but it's cute if you style it that way!
Perfect for a cold weather trip where you wanna be cozy and still look cute. So easy to wear and photographs great

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for my body type
links_reviews_text: This is intentionally over sized shirt / jacket but it seemed bulkier than anticipated. It was very comfortable and on trend but it didn't flatter my body type, it just made me look boxy and dumpy when I tried to style it with my jeans. I ended up wearing to lounge around the house on a cold day but don't plan on wearing it outside. Cute & well made but not for me!

rented this for a chilly weekend in chicago. the pattern is so fun and ~cool~. wasn't the warmest thing i've put on my body but it was fine for 40/50°. loved the boxy fit. i'm usually a m/l, 6/8 and this fit great!

This jacket is everything!! I loved how warm it was during the Chicago winter. I wore it with jeans and a black top and again a few nights later with a dress!! It's a tad itchy but definitely manageable. Would totally rent again
Fit perfectly. I rented for a camping trip. It worked really well to keep me warm on the cold days. :)

Huge, Pendleton style jacket. Love the pattern. I do agree with some reviews that the wool is scratchy. I wore a long sleeved undershirt to avoid. Also, not a fan of the Velcro closure at the sleeves ( typically buttons). Overall, great for house coat or cool weather and being outside.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic item. I wore it all over Maui on my vacation, and also to the office.
links_reviews_text: Warm, cute and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: ONE OF MY FAVORITE JACKETS OF ALL TIME!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket/shirt so so much!!! I would have purchased it if it weren't so expensive. I wore this shirt unbuttoned as a jacket almost everyday with hoodies, tees, sweaters, etc underneath. The material may be slightly itchy for people but I had no issues (and I mainly wore long sleeves under it). The small fit me how I wanted-- an oversized fit, with enough room for bulky sweaters and hoodies. The material is thick and warm-- this was may go to jacket all month, perfect for fall weather! I was a little surprised by the pockets and the cuffs of the sleeves though because they are velcro. At first, this seemed odd to me but the pockets stayed closed and the velcro was unnoticeable and I did like changing the cuff size depending on if I was wearing bulky sweaters. Only thing I would change would be to add pockets for my hands.

links_reviews_title: Love it, wore it so much!
links_reviews_text: Super cute yet casual for a cold fall day! Got lots of compliments!
I also found this itchy and a funny length. I think it was just wrong for my body type
Fabric is really stiff and itchy - would have to wear long sleeves under it to make it even wearable at all - not as cute as I was hoping!

This one's a keeper. Absolutely perfect fit. Thick, stretchy, comfortable material. I received so many compliments. They only downside is the zipper is a little tough because the fabric is so thick and gathered, but I'll get over it.
Flattering cut and fabric. The con - tricky side zipper. Hard to get the dress on/off.
Nice stretchy material, but cut of dress is very form fitting. Overall comfortable to wear dress in a classic navy color.

links_reviews_title: The event I got this for was cancelled so I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: pretty dress

links_reviews_title: Stunning! Loved this so much I almost purchased.

links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress but really small. I ordered a small and typically wear a small or size 4 and to wear this I'd have to have ordered a medium

links_reviews_title: Cute but could also be maternity

links_reviews_text: I can see how well this dress would fit if I was either much smaller or the dress was much larger. It's a great style but unfortunately runs tight - for me. I'm normally a size 12 but the XL in this dress did not fit well. I'll try again when I lose weight.

links_reviews_title: a great style that received many compliments
links_reviews_text: very fitted, love the sleeves

The sweater was soft and a nice weight, but I thought it runs a little short, but sleeves are long. My hair covered up the TB buttons on the shoulders, so it just looks like a regular grey sweater when wearing it. It was ok, but nothing special.
Cute sweater but clingy. The key here is shapewear and choosing a smooth front silhouette bottom. I will love it even more when I lose my last 20 lbs.

links_reviews_title: Nice upgrade on an everyday sweater
links_reviews_text: The material is cozy and lovely! Recommend sizing up - I rented the XL though I typically wear a L in tops and it fit great. The button details and trimmed bell sleeves are small upgrades over an everyday sweater so it was a nice change of pace. Paired it with a pair of fuschia Banana Republic pants and black booties and wore to work and hanging out with friends.
I wear a lot of Tory, especially her sweaters. This one was just too short in my opinion. I prefer them to be a bit longer especially when the sleeves are longer then it's asymmetrical . I'm 5'8".
This is a pretty basic sweater with bell sleeves. The buttons on shoulder are cute and it was comfortable. I found the xl a little big on me, 36d bust size 12. I wish it had a little more shape
This sweater is soft and not at all itchy. Feels very quality. Fabric is thin but warm. Not super special except for the Tory buttons.

links_reviews_title: High end, well fitting top for everyday wear!
links_reviews_text: I'll be honest- I rented this to wear around a certain group of people because they are ALL about labels and this is obvs Tory Burch because of the shoulder. But wearing it was great! It fits beautifully. True to size. The material is so buttery soft! It's great for every day wear, but because the sleeves are flared at the end I felt like it gave it a little dressier look and feel!
The bell sleeves are very feminine with the piping added. Great fit very comfortable.
Very cute. Sleeves are extremely long even on my long arms
Beautiful top and love the bell sleeves. Tight fitting.
Nice and good quality but too short I couldn't wear it. It's also boxy; if you are larger busted it rides up .
Loved the look of the sleeves. Took and simple look and elevated it.

This sweater is very comfortable. I was a great length and the bell sleeves had the perfect amount of "bell" to them. I really liked this fit. I would buy this, however, it was too expensive :) But I will certainly rent this again.
nice fit
Cute sweater, runs small. And there was a hole in the back. I wore it not knowing and I'm glad I had a grey camisole under it but I was so bummed!!
loved this sweater! the material is nice and thick, hides tummy rolls. The buttons on the side shoulder are a nice touch and classy sweater/ fit! I would recommend this to all, I want to buy it!
Sleeves too long, size down

links_reviews_title: So many compliments - I think new RTR members came out of this one!
links_reviews_text: I wore this sweater to work twice, and both days I ended up in deep discussions about how amazing a deal RTR is - that's how many compliments this sweater got! The bell sleeve are gorgeous and the material is very soft and comfortable for all-day wear. The material is the perfect thickness/lack thereof for office temps, which for me can vary from chilly to downright freezing since I go out to different clients' offices pretty frequently. I loved the subtle Tory Burch detail on the shoulder, that seemed to be what pushed it over the top for my coworkers, who immediately fell in love with the idea of getting such stylish, designer clothes without needing a second house to fit all their clothing!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved it! The cut, material, fit.
links_reviews_text: Fit, material, color, flattering !
I found it a little small/tight. I also prefer sweaters that go below belt-level when I'm not tucking it in. This one didn't. But it was still super cute!

links_reviews_title: Nice material and fit. Great for business casual office.
links_reviews_text: This sweater fit TTS and is made of nice, quality material. It's pretty form fitting, so if you prefer a looser fit, size up. For reference, I'm 5'6" 100lbs and I wore XS. The sleeves were a tad long, but it didn't bother me at all. Overall, a great, versatile sweater that's nice enough to wear to the office on a casual day or with jeans on the weekend.
Love the flared arms
Looked fantastic with some jeans and Tory boots!
Comfortable material, great color and flattering. Just had to roll back the sleeves at times when eating so it wouldn't go in the food.
Sweater was slim fit. Liked the details on the sleeve tips. Wore it once.
This fit very nicely, not too tight, good length
True to size, thinner sweater material...not too long on the torso.

Sweaters can so often be bulky and this just wasn't the case with this one. It was a little shorter than I normally wear, but I loved mixing it up. The bell sleeve was also great. Ended up wearing it on a date night with my husband and loved it.
I am 5"10 so the length of the sweater was a bit short.
It pairs beautifully with navy slacks and for a more casual look blush denim jeans. Loved it and received many compliments.
This is soft, not itchy, and the wrists flare out attractively. The buttons on the shoulder add a special touch. However, it's very plain; but unique enough for work.
Fit was good and it was fun to wear. Amazing quality
Pairs well with jeans or slacks. Felt a bit short waisted/small to me.

I usually wear small or medium size tops but all depends on the clothing brand. I s my first time wearing this designer brand and decided to order a M size. I have an average size torso and the length of this sweater was perfect, but it turn out to be a bit too wide on the shoulder and arm pit area.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable work sweater with sleeve flair
links_reviews_text: I am a size 12 in tops and the large was perfect. I layered with an oatmeal colored tank top as it hit about an inch below my waistband and I prefer a bit more length. Did not cling to tummy rolls, and the bell sleeves were appropriately understated. Would rent again in a heartbeat and may buy someday in a smaller size when I have lost some pudge.
Perfect fit..fun in the sun as well as to cooler temps. Great for airplane travel too!
The fit was a bit big and the sleeves did get in the way a bit but this sweater is adorable and warm. Great for the office!
Fits true to size, is comfortable, and easy to match

links_reviews_title: Sleeves and buttons on the shoulder were my favorite
links_reviews_text: Fit amazing!
You cant go wrong with this classic Tory sweater. It holds it shape, was just the right weight to wear with a jacket or coat on colder days. Button accent made jewelry choices less.

links_reviews_title: Just what they appeared to be. A staple for any autumn wardrobe
