links_reviews_text: Was just slightlyyyy too small on the waist so I couldn't quite relax in them after eating dinner. But they fit my larger bum and sticky legs well and were very comfy.

Maybe my hips are just a little to large for the fit of these pants but I didn't look ridiculous. These pants work for any affair but I wore them to work. No crazy compliments but I felt like a rockstar. They don't go skinny all the way down so just an FYI if you're short & have to fold them under. The ends kinda go straight rather than skinny. Still looked dope.
Even though they are a bit short on my5'8 frame I found these pants versatile and fun to wear. My third time renting them
Fit was a little small. Tighter than I expected. But flattering

They fit perfectly! Being a petite person I am so happy when something actually fits perfectly! These hugged my body and were so flattering. Wore to work and felt super cool all day. :) would definitely rent again!
Felt very polished in these pants. Good for both work and social. Pants are tight, but they stretch and are actually pretty comfortable. If they were loose they wouldn't be as cute!

This fabric is very thin so wears comfortably but doesn't feel like luxury. Fit great - feels like a true 6 but elastic waist (zip entry) made it comfortable. Great to mix it up at work but nothing too special.
It fit perfectly. The zipper would act difficult at times but ultimately I loved these pants. It was true to size.

WOW the other reviews saying these run small were not kidding! I usually wear a 2 or a 4, I rented the 6 after reading the reviews and these were still TIGHT. Like, wore them for a couple hours and then had to take them off because the zipper was cutting in to my side tight. These pants are super cute, though, and I might try renting them again in the 8. DEFINITELY SIZE UP A LOT!

links_reviews_title: Beagling (a long walk in the woods with about 16 beagles!)
links_reviews_text: They fit nicely but got a bit baggy over time.

These slim-fitting pants looked fantastic. They are good for a petite frame. They held their shape. The only complaint I have is that the waist was snug so not as comfortable as some pants, but worth it. I will definitely rent again!
Really tight fit

I'm usually a 0 or 24/25 in jeans, and a 4 fit me perfectly. They were tight but not too tight at this size and were really flattering. I'm so glad they were out of my typical size because I can't imagine trying to squeeze into my normal size!

What other reviews saying is true...these pants are tiny!! I usually wear a 0, but sized up and got the 2. Big mistake! I couldn't even pull them up over my legs. Next time, I'd get a 4 or 6 I guess. Crazy sizing! Also the pants are really thin, but the pattern/colors were very cute.

links_reviews_title: Really liked these pants! Nice pattern and fit
links_reviews_text: This Simone run small. I usually wear an 8 but got the 10 and it fit. Nice pant, not thick. Slim fit.

I loved this pattern and style and colors. A couple of things: 1. I am a 2 and sized up to a 4 and the waist was still tight. I was fine at the office as long as the zipper was pulled down 2 inches! LOL 2. There is maroon and plum in the pattern but it's hard to pair a top with either color. I paired with a with a navy short-sleeved sweater and I happened to have just the right shade of plum/purple heel. 3. They're shortish for a tall girl. It's fine because it's a cropped style but extra cropped for me.

links_reviews_title: Comically small - order two to three sizes up.
links_reviews_text: They're cute but I couldn't imagine these fitting anyone.

I love the design and print of these pants. While they technically fit (I could zip them up thanks to a little stretch in the waistband), they look almost obscenely tight and I was hoping to wear them to work. So, going to try the size 0 and see how that goes..

links_reviews_title: The idea was there but these are very tight through the thighs.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5'' with a petite build and muscular thighs. These will run very tight through the thighs unless your legs are super slim.
I am true 10 in most pants I rent- these looked like they were for children when i held them up. I think i would atleast need to go up 2 sizes to get them up. Be warned!!!

links_reviews_title: Runs small, couldn't comfortably zip them up
links_reviews_text: I'd order a size or 2 up

this definitely runs small. Highly suggest sizing up twp sizes. I'm normally an 8 and sized up to a 10 and it was still too small. Wouldn't zip up around my hips. otherwise super cute, has stretch and a stretch waist band for comfort. Will re-order again in the next size up for sure!

links_reviews_title: Need to go up a size.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2" and 106 lbs and the 00 was too tight. Also the hook and I closure was busted so they would not of stayed zipped. They were cute though and I may have to try the zero another time. Great length for petites.

links_reviews_title: Size 6 wouldn't have fit me at age 6
links_reviews_text: As soon as I opened the delivery and spotted the minuscule pair of pants, I knew that I was not going to be wearing them unless I lost 100 lbs and maybe removed my femurs in both legs. They were closer to a 0-2 than a size 6.

links_reviews_title: The leg fabric is non stretch and cut super slim so they didnt fit.
links_reviews_text: Super slim leg Non stretch leg couldnt make it up my legs which was a shame bc they cute as hell
Runs VERY small. Size up one or two sizes.

links_reviews_title: Great statements pants without being over the top
links_reviews_text: I love these pants - they're great for making a statement / not being boring while still keeping it casual. Work for a work trip. They just ran small. I'm usually good with a 4 but these were soooo tight I had to keep them a bit unzipped. Thankfully had a flowy blouse with it. Size up and you're good!
Did get a chance to wear it.
Rag & Bone sizing is always a gamble, I went with the 4 (I am in between sizes 4 or 6). The 4 fit, but the pants have zero stretch, so the 6 would have been more comfortable.
way to small
The inseam was too short for me--it hit just below the calf and felt awkward. Would have fit otherwise, but the waistband was super tight.
These pants were great! Although they ran a bit small they were very transitional. Could be dressed up or down, but would recommend sizing up if you'd like a looser fit.

Runs small! I was able to squeeze myself in and get the zipper up (with some effort) but the material has NO stretch and I couldn't even sit down. Would be super flattering if I ordered the right size though!
Didn't wear
I'm normally a true size 6, and even the size 10 in these was too small to zip! Order at least 2-3 sizes bigger than you normally do.

links_reviews_title: Great fit Slimming Very elastic/ almost feel like leggings
links_reviews_text: Super cute

links_reviews_title: Favorite item from this shipment. Can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit and length.
I went up a size since that is what was recommended to do but the pants were still too small

links_reviews_title: I love these pants! I'll probably end up buying them
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size and the side zipper is great

links_reviews_title: Can be worn with cute sneakers or with booties
links_reviews_text: These fit really well and are adorable for everyday.

Loved the fit-- was loose but still hugged in all the right places. Got compliments at work for the fun & fabulous colors on the shirt. It is not a slip on/off shirt, since you have to tie in front and button in the back... but also not too complicated, you just have to remember. Can probably wear this to work like I did or out with some white jeans!

I wore this to work on a Friday and then out for dinner. Then I ended up wearing again with leather leggings on the weekend! It was flattering for my body type - with the waist definition and shifting design, it drew less attention to my bust and enhanced my waist. Slightly tight on the bust but still so comfortable and didn't cause any flattening effect.
The top fitted well and wasn't likely to swing open. It's a very nice feeling fabric that was perfect for warm weather.

Large was not available so I went with medium. While it fit ok, I think I'd have liked a large better because of the armholes. It's silk, and the armholes were all the way up into my underarms, so I concerns about deo and sweating issues. I just wore it for a couple hours inside but with the high neck and armholes, it would have been too hot for Florida summer despite the light material. That being said, the wrap is very flattering and gives shape in the right way, and the colors are beautiful and very classy.
The wrap part fits flowy instead of tight and fitted at the waist. The design is so fun. I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Very light weight delicate silk fabric but wow, what a great pattern and fit!
links_reviews_text: I will definitely rent it again, such a fun pattern and love a wrap top because it was flattering.
Easy to wear, luxury feeling fabric that was perfect for summer. Flattering wrap style without having a low neckline requiring a cami underneath. Will definitely rent again!

This is a unique colorful silk top that is a long side tie and looks better with slim fitting bottoms. Wore it to a beer tasting evening casual event with white knee length shorts and it looked better than loose black capris. I had plenty of room in the top and could have gone with a small but wasn't sure with DVF because often she runs on the smaller size.
Got lots of compliments on this. Worked for my tall frame.

The pattern and wrap are so cute but the length was odd and it ran a little big. I don't think it was that flattering on me but the print is bright and pretty! I tucked it in and think it looked better.
This top was so flattering and the colors are great!
Very pretty blouse. Wore it to the office with jeans and a jean jacket and got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: very cute- makes your waist look tiny.
links_reviews_text: very cute- makes your waist look tiny.
This top was suitable for work and comfortable to wear. Runs tts. Only issue was that the fabric was a little bit thinner than I would have liked.
Loved this top! Received so many compliments. It wrinkled a bit throughout the day, but still looked great at the end of a long work day. Fit perfectly.
Thought I wanted to try the color and patterns, but didn’t like myself in the garment.

links_reviews_title: really eye catching and very flattering
links_reviews_text: got lots of complements on the color, the shape, everything.

links_reviews_title: Fun, out of comfort zone pattern
links_reviews_text: Fun pattern, fit true to size

links_reviews_title: Loved the pattern but the fitting wasn't as flattering
links_reviews_text: Loved the pattern, the style, color and the cloth. The wraparound wasn't as flattering on my chest as for the model. The wraparound "flap" would loosen up or move into weird places. There was never a danger of any accidents as the neck is conservative. But I'm not a fan of bunching around the chest area so was a tiny bit disappointed with the top.

Really loved this DVF top. Great at work or more casual with jeans. The colors are gorgeous. Runs a little big but I feel the Large would have been too snug for the drapey wrap look. Would rent again!
wrap idea was cute with the different patterns. wrinkles easy.

This is a lovely, lively, fun top that fits the creative field I work in quite well. I thought it would be a little awkward fitting, but it's perfect and very flattering. A little low in the arm openings, but not so bad that it requires adjustment. Wore it twice and loved it with jeans and black pants.
Fit was great because it was a wrap and I could manage how tight/loose the fit was.

links_reviews_title: The printed portion is NOT embroidered
links_reviews_text: In case, anyone else got fooled by the printed portion of this top, like me, let me tell you that it is not embroidered. Although I wish it was, because that would have made this look 100 times better. It is instead regular silky material with the design printed on it. I still wore it and it looked OK. Got the XS and it was still looser than I would've expected around the waist. The wrap lets you tighten the top only to a certain extent. So it does not wrap around my tiny waist like some other pieces do. Overall, it's a good piece. But I may not rent it again.

This is straightforward and exactly as it appears in the photo. Mine arrived a little rumpled, but I steamed it and it's good as new. It's unique and feels like the usual wonderful quality of DVF clothing.

The fit for me for my bodytype was big. I am in between an a cup to b cup. . The arm holes on top were big so you could see my bra a bit. Material is nice, good colors. You do have the ability to tighten it up if too big with the self adjusting tie that is on top. A medium would have probably have given me a better fit. For reference I typically wear a size m top or 8/10.
I really like the way this fit me and the colors are beautiful. Unfortunately, with me being petite (5'1"), it felt more like a tunic, but looks awkward on me.

links_reviews_title: Long lean line on a non-long lean girl
links_reviews_text: This top was made for me. Loved the asymmetry, the tie waist which both allows custom fit and emphasizes waist, colors great, but what was really perfect was the LENGTH! Most tops on RTR are too short for my long torso (and my problem abdomen area....) but not this one. I felt like a million bucks in this.

links_reviews_title: Cute, colorful top to jazz up the work day.
links_reviews_text: The top ran a little bigger than I expected - it was quite loose.

Great top; paired it with the Theory High Waist leggings (since this does cover your bum) and got a lot of compliments. I knocked off one star as I do wish it had a button or something to keep the under of the wrap more to the right (away from the tie), but otherwise very nice silk top.

Cute, unique top for the summer and a nice alternative to a boring work blouse. It hangs a bit odd but I didn't mind - covers your butt in the event you're looking for that! I did find the fabric wrinkles way too easily so I probably wouldn't rent again. Wore this with black skinny pants as any other colors/beige overpowered the shirt.
I love dvf dresses and this was my first time trying one of her tops. It's perfect for work and I got compliments all day.

Trendy and perfect for a Bastille Day dinner at our local French restaurant. VERY comfortable and the despite some of the DVF wrap dresses looking odd on a curvy gal - this hugged in just the right places and looked great. Will rent again for a work event!
I loved this top! I read some other reviews about it running large but the tie on side allows you to cinch it which gives you the defined waist. I received many compliments!
This wrap shirt has a nice color block and print effect. Great for the business casual environment
hung really well on body
Fit as expected. Could be a work or weekend option. I liked the colors and it hides midriff flaws.
The shirt is cute and fun and fit everywhere but the arm holes showed a bit of my bra. Fun for work but the side bra was troubling - received lots of compliments anyway.
Love the fabric and colors. Runs a little small but because it wraps it is forgiving. Paired with white pa to and wedges for a casual work look.

I intended to wear this for a preppy look but the dress itself was rather thin and a little big on my waist so I couldn't tuck too much fabric in. I thought it was pretty and fun but not amazing quality.

links_reviews_title: Loved this skirt and got lots of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: Skirt was just a smidge big, but not enough to have to get a smaller size. It was comfortable as I wore for around 15 hours. Would definitely rent again.

Loved this skirt! Perfect for the holidays. Wore it for my son's winter concert at school and for Christmas Eve. Added a belt for more waist definition. Looked great with boots and also with cute heels.

I wore this skirt to a family Christmas party. I ordered the smallest size. It was still loose around my 26 inch waist and actually sat below my navel. I used to safety pin to tighten it from the back and tucked a sweater in to make it sit at the smallest part of my waist. It worked like a charm. There is a side zip it's so easy to take on and off. The skirt material is thin which is ideal for a Houston winter when its 60s-70s.

I got this skirt to meet with my mentor and a full day of meetings. I am typically a size 6, but I rented an 8 and it was MASSIVE. The 6 was unavailable and I was impatient! I wanted to wear this high around the waist and honestly I could have probably gotten away with a 4- the 8 was big. I had to use a belt to hold it up! But I got a million compliments!! Would rent again in smaller size!

I am 5'10, 140 pounds, straight and narrow. This skirt was falling off my hips and did not sit high waisted like I would have liked. Size down if you're in between or have narrow hips like me. The skirt itself didn't seem like great quality. Very thin and poorly structured. Even if it were to have fit I am not sure I would have worn it.
I got a size 0 and was swimming in it. The skirt is supposed to be high waisted and it barely hung on my hips. Wouldn't waist the rental on this one

The skirt was a pleasant surprise! Just heavy enough for a cold day in NY, but I think would be light enough for late spring in NY as well. Looked great with a chunky sweater, as well as a fitted black tee + long vest situation. Felt like I could wear this skirt a bunch of different ways. Definitely enjoyed wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Pretty length, material, flow - runs large at the waist.
links_reviews_text: The pattern, silky material, flow of this skirt is great. It runs large through the waist but I paired it with a longer turtleneck and that hid the waist just fine. The length is great for boots for fall/winter.

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear. Way too big.
links_reviews_text: Cute print and cut! But, needed atleast two sizes down from my normal size for it to have worked. Was not able to wear.

Skirts like this + a fitted turtleneck or slouchy sweater tucked in are my go to work uniform. This one has nice weight to the fabric and is warm and soft while maintaining its fluidity. Sadly I couldn't wear it - currently I have a 24" waist & 35" hips and wear 24/25 jeans. This one sat several inches below my belly button, slung low across my hips and just wasn't quite wearable (size 0).

I loved this skirt and used it for my Christmas engagement photos. it was long enough, and has great movement! I wanted to keep it. I ordered a 4R and it was slightly too big, I think a 2R would have fit better.
Great pattern, love the length. Runs large! I usually wear 2-4 and the 2 was too big. Needed the 0. Otherwise LOVE

links_reviews_title: Wanted to like this more than I did
links_reviews_text: This was very "meh." There wasn't much shape to it so it wasn't really flattering or not flattering and the fabric was a nice print but kind of lifeless. It also could have used a waistband--it just seemed unfinished.

links_reviews_title: I rented this to wear to a holiday party for elementary. It runs really big, and it's kind of long.
links_reviews_text: Tbh, I rented this for an elementary school party. It feels too Christmasy. It runs really big, so size down. It's kind of long.

This was a super-comfy, cute casual blouse. I wore it multiple times, either for an everyday outfit or to go out with friends. I would consider buying this to wear again next season. It's a great choice if you're busty. I was worried it would make me look pregnant, but it was very flattering.
Was not super excited about this one but ended up loving it. Got a ton of compliments AND got to wear my keds to work! Fits TTS. For more everyday looks follow @renttherunway_teacher on Instagram!
I wore it at work under another RTR piece AG cord overalls. I will probably wear again on its own! Very cute and comfy. Sleeves are TTS for length but is slightly boxy.
Really liked this cute plaid top for casual weekend wear.
Wasn't terrible -- wasn't great. The overall shape is pretty boxy, which isn't super flattering for those with longer torsos. Didn't hate it but wouldn't rent again.
This shirt was cute and comfy for everyday wear. I felt that it fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: didn't end up wearing - this was too big for me
links_reviews_text: Very nice fabric!
Very cute, very comfy!

I wore this shirt several times before I begrudgingly returned it. It was a sad day. It looked adorable with jeans but also just long enough that it could be worn with leggings. I would have purchased it but it didn't come down enough in price. I will likely rent this again!
Comfortable, soft fabric. Perfect for wearing to work or happy hour.
I wore this to work , to dinner and took it on a trip - dress up or down!
I liked the cut. The material was a little thin, but it had a nice shape, given my bust size the fact that the buttons didn't gape was nice. Will rent again!
So cute! Wore it casual with jeans an loafers. Wore it dressy with olive pants and heels. Lays nicely and good quality material. Just ran a bit big in the chest and waist.
This is a great top for work. Fits true to size or maybe a little large. It's very comfortable and not too heavy like some plaid shirts! The peplum is cute and different.
Runs slightly large- couldn't wear it but really pretty

links_reviews_title: Good top for a casual work day or weekend
links_reviews_text: It is super comfortable and love it with skinny jeans
Loved this simple but flirty black tshirt for a date night out.

I wore this tucked into high waisted jeans and with a pair of snakeskin slides. The outfit was super cute! I didn't realize that there is a knot in the back, so it's kind of cropped. I accidentally put this on backwards and thought I was sent the wrong piece at first. It runs kind of big, so I would size down.

links_reviews_title: Cute top! You can wear a regular bra with it!
links_reviews_text: Cute T-shirt with great back detail. You really can wear a real / regular bra with it. Is fitted.
I didn't realize the back was cross cross and open it's super cute but definitely not appropriate for the office. Wore it out with skinnies and heels it's fun and casual with a little extra

links_reviews_title: A classic black shirt with a twist (pun intended)
links_reviews_text: If you want a classic black Tee that is a little different, this if your shirt. Business in front, (not over the top) party in the back. True to size!

What a great basic tee with a little exposure in the back. I'm always worried about my bra showing with these types of tees but it hit the exact spot it should and I got tons of complements on it as well. Great basic tee!
Ran small and much more open in the back than I was expecting
Liked the back but neck was tight
Form fitted but loved it. Would rent again
Should have bought the larger size
This is just a cotton t shirt, back is very cute. I wore it twice and received compliments. You can wear a normal bra!
Perfect for St. Patty's day! It was comfortable and a beautiful color green! Loved this piece!
Wore it downtown for St. Patrick’s Day block party. Super fun and kept me warm!

It was freezing cold and snowy when I rented this jacket, so I ended up layering it under a faux fur coat. I imagine it would work great as a stand-alone jacket in warmer weather though, and would totally rent it again! It's not flashy but the construction is beautiful and the fabric seems very high quality.

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket! Wish I could buy it!

links_reviews_text: I LOVE this jacket! I live in LA and I feel like it's the perfect bomber for our fall/winter. The olive color is super cute and goes with everything and it's sooo comfortable. I don't want to return it!

links_reviews_title: SO CUTE! Got so many compliments and have worn every day since I got it. Great fit and not heavy
links_reviews_text: Fit is great. Color is flattering!
I loved this jacket. I rented it for a couple weeks. It works perfectly with jeans and a pair of sneaker or booties.

This fit well as I would expect a bomber to fit, but it was very short. Needed to be a couple inches longer for me to really love it. If it had been the fall I probably would have worn it at least once, but the weather really heated up at the end of summer so I didn't wear it.
Great fit and nice weight. Ideal for travelling out west to cooler summer temps.
Enough lining to be warm but a cute, slightly cropped cut.
This is a great bomber that works as a light jacket. Not too warm, perfect for travel, and the olive color is really beautiful.
The jacket was super soft and comfy. It was perfect for the Spring transition and the fit was great for my petite frame.
Great fit , perfect with jeans or easily dressed up. Would definitely rent again.
Loved this jacket! It is more fall weight than spring. Nice military green color. I went with lots of things. Would rent this again in the fall.
Really liked the material, feels expensive. Something you can throw over any outfit to pull it all together. Fit is slightly oversized
Great piece! True to size, easy to wear
This jacket is amazing. I wish I could afford to buy it. Seriously everyone needs a jacket like this in their life.

links_reviews_title: Wore to casual Friday work and for the weekend.
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket, warm and easy to throw on.
These were not the most flattering pants that I've ever rented but they did the trick and they didn't read wrinkle during work so three out of five stars

Strange cut makes the crotch fall a couple inches too low. Maybe they are supposed to be worn like that? My admittedly much fashionable sister liked them on me and said I should wear them. I just couldn't. I would have been fidgeting with them all day, trying to hike them up. And they felt baggy. I couldn't have pulled them off with any confidence. It's too bad because I loved the fabric and the detail at the ankles!

in general, love this brand, and I thought the detail at the bottom of the pant would be fun, but it just looked awkward on me. It was basically a full length pant on me, if it had been cropped maybe different.

Didn't get to wear them--way too big. I tend to wear size 4 or 6 but these were so huge they would have fallen to my ankles even when zipped. Size down! I may re-order at some point because the detail at the cuffs was nice. Good thick material. A winter pant--too heavy for warm weather.
Fit as expected, great with a jacket or sweater.
Rented for vaca and print is gorgeous. I rented up after reading reviews but think the small would have been fine. I made it work and wore it but it was a bit big.

links_reviews_title: Fun tropical print but runs small
links_reviews_text: I first ordered these in a medium (I'm normally a 6-8) and i couldn't zip them. There's no stretch at all so ordered a large instead and they fit great. Perfect for my tropical vacay!
Classy, high waisted shorts that look great with a nice heel.
I love the print but runs small. I'm typically between size 6 & 8 but the Medium still runs tight.
Loved these shorts! Great length and fit. A little big in the waist but not an issue for me. Fabric is light, so great for warm weather. And pockets!!
They fit great except a little big in the waist but I just wore it with a belt and it was fine. I looooved these shorts. They were thin and breathable.
So darn cute. So dang small on the waist!
Very cute shorts that I wore with a black top tucked in. They fit but we're slightly tight around the midsection

links_reviews_title: Not a lot of give on the waistband.
links_reviews_text: I wasn't able to wear these because I needed a size up from my normal size.
They were adorable, but a size too small. Size up for something bright, fun and flattering!

links_reviews_title: Cute if I had a Barbie waist
links_reviews_text: Runs small at waist. Hips fit but couldn't zip. Cute design and white scalloping on bottom. Will try the medium when it's in.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing it out
links_reviews_text: The shorts went up extremely high and were not flattering
I could not even get the waist zipped, it was so incredibly small.
These shorts are adorable- colors pop and cute detailing on the bottom... but they run super small at the waist. I am a pretty true 6 and couldn't even zip up the small. Size up on these cuties
Not sure how these retail for $370. The material is extremely thin and poor quality, and for that reason, I did not wear.
too small

links_reviews_title: A little snug, but we made it through.
links_reviews_text: These were cute and I received lots of compliments. They weren't very comfortable as they were a bit snug all over.

Adorable shorts but I couldn't even get the side zipper up. I normally wear a size 2-4 , mostly size 2 and when I choose the size it picked XS since I'm normally a 2. Would've been better with a small.
Great quality
Just not flattering if you have curves

Super huge but fabulous at the same time! The best part is the quality of the material... it has a little weight to it so it hangs perfectly on you AND it's wrinkle free! I packed in luggage for 12hr travel time and it was perfect to wear right away! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wish I had a better picture
links_reviews_text: This is so fabulous. You feel like a model every time you walk because it just flows behind you. It does run really large--size down! And it's also pretty long. I'm 5'7" and needed a small heel to keep this from dragging on the ground. I will definitely rent this one again.
Loved the print. Very large but I would rent again. I forgot it in Mexico so I had to "buy" it. =(
Perfect kimono

links_reviews_title: Beautiful bold print and great drape!
links_reviews_text: I love how dramatic the length of this is! It's very fun to wear. I got so many compliments and wore several times. The colors are really pretty. It is a little long, so best to wear with casual heels. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Your friends will try and steal it.
links_reviews_text: Wore this on a catamaran during a bachelorette party and found my friends wearing it after I'd gone into the water! Awesome, jealousy-inducing piece. Admittedly, I felt like I was swimming in it and wish I'd gotten a size down, but it didn't really matter!
The pattern was so fun for vacation! Imy 5'7" and the length was perfect but it may be too long for women under 5'5"

This piece is super long ... it was hitting the floor so I knotted it and it was perfect. Got a few chances to wear it knotted at different lengths. Feels great on too. Im looking forwa4d to a poolside lounge once summer comes.

links_reviews_title: Eye catching kimono in a beautiful print!
links_reviews_text: The fabric of this kimono is beautiful! Definitely heavier than I thought from the picture but it was still perfect for the Mexico heat. I loved wearing this around the pool!

Wore this for my last 2 beach trips. Was perfect for a swim coverup. I felt really glamorous as it is floor length. I also tied it up in the front when I needed to be more covered up. Love it so much I bought it.

I had been dying to rent this all summer and it was never available. Reviews said it dragged on the ground and was huge so I was iffy but the small was the perfect length for me and I'm 5'5. I wore it over jean shorts and a white cropped tank to breakfast on vacation and then as a swimsuit coverup. It's a little over the top but I loved it!
Was great for a Hawaii vacation. Pool cover up or going out. I'm 5'4" and the SR was about an inch off the ground. Though I would have ordered the XS if it was available at the time.
Ran a bit large, so followed other reviews and sized down, and it fit perfectly. I'm 5 ft 6 and it didn't hit the floor with flats. Was a fun and comfy top. Wore to work.
Super long comfy and elegant. I'm 5'11". So it's very long. I suggest sizing down this does run large. Perfect for my trip to Florida. It can be dressed up or down
Running around the pool with this felt so extra and I loved it! It's very roomy and comfortable, so there was plenty of room to spare.
Thought it was cuter in the picture. It is super long. I'm 5'7 and it was hitting the ground.

This kimono is everything! It was definitely a bit on the bigger size, and super long. I'm 5'6" and I had to wear heels to keep it from dragging. It dressed up a plain black dress for a dinner double date.
Am so obsessed with this kimono. Wore it several times to work, on the weekends, over jeans and a tee, even over a black dress for an engagement party. Would definitely rent again!
I really loved this piece. It helped dress up my simple outfit. I am 5'9 and had to wear heels though so this wouldn't drag on the ground.
Really liked this but even the Medium on me was too big, would honestly size WAY down
Drags on the ground - I am 5'6

links_reviews_title: Love a good lounging kimono but this didn't do it for me
links_reviews_text: I like to just wear these around the house, but this one didn't even impress me enough to do that. Wish it had a belt and/or pockets. Fabric not as soft as I would have expected. Floor length on me (5'3"), very pretty pattern and colors though.
Wish this fit because the pattern was pretty. But I was swimming in this. Too bad 2/4 of my choices were wasted because I'm too petite.
Def a little long, would have loved a size smaller but overall beautiful. Could be tied if needed. Worn as a cover up or over shorts and tank. Beautiful material

Runs pretty big for a Kimono and it's LONG. I'm 5-4, wore a small, and it came down to my heels. Beautiful print, received tons of complements. Rented it for a 'tropical' themed party, it worked great!

I got a size SMALL (I haven't worn anything size Small since middle school) and was swimming in it. Not just the length, the entire thing was just really big. I couldn't end up wearing this even for a beach cover up.

Unfortunately I didn't get a picture in this but I was OBSESSED with it!!! I will definitely be renting it again. It is huge though (even the small)! Overall loved it and received so many compliments!
liked it

links_reviews_title: Great for a beach vacation but runs VERY big!
links_reviews_text: I am a size 10/12 and ordered a medium and it was still very large, I would definitely recommend a small for anyone who isn't very tall or a plus size. That said I absolutely LOVED this and wore it to the pool, the beach and around the island. I paired it with almost everything and it was great to keep my very fair skin protected while being very lightweight so I was never too warm with it on. I also received a ton of compliment.
Cute as cover up or kimono was disappointed they didn't have the M in stock because the large was a bit too big
Perfect kimono- I wore this on repeat postpartum.
Perfect coverup for beach

links_reviews_title: Really cute but a bit too big
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little too big for what I needed. Did not end up wearing it.

This could be great for all seasons - wore it in December with a cream sweater and jeans and loved it! Definitely a little long for shorter ladies but paired it with some heeled booties and it worked perfectly.
Looked like pajamas. Just no.

I rented this to use as a glam layering piece for vacation and poolside. But when I tried it on, it was SWIMMING on me. I'm between 5'6"-5'7" and this was skimming the ground, and wide enough for two. I sent it right back. There's no way I could've managed this on a breezy beach.
looked like a mumu and I'm 7.5 months pregnant. I'm a size 6 pre pregnancy so I expected the MR would fit well. It swallowed me whole.
I was so excited for this kimono but OMG it's gigantic. I couldn't even make it work and promptly returned it the get a smaller size. Hopefully that will work better.

links_reviews_title: did not fit, was not able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: way too long. I am 5'5 this draped on the floor, you would need to wear a tall heel with this. otherwise very pretty.

Perfection. Just absolute perfection. I rented through Unlimited and kept it in my closet until the change in season demanded I return it. I know others weren't crazy about the length but I just adored it-and I'm 5'3. I had to talk myself out of buying this piece. Favorite rental to date, hands down.

If these weren't so expensive, I'd definitely buy them! Never would have guessed that cargo jeans would ever look good on me but these were amazing. So comfortable and nice material! Roomy throughout but still flattering. Want to rent again!
I'm usually a 29 and I sized down and it was still large but they have two buttons to make them tighter so once I tightened them it fit perfectly :) definitely gonna buy them cuz they are so cozy too
Loved these! They're something different but still cute! Order a size down, I am normally a 27 and a 26 was perfect.

These were great jeans. Stylish and different and the buttons on the side enables me to adjust size as needed for when I tucked in a top. Wore with them front tie hearts blouse. Lots of compliments on the outfit. Wore the jeans with sneakers, heels - looked good styled so many ways!!

links_reviews_title: So good I want to own!
links_reviews_text: Love these jeans. Great fit. Really fun. Got so many compliments.
I loved these so much. They are so effortless yet chic and super comfy!

Favorite pants. Love these but they do run slightly large. I recommend going a size down bc these do get loose through the day. Very easy way to try the cargo trend. Pair with sweater or tee and you're set. They're also long- I'm wearing 3" heels and am 5'7 so keep that in mind!

I rented these out of sheer curiosity. However the minute I put them on I fell in love. The cut is easy through the leg but nips you in perfectly at the waist. You can also adjust how tight the waist feels with buttons on each side, depending on how easy or structured you want to feel. The weight of the denim is substantial (worth the retail) but has a great wash so the drape of the silhouette still feels feminine. Got compliments at work every time I wore them and eventually bought them!
Rented these for work. They're a painter style cute, so straight leg and not a lot of booty room. I felt It was a little narrow in the hips but they worked! Comfy and cute for work or weekend.
Loved these jeans! Super comfy! They run a little big but I think that goes with the cargo look!
Definitely size down. I know they are supposed to be oversized but these could barely stay up even once I tightened the waist. The cut was unflattering and added 10lbs+

links_reviews_title: Mom Jean but make it trendy
links_reviews_text: I took these out of the bag and was ready to send them back but boy was I wrong. I out then on and they were tight but there are adjustable buttons on the waist. I let those out and we were in business. High waisted and casual I paired them with flower Betsy Johnson booties, a black t shirt and a purple Samantha Sipos leather moto jacket (also rtr) And it was perfect
These are amazing. They are loose fitting, but there are buttons to tighten at the hip.
runs slightly large since they are bagging. i usually wear a 26 and the 25 were perfect
Casual, cool and stylish. These jeans are awesome. I wore multiple times and might buy. I would recommend sizing down but there are buttons on the waist to cinch. Overall awesome, weekend style!
Amazing quality, great for everyday, LOVEEEE!
loved these jeans. i normally wear a 28 but the 27 were a comfy loose and gave the jeans a casual vibe! definitely will rent again

links_reviews_title: Perfect jeans for a casual daytime look or dress them up for a night out!
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit. Not so loose that they looked sloppy, but loose enough to be really stylish and comfy. I could've sized up and they would've still worked. I typically wear a 6 for a slim fit, but these are generously cut. I'm keeping these to wear all month.
Perfect fit; soft, heavy denim; made in USA; well sewn.
Can be dressed down or up - wore it on the weekend and to work!
great look to dress up or down
Loved the earrings.. it can match almost anything. Great for spring!!
So fun! Such a statement. Perfect for tropical vacation. Comfy earring
These earrings are so fun! Nice and large to make a statement but nothing too crazy. I wore these for a date in Miami. They're SUPER lightweight so very comfy.
Fun pop of fun. These are light but do scratch your shoulders a bit if you're prone to cock your head like me.
So fun!!
Great statement piece

links_reviews_title: So pretty, will rent again in spring
links_reviews_text: I love these, but I couldn't make them work with my winter wardrobe. Will rent in the spring for sure!

These bird earrings are really fun and cute. They are a bit duller in color than in the picture. They are fairly rigid and on the large side, so they kept hitting my collar, which was distracting. In the summer when you would wear something without a collar or jacket that wouldn't be an issue.
I received so many compliments! They are lightweight. I seriously considered buying these I love them so much.

links_reviews_title: Great extra layer but not waterproof.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my trip to Iceland. I thought it was waterproof--it is NOT waterproof! But it did add a nice extra layer on top of a down jacket. It fits true to size and is very cute.

Cute lightweight rain jacket. I wore in Hawaii during afternoon rains and didn't overheat me. Like another review said it is not lined at all like it says in description but that didn't bother me. Only major gripe was the ribbon tie at the base of the jacket felt stupid when it was unzipped.
The hood is huge. I made a couple of store security alarms go off when I would walk in and out. Not cool. Other than that, I loved this jacket for our spring showers.

links_reviews_title: Wore this on a trip to California - was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Was a little tight around the waist area, but otherwise great
I returned this without wearing it because I don't like the material, and the nylon ties hang down stiffly.
This was perfect for a week at the lake. It's light weight but still offers protection/warmth. The light colors went well over everything. The hood is deep and stays on your head. I would rent again.
I rented this for a trip to Montana and it was great. Nice colors, lightweight fabric but also held up in the rain and dried out quickly.
Nice colors but why so spendy- nothing special about it.
Comfy - fit kinda on the loose side but how a windbreaker should be. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket - rented twice! Great for everyday wear, spring weather
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket so much I rented it twice! Was perfect for spring weather with leggings or jeans and sneakers. Only returned because tge weather warmed up.

links_reviews_title: Comfort and style wrapped up in one!
links_reviews_text: This jacket is adorable! I wore this on casual Friday at work with some jeans and a Tee. I unbuttoned and cuffed the sleeves and they stayed all day. It was a rainy spring day so having the hood was a great bonus! I also loved the ribbon tassels at the bottom to cinch in the waist as well as the top for the hood detail. I NEVER wear pink, but the combo with grey made me want to wear this every day!
Great quality and a perfect Spring jacket. Complimentary fit. Maybe little shirt on my longer torso, but I liked the way it looked.
Great colors, comfortable fit, and high quality material - super cute!
This was very unflattering, like a blob. Way too short in the waist with bad laying elastic
Sleeves were a tiny bit short but I have a long. Wingspan
I received many compliments wearing the jacket. Wish I could keep it.

links_reviews_title: Didn't really care for this item
links_reviews_text: I thought it was lined and it wasn't. It was fine but just didn't care for it

links_reviews_title: The dress went from one event to another it's muti-purpose!
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful, the material is thin so the zipper pooches in the back a bit from the weight of the zipper...so if you have a small torso like me at certain angles it can pooch and look like a hump...but as long as you are conscious of it the dress can go from day to night easily! And is a show stopper!

I didn't expect to like the dress as much as I did. The neckline is deep but didn't show inappropriately. There's a clasp in just the right place. It fit like a dream and looked sharp with hot pink heels. Wore it three or four times.

Sophisticated and svelte for work. Colors really pop and high quality material which is think but not heavy. Very figure flattering for hourglass with an appropriate slit. I am typically between a 6 and 8 and this 6 was a little roomy. Note there is a clasp at the bust which worked fine for me but might be a little showing for aiming who is busty. Very happy with this rental.

Nice neckline, a bit on the low side, but thought it balanced out the wide, fluttery sleeves. Gives a nice shape and the length was easy. The slit was a nice surprise - felt comfortable with it since I was covered up otherwise. Light and breezy material. Nice to have the shoulders covered when it cooled down at night. Will definitely rent again!
Great cut, comfortable material. Could easily dress up or down. Love it!
Wore this dress to work. It was the perfect midi length for me. The twist in the front is very flattering and the fabric had a nice weight to it. Overall loved the dress!

This is a pretty dress. It drapes in just the perfect way. I love that the arm holes are covered so you're not revealing anything on the sides. It is EXTREMELY LOW CUT. I had to pin it even above the little hook to keep it closed. Dress can be dressed up or down. For reference, I'm 5'7" and the dress was a wee bit long on me.

Really great dress! Silky but substantial fabric but a great drape. A little thin on the skirt but with a slip or spanks you're all set. Deep plunge held together nicely by a hook and eye. Great fit true to size!

Really fun dress for spring (unfortunately the temperature dropped the day I was going to wear it). It definitely runs true to size and is a true midi on anyone around 5'7" to 5'9". The slit in the front goes a little high if you're going to be sitting for most of an event, so bear that in mind if you're renting it for an event.
Super cute fit. Loved it. The fabric is not worth the price though, so didn't buy.

links_reviews_title: Purple twist front Prabal Gurung dress
links_reviews_text: This midi dress with a v-neck was easy to wear. There is a hook closure at the front, but it continually came unhooked, so I wore a camisole underneath. There is a tiny bit of stretch- the fabric is polyester, which I thought made it seem less $$ than it was. I normally wear a 2 or a 4 and while the 4 fit, I think the 2 would have been okay too. Pretty color and print; with cami + cardigan it went from work to dinner easily.
Loved this dress. It's comfy, chic, and unique. I wore it with a cami underneath bc it was too deep a v for work, but it would be okay for outside of the office.

links_reviews_title: Oh Goodie, it didn't fit. Beautiful dress, sad lady!
links_reviews_text: I rented this in a size down (my normal size) and sent it back for the larger one. Sadly, it too was not a winner. Sad times, designer clothes just aren't for me this week!

links_reviews_title: Color and cut great, tummy tight
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress but it really hugged my tummy a little too much for me not to wear serious spanx. I usually wear a 16 and the 18 even hugged too much. The top, deep v and fabric were great. Just didn't quite have the flatter tummy for it.
I wore this for Christmas with my husbands family. It was a little bit too low cut for the occasion, but I still loved this dress!! It's super comfortable and sexy. Would definitely rent again.
fit great. Can clasp at chest to make more appropriate for work. can dress up or down
This dress is even more beautiful in person. It's very flattering and so comfy. Will rent again.
Dress is so flattering and comfortable. Fabric is very lightweight

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but large in the chest
links_reviews_text: I took this on vacation but never quite found the right occasion for it. The print and fabric seem very daytime, but the plunging neckline and slit seem destined for evening. The bust was very large on me, especially when sitting.
Loved the fit and the fabric. It was very comfortable and true to size. A little low cut for work so I just safety pinned the neckline and it looked great. Many compliments.

Got so many compliments on this dress, especially the color/pattern! Probably one of my favorite rentals. LOVED the way it hung on my body - perfectly draped and tailored, not too fitted though and hit mid shin - so flattering. The fabric is medium thick and very jersey smooth. It is slightly see-through, but I opted not to wear a slip. The front slit down the middle is still work appropriate as it only comes to the knees (just be careful when sitting/crossing the legs). I did find the V neck to be a bit low for work, so I pinned it an inch above the hook, but would probably be fine in any casual setting. The fabric is also stitched under the arm hole so even though the holes are big, you can't see in. Would definitely rent again - for work, casual summer wedding, party, etc.
So low cut it was unwearable, even with the hook and eye closure.
Didn't realize this dress had such a high split. Combined with the low v definitely not appropriate for work. Would be cute for a date night or special occasion.

I had planned to wear the dress to church but when I put it on it fit perfectly however the picture does not show the split which is almost to the crouch and not appropriate for a church event therefore I was not able to wear it.
I had to go to a charity gala after work, so it was great for both events. I sized up because they didn't have my size available, but it wasn't too large and draped really nicely.

links_reviews_title: great dress - so comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: hook & eye closure helped keep modesty for chest
Beautiful dress! Runs true to size and drapes incredibly. Totally comfortable too.
the colors are amazing, so sexy!! Want to keep it. the cinch in the waste thins you out, you can dress it up or down. LOVE!!!

links_reviews_title: Not a real plus size dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is sized up to 20, but it's not a plus size dress. It was super small and unflattering around the stomach area. The fabric is also quiet cheap feeling for a designer dress. Disappointed with this one.

I am absolutely in love with this dress. The fit, the color and the draping were all fantastic! I wore it to lunch with my fancy flip flops (I live in Florida! They're a thing!), to a family dinner with white pumps and on a date with black lace-up sandals. I genuinely love Prabal Gurung and the way his designs fit me. If you are looking for a dress that gives you lots of options, this is the one.
Love the length and the fact it had a fastener in breast area for extra coverage

links_reviews_title: Loved how comfy this dress was, and at the same time, sexy!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very flattering and slimming, unique color and super comfy too. I did pin it as it's low cut and I don't have the bust to pull that off. Love this dress!

I guess I expected a little more stylishness from this dress because of the brand, but I was underwhelmed. The cut is very nice with the v-neck (a little plunging) and the hidden slit in the middle. The fabric is a knit. I also should have sized down. It's quite flattering and there's nothing wrong with the dress, it just did not wow me.
Sheer fabric. Runs small.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and sooo many compliments
links_reviews_text: A little large in the bust area for those with a smaller chest. Could have used the size 6. Still obsessed with the dress though.
Couldn't wear this. The neckline was too plunging and there is a huge slit up the middle of the dress. Definitely not work appropriate.
I really loved this dress. It fit great.

links_reviews_title: Dress too short not good for a long torso
links_reviews_text: Not recommended for tall women
Cute and comfortable. Can be dressed up or down. Dress have a bit of stretch to it.

Rented for my company's awards dinner & it could not have been more perfect. A bit sexy without being over the top & not too revealing. The neckline is so unique, but may be a little low for the more modest. The main body of the dress was fitted but not tight. Which was key for a mom of a 10 month old still working on losing the remaining baby weight. And leaving the best for last—those sleeves are fantastic! The main sleeve is about 3/4 length before the larger bell. They are just gorgeous!
I felt amazing all day! Simply perfect and figure flattering. You won't regret renting it.
So many compliments fit perfect!

links_reviews_title: Over the top sleeves but cute neckline
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work. The sleeves are a bit crazy (had to be very careful at the salad bar!) but I thought the neckline was very cute and overall the dress was very flattering. I wear a 2 or 4 depending on the brand. I tend to find Trina Turk runs big so I opted for a 2 and it fit great. Dress has no stretch

I loved this dress. It ran big but it wasn't too shifty/boxy. The details are unique and fun but still very classic and conservative. It looked a little low cut on the pictures but i was still very comfortable with it and i am 38DD.
I got so many compliments on this dress I lost count. Great dress for those who like to mask a not so perfect midsection. Fit was perfect. I would buy this and wear it a million more times.
It's a little long in the torso for me so the neckline doesn't lay flat always. But other than that this takes a little black dress and adds sophisticated flair

links_reviews_title: Sleeves!!! Low cut for those with short upper body.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this dress. The neckline is unique and the sleeves are amazing!!! It was a little low cut for me, so I put a lace cami underneath. This dress runs mostly true to size, or a little big.

The neckline on this dress makes it interesting. It's quite beautiful. The sleeves are also interesting, but felt like a bit much. I kept catching them on everything! The dress is a lovely winter weight. Perfect for cooler temps. I wore this to work and then an event afterwards. It was a bit dressy for the office, but whatever. Jewelry and shoes swap brought it more along the lines of a cocktail dress. The waist is a touch high and gives it a more youthful look.
I loved everything about this dress! Great quality and very flattering. Wore it to a fashion show.
Wore to my cousin's wedding. Perfect weight for an outdoor fall wedding at a vineyard. Interesting neckline and sleeves. Almost purchased!
This dress was perfect. The shape was ideal for my curves, no pinching or gapping. The sleeves were beautiful and didn't get in the way like some billowing sleeves do. Will rent again!
Fit TTS, with year-round fabric. Flattering and fun sleeves that are comfortable. Only note is that the neckline was borderline uncomfortable for me (32DD) as I have a more formal office.

links_reviews_title: Love the neckline in the photos -doesn't work for 34J
links_reviews_text: The neckline is beautiful on the right body - won't work with my 34J situation! (& a cami under it is too obvious to look good).

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! it is definitely a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Dress is very comfortable and has a little bit of stretch which makes it comfy for a long work day but still look very cute!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Court and Dinner Afterward!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress. I wore it for work. Presented in court, felt great. Received many compliments. I paired it with a scarf, as for my particular chest, the dress had a bit of cleavage. Perfect for the dinner afterward to celebrate the win!

links_reviews_title: A very versatile dress. Can be worn to any event.
links_reviews_text: Basic LBD with some cleavage and a fun sleeve.
Nice dress!! I'm looking for a slightly tighter fit. Going a size down and trying again.
Wore this work and received a jillion compliments. Gorgeous material, flattering fit, dramatic arms-- truly a special black dress that could easily be worn out at night as well.
One of my favorite rentals. Got so many compliments. I'm 5'9" and it hits about 2 inches above the knee which was fine by me. Sleeves are added flair and don't get in the way. Wish I could buy it!
Loved this dress and will rose again! Nothing like a LBD with a little flair. Fit TTS and was a great length for me! (I'm 5'3"!)

The dress ran a little large for me, I use an awesome black leather belt to cinch the waist a bit. The keyhole neckline, folded in on itself a bit b/c I do not have a long torso. Prob better for someone a little taller but it still worked enough to wear. FYI - attention ladies renting in cold weather: sleeves are gorgeous but trying to get them into a coat sleeve is nearly impossible.
Perfect for work.
Little low cut & tight through bust area
Loved this dress! For is flattering and fun, lots of compliments. Something I didn't expect - a little low cut, had to adjust to be sure I wasn't showing my bra

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous material, gorgeous fit, gorgeous detail.
links_reviews_text: This dress was my favorite. Flattering, perfect length, detail was so wonderful at sleeve and neckline. Not your run-of-the-mill LBD. I would rent again and again.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a classic and perfect fit. The neckline is stunning and the sleeves are pretty.
links_reviews_text: It was a beautiful dress, perfect fit and I received tons of compliments all night long. The neckline is beautiful and with the sleeves it spices up a classic fitting black dress. Great material and length as well.

I absolutely loved this dress! The sleeves and neckline were so chic. I'm a wedding planner so I ordered this to work a wedding and absolutely loved it. I ended up keeping it longer so I could wear it again and really didn't want to send it back. I have a feeling I'll be renting it again!
Great fit, cool silhouette. Excellent mix of polish and interesting.
Perfect pair of pants to dress up or down. Took these on vacation in Cape Town, but might buy and keep for myself! Good quality fabric and quality fit.
Loved these flowy pants. Perfect for a beach getaway or any warm weather day!

These pants are such lovely quality I was able to wear them nearly every moment on our vacation in Santorini. From the flight with sneakers, days at the pool, and dressed up with wedges for dinner. So many compliments at every turn. Love them.
I wore these pants to work with a blouse and on a flight with a comfy tank and they were perfect for both occasions. Kinda like PJs but definitely chic too. Love them.

Really wide leg and comfy! I'm 5'7" for reference and these were a good length on me, but may be too long for shorter people. The color is a little more green than pictured too. But overall I really liked them and wore them a few times
Loved the relaxed style and comfortable fit. Added pockets nice touch and pairs well with a lot. Will order again!
I am obsessed with these pants. So comfortable and cute for the summer. I've worn them literally everywhere between home, work, and vacation. The color is beautiful and the fabric is high quality
Very cute and extremely comfortable. Love pairing the pants with the matching top. I am 5'9 and 130 and the xs fits perfectly.
I normally wear a 2/0, the XS were perfect. So cozy but cute! Would rent again.

I LOVED how comfy and almost silky these pants were. Since we're stuck at home, I've been lounging around in these bad boys. I decided not to keep them, though, because they are slightly see through in the bum region.

I really loved renting these pants. They flowed well in the legs and cinched in at the waist perfectly. Most pants like this are loose on my waist, but I was very impressed with how it fit snugly but not too tightly. If you wear these to an actual beach, be careful about getting them wet. It ruins the aesthetic very quickly. Overall, great pants. Would rent again

I should have sized down. I rented these pants to wear on the last day of a vacation. I knew I would be looking for a more loose fit after a week of eating at delicious restaurants! Instead, these pants were so loose and so much fabric that they just accentuated my bloated look. I am usually a medium or large, but I think I could have made these work in size small.

So flowy and comfortable, and also flattering. Wore with a black crop top and white leather sneakers and got so many compliments on this casual look. I have a high waist so it can be hard to find things that work for this style. Will definitely rent again for the summer, and maybe even buy :)
They weren't super flattering but they were fun. I wore them to work with a long sleeve sweater and then on a vacation with a black tank.
Comfortable work pants. I wore them to work with black strappy wedges and a black turtleneck. It was a very comfortable day. Pants are great quality, very soft, and well made.
There was far too much fabric - did not wear
These pants are so great to dress up and down. I loved these pants so much I almost bought them. Super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Rented this to wear to a conference. I loved it so much that I wore it twice afterward.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and flows beautifully.

These pants were so comfortable and versatile. I wore them at least 3 times and might end up having to own them eventually. The length for me was right at my ankles (5'4" height) so if you're more petite they might be a bit longer than expected.

links_reviews_title: These were my go to vacation pants this summer.
links_reviews_text: LOVE THESE. Easy to throw on with a casual tank or dress up with heels. So comfortable, and such a cute color. I'm 5'3" and they hit just above my ankle (with the waistline at my belly button). Elastic keeps them in place well, but isn't tight or uncomfortable. I wore these on a hike in Greece and also touring Pompeii in the summer - I was VERY hot, but these didn't really show sweat and were very quick to dry when they got wet.
Beautiful fabric super light and cool! The fit is great and they're so flattering for being so baggy. Can dress up or down

This pant is pretty and very comfortable to be in all day! I went with the SR and would definitely order the XSR next time. The waistband is too large on me and I found the length to be a little long.

Super lightweight, soft pants for summer work days. I love the color and the fabric and have worn these a ton. I have wide hips and am usually between a medium and large pants, but the medium has plenty of room in these. Love that the drawstring makes them adjustable. I'm 5'7" and they're slightly longer on me than the model, but still ankle length. Not sure I'm ever sending these back. I did get caught in a thunderstorm in these - they soak up water and get really heavy when they're wet. Not the best thing to be wearing in that moment, but they dried out totally fine.
Such a nice, comfy, stylish pants. You can dress them up or down and fabulous looking
Super comfy for flying

links_reviews_title: Cute but not a great length for short people
links_reviews_text: I liked the lightweight material and fit but the length was tough for me....I'm pretty short so they didn't look cropped but also not full length so didn't look right on me. Also rented the matching top which didn't fit....if it had I probably would have dealt with the length and worn the set because it is really cute!

Super comfy pants that can be dressed up or down. I was debating between the small and medium, and went with the medium to be safe since there weren't any reviews yet. There is extra room in the waist (mine is 28" for reference), but it was fine to tuck shirts into. If I was going to wear a crop top with these pants, I would have liked a small. Even though there is a drawstring to make it tighter, it would be oddly bunched. There's also plenty of room in the hips. Definitely recommend for hot days!
Rented for shelter in place and used on many Zoom calls. The buttons on the sleeves were a nice extra touch to roll up.
This is such a great piece. It's comfortable and sport but not sloppy! I may purchase this piece!
Perfect for working from home in cold-ish weather. It fit great, was a high quality material and looked sporty and chic.
Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: The colors on the back are hideous
links_reviews_text: This is my fault for not looking at the description closer, but the back is neon green stripes. Not something I want to wear.
This is a great and fun turtleneck that I rented for work. Fits true to size.
Fits well and has an inverse print on the back. Slightly tight in the neck.
Love this sweater! It was comfy and stylish..
Though it ran a little bigot me, I really liked this sweater. It's navy at the front but neutral at the back for a little fun when you turn around. I could see this as a staple in my wardrobe.

The detail on this sweater is beautiful. From the neckline to the sleeves, to the soft and resilient fabric that didn't stretch out and get loose by the end of the day. I'm obsessed with this sweater! One of my favorite rentals.

links_reviews_title: Love the stripes and especially the neckline. Wore with a denim blazer for a great fall work look.
links_reviews_text: Quality fabric and beautiful colors

links_reviews_title: Business in the front, party in the back
links_reviews_text: This turtleneck is so fun with all the colors, but you don't feel too obnoxious with the color combo. The one qualm is had was when I tucked it into mid rise jeans it would bunch up in the back due to the texture of the knit. Very cute and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Longer, warmer and not as fitted as I thought.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work and I was very happy this rental. I only wore the shirt once because it was a little bit looser than what I wanted. I got a lot of compliments while wearing it, and my girlfriends loved the back side colors. This shirt looks amazing when you first put it on. However, I did find myself pulling the shirt down quite a bit during the day. I think because it's a looser fit it tends to bunch up. I would size down if I ordered it again.
Back fabric color way is different than the front and that gives it a fun twist!

The sweater is very cute, but it runs large and the item received was damaged. I didn't realize until shortly after leaving home and my husband pointed out the giant hole under the arm. Maybe the blouse was just too loved and should be retired.
Simple cool sweater that reminded me of the 70s! Loved the fabric and stretch. Kept me warm on a chilly Dallas TX morning!
Great everyday wear turtleneck. Very comfy and not itchy. Fit great!

I'm not usually a turtleneck fan, but I couldn't help but rent this once I saw the colors and the back. The colors are even more vibrant in person. The fit was great. I'd say it runs at least 1 size large, since I was able to wear my normal size with plenty of room at 9 months pregnant. The stretch knit looks really high quality and feels great on the skin. Highly recommend.

I rented this sweater for cold weather in New York. I wanted a piece that I could wear well under a coat without it being bulky. This was the perfect item because the fabric was dense and warm and it was fitted.
Very flattering top. The neck of the turtle neck was a little too tight for me. I actually got pretty hot wearing this top.

Really liked how many different things this goes with. Lots of colors and unique since the front and back are different. Loved the scalloping on the collar. Wore it many times. Would have rated it a 5 but the neck was slightly itchy and it tended to ride up so I had to keep pulling it down.

Very pretty sweater, I word it tucked into high waisted jeans. My only complaint is that it is very long so it is a little tough to tuck in without it bunching up. Would suggest sizing down if you wanted the tighter fit like the model in the photo. Overall beautiful sweater!
The fit in front was a bit funny - it bunched up a bit around the neck. Otherwise, it fit well, warm yet thin knit with an interesting pattern.
Thought it was a cute, easy transitional sweater for the weather but it definitely would bunch in unflattering places. Felt boxy
They sent this item new with tags, loved the color, but it was a little large. The fabric was a little itchy.
Loved this top - made putting an outfit together super simple.

links_reviews_title: The colors are great but not the most comfortable shirt
links_reviews_text: Great color but it's really clingy no matter how tiny you are. The turtle neck is super tight which is what makes this shirt pretty uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Soft fabric. Love the strips front & back as well as the detail around the neck.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are very long.
They did not have it in my size so I got the large and wore with a white t-shirt underneath. Great casual "boyfriend" sweater - a staple for the winter months. It was nice and light so easy to layer

links_reviews_title: Quality staple knit - why didn't I keep it?!?!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this sweater with bf & skinny jeans, but likely most flattering with skinny style pant bc of boxier fit. Loose fit, but not drowning. Maybe tiny scratchy but not unbearable, & when paired with a tank underneath I liked it more as it seemed to "catch" and not go too low at vneck (when holding LO, sweater moved easily & neckline would show bra). Right when sending back it was price I just wasn't ready to pay, today it is addtl %off, and I would've kept for sure. Regretting. Sweater pilled but easily removed. Sorry pic not great, it's under Elizabeth & James bomber, legging & Nike Cortez ... perfect out of town athleisure luxe
Great sweater, super soft
Great lightweight sweater, great for cool summer nights. It is showing its wear a bit, but still great.
Was too large to wear to work — would size down

links_reviews_title: Itchy and too boxey. Felt like I was a big box.
links_reviews_text: Itchy
Nice casual sweater. Was bit worn with small pills but overall liked and considering buying.

links_reviews_title: Made for a very very small small person. That or the sweater was shrunk.
links_reviews_text: I thought I was order the sweater I had ordered from this company two years ago. This was itchy, and very tight and small. I looked like I was wearing children's clothing. I think a XL would be better.
Fit a little tighter than expected, but was still able to dress it up Nice. The material is very warm.
Comfortable, not itchy. Great weekend sweater

It was a nice sweater and a lovely cream color. But the fit was nothing special. I guess that boxy look is in right now but it's only flattering on very thin people in my opinion. It was fine for work but nothing special.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable! I would buy this sweater if it came in the correct size.
links_reviews_text: I loved the cut of the sweater. Classy yet comfortable and casual.

links_reviews_title: Wore this with jeans and sneakers on the weekend, and with sweats at night to relax at home.
links_reviews_text: Sweater has a great slightly over sized fit without being too boxy. The weave is cozy and warm.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and cute! Could dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: I would rent this again!
Sweater was a little too worn also sleeve length was awkward
Great fit. A bit big. I'm an 8/10 and this looked cute but was baggy. I wore it with jeans for Christmas festivities.
I loved this sweater! I thought it might be itchy, but wasn't at all! I will be renting it again!
It's roomy, cozy, and super cute. I paired this with black/gray jeans and received tons of compliments.
The fit is oversized, boxy with longer straight sleeves.

links_reviews_title: The fabric and knit together are perfect!
links_reviews_text: I loved it, I hoped to rent it in a size smaller in future but no longer seems to be in my unlimited options?
Pilled after only 1 day of wear

links_reviews_title: Soft boxy sweater in perfect color
links_reviews_text: Great roomy fit without swallowing you. The color is just as pictured and the material is soft and thick without being hot. However, I was glad to be the first rental for this particular sweater as it began to pull after 2-3 wears. Paired great with jeans and also with a skirt to the office.
This was very big and boxy - not what I was looking for

This is a deep teal color. I loved the pattern and the puff detail on the sleeves. This is more fitted than expected, but it was a good fit. I'd size larger if you want a looser fit. This is cropped. I paired with with high waisted pants.

I wore to work (photo) and dressed it more casual to meet friends -jeans and boots. Definitely kept me warm in cold Chicago and was very comfy. I wore my hair up so the fun shoulders were more noticeable. When I first put on the shoulders made me feel a little like a football player but I got used to it ha. I think the casual look was cuter but it's nice for work too.
Had a cute puff on the shoulders. Nice color.
Beautiful sweater with an extra oomph in the puffed shoulders. Would rent again!

This is super soft and thick-- not scratchy, feels great against the skin. Enjoyed wearing with jeans and a also with fall skirts. The sleeve does have a bit of "puff" at the top --- it is not huge but definitely part of the design.

I'm usually an XS and I rented a S because of the cropped style. The S was still short (could have been ok with high waisted jeans). My problem was that it wasn't comfortable for being a comfortable looking sweater.. the shoulders and arms were tight and short too. It made it feel like I was wearing a baby T in sweater form so I didn't wear it.
Very nice, warm sweater. The color is absolutely stunning. I would say it runs a little bit small - I rented my normal size (small), and the sweater was a little bit tight.
Perfect color, perfect fit. Would wear again and again.

The sweater was a beautiful color and the pattern was exactly what I was looking for, but I just couldn't get over the puffy shoulders. Maybe the hanger had stretched them out a bit in transit, but it looked ridiculous. The RTR pictures do not show how big they really are. Would have been the perfect sweater without the 80's big shoulder puff.
I would definitely rent again (maybe buy). Received a lot of compliments. A little short in length but not too bad. So nice and warm and also comfortable.
Gorgeous vibrant color, love the feminine puff sleeves, subtle enough for everyday wear. I was glad I sized up, I am a busty size six and I think a medium would have been too fitted for my taste.

Fairly average sweater overall, but heavy and super warm. It's well fitted in the shoulders and shorters, so I was comfortable in a M (vs sometimes needing a S in blouses). And the color is great for gloomy winter days.

This sweater was nice. The arms were very tight, around the bicep. I have twig arms, so this was strange for me. The color is very pretty and is a good pop against other neutrals. The material was not scratchy.
Love the cable knit, rich shade of green, and fun puff sleeves—but not too poufy. Very warm.
Wonderful color and style. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Pretty little teal-ish blue sweater with puffy shoulders
links_reviews_text: Love the shoulders they are a bit puffy without being too statement-ish for every day wear. 4/5 stars for waist runs a bit short, I was pulling down a bit.
This sweater is really cute and fitted - it stretches in the right places and is a very good quality. I paired with jeans and boots. Recommend.
I felt like the arms were tight

This is an adorable sweater - I love the color and puff sleeves. Unfortunately, it runs very small. I normally where a medium or size 8 in sweaters but the medium in this sweater was very small! I had to return it.

links_reviews_title: Cute comfy outfit! All from RTR!!
links_reviews_text: This sweatshirt was super comfortable, but a little right in the cuffs at the wrists.
As everyone else said, arm bands are tight. Soft and cozy sweater and not too cropped.
The sleeves were super tight around the wrist. The hoodie is good quality and is a true crop fit. Highly recommend for a cute sporty look.

links_reviews_title: So soft but the arm bands are soooo tight
links_reviews_text: I rented this and the matching pants. Both were SO cozy and soft. I fell asleep in the outfit and when I woke up the next day my hands were totally swollen because the elastic at the wrists is extremely tight--and I have really small wrists. If I were to rent this again, I'd definitely size up

I was so excited to try this crop, and had basically decided to purchase it before I tried it on. Ouch!! I have tiny wrists, but even so the elastic in the sleeves cut off circulation to my hands. I actually had to change because it was so uncomfortable, and I had marks where the circulation had been cut off. Not worth the discomfort no matter how great it looked!
This is so cute and soft, I wore it a bunch and almost bought it!!! The wrists are tight but it didn't really bother me, I just rolled them back!!
Love the cropped fit and hood.
Amazing fit and cool print. Received so many compliments!!

Loved this dress. Very comfortable and not too short (I am 5'4). The waist is elasticated in the back so it stretches and can be adjusted higher or lower to your preference. Goes well with some white trainers or boots!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to horse races in Kentucky!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. It's so flattering. Runs a bit large, I'm usually a small and wore an XS. Was perfect for my occasion, but could also be worn every day to work, etc.

links_reviews_title: Easy transition for summer to fall
links_reviews_text: Love the seasonal versatility of this dress. Can easily go from summer to fall and honestly even winter with some fleece tights. Edgy but a little bit sweet. Would totally rent again!

I'm normally not a fan of a drop waist dress as a girl with hip, but this dress is flattering and incredibly comfortable. Perfect for day wear or could dress it up for an evening out. I styled for work with some Doc Martins, but a cute sandal would make it evening ready. Fabric swishes while you walk which has a cute flirty effect.
It was a little big around the shoulders, but overall a very comfortable dress. The only thing is that the material is very thin so you would need to wear something underneath.

Love this dress! Wore multiple times because it was so easy to dress up or down, and was work friendly! I am typically a size 4 or 6 and the small fit perfectly. (5'9" and 140 lbs) I highly recommend!
Super comfy, flattering fit. I normally wear a US 2 and got the small in this. Possibly could have gone with XS but S worked fine and was a very easy wear.
