I wanted to buy this dress but missed the window and did not want to get fined. And only wore it once! :-( Got loads on compliments on that one day.
The dropped waist was comfortable and flattering, but the dress didn't feel that special.

links_reviews_title: This dress helped my special dinner feel super special and all of the ladies gave me complements!
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect for a big meal out because it covers your tummy and hides any thing physically you may not want to show 😁 I felt confident eating a burger and fries and cake 🧁 yummy! #pinewoodRestaurant #nashville
This dress is so cute and comfortable! You can really wear this anywhere. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress multiple times across different occasions - work, dinner out and daytime. Loved it
links_reviews_text: Very versatile dress - works for daytime, work and night. While it runs small, cut is flattering and print is fun!

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern and flattering cut on my petite frame
links_reviews_text: Dress arrived in great condition and I felt great in it. Added my own Zadig & Voltaire belt to define my waist and pull the look together--without the belt the waistline would've hung too low on my 5' frame. It was cold outside, so I wore with black opaque tights and black booties. Added a black slip--the dress is slightly see-through under harsh light.

links_reviews_title: super cute and casual and lovely.
links_reviews_text: true to size
Super comfy and great fit. So many compliments.
comfortable, forgiving, stylish and unique.
Love how it gathers in front to give it shape. I have large breasts and narrow hips so I sized up but the 10 would have been a slightly better fit. Loved it all around and multiple compliments!

This is not cinched whatsoever i thought going with a 2 I'd have some fit to it but it just completely hangs. Thought there would be a hidden cinch but there's not. The material is GORGEOUS though and i love the print

Never would have rented this online but saw it in the store and gave it a go. So comfy! I felt like a rich person lounging in pj's all day. I'd size up so it hangs correctly! This one was 2 sizes up for me but it was ok, gave it a nice oversized-swingy thing.

Super easy work dress. Didn't want to return! Will order again this winter. Also, it's a beautiful dress I couldn't stop starring at my sleeves. Size 12 worked for me because I need the room for back/arms.
The arms are tight but then the dress is suppeerrr baggy, I don't know how it's supposed to be flattering maybe it's a maternity dress? Nice fabric though

This arrived and was way too large, but I wanted to wear it anyways because the time it would take to swap out for a smaller size would've been a waste. The fabric is really pretty and I really like the dress; just recommend you size down as this runs larger than other brands/items.
Fun print and colors and super comfy.
This dress is great for someone with an apple shape...heavier middle and slender legs. It runs on the larger side. I am going to wear it out to dinner. Fun and flattering design.
Great look with no effort! The cut is flattering and comfy and the fabric is gorgeous! Loved it for the holiday season and everyday.
It is a loose fit but very comfy and easy able to wear it to date night and still look cute
This dress is very cool - wore it with black booties like the RTR model. I'm a 14 and it fit fine, although I am broad and the shoulders were just the right size.
Size down at least one size. I would recommend sizing down two sizes

I wore this to a music festival in Costa Rica and it was PERFECT! It was long enough to protect me from the dust/wind, and lightweight enough for me to wear over a bodysuit or wrap around my waist. It's also rainproof. And life proof!

Loved this jacket! Was easily paired with leggings or dark jeans. It completes a look and is definitely designer quality. It's definitely not a heavy jacket but good for spring rainy weather. There is enough room for light layering.

Loved the print and logo details on the back of the jacket. The lining was too small for the volume of the outer shell, it pulled at the hem which made it look uneven. Not super noticeable and may only have been an issue on my rental size.
It's warm. It's kinda like a rain slicker? Love the print. Casual but sporty and cute!
This coat is just fun to wear
This jacket was perfect for my weekend watching my kids' soccer matches in early fall over a sweater and jeans.
Great everyday long sleeve. Easy to dress up or down. The fabric is so soft and the colors amazing!

links_reviews_title: Flattering drape and great winter stripes!
links_reviews_text: This thin sweater hangs beautifully and flatters the figure. The wide stripes have all of my favorite winter colors. I'm going to have a hard time sending this one back. Wearing with RTR Madrid Jeans by RtA - https://rtr.app.link/33yc0KkN52
I am allergic to wool so it can be difficult to find a nice sweater that doesn't make me itch. This one fit the bill! It's a classic stripe shape and a light material great for layering.

PROS: This sweater is so soft and comfortable. It is very thin so you can wear it even when it's not too cold outside. CONS: It runs a bit small in my opinion. I like baggy sweaters so usually rent an XL. But this was still a bit snug. I also wish it were a little longer.
Loved this sweater! It's lightweight which makes it perfect for early fall, but not too thin. Draped perfectly, fit exactly as expected, and the colors are gorgeous.
This was a very comfortable, soft sweater and it looked terrific. I wore it several times and it looked good every time. I wish I had bought it!
Sweater is not as cropped as it appears in the photo. Love it. Great fit, not boxy at all

links_reviews_title: Great colors for casual work or weekend.
links_reviews_text: I loved how soft it was and it reminds of one I owned in the '80s. Sleeves were long enough!

This was a weird one. The sweater is SO THIN it's like tissue paper - there's really nothing to it, not very warm and not a flattering fit. it's so lightweight that it moves around constantly which makes the stripes look asymmetrical at times, needing constant readjustment. Looks good for a super SUPER casual day (and I guess I'd wear the top as PJs).

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater. Only issue was the top of the sleeves was stretched from the hanger
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5", 170lbs the xl fit great.
Nice everyday sweater - nothing special but easy for work or the weekend.
Rich colors, great fit, quality material. Loved it so much I purchased
Good!

I loved the color pallet of this sweater. I wore it twice - once for work and on Thanksgiving. It's comfortable and fitted without being too snug across the chest. Great light sweater for transition season or under a blazer/cardigan.
It's a thin, light material but I actually liked how light it was and super soft.

links_reviews_title: Soft, thin pullover but kept shape
links_reviews_text: Great for everyday wear. Nothing too fancy but nice fall staple piece.

Gear everyday sweater for cool and warmish climates when the weather is transitioning. It's thin soft material. I sized down because I like a more fitted look. It's a great sweater for short waisted women.

Really loved this sweater. Super soft and comfy. Wore it to work with black jacket and then work it to charity fundraiser without the jacket so it can be dressy as well. Medium fit was just right for me.
Shirt is a nice light sweater. Very soft. Has some shape to it/not boxy.
Super comfy and thin
Super fun little sweater (it's pretty thin) for fall. Loved the colors and how soft the fabric was.
My boss told me I looked like a paint swatch, in a good way! This sweater is super soft and thin, great for layering. I got a ton of compliments when wearing it. Casual, comfy, versatile!
Cute and just a bit polished

Loved this sweater. It's the perfect lightweight fabric for fall and the stripes are a nice color. I'm between a S and XS and the XS fit great, so I'd say this runs a little large. Easy to wear for work or weekend.

links_reviews_title: Great color but a little large
links_reviews_text: Wanted it to be slightly more fitted in the waist

I absolutely LOVED this sweater! It's super thin and lightweight so perfect for layering underneath a jacket or vest and it's great for those early fall days when the weather is very confusing. The colors are gorgeous and perfect for fall. Fit is completely true to size, I would highly recommend this sweater.

This coat was perfect with the wedding dress. The coat does run a little big so going a size up was perfect and was comfortable. The bride absolutely loved it and wished she could keep it. It photographed beautifully and kept her warm when she was outside. The fur on it was soft and it wasn't itchy. Perfect rental for her wedding dress.
Felt like a cozy blanket. Stylish and fun. Dressed up ordinary outfits. Almost put a belt on to cinch since the fit is boxy. Very cute. May buy it.

links_reviews_title: Not as warm as it looks!
links_reviews_text: It's a gorgeous coat but it is not as warm as it looks. It's actually quite thin and lightweight. However, I was very comfortable in it in 40 degree weather with a sweater on underneath.
(Sorry about the bathroom photo) Loved this coat. A bit out of my comfort zone - bought it and changed my comfort zone! Husband liked it too. Very fun and cozy.

links_reviews_title: Looks better on the app. Slightly disappointed
links_reviews_text: I liked this coat but it looked fluffier in the pics. Maybe the one I got was just over worn. It was cute but also wasn't as warm or heavy as I expected it to be. Better for a chilly day, not a super cold one!

links_reviews_title: Hello it's me, a fuzzy white blob
links_reviews_text: Super super fuzzy and cozy. Not actually that warm, but is a nice layer under a coat!

This jacket was included with my rental when I did cape I rented wasn't available. It was a brand new piece with the tags still on it. Super comfortable and soft but not too warm for a 50 degree day. Ended up wearing a couple times throughout my wedding weekend. Was the perfect casual coat! Has nice silk lined pockets too.
This fur jacket was PERFECT for my Cruella DeVil costume !!! Got so many compliments - I wish I could keep this jacket and never send it back ;))
Bold look, not fitted. It's not warm and the lining can be rather cool, actually. Takes every outfit up a notch. Got a tad matted after wearing it so many times.
I liked this to add some flair to my outfit! Fit true to size but it was a little tight to button. Looked cool though!

links_reviews_title: Definitely a jacket for having fun, not for cold
links_reviews_text: This jacket fit well - no issues at all. It is thin and lined with a satin-y fabric inside. It does have pockets but again, nothing super warm. I wore it out as part of an outfit...kept it in inside the restaurant. It was soft and felt like an old teddy bear from childhood. Buttons are snaps so easy on and off.

links_reviews_title: Very cozy for winter in SoCal
links_reviews_text: Looked great with pink sweater and other light colored tops

links_reviews_title: Fit awkwardly. Did not look good.
links_reviews_text: too tight on shoulders, too big everywhere else. I have slightly proportionally larger shoulders, but it just looked awkward
Wore this with a sparkly gold dress, was absolutely adorable. Got TONS of compliments. Wore with a shirt / pants also and got even more! Very versatile, cozy, and CUTE!!!
Lightweight but warm and cozy. Great with party dress, work clothes, and to glam up jeans.
fit was perfect even though I am only 5'1. The sleeves were a perfect length

links_reviews_title: Perfect to wear to and from work.
links_reviews_text: Jacket was super comfy, true to size. Wasn't the warmest and was very delicate with the buttons but overall a cute jacket for a day or evening look!
I got this as part of a Halloween costume and it was perfect, but I ended up not attending the event. It fit well and was very warm. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Cool, structural bag. Deceptively small interior.
links_reviews_text: This bag is very unique and a great fit for my normal fall style however, the magnet closure at the top takes up a lot of the internal space. You need to have a card holder or just throw everything in loose because even a small wallet is too big.
It's a cute bag, but basically it's impossible to get things out of it due to the design.
Cool lil bag, even a rugged man that does not give compliments noticed the bag and complimented it!

links_reviews_title: Cute but my wallet and keys kept falling out
links_reviews_text: Very cute style and looks good but highly impractical. My things kept falling out. And it was so small I couldn't fit many things in anyways.

links_reviews_title: Super cute bag got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous design, my only complaint it things can definitely fall out if you aren't paying attention so don't over pack it with small items that can easily fall out.

This skirt was even cuter than I imagined! So many compliments at work! Nice thick fabric, but I found it wrinkled during my 35 minute drive to work, it relaxed a bit as the day went on. My husband wanted me to buy it!
Such a flattering fit and fun print!

So many compliments on this skirt - which I rented for a work trip in Hawaii in September. I sized up and rented the 6 (I am usually a 4) and it worked out well as I think the 4 would have been too tight in my hips. Beautiful color and well made material.
This skirt so cute and comfortable! I worn it to a lunch with my father during my trip to Switzerland. I would rent it again!

I felt amazing in this skirt and got a ton of compliments. I wore with a white button down and it definitely was work appropriate for my office. I would buy it but can't justify spending that much on a "non-staple" piece. Would 10/10 rent again.

Super cute, super preppy- I sized up a little to give myself some extra links and it was still pretty tight through the hips. Definitely size up if you have any booty what so ever. The material is pretty dressy - But you can dress it down with a casual top
So cute and festive! Ran a tad big on me but doable. Loved the pineapples and pink/coral color. Unique and got so many compliments. Wore to work and then to dinner!

I love this skirt! The fabric is lovely and the print is really beautiful. I found that it was slightly too big around my waist but fit perfectly everywhere else, which I expected as I am in between a size 6 and 8 and usually have this issue. Would 100% recommend!!
I love this skirt! I got so many compliments and it was so fun to change up my wardrobe. I'm closer to a 2 but got the 4 and it was a little loose so it just sat lower on my hips. Still worked great!
This skirt was longer than I thought which was a good thing! The design is adorable and great for vacations or just spring or summer vibes. Material is silky and skirt is well made!
Normally I wear an 8. Read reviews and decided on a 10. Glad I did. The 10 fit perfect. This material has zero give and doesn't stretch at all!!! Super cute and great for spring!!

I love this skirt but it fits very very tight. I wear size 12-14 and I sized up to a 16 and it was still tightly fitted. I received so many compliments. You can tell this is quality from far away. Beware, skirt wrinkles really easily.
This is a great skirt! I rented it for work (I have a casual office). I like the punch of color and the unexpected print. It's definitely a quality fabric and is long enough for my office!
So summery love it
Pink skirt definitely stands out, pineapple design adds to the fun. Love the color and fit.
Really beautiful print and a thick material! Love this skirt!
Fun, punchy while still classy - amazing rental.

This skirt was really adorable and just long enough to be appropriate for work. You can definitely dress it up or down depending on the top. I have somewhat larger hips and sized up to the 6 which was comfortable and well fitting.
This skirt made everyone happy when I wore it! It's not the MOST comfortable bc it has no stretch - I would recommend sizing up.
This skirt is true to size and so much fun! Comfortable for travel and adventure!
This skirt lets you be a pineapple. Fun and work appropriate. Thick fabric that is lined.

links_reviews_title: Fun for summer work or play
links_reviews_text: Great fit, and worked well paired with a white tee, but could be dressed up even more. Work colleagues complimented me, as did the cashier at Target! This is a all all-around fun piece no matter the occasion. It fit true to size; material does not give.

links_reviews_title: Summer in a skirt and a perfect tribute to remember Kate Spade by.
links_reviews_text: This adorable and perfectly summery skirt is quintessential Kate Spade and I'm so happy I got to rent it. I was the first one to wear it and take off the tags which was great. I'm normally a 6 in skirts, but they only had an 8 available and I'm glad. Super cute skirt, but there is no give or stretch in the mid section. It's the perfect skirt to switch up your normal drab work clothes.
Although this is cute it is really worn and is pretty wrinkled.

links_reviews_title: Cute style, lots of complements but stiff

links_reviews_text: the material was very nice but i could tell it was worn quite a bit

links_reviews_title: cute! but more A-line than the pictures show
links_reviews_text: Adorable pineapple pattern. A little big for me, i am between 12-14 and a 16 was suggested, but it's very loose. Wore to work with black sandals and a black v neck tee. cute!
Rented for our honeymoon but ended up also wearing to work and got compliments both times it was worn. Pairs really well with a simple white tee

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but a little tight so I didn't wear.
links_reviews_text: This skirt is super adorable, but there's no give in the fabric. While the 12 definitely fit, I think it would have gotten uncomfortable after awhile.
Wore with a white shirt. Was tight in the waist but still such a fun skirt. A heavy brocade fabric but pink with pineapples was unique.

Got lots of compliments on the his one. Runs a bit small - I'm usually between a 4/6 and I went with the 6 and it was form-fitting, but looked nice. I'm pretty tall, but with the larger size, the length was fine for work. The fabric was a great combination of a fun pattern with a high-quality finish. Huge fan!
Rented this for my mom and she loved it! She wore it to a graduation party and rocked it.
A little wide for my petite frame but adorable print

I wanted to live this shit but I have a small waist and very wide hips. The dress does not accommodate and is more for a rectangle with even hips and waist. I am normally an 8-12 depending on cuts, but got a 12 to be safe. It was still extremely tight in the hips and extremely big in the waist. NO give or stretch in this skirt.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful skirt, but sadly, too small
links_reviews_text: Beautiful skirt, but order 1 or 2 sizes up!

After reading a number of other reviews, I ordered up a size and while this fit in the waist there was too much fabric in the hips and below. The pattern is great and I wanted to love this but the A-line cut made this look like a lampshade on me.
I ware it to a conference in NOLA. appropriate and fun.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have worn it, it was really cute but runs small.
links_reviews_text: Runs small.
Great skirt! Only problem was it wrinkles if you are sitting often

I LOVED this skirt. Wore it to work and walking around town and the compliments just rained down on me wherever I went. Everyone loved it - coworkers and strangers alike. The material is very structured but comfortable and is clearly great quality.

I really liked the different fabric types on the dress. I rented it for work but when it arrived I found it to be too short for work and wanted to wear it out on the weekend with white Keds. The problem with this dress is that when you sit all of the buttons gape and don't go flesh against your body which I personally do not like the look of. Haven't worn it out yet, might have to give it go for a purely standing event.

links_reviews_title: Love, love the simplicity of this dress. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The only drawback is how quickly it wrinkles. Also, be aware that the chest area is a bit snug.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to give it back!
links_reviews_text: So comfy and versatile. Just had to be careful sitting!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress. Perfect for a wonderful birthday brunch !
links_reviews_text: Dress was a little big. Should have got a small. I didn’t like how the dress was wrinkly even though I ironed it multiple times. Overall perfect dress for a brunch!

Perfect for a day outside! Elevated shirt dress that I felt comfortable and kept me cool in the sun. I didn't have any issues with it being boxy, actually felt like it was tailored to have good coverage since it is shorter. I wouldn't have felt comfortable wearing it to work to be honest.

Paired it with a chunky Egyptian necklace and Got the most compliments. Very comfy and also a bit edgy. Most importantly, very appropriate for work. I'm a size 4 and 130lbs and the Medium was PERFECT. Any smaller and it Would've been too small.
I wore this dress to work and while it was cute while I was standing, when I sat down the buttons pulled open a little bit which was not a cute look!

I wore this for a business casual work conference (but could be worn for really any kind of event). Got a million compliments. It fits well and is flattering, but a little short when sitting down. Didn't bother me at all but might be too short for some corporate atmospheres. I'm 5'7 and wore heels. Would rent again.

True to size shirt dress with no stretch. This dress gives off a spring, summer vibe with its blue & white stripes. I rented this for the office and to try out different fashion looks outside of my preferred all black outfits.

links_reviews_title: Loved this but not for tall ladies!
links_reviews_text: So cute, but was not long enough at all. Looked like I was wearing my husbands work shirt! Which is good for indoors, just not in public!

I love this preppy work look by Elizabeth and James! Running small with no stretch, I recommend going a size up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted throughout the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this work look. At 5'8, the length hit mid-thigh on me. This menswear inspired look was fun and simple to wear. Pair it with a cute flat and a statement tote will defiantly complete your look!
Dress is classy. The last button came off before I even got to work. You need a slip or something to wear underneath it. Size is true to size. I wore it for work.

links_reviews_title: Buttoned up look for a nautical or beach setting
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was very flattering the way it curved to my body, was the perfect length and had large cuffs to take it up a notch. I wore this to a dinner in the North Fork because it was preppy, nautical-ish, blue stripes remind me of the beach or Hamptons and I just really liked the fit. It could totally have been worn to an interview or a work event because of how professional it is. I would totally rent again!

this was a fun piece to wear, it was a little on the shorter side for me, so it could be fun for a BBQ, something casual where you're not bending over too much. I wore once with sandals and once with low booties.

Loved this for work, would've work on a weekend or vacation if it had been just a little cooler out. Cool twist on a basic shirt dress, the material felt great and the fit was perfect (sized up per other reviews).
Wore this for happy hour, cool in 80 degree weather, but wrinkles easily.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved it!! Fit perfectly!! Is comfortable- almost didn't give it back.

links_reviews_text: Was snug across my chest, but still worked well with a few buttons undone! It was fresh looking, although it wasn't SUPER comfortable. It also is a button down men's T-shirt type material and wrinkled easily. But other than that, it was a hit!

links_reviews_title: Flattering but runs small... wish I owned!
links_reviews_text: So happy I read the reviews ahead of time because I ordered up a size and due to my larger chest, I couldn't button without it pulling. To avoid a gap, I left opens and wore a bandeau underneath. Didn't need tights; it was longer in the back than in the front, too. The shape was great, something that's not always the case with the menswear inspired lines. I will def be renting this again.
I wore this as a bathing suit cover up for vacation recently and it was awesome! It is too short for me as a normal dress but I loved the preppy look which worked well for my beach style.
I loved this dress for everyday, however it might be a bit short for office. It's very pretty in the beginning of the day, but wrinkles way too easily! The fabric feels great though.
I'm 5'11 and it wasn't too short with flat sandals. Was so comfortable!
Received compliments from coworkers for this dress. It runs a bit boxy but overall I love it!

I'm between a 4 and a 6 but mostly 6 (because I have a wide back) and wore the medium. The fit was great without having tightness in the back or bust. The length was long enough to wear as a dress. I didn't like how my midsection looked in the dress so I put a white denim skirt over it to create shape and let the bottom of the dress peak through. I wore it with gray suede booties.

Sorry for the mess in my photo - I'm moving! Back to the shirt dress - I love it! This was an option given to me by a RTR stylist. I wouldn't have ever chosen this myself. I decided to give this a shot since this brand usually runs small. This x-small is still loose fitting, but cute for an everyday outfit. I love the style & the fit isn't bad either. True to size for sure!

Don't like the photo fool you, this dress does not appear that wrinkly! I loved this dress, it was a little short for work and the spring weather has been a little cool in the 50, so I put black leggings underneath. Looked great with heels and I dressed it down with sneakers for the weekend. This was a fun piece if you want to play with the irregular/assymetric denim look.

Denim is going to be the IT Spring trend! If I would have gotten this dress in a Medium, I would not have taken it off! Like other items by Elizabeth and James, I HIGHLY suggest going up a size! This dress does not have any stretch like typical denim pieces, but does have really long sleeve which is a total plus to me! I selected this dress for everyday, but you could totally dress it up with cute heels for a Spring/Summer brunch! This dress is great for the straight and narrow body type, but anyone with a little more in the bust... get 2 sizes up as your backup size.
I'm a shirt dress girl and this one is made of comfortable fabric, isn't too short since I'm tall and is cut to come in right at my waist. Bought it!

It was amazing. Wish I owned this!!! V true to size. Wore this to a work team dinner that was more on the casual side. Got lots of complements and I felt very cute and comfortable in it! The only thing is it was a liiiiiiittle short on the sides - but not too bad and was still casual work appropriate.
very cool and easy to wear.
Nice fit
So classic. So effortless. Wore with wedges and a huge designer bag. It's over the top cute on!

I'm 3 months postnatal and I just wanted something that wouldn't show off to much, yet look crips and slightly elevated. This dress was a solid choice, only thing is that it's needs to be pressed to have that crisp/ clean look like the model photo.
Was a little on the short side. Soft material and duper cute. Got plenty of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Wrinkled by the time I left my house
links_reviews_text: Wrinkles really really easily. Also the material is less breathable than a typical button down material you'd expect.
No issues!

links_reviews_title: Super cute for work but runs small in chest and hips. Size up.
links_reviews_text: Size up 1. Small in chest and hips. Couldn't button it with a bra on and I'm always a size small.

Sometimes can get away with an xs even tho I'm normally a 2-4. This dress was super cute, but was just a tad too tight. The length was perfect for work but I ended up just wearing it casual, unbuttoned with a pair of jeans and doc martens. Wish I went up a size to be able to wear it as a dress

wore it to work. The sleeves were a little long on me but perfect cuffed. Dress was above my knees and somewhat short for the office even though I'm petite. XS fit me well - I normally wear 0. Overall I liked the look and fit, and received compliments for it, however it wrinkled a lot over the day so am only wearing once.
It does wrinkle in a matter of seconds but other than that it's so flattering and sexy in a conservative way.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work or going out!
links_reviews_text: I wore this twice. Once with sneakers and a ball cap to the bar. And then two days later to work with leggings and flats. I loved it!

Very comfy dress that I wore at 24 weeks pregnant for Thanksgiving (on photo) and also a couple times for work with black leggings and nice boots. Runs a little on the larger side, so definitely size down if you are between two sizes.

My arms are short so the arm detail wasn't visible. The dress is very warm and cute but the material shows your completely body shape underneath. Usually not a problem but I felt as though it brought attention to the tummy. If I had some shapewear I would have felt more comfortable

links_reviews_title: Warm, comfy, but tight around the butt/hips
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work & got lots of compliments! It was a little tight around butt/hips, so may want to size up if you're looking for a looser fit.

links_reviews_title: Cute! Good for work with tights & booties.
links_reviews_text: I like this dress. I wore it to work with tights and booties. It fits more snug on the bottom (at least for me but I have a larger bum ;)). Very cute -- just definitely not an oversized sweater dress fit.
SO comfortable. Totally a more boyfriend length but clung in the right places.
Perfect dress to pair with tights and heeled boots/booties. Length hit just below mid thigh and a beautiful color.

Rented this for Thanksgiving dinner--and I'm glad I did! Ended up getting engaged, and it was perfect for a fall photo! The fit is oversized, but the material allows the dress to drape in the right places without looking frumpy. Highly recommend, may even buy. I'm 5'7", 135, and I rented a small. It was perfect, even though I normally size up because I have broader shoulders.
Comfortable without being too fitted, easy dress to dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable for work and weekend events.
links_reviews_text: Fun for fall and really soft feel! The sweater material was not itchy at all. Paired well with different types of footwear, pumps during work hours as well as booties for after work. Easy outfit choice. I will keep this item as a heart for future rentals.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy dress for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: The material was warm and thick with a nice stretch to it; however, it wasn't form-fitting around the torso, so it drooped like a bag. The neck line was awkward and too high for my liking. The dress was also on the shorter side, so be careful raising your arms above your head!

links_reviews_title: Cozy for fall! Paired with sock sneakers - so cute!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the size larger than I normally would so this dress was oversized - it was a great fit!

This dress is unbelievably soft and comfortable. The color is gorgeous and looks exactly like the picture. The only con is that it was a little short on me, especially in back, so I had to wear it with tights, but I'm 6 feet tall so everything is usually short on me.
Great knit dress. The horizontal stripe adds illusion. Very comfortable. Looks small upon first look, but great stretch!
Very Very flattering and sexy without looking like you're trying. Was complimented everywhere I went. Also Super warm material so def a winter dress. Considering purchasing it.

This dress is a great midi length and has enough warmth in the fabric to wear on a cold day. The design is very flattering. It runs long so is probably best if you are tall. I was concerned about it being 5% wool ( I'm allergic) but it was fine with tights and a slip.
A perfect sweater dress! I think it runs a bit small though as I never get mediums but this fit perfectly. I didn't want to send it back!
This fit like a glove! Not too big or small, not too much cleavage, makes my butt look good but not so clingy that I couldn't wear it to certain work events. Seriously considering purchasing!

links_reviews_title: My husband said I looked pregnant
links_reviews_text: The dress was super comfortable , but way too big. I normally wear an 8-10 dress. It was recommended I order a XL. That seemed too big and it was too big. Overall the dress is beautiful and very comfortable, but I recommend ordering down a size. I almost think I could have worn a medium.

I wore this to work with knee high boots. The fabric was comfortable and cozy. It's difficult to find attractive long-sleeved dresses. This dress is versatile and can be worn for work or a dinner date.

I'm short so I was worried about the length bur paired it with mid calf heeled boots and it was absolutely perfect. I felt amazing in it and I got so many compliments. It really flatters a curvy figure and didn't make my chest look huge (which is a struggle). Will absolutely be keeping this for a while
Loved this and will def rent again
Runs super small

I am petite and this dress went almost down to my feet so it would definitely be shorter on taller women. I loved the asymmetrical tie on the side and I found it super comfortable to wear for day-to-day. Very flattering and would rent again!
Little tight but received compliments. Great length
Worked great, got a ton of compliments!
The belt was a little confusing but the color and length was great. I wore to work but would also be great for Happy Hour or night out during the winter.

links_reviews_title: fit well with lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: definitely thicker sweater than expected, but it was a cold day so it was welcome. Be warned if your workplace or where you are planning to wear this runs hot!

Very comfy, not itchy, and cute. Work appropriate, not see-through at all, and true to size. A great, simple dress. I didn't get a chance to wear it because I had to return it to get something else as part of my Unlimited membership but I'll rent this again.
Classic sweater dress feel with a little Something extra.

This dress was amazing, would definitely buy this. Received a ton of compliments both on the style of dress and how flattering it was. On top of that, it's warm with lots of coverage while still looking amazing. Highly recommend.
Tie is a little strange and too long for my frame, but overall, dress is flattering and comfortable
Wonderful dress for fall. Warm but not too thick. I'll definitely rent again. Wouldn't say it runs large, but I'll size down as it's more "true to size" than most dresses available from RTR
One of my favorite rentals and so chic. So many compliments. I love how the flaps at the bottom of the vest moves as you walk. Fabric is heavy in weight.
Wore this for a fall day trip to Napa. Was definitely dramatic (maybe a little big) but worked for the all white look I was going for!
Loved this added option to my basic black dress and it was fun to dance it as I twirled around. The back has cuts and flows nicely.

links_reviews_title: The slits at the bottom are gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: It's pretty long if your under 5'4. Every time I sat down , it would graze the floor and it got kinda dirty. I sized up thinking it was small but it runs true to size. I would rent again in my actual size

Super fun accessory. Make sure you have the right things to put underneath, I ended up wearing jeans and no top under because none of the tops I had had the right neckline (I was on vacation so I had limited options). It would look great w a sheath dress under it too. It was pretty baggy so I'd size down. super comfy and I felt uber chic!
gorgeous fabric and buttons; the exact kind of piece that RTR is made for, something that is a huge statement but you probably don't want to wear as a "staple." loved it!
I have never felt more chic in my entire life wearing this to work. Runs big so I was able to wear the 4! A little heavy so not ideal for hot weather

This duster vest is amazing. I've never received so many compliments on an outfit. It has some weight to it, so you can tell it's of good quality fabric. It was a little long so heel's are a must if you're short like me. I rented the 12 and it was slightly large but still managed to work as an oversized look. A timeless piece that I am seriously considering buying!!
Elevated look

links_reviews_title: Thought I would love it but really boxy
links_reviews_text: I will say that I loved that this was so long since I'm tall. The fabric is gorgeous and I love the big silver buttons but overall it was just large and really boxy. It didn't do anything for me wearing it open either, too many flaps.

I got this new with the tags on (aka LUXURY!) and was blown away by how beautiful it was. The construction and fabric were beautiful and it elevated my look for a really dressy presentation at work. It looked equally good with a white blouse and ripped jeans. Only call out is that it's very long and due to the color, be careful about wearing it on a wet or rainy day. I took cabs so I didn't soil it. Really special piece!

I wore this long vest jacket with the matching pants from 3.1 Philip Lim and felt like a dream! I selected the pieces to wear in a largely white dining room on a birthday date with a great friend, and felt like I was in full celebration mode for her, which was lovely. The slits throughout the vest "skirt" make it a beautifully fluid piece (especially with the matching pants which also have interior side slits at the hem!). The fit felt super flattering (not too tight or too loose, just right). And the snap closure with gorgeous silver sculpted buttons is such a beautiful accent to complement your jewelry or replace it! Such a goldmine overall!

Really lovely and well-made. Pay attention to the details in some of the reviews.... the bottom is split into multiple panels which made it less chic than the photos and this piece is HEAVY. I felt like I was wearing a lead vest getting an X-ray.
This vest is beautiful but unfortunately too long for those under 5'1. I tried it on with 3 inch heels and it was still grazing the floor so I sent it back.

I loved this piece in the pictures.. cool & unique.. it was in person too *but* it's really long.. I'm 5'5" and was tripping all over it until I put on my 4" heels. (And I still tripped going up/down stairs) It also looks to have been worn a bunch.. a little beat up. I struggled to keep the bottom from not looking wrinkled. That said I still got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Paired well with a tight dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a cover up for a beautiful green knit dress. Loved how sheek this was... very fashion forward. Walked past the NYC Housewives during filming and they all looked - not that that is a barometer I care about

links_reviews_title: Fantastic piece, wore over black leggings and top and got stopped in the street for compliments
links_reviews_text: Only note, this is LONG, I'm 5'8 and it almost reached the ground in flats.
Fit was nice, the garment is very heavy
I wore this with the matching pants and a tibi shirt to a Christmas party. Very elegant. this is a heavy weight material, so the vest is actually heavy to wear. Looked good, husband loved it.
Loved this and wore it to a few casual events with black jeans and a black turtleneck, received tons of compliments. Is an awesome simple statement piece!

The long vest has carwash bottom with 5 high slits. It functions more like a super high end duster. Dress it up with short skirt and heels-or go more casual like the pic. The material has some weight to it which gives great movement to the carwash slits. Considering buying this!
Great velvet shirt to wear with jeans or black pants. Can be dressed up or down. I wore with black leather jacket and black jeans.
Comfortable material, pretty color. Sleeves were very flattering. A little short on the bottom for longer torso.
I wore this top to a sporting event and then night out in a college town. It was perfect. I tucked in the front but it could be worn untucked. The fit was a little baggy untucked.
Wore this to a holiday party loved the fancy velvet look and puffed sleeves. Open keyhole in the back makes this a great blouse to wear with an updo. Cute with jeans!
Wore to wine bar, and again on Christmas Eve. Very cute!
Loved the vintage look and feel of this top. I paired with jeans and boots mostly. The opening in the back added a little something extra to the look.
Fits big and long the sleeves

links_reviews_title: Wore it on Valentine's Day to a friend's party.
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful piece and I received many compliments all evening.
This shirt is so cute - I wore it to work and on vacation. I'm a solid size 6 and the medium fit perfect.
Loved everything about this top. Wore to lots of parties over the holidays. It looked great tucked into black skinny pants or loose with denim. Got tons of compliments.... subtle sexy.
The sleeves run a bit long, but otherwise it was a nice, fun top to wear for the holidays.

links_reviews_title: Perfect shirt for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Quite simply this was perfect for a work holiday party! I paired it with some skinny jeans and suede boots. I received many compliments from my coworkers! Would definitely wear again if given the chance.

links_reviews_title: Nice piece but more of a casual striped velour
links_reviews_text: I thought this would be a bit dressier than it is. It is a short (not plush) velour with a vertical stripe that does not have velour texture. It was fine for a casual friend's' weekend gathering,but I would not characterize it as velvet. The sweetheart open back was a bit too much for my workplace.
The button on the neck closure came off as I tried to undo it so I couldn't even try it on! Would have been super cute for the holidays
Beautifully made and extra soft. Modest length sweater dress where I got loads of compliments.
I picked this dress for the weekend but ended up wearing it to work. Was perfect cozy sweater dress

This dress has been my rainy Monday go to. It's professional enough due to the color and sooo comfortable it makes getting out of bed on wet Mondays so much easier. I've worn the XS and S and both fit well, so it just depends on how loose you want it to be. I usually pair with tights and flats or booties. No accessories/belts needed!

The dress is fantastic, but in my opinion has to be worn with a belt. First, the dress looks like a sack without the belt. Second, the belt is a nice way to break up the geometry. I really love this look and highly recommend it. Definitely size down.

links_reviews_title: A co-worker asked me if it was Prada!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. It's soft, light but warm, and looks very high-end. I ordered a M (even though I'd normally be a L because of my hips) based on other reviews, and it was perfect- figure flattering without being clingy or tight. So I'd say be aware that it runs a little large. L definitely rent again!
I really enjoyed wearing this dress. Easy to accessorize but really doesn't need much. Soft material that is not too heavy but is still warm. Perfect for an easy stylish outfit for work.
I loved this dress. It was so comfortable yet stylish and well made. The XS was still loose on my curvy bottom. It was a little staticky with the tights but I didn't mind. Would highly recommend
This dress is super warm and comfy! It is a little boxy but it is a sweater! I'm a size 6 and the medium fit best with a little belt to show off my waist line.
Very comfy and true to size. I do wish it hugged my curves a little bit more (it didn't look right belted because of the diagonal design). But it was appropriate for work and good for winter.

I am not wearing this dress as it arrived with a horrible stitching job on the sleeve. I guess there was a hole or tear but this fix is laughable. Returning ASAP for another item. This dress should be taken out of rotation - I cannot believe RTR is offering this for sale at $331....

I am 5'11 and this dress was not flattering with flat boots. It was a little better with healed boots, but despite being cut wide the wool knit clung to my tights. Maybe bare legs or slicker tights? On the plus side, quality soft knit and nice colors. Wore to work but didn't feel particularly special.

links_reviews_title: Cozy and easy to wear; needs accessorizing
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and to a Rotary Club meeting. Originally I paired it with black boots, but that looked predictable and boring, so I went with dark red ankle boots and a red scarf, and a wide silver cuff. I tried a belt but it looked awkward due to the placement of the stripes. This is a nice staple piece and makes a good, warm basic dress.
Love this dress! If it was a kettle I would purchase it. Great fit. A little itchy but nothing major. Definitely a great cold weather work dress.
I felt like a million bucks in this dress. So cute and stylish. The fit is flattering but I had to wear a tall boot. I would highly recommend!
Very loose/runs large. Very comfy! No real shape. It's soft wool. The sleeves are a bit short though. Perfect for a 60° day or a cold office!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! So soft and flattering.

links_reviews_text: This was too big all around - bummer because the material was a good weight. Plan to size down, or go for that oversized look!
Really pretty, but too fitted for me around the waist. The material was thinner than expected but very soft. Wish it would have worked. I planned to wear it on date and to work.
Perfect winter work (or weekend) dress. Runs a bit big as I would normally wear a S sweater dress, but needed XS for this one. Will rent again!
Loved this so much

links_reviews_title: This was a very comfortable dress that looked great.
links_reviews_text: The dress was super comfy for an at-home casual cocktail party. I was comfortable all night and the dress was flattering. I wore shapewear underneath and was happy with the fit. I wore with high-heeled boots to add to my height - the dress length probably would have looked funny if I hadn't been wearing heels since I'm short.
fit well, many compliments, a great dress to own

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, chic, elegant and stylish. Fantastic quality. Can't say enough good things about
links_reviews_text: Fits to size

I absolutely love this! The length, fit and design were very flattering. Unlike many other sweater dresses, it was not too tight in the butt/thighs. The material is so soft and cozy; will definitely rent again.

The perfect dress. So flattering but trendy, elegant and comfortable. Wore on a flight with over the knee boots. Also wore to work with a leather jacket. Would look very cute wjrh sneakers too. Want to buy for sure.
Comfortable, chic, and warm. I liked this dress and will probably rent ago for work in the fall.

I rented this dress at 26-27 weeks pregnant. Loved it and got a ton of compliments. It runs slightly tight through the chest and shoulders but the rest of the dress was true to size. If I rent again, I will size up to a S from the XS. Overall, a great rental. Perfect for end of winter transitioning to spring.

links_reviews_title: Looks dumpy because the contrast colors are right on the stomach.
links_reviews_text: Highlights stomach!
Looked pretty shapeless on me, even when I sized down. With bare legs this dress clung in an unappealing static-y way. Sent back unworn.
loved this styling and wasn't itchy

my office knows I rent the runway so I dont always get compliments, but this dress recieved a few. The fit was very comfortable. the bottom was a bit clingy, as my slip was not long enough to accommodate. I would rent again.

I will be renting it again. This is a gorgeous and very warm sweater dress. Perfect for the 10-degree temps in NYC the other week. I'm curvy and this drapped beautifully. I usually size up in tight dresses but it isn't necessary here. It's not a tight dress but it's a flattering dress (if you have bottom curves). For reference, I do not like the bodycon look. That's not what this dress it. I wore it to work and on a date with over the knee boots.

links_reviews_title: loved this- very cozy but still look put together
links_reviews_text: love this- ran a tad big but still looked great. Felt sophisticated yet comfortable at the office

not the most flattering dress, but i shldve known it wldnt be. i'm typically a 2/4 and sized down because this was shift dress. the dress fit w tons of room around the waist. unlike a usual shift dress, it didn't continue to bell out at the bottom, it became a bit straight so ended up making me look like i have a large waist so this was just ok for me. hit around the knees.
Beautiful dress that hugs in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love this dress and get compliments absolutely every time I wear it!
links_reviews_text: Simple, striking and easy to wear. Only slight negative is that wool is not quite as soft as one might wish for an item that otherwise looks and feels luxurious
Not too scratchy for a sweater material. Length is perfect and the design is flattering. It's a bit lighter and not a thick material, so it's good for wearing indoors without getting too warm.
Really comfy dress. Easy to throw on and immediately elegant. Wore to work.

I may never return this dress. I've worn the large from about 21 weeks pregnant with my second to 28 weeks and hope to wear it until at least 32-34 weeks. Super soft -- my toddler loves giving me hugs in this, probably bc I'm like a large teddy bear. Loose enough to be comfortable in late 2nd trimester. Loved it enough that I bought a small from the designer for when I'm no longer pregnant.
So many compliments. This one is great.
Really lovely blazer. Fits well. Really interesting two different fabrics that go really well together. Classic yet chic.

I really want to buy this, maybe on second rental I will. I loved the two different patterns, the fit was awesome, perfect length. It is hot here so I rolled up the sleeves, and I felt stylish in my conservative workplace.

I loved this jacket so much! I desperately wanted to keep it, but the price point was just too high... perfect fit, like it was tailored to me. Great weight, nice lining... an all-over fantastic blazer!

I have yet to purchase a blazer in my adult life because I can't find one I like. I have broad shoulders and am busty, with a narrower waist, and I have a terrible time with the fit of a blazer. This was perfect and I've now decided I like blazers. Wore it with jeans and a t-shirt for a more casual work day, and threw it on for a Skype meeting (with PJ pants obviously). A bit heavier for the summer, and I had to cuff the sleeves as they hit my wrists at a weird spot - otherwise the 6 was a perfect fit.
Love this blazer! Work for work and with jeans for date night. Would purchase if it wasn't quite so pricey. Will rent again!
This blazer has the perfect modern fitted cut. I have worn it several times, out to dinner and to work meetings. It has a really clean fit unlike a lot of bulky women's blazers. Great jacket!
So cute. I loved the bright blue detailing. One button. Fits large chest.
Fit perfectly with a great plaid print. High quality blazer.

Liked this jacket. There are a lot of fun details (button stitching is bright blue in color, contrasting fabric patterns at elbow/etc. it was very comfortable and fit well, was also warm enough to wear on cooler fall days.
Good-looking sharp jacket. Compliments. Fits well. Comfortable. Easy. Perfect for work. Good details.

I love this jacket and may purchase it. The side panel and sleeve detailing are great. The detail material is also a subtle plaid with the same color scheme- slate blue with navy, maroon, and peachy tan accents. There are also great bright blue details at the button holes. These are visible in my review of the Kate spade black sam bag (also pictured). I love this as a competing look to all of the fashionable sport coats you see men wearing with jeans on casual Friday. Very fun and professional.

Love this blazer! Unique but tasteful. Bold but not too bold so that it is work appropriate even for a conservative workplace. I've worn it twice and wish I could keep it. I own 3 Rage and Bone Blazers, so I have good luck with the fit and brand.
Wore it for an interview and it was amazing!! Looked and felt great!
Gorgeous, flattering plaid jacket. The different colors / prints of fabric and they way they are cut make an almost contour effect - very comfortable, easy to wear, looks great with navy pants.
Loved this! Was perfect with jeans and heels.

Loved the fabric and the print. Unfortunately it was too small. I wasn't planning on wearing it closed but it wouldn't fit over my chest. Looked like I was trying to wear something that wasn't the right size.
Felt like a million bucks. fit well, looks great will likely buy it.

links_reviews_title: Love this blazer! Will rent again
links_reviews_text: Beautiful construction. Pattern is nice balance of interesting but classic. The darker back of sleeves and stripe down the side keeps it interesting. Will rent again, may size down to a 10.
This has a great pattern and fits really well and true to size. My only complaint is that after repeated cleanings and shipping, the lapel doesn't lay quite flat.
Interesting details like bright blue on the sleeve buttons. The cut was flattering and it looked great over a dress or with casual jeans. Highly recommend for those who like the blazer look!
Great fit, flattering and comfortable. Good for a professional office.

This blazer fits amazingly well, and the contrast fabric on the back of the arms/elbow areas is a great detail. I've rented this twice already on Unlimited and will definitely put it into the regular rotation, especially once the weather cools down a little more.
Got this for a job interview. Looked and felt great.
Nice blazer. The fit was great and TTS 4 even while I'm pregnant. I liked this overall and can see lots of ways to wear this -- over black dresses or with jeans + tee
Great jacket to pull on over a basic outfit when heading out the door. Glad I sized up...the 16 fit perfect. I'll check out other Rag and Bone items after wearing this classic.
This is nice jacket. A little preppy, a little sass. Not the most flattering fit for me; has a nice roomy chest, and I'm pretty flat-chested — maybe would have been better in a size down, though.
Perfect fit! Love this blazer! Structured yet feminine!
Great quality and fit and perfect for work. Got lots of compliments and would rent again

I got so many enthusiastic compliments on this blazer that I began to wonder if I usually look like garbage. :) The fit was great and looked polished with jeans and a white t-shirt. Size 4 was on the snug side, but I think that was the appropriate look for the cut of the blazer.

I wore this blazer five or six times for various occasions: business meeting; jeans and tee shirt daywear; and, over a shirred raspberry cocktail dress. It's completely versatile, a very exciting blue grey pink plaid, and it fits the body perfectly. I'm going to buy this blazer soon.

links_reviews_title: Love this! So cute with jeans and current way to update your work style.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly. Love the colors. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a work conference and ended up wearing it three times!
links_reviews_text: Loved the royal blue details on this blazer, wore it with the collar popped and some loafers that matched the burgundy stripe perfectly. Went two sizes up from my usual 6 for a larger comfy fit and it was spot on.

links_reviews_title: I loved the pattern and detailing on this blazer. So fun for work!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and a nice length for my 5'7" body.
Fit well
Nice fit, design and fabric.
It's a loose fit but I liked the design and material. It felt high end.

links_reviews_title: I liked the detailing...the long sleeve patches and the contrasting threading on buttonholes
links_reviews_text: Didn't get compliments but I liked it!
Fit true to size
Good for business but with nice pink lines in the plaid making it a bit more feminine
Fits well, very nicely made

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, but kind of shapeless
links_reviews_text: Wasn't a great look on me. But it was warm and a lovely color.

Got so many compliments on this fun coat! It is basically a thick sweater material but very warm. I know some people commented on the fit being boxy, but I am 5'4" with a petite athletic build and I thought the XS fit great!

links_reviews_title: Pop of color is perfect to brighten up a winter look!
links_reviews_text: Could have gotten I size down but still worked with layering chunky sweaters... brighten a winter look!

Super bright coat! Way heavier than I expected as it looks semi cardigan like on the stock photo and others reviews but it definitely is very much a coat. Definitely a fun piece to wear in the winter!

links_reviews_title: The most unexpected but perfectly brilliant every day piece.
links_reviews_text: I originally got this thinking "I'll wear it for my photo shoot and return it because I hate pink" but I ended up LOVING it so I kept it and then re-ordered it again I loved it so much.

Forgot to take a pic but here is my fully grown male office mate wearing the coat which should tell you how big it runs. Color is nice, kept pretty warm even tho material is something between a sweater and a properly lined coat but not being able to button it was also annoying
Great coat. It wasn't very cold the day I wore it. But it seemed snuggly and warm.

Loved the color and style of this coat! Warm enough for walking a few blocks in the chilly nighttime Chicago air. For me the fit was a bit off--shoulders were wide, but was very slim around the hips/booty.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a weekend in New York
links_reviews_text: Rented a size medium for myself and used the backup size to get my sister a matching coat (size small). The sizing was perfect and we both were able to have a fun coat for our birthday weekend in New York.

The color is gorgeous and it's so comfy and warm. I ended up sending it back right away because the pockets lay so weird. They stick out and make it look like your hips are huge and not in a cute way. I was able to make it look okay for this pic but wasn't impressed enough to keep it for a whole month.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color!! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: A tad bit Heavy but perfect for colder weather.

links_reviews_title: Brought a fun splash of color into my monochromatic closet! Plus, comfy AF.
links_reviews_text: This coat fit perfectly, with enough room to layer up on chillier days. I wore this with layers and a scarf on a 40 degree day in Chicago, as well as with a light top and jeans on a 55 degree day and was comfortable both times. Easily transitions from work to casual wear with the right outfit and styling. Extremely comfortable and totally eye-catching color. I got lots of compliments on this one!

So soft, stretchy, and just the right weight for a spring jacket that you can layer up! Love the pockets! Love that it's long enough in the arms and fits me great as I'm 6ft tall. Got the XL and I normally wear a size 10, and it fits great.

links_reviews_title: Great fun coat Perfect for early spring
links_reviews_text: I'm tall so it worked well but I could see it being too over sized for a shorter gal. Great to pop a color- I actually bought it!

links_reviews_title: A great everyday coat to brighten up the Winter blues!
links_reviews_text: Runs large, so I recommend sizing down one size! I am a true small and originally ordered it and it swallowed me! I loved the look of the coat for a casual everyday look and ordered the XS and it was perfect! If you love pink add this to brighten up your wardrobe. So many ways to style it so you can wear it many times!
It's got stretch to it, which made it incredibly comfortable. It's very warm, too. It ran a tad tight so it would not have fit of I wore it with a sweater or something bulky.

I was went to a Harry Potter themed bar crawl and chose to be Delores Umbridge. This jacket, paired with Donna Morgan pink dress was so perfect. All night I received compliments and even won the costume contest. The jacket is large and not very form fitting, I ordered a medium even though I could have used the large for the sleeve length. The medium still felt very big. The material is thick and heavy, best to be worn for cooler but not freezing weather, it does not have a way to fasten close.

links_reviews_title: Wish it came in more colors!
links_reviews_text: Feels like a sweater, but is warm like a coat. SO cozy. Wish I didn't have to return it!

links_reviews_title: Love the color, Jacket was fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Overall I loved this jacket. Im figuring out other ways to wear it. I haven't it yet, i want to hold on to it as long as possible!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, but pockets made it feel very wide and unflattering
links_reviews_text: I LOVED the color of this jacket and it's very soft (perfect for a mild winter in LA), but when I put it on, it was very unflattering. I don't mind over-sized things and the fit is pretty large, but the way the pockets fell was just a little too unflattering. It might be totally fine when paired with sweaters/boots/full winter gear though!

It's so cute and actually decently warm. The pink is atypical for winter and really makes you pop. It fits like a thick and heavy cardigan, but it's definitely a winter jacket. There is no way to close the front, so I would say it's for like 45ish degrees or warmer.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, masterfully constructed coat but petites be forewarned
links_reviews_text: If you're 5'6' or taller, this coat is a major do. The fabric is a baby soft, thick, stretchy felted wool in a vibrant shade of deep fuchsia. Unfortunately, the sleeves, even when cuffed, were too long (you can see my right one rolled vs. left arm as-is in pic). Even worse was that the proportions on the lapels and shoulders just swam on my frame. I tried belting and it didn't help. I wish this came cut to petite sizing because I would have given anything to wear the coat, but just couldn't carry it without looking like a clown. Ah, well. Tall gals, enjoy it for the shorties.
Love this coat. I wore it over a tank and under my more heavy weight pea coat in 30 degree weather. It is true to size and quite warm.

So many compliments!!! I can think of so many ways to pair this, I wore it first with all black and a leopard bootie. I border bw a M/L depending on designer but I went with medium as I don't like extra bulk jackets like this can add. I think it fits perfect though the pockets are a bit far back on the sides but not enough to be noticeable to make me size up. If you want a warm bold pop of color this is for you!!!
So cool for spring can be worn up or down, sweats or evening outfit!
Pretty tight in the arms for a jacket, not comfortable at all with a long sleeve under it. Overall this wasn't flattering on me
Brighten up your winter with this coat. I live in Florida and something like this is a "winter coat" for us. It's incredibly comfortable and I received MANY compliments. Purchased.

I really liked the color and fabric of this coat, would've been nice to wear everyday but as others have said it does run small and it also doesn't close in the front. It doesn't have buttons, a belt, or zipper, so if you'd definitely need a scarf if you're wearing it when it's very cold out.
Fabric is soft and fit is big but still flattering for crisp winter days

I wore it for a work trip in NYC and got so many compliments. Super comfy and warm too -- I loved being able to walk outside in 40 degree weather sporting this very fun and fashionable liece and not having to take a bulky coat to wear instead.

I rented this coat for a business trip to a colder climate and got so many compliments while I was wearing it. The style is open front (no buttons) and is intended to look a little oversized, so I often wore it as an accent to whatever I was wearing for the day. Loved the deep pockets and the bold color too. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Loved this coat! Wore it during my third trimester and it was a great stylish spring coat.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, perfect for in-between spring weather.

links_reviews_title: Love it. So fun to have a pink coat. Ended up purchasing it.
links_reviews_text: So fun to have a pink coat. Loved it. Ended up buying it.
Striking color. Soft and stretchy fabric. Yet warm. Let the compliments roll in with this statement piece.
Great pop of color for spring! I paired with a bright orange dress and an orange-and-pink scarf

links_reviews_title: Great statement piece, received many compliments. This was great transition from winter to spring!
links_reviews_text: I am usually a large but the XL was great fit. Not too big and not too restricting.
Hot colour! A little big in the shoulders but I usually wear an xs, this was a small.

Really nice material and color - was so sad I couldn't wear it. I'm around 130 lbs and 5'2, with narrow shoulders. I was drowning in the small. Really long and awkward on the shoulders. Maybe XS would have been better. I am usually a small or medium but this was big.
Beautiful color but looked like a robe on me -- I'm petite, not for the under 5'5" folks.
Loved the fit, really accentuated my waistline and is very comfortable.
This shirt was perfect for flying to NYC and enjoying the city immediately. In my opinion fit perfectly and was easy to tie. I did have to retie it throughout the day.

This is a great option instead of a t shirt. It's not dressy but looks pulled together. I wore in the evening with dark ankle length denim and during the day with navy shorts. Needed a long necklace to break up the broad part at the top. Would definitely rent again and considered buying. Only downside is that it needs ironed before each wear.
A lot of compliments on this top! I loved the fit.

links_reviews_title: Love this top! So flattering even on a petite person.
links_reviews_text: I love the fit. Its so comfortable and has been perfect for a trip to visit my in-laws.
Truly loved this shirt. The fit looked amazing. Got a small even tho I'm usually a medium. Don't sleep on this shirt!
I wish I could buy this. I tied it in the back and I tied it in the front. I loved it both ways. Medium weight material but breathable! I was very comfortable in this!
A bit big, I'd size down!

At first, I didn't think I was going to like this top. It looked like an apron when I first put it on, but after some time playing with the structure, I ended up really liking it. I tied it in the front and tucked the extra fabric inside the sides of the shirt to smooth it out (look really close in the photo). Wore it with jeans to work but it could be dressed up or down. Material is high quality and comfortable.

Before I tied this, I thought oh wow, I'm wearing a poncho. The shape changes quite a bit when it's tied and I think is very flattering. The top is soooo big though. It doesn't come through on the picture, but I had to tie it pretty tight and it's so big on the top you can see my bra on the sides if I were to lift my arms. I'd definitely size down (I'm a size 6 in shirts). Also, this one came pretty wrinkled and stayed pretty wrinkled. Since it's cinched at the waist with the tie, it's not as obvious. I'd rent again for a casual date night or a summer work day, but I'd size down next time.
I really like this top. The fabric is a bit heavy and is very flattering for my shape. Comfortable but dressy looking. Looking forward to wearing it multiple times during my rental!
Fit true to size. Breathable fabric. A nice, respectable, casual shirt.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, dresses up or down
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size small, sometimes xs, but based on other reviews I went with the xs which was a perfect fit. It was cute with skinny jeans and heels for a night out or flats for daytime. I'm thinking about making a purchase because I'd definitely wear this one often. I also layered under a cardigan and it looked super cute.

Super cute top! Fun with jeans and heels. Does run a bit big. I'm usually a large (size 12) and could have easily size down to a medium. Liked the fit of the top....the tie makes it slimming. Also liked the length. Definitely a winner!
Cool fabric, interesting cut, the belt was too short to tie nicely though so it looked boxy.
Love this top for work! Light material and flattering with the tie front!

links_reviews_title: The reviews were right, this is the most flattering top!
links_reviews_text: I listened to other people's reviews and went with the Medium when I would normally order a Large from RTR and it was a perfect fit. Very light material which was perfect for a summer work party - the tie is so flattering and you won't be disappointed if you rent this. I received so many compliments and would love to buy this top.

Perfect for hot weather. It took me two wears to get the folds right - needs to be ironed, but to be expected with this material. It had very chic look, very flattering. I wore it to some work meetings during really high temp / humidity days. I did need to wear a tank underneath, as the arm holes were huge, despite my renting the XS.
I would recommend sizing down. I rented a large. I normally wear a size 12 top and have a 36DD chest. The large was pretty big on me. I still wore it and it was so cute! Even better in person!

links_reviews_title: One of my top 5 rentals so far
links_reviews_text: Great casual top but structured enough to wear with slacks for work - especially in the summer heat. Getting the tie right can take a few tries. Wore it with skinny jeans and sandals. Loved it!
Ran a little large on me but cute!
This top was fine but not memorable. I liked the longer length, but overall it was kinda frumpy.

links_reviews_title: Great for work and night out, very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This felt like I wasn't wearing anything (which is a good thing), super comfortable and laid really nicely. The material feels great and the colors made it work with all different jean washes and even navy slacks to work. Wore it out to dinner and to work, wore several times during rental period. No one commented on it though, so I don't know, maybe it didn't look as good on me as I thought!
So cute for work and could work for probably any body type!

Wore this around in Seattle in June; very nice weight natural fabric blend. It may run a LITTLE big, if you're dying to try this piece but availability is an issue, you may be able to size down. Does accentuate shoulders, so if you don't like that, don't pick. I absolutely loved it.
Loved this top. Great for work but would also look great with skinny jeans on the weekend.

links_reviews_title: I loved this look for work with a pair of grey pants.
links_reviews_text: It ran large, there's a lot of fabric.
This Top looks great with jeans very slimming

links_reviews_title: Loved the colors. Perfect for spring
links_reviews_text: I'm a 16 and XL, but could have went down to a Large. The blouse is pretty and I received plenty of compliments. Perfect for spring/summer!

links_reviews_title: Weird fit, muted color and wrinkles = didn't wear
links_reviews_text: This top didn't work for my body type...it was lose, empire cut but also cropped in length. The color was also a muted teal - not a strong jewel color, so it almost looked faded. The fabric was a nice substantial weave, but also came very wrinkled and I wasn't able to quickly steam out the wrinkles - so since it also didn't fit well, I didn't bother to spend more than a few minutes with the steamer. The neck ties didn't seem to ever tie right - looked awkward. I won't be renting again.
This shirt is high quality, fits nicely, and has very cute details on the sleeves!
Great for work with a cami under it, or nights too
Can be dressed up or down. Love the color
Loved this shirt, great for work and super comfortable. I sized down one size and it fit great. My only complaint is that the fabric wasn’t very breathable.
Easy and flattering. Silky material. Looks classy. A bit loose fitting.
Loved the color
More beautiful in person than I expected. I wore this to work and out to dinner.

links_reviews_title: Work appropriate and love the color
links_reviews_text: Love the color and got a matching green Tory Burch purse to compliment the look. Need to wear a top underneath to be work appropriate. Runs true to size I'm a 2/4 and wore a 2 with a 32DD chest.
This shirt fit as expected. I'm pear shape and appreciated that the bottom was not fitted. It was a little low so wore a tank under it to make it work appropriate. Great color and quality.
The arms and neck are dashing. Wear this only if you don't have to hide it under a suit jacket.

links_reviews_title: I ordered a size up, mistake.
links_reviews_text: Was big, boxy and short.
Love the fit and style! Perfect for work.

This shirt is flattering and the color perfectly matches my eyes. Wrist cuff buttons can be difficult to button/un-button, but they have a classy slimming effect that I really like. The hanging straps are a bit weird if they're left just hanging out, but I did a simple single knot that made them look fine. Would rent again.
It fits true to size. It wrinkles easily, but once you are out and about you forget about that. I love the sleeves. The material is not as high quality as it looks in the picture.
Beautiful color, was such a cute option to wear to work, then out for drinks afterwards! Size at least one size down
beautiful, quality blouse.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work! Professional and flattering!
Perfect for work or date night
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly! I absolutely love this and will definitely rent again.
Great fitting blouse that transition from work to a night date with ease! went from work pants to white jeans to give it a more casual look. HIGHLY recommend!
Very pretty and well-made top. Perfect for work.
Would definitely rent again
Nice color, fit was comfortable, but neckline/tie was strange and unwieldy for me
Loose but very flattering hang.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely beautiful blouse - I paired it with a cream colored skirt for work. Will rent again.
links_reviews_text: Lovely fabric and color. It was a little difficult to button the sleeves, but otherwise it was an A+!
True to size, I liked wearing this top for work. My only issue was the ties that fall from the collar.

This blouse is silky and a beautiful color. I thought I'd end up tying the straps into a bow, but I found it looked better to leave them hanging. Only con was that you had to unbutton the wrists to fit your hands through (and I have very thin wrists).
Beautiful blouse with skirt or pants. The color is lovely. It's silk, but with stretch to it. The fabric feels fantastic. I will probably rent this one again.
nice blouse

links_reviews_title: Loved the classic look of this! Felt and fit just like the photo!
links_reviews_text: Wrist are tight when buttoned all the way but I have pretty tiny wrist so it still fit!

I wore the 12 as the 10 was not available...and the 12 was way too big. (All of which is to say: this is true to size, and maybe generously sized.) Perfect work top, though, with or without a blazer. Loved the material and the color.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, but a little "maternity" looking
links_reviews_text: I loved the color of this blouse, but didn't realize it had an empire waist. That gave it sort of a maternity vibe, which I didn't think was very flattering.
comfortable and flows. Received many compliments on the style and color.

links_reviews_title: I am 5'11 in tall and this was cut a little short for me.
links_reviews_text: Cut short and wide

links_reviews_title: No particular reason except the color.
links_reviews_text: I liked the color. Great top for work. I wore it untucked over some black slacks. I think I'd look good tucked into a nice pencil skirt. Was not sure what to do with tie.
Beautiful cut and feel. Excellent weight, not flimsy or sheer. I just wish the color was a bit more vibrant but otherwise fabulous.
I got so many compliments on this. Got it to wear for St. Patrick's day and it was definitely the perfect color. Beautiful, silk blouse that fits great!
I liked this even more than I thought I would. It was a beautiful color and looks very expensive. I paired with black high waisted skinny pants for work and loved the look.
The inner flaps sometimes popped out
Wore this with a black suit. Cute and professional- cut short but still fine for work.
Too cropped for my liking Fits true to size every where else though Color is a greyish Nice elastic band with some shimmer Not the warmest good for 60s
Love the sang on the inside & the lightning bolt on the back!!!

This was thick and well made ... loved the inspirational message inside! However, it was pretty cropped so even the large hit above my hips, so it was difficult to find comfy clothes to pair with. The color was a little dinge-y but I still enjoyed wearing
Not for a big bust (I'm a D cup and the medium looked like a child's jacket on me). Cute jacket for petite/slim.

Love this bomber! It's warm and has super cute detailing. Can wear casually with jean or with leggings. I wasn't sure how I would feel about the lightning bolt but it grew on me! It's a little short so if you're in between sizes go up. Sleeves could run short if you're pretty tall and would normally buy a small
Great, comfy every day jacket

I didn't end up wearing this jacket as it was way too short (more like a bolero jacket on me), and the color was much darker than the photo: more like a beige or mocha than white. Very cute and well made, though.

The fit on this jacket is very snug! I am petite but even the XS felt a bit short and tight. I understand it is supposed to be a slimmer fit, so I only wore a tshirt underneath. It is a super cute style so I made it work, but would size up next time.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this because it was too long on the arms.
links_reviews_text: The arms are a bit long (as shown), so it looked too over-sized on me.

I loved this blazer! It fit a bit long, but was so easy to keep casual with jeans and a tee underneath. I definitely wavered a bit before ultimately sending back, it was a bit too Easter-y to justify buying. I'll definitely be renting again.
Fit was great, nice and bright for the spring. Got many complaints
