links_reviews_title: The colors were great and could easily dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket. Wore it on my vacation dressed down with sneakers and jean shorts, then also wore it for work with dress pants and heals. Got compliments on it for both occasions and I loved wearing the pops of color

links_reviews_title: Wore it to DJ in Vegas. Loved it.

links_reviews_text: I did like this jacket and I got a lot of compliments on it, but I did feel a bit like I should be running a circus in it. It was also very heavy, and although I am often cold at work, I wanted to take this jacket off. It was definitely very stylish though. I rented it to go with jeans and I think that was the right move- most of the ppl who were happy with it in reviews had jeans on. It's mostly too different/fancy/colorful/shiny to wear with anything else.
I feel like I should run a candy store or sing in a quartet in this, which is why I love it. It's like candyland. It just makes me happy to wear it!
Was a really cute piece to spice up my normal business casual! Def recommend!

I like this blazer. It fits nicely and is clearly well made. I love the grey color on the inside. I think I was expecting the colors to be a little more vibrant - it's got a kind of strange washed out candy striper feel but it's still fun and I got a lot of compliments at work!

I really wanted to like this blazer but it didn't look professional enough for work. Unlike what others have written in reviews, I actually thought the shine to the fabric made it look cheaper. Way too flashy for court, even on a casual/non-trial day. Fit was good though.

links_reviews_title: Brightens up a work outfit and also great for dinner after work
links_reviews_text: The fit was good, the arms a little long but not much. Paired it with pink jeans and various tops.
so fun! lots of compliments - perfect example of a piece i'd never ever buy, but rent multiple times
Loved the Pastel colors, beautifully made. I really loved this, I wore it to a graduation and it was perfect

I am loving the way this fits me. The fabric is dressier than it appears in the photos because there's a light sheen to it. From the photos, I thought it was a poplin. Can't wait to wear it to work with white denim.
Rented the jacket along with the matching pants and I really like the look. Substantial fabric and nice stretch. Will rent again.
Very comfortable blazer. Wore for work and date night. Great piece to rent since it's such a statement piece.

I normally would order a 14, but grabbed the 16 because it's summer, and I was worried the heat would make the lining tight and uncomfortable. That meant the blazer was a little large, since it is true to fit, but I was still glad I did it. Overall, I paired it with the J. Crew Crisp Begonia Resume Dress, which was a perfect match. Definitely happy with this rental.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Great fit and style
links_reviews_text: Great fit. I am between an 8/10 in dresses and just hoped a 10 would work and it was perfect. I wore to work with dark jeans, flats and a light pink shirt tucked in. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun suit for Easter! I got so many compliments about it!
links_reviews_text: I sized down in the jacket bc I have a pear shape! It was a perfect fit. I think the jacket would've been too big if I had gotten a 20z

It fit like a glove (maybe a biiiit large on the waist, but I wouldn't size down) and it definitely pops in an office. The material feels expensive and the picture does no justice to the brightness of the colors. Will rent again for sure

links_reviews_title: The colors on this blazer make it a real head turner!
links_reviews_text: Love the fit, I think I would be much more comfortable ina size 8 but it still fits well!

links_reviews_title: Work at work conference in Miami
links_reviews_text: Liked it so much I bought it! Such a cute outfit and I got TONS of compliments and people asking here it was from. Love this outfit!
This blazer is perfect with a tee and jeans! Just note, size up. I read the earlier reviews and went a size up, it ended up fitting like a glove

Several of my co-workers loved this jacket. It is super shiny and the colors are bright. I felt kind of strange in it all day though - felt a little too shiny and too pastel to be taken seriously. For a non-work event it would probably be better - I work in a business casual but still old-school office.

So I got two sizes bigger than usual, and it still was to tight on the chest, while being baggy everywhere else. Also would have probably fit better if I were taller. Really nice jacket. Disappointed I couldn't wear it
Loved this jacket, great fit, fun colors, no stretch. I considered buying!

links_reviews_title: Too warm for midsummer but cute!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my art opening but it was too warm to wear on that day bc it's 100% polyester. The coordinating pants run large. This would be great for a cooler summer look or someone who's comfortable in sleeves when it's over 80°F
Nice fit but a little shinier than I prefer. Wore it to work three times: paired with a magenta sheath, with dark turquoise pants, and with bright berry pink pants. Fun all around.

This is a nice blazer with some stretch and great fabric. The cut is very straight though, so probably would go to a 12 if I wanted to button it as I'm large chested/small waist... it's just a bit too tight around the chest. I am going to wear it a few times open though and we'll see how it goes.

The colors aren't as vibrant as they appear online. I rented the jacket & pants to wear as a suit and it was not as pretty as depicted online. You should also know that it has a polyester sheen appearance- shiny material with muted/dull colors was just weird.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blazer but large in the shoulders.
links_reviews_text: The painterly colors and subtle sheen of the fabric were truly high quality. Swallowed my shoulders but it fit everywhere else. Wish it had fit.

This sweater was amazing! Such a Beautiful Merigold color that is so uplifting. The knit feels heavy and high-quality and the balloon sleeves are awesome! I got several compliments and girls asking where I got it. It's warm but not too warm and the length is perfect to wear with high waisted bottoms for petites.

i love this sweater - the color, the weight, the sleeves. but the hanger it came on stretched out the shoulders so they don't lie flat, they have peaks. not a good look. maybe heavy sweaters like this should be sent folded, not hung, like they'd be stored at home. bummed...
Great color and shape. It was a little itchy and shorter than expected.

The most wonderful sweet potato soufflé of a sweater. I love it so much. Could not wear this enough, got compliments ever day and didn't want to send back. Although the sleeves are a bit bulky it was cozy and comfortable all day.

links_reviews_title: Loved the size of the sleeves
links_reviews_text: Oversized sweater which I loved and I loved the color

links_reviews_title: Loved everything about it. Feel, color and fit..so yummy!
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were long and fun , sweater kept me warm and cozy. Wore it with pants and a dress. Very versatile.
Wanted to buy this sweater it's so soft!

I absolutely loved this sweater. I wore it with high waisted wide legged jeans for shopping and over a hunter green dress with a Peter Pan collar for work (pictured) I cannot stress how warm it is. The sleeves make coats a bit tricky but I ended up not needing one because it did the trick on its own (on a fairly brisk fall NYC day)

The pictures do not do this sweater justice. It's a heavy sweater, so works better on a colder day. Would be tough to wear to work if you sit inside at a desk all day as it would probably be too warm. It's a little shorter than I'd like, but manageable. It was quite itchy at first, but not unbearable. Love the color and am keeping it to wear again next weekend when the temperature drops a little more. Would definitely rent this again. One issue with it is the sleeves are so thick, I couldn't get any of my coats over them without squeezing my arms in. So, may be better on a cool fall day where you don't necessarily need a coat also.
I loved this sweater! Fits true to size. I did not find it overly cropped or long. Very flattering and does not appear bulky on.

The sweater had a beautiful rich marigold color. It was cozy to wear and the low balloon sleeves were flattering. My biggest con about this sweater was the amount of pilling and shedding that occurred. I found it very frustrating the amount of pilling on the inside and outside of the sweater and shedding the occurred when I wore it (4 times).

Bigger fit, which I prefer. Fit like a sweatshirt (not skin tight) if you will. It made me feel so good about myself every time I put it on. OBSESSED. It was hard to send it back. I wore it to work and for everyday.

It is surprising that I don't have a picture in this sweater bc I wore this nearly every other day for three weeks. I LOVED this sweater. The bell sleeves don't comfortably in jackets, but the sweater was warm and worked for me in moderate winter San Francisco.
Short at the bottom, pretty heavy
Great sweater with a pair of jeans and boots! Warm and perfect for the fall/winter months.
So comfortable and cute!

The sleeves are super on trend and the color is the perfect fall color. I did size up and get a M which fit fine but I think the S would have been fine too. M gives a more oversized cozy sweater look and S would have fit a little more true to size. Had to wear a tank underneath cuz it’s a tad itchy but otherwise definitely recommend!
Very warm!
Runs large, didn't wear
Very comfortable material, great color.
Enjoyed this sweater and would def rent again next fall or winter! Could work in early spring as well.

This sweater was very comfortable, hit at the right length. The sleeve shape added some style to an otherwise relaxed outfit. Paired it with the See by Chloe patchwork jeans, great combo! Only downside was that it shed a lot, there are mustard yellow wisps all over me now.
This was cute but a little shorter at the waist than I expected. I'm 5'2.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, cute sleeves, super comfy
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater and got a lot of compliments on it. Fit is super cute and the sleeves have nice detailing. Quality is tops and yarn is so soft. Paired it with high waisted jeans and white sneakers for a casual weekday/weekend look.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it. Was too itchy
links_reviews_text: Itchy :(

links_reviews_title: Beware. It's like a crop top
links_reviews_text: Super heavy fabric. Extremely short. Showed my belly button. Not ideal.

Wore this to happy hour and it's super oversized. Would have loved to wear a smaller size, but made this work once before sending back. The color is beautiful and so are the sleeves, but fabric was really scratchy also. Not a huge fan but did the trick.
The color and style was great but it was so itchy I couldn't wear it

Loved this sweater. Heavy fabric, good golden color, warm. I didn't have an issue with the extra fabric fitting into my coat sleeves, but I can see how this can be annoying or not possible since there is a large rounded bell sleeve.
Fun sweater, but not as nice as I expected. Only wore once. Sleeves were so large, hard to wear a jacket over.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves too big under a coat
links_reviews_text: Big sleeves are a great unexpected detail but I found it too hard to wear with a coat. Could wear w a cape but it's too cold here!!!
Very thick and warm

links_reviews_title: The coziest fall sweater you will ever wear
links_reviews_text: I wore this at least a dozen times. The designer Mara Hoffman said to wear it as much as possible before washing it, so I'd like to think I was just following orders but the truth is it was so incredibly comfortable, soft, plush, and warm. I returned it reluctantly after keeping it for almost 2 months. I miss it already.
Beautiful sweater, I accidentally ordered a size too big but it's very heavy - great for a chilly day

links_reviews_title: I received compliments on the color - a rich gold hue.
links_reviews_text: great fit, cute bell sleeves

I love this cozy, thick Mara Hoffman sweater. The color was a tad darker than expected (somewhere between marigold and burnt orange), but it's a lovely fall/winter color. The puff sleeves can be a tough fit under certain coat/jacket arms, so just something to think about before renting for the winter!

links_reviews_title: So cute but sheds literally everywhere!
links_reviews_text: This sweater is so cute, feminine and easy to wear. My only issue was that it shed literally everywhere! If you wear this make sure you have a lint brush with you.
This sweater is cropped and very short.

I am normally a small in sweaters but got a medium to avoid a cropped look. This sweater was so cozy and versatile. I would warn though to not rent this if you intend to wear with a coat. The sleeves are bell and thick and it's terribly uncomfortable to try to wear under a coat.

links_reviews_title: Cute! Runs true to size, maybe a touch big.
links_reviews_text: I am usually between a M and S and got the S and it is fitting perfectly. It is a fun twist on a normal every day sweater. The color is a really nice fall burnt orange.
